continue; (data) = ((jobs->table)->vals[__i]); { ABORTING
(set_ref_dict)(data->self, copyID); }; } }
5672 }){ khint_t __i; for (__i = (khint_t)(0); __i != ((jobs->table
)->n_buckets); ++__i) { if (!(!(((jobs->table)->flags
[(__i)>>4]>>(((__i)&0xfU)<<1))&3)))
continue; (data) = ((jobs->table)->vals[__i]); { ABORTING
(set_ref_dict)(data->self, copyID); }; } }
5673 }
5674
5675 // v: vars
5676 ABORTING(set_ref_in_ht)(&vimvarhtvimvardict.dv_hashtab, copyID, NULL((void*)0));
5677
5678 // history items (ShaDa additional elements)
5679 if (p_hi) {
5680 for (uint8_t i = 0; i < HIST_COUNT(HIST_DEBUG + 1); i++) {
5681 const void *iter = NULL((void*)0);
5682 do {
5683 histentry_T hist;
5684 iter = hist_iter(iter, i, false0, &hist);
5685 if (hist.hisstr != NULL((void*)0)) {
5686 ABORTING(set_ref_list)(hist.additional_elements, copyID);
5687 }
5688 } while (iter != NULL((void*)0));
5689 }
5690 }
5691
5692 // previously used search/substitute patterns (ShaDa additional data)
5693 {
5694 SearchPattern pat;
5695 get_search_pattern(&pat);
5696 ABORTING(set_ref_dict)(pat.additional_data, copyID);
5697 get_substitute_pattern(&pat);
5698 ABORTING(set_ref_dict)(pat.additional_data, copyID);
5699 }
5700
5701 // previously used replacement string
5702 {
5703 SubReplacementString sub;
5704 sub_get_replacement(&sub);
5705 ABORTING(set_ref_list)(sub.additional_elements, copyID);
5706 }
5707
5708 bool_Bool did_free = false0;
5709 if (!abort) {
5710 // 2. Free lists and dictionaries that are not referenced.
5711 did_free = free_unref_items(copyID);
5712
5713 // 3. Check if any funccal can be freed now.
5714 bool_Bool did_free_funccal = false0;
5715 for (funccall_T **pfc = &previous_funccal; *pfc != NULL((void*)0);) {
5716 if (can_free_funccal(*pfc, copyID)) {
5717 funccall_T *fc = *pfc;
5718 *pfc = fc->caller;
5719 free_funccal(fc, true1);
5720 did_free = true1;
5721 did_free_funccal = true1;
5722 } else {
5723 pfc = &(*pfc)->caller;
5724 }
5725 }
5726 if (did_free_funccal) {
5727 // When a funccal was freed some more items might be garbage
5728 // collected, so run again.
5729 (void)garbage_collect();
5730 }
5731 } else if (p_verbose > 0) {
5732 verb_msg((char_u *)_(gettext((char *)("Not enough memory to set references, garbage collection aborted!"
))
5733 "Not enough memory to set references, garbage collection aborted!")gettext((char *)("Not enough memory to set references, garbage collection aborted!"
)));
5734 }
5735#undef ABORTING
5736 return did_free;
5737}
5738
5739/// Free lists and dictionaries that are no longer referenced.
5740///
5741/// Note: This function may only be called from garbage_collect().
5742///
5743/// @param copyID Free lists/dictionaries that don't have this ID.
5744/// @return true, if something was freed.
5745static int free_unref_items(int copyID)
5746{
5747 bool_Bool did_free = false0;
5748
5749 // Go through the list of dicts and free items without the copyID.
5750 // Don't free dicts that are referenced internally.
5751 for (dict_T *dd = first_dict; dd != NULL((void*)0); ) {
5752 if ((dd->dv_copyID & COPYID_MASK(~0x1)) != (copyID & COPYID_MASK(~0x1))) {
5753 // Free the Dictionary and ordinary items it contains, but don't
5754 // recurse into Lists and Dictionaries, they will be in the list
5755 // of dicts or list of lists. */
5756 dict_T *dd_next = dd->dv_used_next;
5757 dict_free(dd, FALSE0);
5758 did_free = true1;
5759 dd = dd_next;
5760 } else {
5761 dd = dd->dv_used_next;
5762 }
5763 }
5764
5765 // Go through the list of lists and free items without the copyID.
5766 // But don't free a list that has a watcher (used in a for loop), these
5767 // are not referenced anywhere.
5768 for (list_T *ll = first_list; ll != NULL((void*)0);) {
5769 if ((ll->lv_copyID & COPYID_MASK(~0x1)) != (copyID & COPYID_MASK(~0x1))
5770 && ll->lv_watch == NULL((void*)0)) {
5771 // Free the List and ordinary items it contains, but don't recurse
5772 // into Lists and Dictionaries, they will be in the list of dicts
5773 // or list of lists.
5774 list_T* ll_next = ll->lv_used_next;
5775 list_free(ll, FALSE0);
5776 did_free = true1;
5777 ll = ll_next;
5778 } else {
5779 ll = ll->lv_used_next;
5780 }
5781 }
5782
5783 return did_free;
5784}
5785
5786/// Mark all lists and dicts referenced through hashtab "ht" with "copyID".
5787///
5788/// @param ht Hashtab content will be marked.
5789/// @param copyID New mark for lists and dicts.
5790/// @param list_stack Used to add lists to be marked. Can be NULL.
5791///
5792/// @returns true if setting references failed somehow.
5793bool_Bool set_ref_in_ht(hashtab_T *ht, int copyID, list_stack_T **list_stack)
5794 FUNC_ATTR_WARN_UNUSED_RESULT
5795{
5796 bool_Bool abort = false0;
5797 ht_stack_T *ht_stack = NULL((void*)0);
5798
5799 hashtab_T *cur_ht = ht;
5800 for (;;) {
5801 if (!abort) {
5802 // Mark each item in the hashtab. If the item contains a hashtab
5803 // it is added to ht_stack, if it contains a list it is added to
5804 // list_stack.
5805 int todo = (int)cur_ht->ht_used;
5806 for (hashitem_T *hi = cur_ht->ht_array; todo > 0; ++hi) {
5807 if (!HASHITEM_EMPTY(hi)((hi)->hi_key == ((void*)0) || (hi)->hi_key == &hash_removed
)) {
5808 --todo;
5809 abort = abort || set_ref_in_item(&HI2DI(hi)((dictitem_T *)((hi)->hi_key - __builtin_offsetof(dictitem_T
, di_key)))->di_tv, copyID, &ht_stack,
5810 list_stack);
5811 }
5812 }
5813 }
5814
5815 if (ht_stack == NULL((void*)0)) {
5816 break;
5817 }
5818
5819 // take an item from the stack
5820 cur_ht = ht_stack->ht;
5821 ht_stack_T *tempitem = ht_stack;
5822 ht_stack = ht_stack->prev;
5823 xfree(tempitem);
5824 }
5825
5826 return abort;
5827}
5828
5829/// Mark all lists and dicts referenced through list "l" with "copyID".
5830///
5831/// @param l List content will be marked.
5832/// @param copyID New mark for lists and dicts.
5833/// @param ht_stack Used to add hashtabs to be marked. Can be NULL.
5834///
5835/// @returns true if setting references failed somehow.
5836bool_Bool set_ref_in_list(list_T *l, int copyID, ht_stack_T **ht_stack)
5837 FUNC_ATTR_WARN_UNUSED_RESULT
5838{
5839 bool_Bool abort = false0;
5840 list_stack_T *list_stack = NULL((void*)0);
5841
5842 list_T *cur_l = l;
5843 for (;;) {
5844 if (!abort) {
5845 // Mark each item in the list. If the item contains a hashtab
5846 // it is added to ht_stack, if it contains a list it is added to
5847 // list_stack.
5848 for (listitem_T *li = cur_l->lv_first; !abort && li != NULL((void*)0);
5849 li = li->li_next) {
5850 abort = set_ref_in_item(&li->li_tv, copyID, ht_stack, &list_stack);
5851 }
5852 }
5853
5854 if (list_stack == NULL((void*)0)) {
5855 break;
5856 }
5857
5858 // take an item from the stack
5859 cur_l = list_stack->list;
5860 list_stack_T *tempitem = list_stack;
5861 list_stack = list_stack->prev;
5862 xfree(tempitem);
5863 }
5864
5865 return abort;
5866}
5867
5868/// Mark all lists and dicts referenced through typval "tv" with "copyID".
5869///
5870/// @param tv Typval content will be marked.
5871/// @param copyID New mark for lists and dicts.
5872/// @param ht_stack Used to add hashtabs to be marked. Can be NULL.
5873/// @param list_stack Used to add lists to be marked. Can be NULL.
5874///
5875/// @returns true if setting references failed somehow.
5876bool_Bool set_ref_in_item(typval_T *tv, int copyID, ht_stack_T **ht_stack,
5877 list_stack_T **list_stack)
5878 FUNC_ATTR_WARN_UNUSED_RESULT
5879{
5880 bool_Bool abort = false0;
5881
5882 switch (tv->v_type) {
5883 case VAR_DICT5: {
5884 dict_T *dd = tv->vval.v_dict;
5885 if (dd != NULL((void*)0) && dd->dv_copyID != copyID) {
5886 // Didn't see this dict yet.
5887 dd->dv_copyID = copyID;
5888 if (ht_stack == NULL((void*)0)) {
5889 abort = set_ref_in_ht(&dd->dv_hashtab, copyID, list_stack);
5890 } else {
5891 ht_stack_T *newitem = try_malloc(sizeof(ht_stack_T));
5892 if (newitem == NULL((void*)0)) {
5893 abort = true1;
5894 } else {
5895 newitem->ht = &dd->dv_hashtab;
5896 newitem->prev = *ht_stack;
5897 *ht_stack = newitem;
5898 }
5899 }
5900 }
5901 break;
5902 }
5903
5904 case VAR_LIST4: {
5905 list_T *ll = tv->vval.v_list;
5906 if (ll != NULL((void*)0) && ll->lv_copyID != copyID) {
5907 // Didn't see this list yet.
5908 ll->lv_copyID = copyID;
5909 if (list_stack == NULL((void*)0)) {
5910 abort = set_ref_in_list(ll, copyID, ht_stack);
5911 } else {
5912 list_stack_T *newitem = try_malloc(sizeof(list_stack_T));
5913 if (newitem == NULL((void*)0)) {
5914 abort = true1;
5915 } else {
5916 newitem->list = ll;
5917 newitem->prev = *list_stack;
5918 *list_stack = newitem;
5919 }
5920 }
5921 }
5922 break;
5923 }
5924 }
5925 return abort;
5926}
5927
5928/// Mark all lists and dicts referenced in given mark
5929///
5930/// @returns true if setting references failed somehow.
5931static inline bool_Bool set_ref_in_fmark(fmark_T fm, int copyID)
5932 FUNC_ATTR_WARN_UNUSED_RESULT
5933{
5934 if (fm.additional_data != NULL((void*)0)
5935 && fm.additional_data->dv_copyID != copyID) {
5936 fm.additional_data->dv_copyID = copyID;
5937 return set_ref_in_ht(&fm.additional_data->dv_hashtab, copyID, NULL((void*)0));
5938 }
5939 return false0;
5940}
5941
5942/// Mark all lists and dicts referenced in given list and the list itself
5943///
5944/// @returns true if setting references failed somehow.
5945static inline bool_Bool set_ref_list(list_T *list, int copyID)
5946 FUNC_ATTR_WARN_UNUSED_RESULT
5947{
5948 if (list != NULL((void*)0)) {
5949 typval_T tv = (typval_T) {
5950 .v_type = VAR_LIST4,
5951 .vval = { .v_list = list }
5952 };
5953 return set_ref_in_item(&tv, copyID, NULL((void*)0), NULL((void*)0));
5954 }
5955 return false0;
5956}
5957
5958/// Mark all lists and dicts referenced in given dict and the dict itself
5959///
5960/// @returns true if setting references failed somehow.
5961static inline bool_Bool set_ref_dict(dict_T *dict, int copyID)
5962 FUNC_ATTR_WARN_UNUSED_RESULT
5963{
5964 if (dict != NULL((void*)0)) {
5965 typval_T tv = (typval_T) {
5966 .v_type = VAR_DICT5,
5967 .vval = { .v_dict = dict }
5968 };
5969 return set_ref_in_item(&tv, copyID, NULL((void*)0), NULL((void*)0));
5970 }
5971 return false0;
5972}
5973
5974/*
5975 * Allocate an empty header for a dictionary.
5976 */
5977dict_T *dict_alloc(void) FUNC_ATTR_NONNULL_RET
5978{
5979 dict_T *d = xmalloc(sizeof(dict_T));
5980
5981 /* Add the dict to the list of dicts for garbage collection. */
5982 if (first_dict != NULL((void*)0))
5983 first_dict->dv_used_prev = d;
5984 d->dv_used_next = first_dict;
5985 d->dv_used_prev = NULL((void*)0);
5986 first_dict = d;
5987
5988 hash_init(&d->dv_hashtab);
5989 d->dv_lock = 0;
5990 d->dv_scope = 0;
5991 d->dv_refcount = 0;
5992 d->dv_copyID = 0;
5993 QUEUE_INIT(&d->watchers)do { (*(QUEUE **) &((*(&d->watchers))[0])) = (&
d->watchers); (*(QUEUE **) &((*(&d->watchers))[
1])) = (&d->watchers); } while (0);
5994
5995 return d;
5996}
5997
5998/*
5999 * Allocate an empty dict for a return value.
6000 */
6001static void rettv_dict_alloc(typval_T *rettv)
6002{
6003 dict_T *d = dict_alloc();
6004
6005 rettv->vval.v_dict = d;
6006 rettv->v_type = VAR_DICT5;
6007 ++d->dv_refcount;
6008}
6009
6010
6011/*
6012 * Unreference a Dictionary: decrement the reference count and free it when it
6013 * becomes zero.
6014 */
6015void dict_unref(dict_T *d)
6016{
6017 if (d != NULL((void*)0) && --d->dv_refcount <= 0)
6018 dict_free(d, TRUE1);
6019}
6020
6021/*
6022 * Free a Dictionary, including all items it contains.
6023 * Ignores the reference count.
6024 */
6025void
6026dict_free (
6027 dict_T *d,
6028 int recurse /* Free Lists and Dictionaries recursively. */
6029)
6030{
6031 int todo;
6032 hashitem_T *hi;
6033 dictitem_T *di;
6034
6035 /* Remove the dict from the list of dicts for garbage collection. */
6036 if (d->dv_used_prev == NULL((void*)0))
6037 first_dict = d->dv_used_next;
6038 else
6039 d->dv_used_prev->dv_used_next = d->dv_used_next;
6040 if (d->dv_used_next != NULL((void*)0))
6041 d->dv_used_next->dv_used_prev = d->dv_used_prev;
6042
6043 /* Lock the hashtab, we don't want it to resize while freeing items. */
6044 hash_lock(&d->dv_hashtab);
6045 assert(d->dv_hashtab.ht_locked > 0)((d->dv_hashtab.ht_locked > 0) ? (void) (0) : __assert_fail
("d->dv_hashtab.ht_locked > 0", "/home/travis/build/neovim/bot-ci/build/neovim/src/nvim/eval.c"
, 6045, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));
6046 todo = (int)d->dv_hashtab.ht_used;
6047 for (hi = d->dv_hashtab.ht_array; todo > 0; ++hi) {
6048 if (!HASHITEM_EMPTY(hi)((hi)->hi_key == ((void*)0) || (hi)->hi_key == &hash_removed
)) {
6049 /* Remove the item before deleting it, just in case there is
6050 * something recursive causing trouble. */
6051 di = HI2DI(hi)((dictitem_T *)((hi)->hi_key - __builtin_offsetof(dictitem_T
, di_key)));
6052 hash_remove(&d->dv_hashtab, hi);
6053 if (recurse || (di->di_tv.v_type != VAR_LIST4
6054 && di->di_tv.v_type != VAR_DICT5))
6055 clear_tv(&di->di_tv);
6056 xfree(di);
6057 --todo;
6058 }
6059 }
6060
6061 while (!QUEUE_EMPTY(&d->watchers)((const QUEUE *) (&d->watchers) == (const QUEUE *) (*(
QUEUE **) &((*(&d->watchers))[0])))) {
6062 QUEUE *w = QUEUE_HEAD(&d->watchers)((*(QUEUE **) &((*(&d->watchers))[0])));
6063 DictWatcher *watcher = dictwatcher_node_data(w);
6064 dictwatcher_free(watcher);
6065 QUEUE_REMOVE(w)do { ((*(QUEUE **) &((*((*(QUEUE **) &((*(w))[1]))))[
0]))) = (*(QUEUE **) &((*(w))[0])); ((*(QUEUE **) &((
*((*(QUEUE **) &((*(w))[0]))))[1]))) = (*(QUEUE **) &
((*(w))[1])); } while (0);
6066 }
6067
6068 hash_clear(&d->dv_hashtab);
6069 xfree(d);
6070}
6071
6072/*
6073 * Allocate a Dictionary item.
6074 * The "key" is copied to the new item.
6075 * Note that the value of the item "di_tv" still needs to be initialized!
6076 */
6077dictitem_T *dictitem_alloc(char_u *key) FUNC_ATTR_NONNULL_RET
6078{
6079 dictitem_T *di = xmalloc(sizeof(dictitem_T) + STRLEN(key)strlen((char *)(key)));
6080#ifndef __clang_analyzer__1
6081 STRCPY(di->di_key, key)strcpy((char *)(di->di_key), (char *)(key));
6082#endif
6083 di->di_flags = DI_FLAGS_ALLOC16;
6084 return di;
6085}
6086
6087/*
6088 * Make a copy of a Dictionary item.
6089 */
6090static dictitem_T *dictitem_copy(dictitem_T *org) FUNC_ATTR_NONNULL_RET
6091{
6092 dictitem_T *di = xmalloc(sizeof(dictitem_T) + STRLEN(org->di_key)strlen((char *)(org->di_key)));
6093
6094 STRCPY(di->di_key, org->di_key)strcpy((char *)(di->di_key), (char *)(org->di_key));
6095 di->di_flags = DI_FLAGS_ALLOC16;
6096 copy_tv(&org->di_tv, &di->di_tv);
6097
6098 return di;
6099}
6100
6101/*
6102 * Remove item "item" from Dictionary "dict" and free it.
6103 */
6104static void dictitem_remove(dict_T *dict, dictitem_T *item)
6105{
6106 hashitem_T *hi;
6107
6108 hi = hash_find(&dict->dv_hashtab, item->di_key);
6109 if (HASHITEM_EMPTY(hi)((hi)->hi_key == ((void*)0) || (hi)->hi_key == &hash_removed
)) {
6110 EMSG2(_(e_intern2), "dictitem_remove()")emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_intern2))), (char_u *)("dictitem_remove()"
));
6111 } else {
6112 hash_remove(&dict->dv_hashtab, hi);
6113 }
6114 dictitem_free(item);
6115}
6116
6117/*
6118 * Free a dict item. Also clears the value.
6119 */
6120void dictitem_free(dictitem_T *item)
6121{
6122 clear_tv(&item->di_tv);
6123 if (item->di_flags & DI_FLAGS_ALLOC16) {
6124 xfree(item);
6125 }
6126}
6127
6128/// Make a copy of dictionary
6129///
6130/// @param[in] conv If non-NULL, then all internal strings will be converted.
6131/// @param[in] orig Original dictionary to copy.
6132/// @param[in] deep If false, then shallow copy will be done.
6133/// @param[in] copyID See var_item_copy().
6134///
6135/// @return Copied dictionary. May be NULL in case original dictionary is NULL
6136/// or some failure happens. The refcount of the new dictionary is set
6137/// to 1.
6138static dict_T *dict_copy(const vimconv_T *const conv,
6139 dict_T *const orig,
6140 const bool_Bool deep,
6141 const int copyID)
6142{
6143 dictitem_T *di;
6144 int todo;
6145 hashitem_T *hi;
6146
6147 if (orig == NULL((void*)0))
6148 return NULL((void*)0);
6149
6150 dict_T *copy = dict_alloc();
6151 {
6152 if (copyID != 0) {
6153 orig->dv_copyID = copyID;
6154 orig->dv_copydict = copy;
6155 }
6156 todo = (int)orig->dv_hashtab.ht_used;
6157 for (hi = orig->dv_hashtab.ht_array; todo > 0 && !got_int; ++hi) {
6158 if (!HASHITEM_EMPTY(hi)((hi)->hi_key == ((void*)0) || (hi)->hi_key == &hash_removed
)) {
6159 --todo;
6160
6161 if (conv == NULL((void*)0) || conv->vc_type == CONV_NONE0) {
6162 di = dictitem_alloc(hi->hi_key);
6163 } else {
6164 char *const key = (char *) string_convert((vimconv_T *) conv,
6165 hi->hi_key, NULL((void*)0));
6166 if (key == NULL((void*)0)) {
6167 di = dictitem_alloc(hi->hi_key);
6168 } else {
6169 di = dictitem_alloc((char_u *) key);
6170 xfree(key);
6171 }
6172 }
6173 if (deep) {
6174 if (var_item_copy(conv, &HI2DI(hi)((dictitem_T *)((hi)->hi_key - __builtin_offsetof(dictitem_T
, di_key)))->di_tv, &di->di_tv, deep,
6175 copyID) == FAIL0) {
6176 xfree(di);
6177 break;
6178 }
6179 } else
6180 copy_tv(&HI2DI(hi)((dictitem_T *)((hi)->hi_key - __builtin_offsetof(dictitem_T
, di_key)))->di_tv, &di->di_tv);
6181 if (dict_add(copy, di) == FAIL0) {
6182 dictitem_free(di);
6183 break;
6184 }
6185 }
6186 }
6187
6188 ++copy->dv_refcount;
6189 if (todo > 0) {
6190 dict_unref(copy);
6191 copy = NULL((void*)0);
6192 }
6193 }
6194
6195 return copy;
6196}
6197
6198/*
6199 * Add item "item" to Dictionary "d".
6200 * Returns FAIL when key already exists.
6201 */
6202int dict_add(dict_T *d, dictitem_T *item)
6203{
6204 return hash_add(&d->dv_hashtab, item->di_key);
6205}
6206
6207/*
6208 * Add a number or string entry to dictionary "d".
6209 * When "str" is NULL use number "nr", otherwise use "str".
6210 * Returns FAIL when key already exists.
6211 */
6212int dict_add_nr_str(dict_T *d, char *key, long nr, char_u *str)
6213{
6214 dictitem_T *item;
6215
6216 item = dictitem_alloc((char_u *)key);
6217 item->di_tv.v_lock = 0;
6218 if (str == NULL((void*)0)) {
6219 item->di_tv.v_type = VAR_NUMBER1;
6220 item->di_tv.vval.v_number = nr;
6221 } else {
6222 item->di_tv.v_type = VAR_STRING2;
6223 item->di_tv.vval.v_string = vim_strsave(str);
6224 }
6225 if (dict_add(d, item) == FAIL0) {
6226 dictitem_free(item);
6227 return FAIL0;
6228 }
6229 return OK1;
6230}
6231
6232/*
6233 * Add a list entry to dictionary "d".
6234 * Returns FAIL when key already exists.
6235 */
6236int dict_add_list(dict_T *d, char *key, list_T *list)
6237{
6238 dictitem_T *item = dictitem_alloc((char_u *)key);
6239
6240 item->di_tv.v_lock = 0;
6241 item->di_tv.v_type = VAR_LIST4;
6242 item->di_tv.vval.v_list = list;
6243 if (dict_add(d, item) == FAIL0) {
6244 dictitem_free(item);
6245 return FAIL0;
6246 }
6247 ++list->lv_refcount;
6248 return OK1;
6249}
6250
6251/*
6252 * Get the number of items in a Dictionary.
6253 */
6254static long dict_len(dict_T *d)
6255{
6256 if (d == NULL((void*)0))
6257 return 0L;
6258 return (long)d->dv_hashtab.ht_used;
6259}
6260
6261/*
6262 * Find item "key[len]" in Dictionary "d".
6263 * If "len" is negative use strlen(key).
6264 * Returns NULL when not found.
6265 */
6266dictitem_T *dict_find(dict_T *d, char_u *key, int len)
6267{
6268#define AKEYLEN200 200
6269 char_u buf[AKEYLEN200];
6270 char_u *akey;
6271 char_u *tofree = NULL((void*)0);
6272 hashitem_T *hi;
6273
6274 if (len < 0)
6275 akey = key;
6276 else if (len >= AKEYLEN200) {
6277 tofree = akey = vim_strnsave(key, len);
6278 } else {
6279 /* Avoid a malloc/free by using buf[]. */
6280 STRLCPY(buf, key, len + 1)xstrlcpy((char *)(buf), (char *)(key), (size_t)(len + 1));
6281 akey = buf;
6282 }
6283
6284 hi = hash_find(&d->dv_hashtab, akey);
6285 xfree(tofree);
6286 if (HASHITEM_EMPTY(hi)((hi)->hi_key == ((void*)0) || (hi)->hi_key == &hash_removed
))
6287 return NULL((void*)0);
6288 return HI2DI(hi)((dictitem_T *)((hi)->hi_key - __builtin_offsetof(dictitem_T
, di_key)));
6289}
6290
6291/// Get a function from a dictionary
6292/// @param[out] result The address where a pointer to the wanted callback
6293/// will be left.
6294/// @return true/false on success/failure.
6295static bool_Bool get_dict_callback(dict_T *d, char *key, ufunc_T **result)
6296{
6297 dictitem_T *di = dict_find(d, (uint8_t *)key, -1);
6298
6299 if (di == NULL((void*)0)) {
6300 *result = NULL((void*)0);
6301 return true1;
6302 }
6303
6304 if (di->di_tv.v_type != VAR_FUNC3 && di->di_tv.v_type != VAR_STRING2) {
6305 EMSG(_("Argument is not a function or function name"))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)("Argument is not a function or function name"
))));
6306 *result = NULL((void*)0);
6307 return false0;
6308 }
6309
6310 if ((*result = find_ufunc(di->di_tv.vval.v_string)) == NULL((void*)0)) {
6311 return false0;
6312 }
6313
6314 (*result)->uf_refcount++;
6315 return true1;
6316}
6317
6318static ufunc_T *find_ufunc(uint8_t *name)
6319{
6320 uint8_t *n = name;
6321 ufunc_T *rv = NULL((void*)0);
6322 if (*n > '9' || *n < '0') {
6323 if ((n = trans_function_name(&n, false0, TFN_INT1|TFN_QUIET2, NULL((void*)0)))) {
6324 rv = find_func(n);
6325 xfree(n);
6326 }
6327 } else {
6328 // dict function, name is already translated
6329 rv = find_func(n);
6330 }
6331
6332 if (!rv) {
6333 EMSG2(_("Function %s doesn't exist"), name)emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)("Function %s doesn't exist"
))), (char_u *)(name));
6334 return NULL((void*)0);
6335 }
6336
6337 return rv;
6338}
6339
6340/*
6341 * Get a string item from a dictionary.
6342 * When "save" is TRUE allocate memory for it.
6343 * Returns NULL if the entry doesn't exist.
6344 */
6345char_u *get_dict_string(dict_T *d, char_u *key, int save)
6346{
6347 dictitem_T *di;
6348 char_u *s;
6349
6350 di = dict_find(d, key, -1);
6351 if (di == NULL((void*)0))
6352 return NULL((void*)0);
6353 s = get_tv_string(&di->di_tv);
6354 if (save) {
6355 s = vim_strsave(s);
6356 }
6357 return s;
6358}
6359
6360/*
6361 * Get a number item from a dictionary.
6362 * Returns 0 if the entry doesn't exist.
6363 */
6364long get_dict_number(dict_T *d, char_u *key)
6365{
6366 dictitem_T *di = dict_find(d, key, -1);
6367 if (di == NULL((void*)0))
6368 return 0;
6369 return get_tv_number(&di->di_tv);
6370}
6371
6372/*
6373 * Allocate a variable for a Dictionary and fill it from "*arg".
6374 * Return OK or FAIL. Returns NOTDONE for {expr}.
6375 */
6376static int get_dict_tv(char_u **arg, typval_T *rettv, int evaluate)
6377{
6378 dict_T *d = NULL((void*)0);
6379 typval_T tvkey;
6380 typval_T tv;
6381 char_u *key = NULL((void*)0);
6382 dictitem_T *item;
6383 char_u *start = skipwhite(*arg + 1);
6384 char_u buf[NUMBUFLEN65];
6385
6386 /*
6387 * First check if it's not a curly-braces thing: {expr}.
6388 * Must do this without evaluating, otherwise a function may be called
6389 * twice. Unfortunately this means we need to call eval1() twice for the
6390 * first item.
6391 * But {} is an empty Dictionary.
6392 */
6393 if (*start != '}') {
6394 if (eval1(&start, &tv, FALSE0) == FAIL0) /* recursive! */
6395 return FAIL0;
6396 if (*start == '}')
6397 return NOTDONE2;
6398 }
6399
6400 if (evaluate) {
6401 d = dict_alloc();
6402 }
6403 tvkey.v_type = VAR_UNKNOWN0;
6404 tv.v_type = VAR_UNKNOWN0;
6405
6406 *arg = skipwhite(*arg + 1);
6407 while (**arg != '}' && **arg != NUL'\000') {
6408 if (eval1(arg, &tvkey, evaluate) == FAIL0) /* recursive! */
6409 goto failret;
6410 if (**arg != ':') {
6411 EMSG2(_("E720: Missing colon in Dictionary: %s"), *arg)emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)("E720: Missing colon in Dictionary: %s"
))), (char_u *)(*arg));
6412 clear_tv(&tvkey);
6413 goto failret;
6414 }
6415 if (evaluate) {
6416 key = get_tv_string_buf_chk(&tvkey, buf);
6417 if (key == NULL((void*)0) || *key == NUL'\000') {
6418 /* "key" is NULL when get_tv_string_buf_chk() gave an errmsg */
6419 if (key != NULL((void*)0))
6420 EMSG(_(e_emptykey))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_emptykey))));
6421 clear_tv(&tvkey);
6422 goto failret;
6423 }
6424 }
6425
6426 *arg = skipwhite(*arg + 1);
6427 if (eval1(arg, &tv, evaluate) == FAIL0) { /* recursive! */
6428 if (evaluate)
6429 clear_tv(&tvkey);
6430 goto failret;
6431 }
6432 if (evaluate) {
6433 item = dict_find(d, key, -1);
6434 if (item != NULL((void*)0)) {
6435 EMSG2(_("E721: Duplicate key in Dictionary: \"%s\""), key)emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)("E721: Duplicate key in Dictionary: \"%s\""
))), (char_u *)(key));
6436 clear_tv(&tvkey);
6437 clear_tv(&tv);
6438 goto failret;
6439 }
6440 item = dictitem_alloc(key);
6441 clear_tv(&tvkey);
6442 item->di_tv = tv;
6443 item->di_tv.v_lock = 0;
6444 if (dict_add(d, item) == FAIL0) {
6445 dictitem_free(item);
6446 }
6447 }
6448
6449 if (**arg == '}')
6450 break;
6451 if (**arg != ',') {
6452 EMSG2(_("E722: Missing comma in Dictionary: %s"), *arg)emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)("E722: Missing comma in Dictionary: %s"
))), (char_u *)(*arg));
6453 goto failret;
6454 }
6455 *arg = skipwhite(*arg + 1);
6456 }
6457
6458 if (**arg != '}') {
6459 EMSG2(_("E723: Missing end of Dictionary '}': %s"), *arg)emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)("E723: Missing end of Dictionary '}': %s"
))), (char_u *)(*arg));
6460failret:
6461 if (evaluate)
6462 dict_free(d, TRUE1);
6463 return FAIL0;
6464 }
6465
6466 *arg = skipwhite(*arg + 1);
6467 if (evaluate) {
6468 rettv->v_type = VAR_DICT5;
6469 rettv->vval.v_dict = d;
6470 ++d->dv_refcount;
6471 }
6472
6473 return OK1;
6474}
6475
6476#define CHECK_SELF_REFERENCE(val, copyID_attr, conv_type)do { if ((val)->copyID_attr == copyID) { CONV_RECURSE((val
), conv_type); } (val)->copyID_attr = copyID; } while (0) \
6477 do { \
6478 if ((val)->copyID_attr == copyID) { \
6479 CONV_RECURSE((val), conv_type); \
6480 } \
6481 (val)->copyID_attr = copyID; \
6482 } while (0)
6483
6484/// Define functions which convert VimL value to something else
6485///
6486/// Creates function `vim_to_{name}(firstargtype firstargname, typval_T *const
6487/// tv)` which returns OK or FAIL and helper functions.
6488///
6489/// @param firstargtype Type of the first argument. It will be used to return
6490/// the results.
6491/// @param firstargname Name of the first argument.
6492/// @param name Name of the target converter.
6493#define DEFINE_VIML_CONV_FUNCTIONS(scope, name, firstargtype, firstargname)static int name_convert_one_value(firstargtype firstargname, MPConvStack
*const mpstack, typval_T *const tv, const int copyID, const char
*const objname) { switch (tv->v_type) { case 2: { CONV_STRING
(tv->vval.v_string, strlen((char *)(tv->vval.v_string))
); break; } case 1: { CONV_NUMBER(tv->vval.v_number); break
; } case 6: { CONV_FLOAT(tv->vval.v_float); break; } case 3
: { CONV_FUNC(tv->vval.v_string); break; } case 4: { if (tv
->vval.v_list == ((void*)0) || tv->vval.v_list->lv_len
== 0) { CONV_EMPTY_LIST(); break; } do { if ((tv->vval.v_list
)->lv_copyID == copyID) { CONV_RECURSE((tv->vval.v_list
), kMPConvList); } (tv->vval.v_list)->lv_copyID = copyID
; } while (0); CONV_LIST_START(tv->vval.v_list); do { if (
(*mpstack).size == (*mpstack).capacity) { (*mpstack).capacity
= (*mpstack).capacity? (*mpstack).capacity<<1 : 8; (*mpstack
).items = (MPConvStackVal*)xrealloc((*mpstack).items, sizeof(
MPConvStackVal) * (*mpstack).capacity); } (*mpstack).items[(*
mpstack).size++] = (((MPConvStackVal) { .type = kMPConvList, .
data = { .l = { .list = tv->vval.v_list, .li = tv->vval
.v_list->lv_first, }, }, })); } while (0); break; } case 5
: { if (tv->vval.v_dict == ((void*)0) || tv->vval.v_dict
->dv_hashtab.ht_used == 0) { CONV_EMPTY_DICT(); break; } const
dictitem_T *type_di; const dictitem_T *val_di; if (CONV_ALLOW_SPECIAL
&& tv->vval.v_dict->dv_hashtab.ht_used == 2 &&
(type_di = dict_find((dict_T *) tv->vval.v_dict, (char_u *
) "_TYPE", -1)) != ((void*)0) && type_di->di_tv.v_type
== 4 && (val_di = dict_find((dict_T *) tv->vval.v_dict
, (char_u *) "_VAL", -1)) != ((void*)0)) { size_t i; for (i =
0; i < ((sizeof(msgpack_type_lists)/sizeof((msgpack_type_lists
)[0])) / ((size_t)(!(sizeof(msgpack_type_lists) % sizeof((msgpack_type_lists
)[0]))))); i++) { if (type_di->di_tv.vval.v_list == msgpack_type_lists
[i]) { break; } } if (i == ((sizeof(msgpack_type_lists)/sizeof
((msgpack_type_lists)[0])) / ((size_t)(!(sizeof(msgpack_type_lists
) % sizeof((msgpack_type_lists)[0])))))) { goto name_convert_one_value_regular_dict
; } switch ((MessagePackType) i) { case kMPNil: { CONV_SPECIAL_NIL
(); break; } case kMPBoolean: { if (val_di->di_tv.v_type !=
1) { goto name_convert_one_value_regular_dict; } CONV_SPECIAL_BOOL
(val_di->di_tv.vval.v_number); break; } case kMPInteger: {
const list_T *val_list; varnumber_T sign; varnumber_T highest_bits
; varnumber_T high_bits; varnumber_T low_bits; if (val_di->
di_tv.v_type != 4 || (val_list = val_di->di_tv.vval.v_list
) == ((void*)0) || val_list->lv_len != 4 || val_list->lv_first
->li_tv.v_type != 1 || (sign = val_list->lv_first->li_tv
.vval.v_number) == 0 || val_list->lv_first->li_next->
li_tv.v_type != 1 || (highest_bits = val_list->lv_first->
li_next->li_tv.vval.v_number) < 0 || val_list->lv_last
->li_prev->li_tv.v_type != 1 || (high_bits = val_list->
lv_last->li_prev->li_tv.vval.v_number) < 0 || val_list
->lv_last->li_tv.v_type != 1 || (low_bits = val_list->
lv_last->li_tv.vval.v_number) < 0) { goto name_convert_one_value_regular_dict
; } uint64_t number = ((uint64_t) (((uint64_t) highest_bits) <<
62) | (uint64_t) (((uint64_t) high_bits) << 31) | (uint64_t
) low_bits); if (sign > 0) { CONV_UNSIGNED_NUMBER(number);
} else { CONV_NUMBER(-number); } break; } case kMPFloat: { if
(val_di->di_tv.v_type != 6) { goto name_convert_one_value_regular_dict
; } CONV_FLOAT(val_di->di_tv.vval.v_float); break; } case kMPString
: case kMPBinary: { const _Bool is_string = ((MessagePackType
) i == kMPString); if (val_di->di_tv.v_type != 4) { goto name_convert_one_value_regular_dict
; } size_t len; char *buf; if (!vim_list_to_buf(val_di->di_tv
.vval.v_list, &len, &buf)) { goto name_convert_one_value_regular_dict
; } if (is_string) { CONV_STR_STRING(buf, len); } else { CONV_STRING
(buf, len); } xfree(buf); break; } case kMPArray: { if (val_di
->di_tv.v_type != 4) { goto name_convert_one_value_regular_dict
; } do { if ((val_di->di_tv.vval.v_list)->lv_copyID == copyID
) { CONV_RECURSE((val_di->di_tv.vval.v_list), kMPConvList)
; } (val_di->di_tv.vval.v_list)->lv_copyID = copyID; } while
(0); CONV_LIST_START(val_di->di_tv.vval.v_list); do { if (
(*mpstack).size == (*mpstack).capacity) { (*mpstack).capacity
= (*mpstack).capacity? (*mpstack).capacity<<1 : 8; (*mpstack
).items = (MPConvStackVal*)xrealloc((*mpstack).items, sizeof(
MPConvStackVal) * (*mpstack).capacity); } (*mpstack).items[(*
mpstack).size++] = (((MPConvStackVal) { .type = kMPConvList, .
data = { .l = { .list = val_di->di_tv.vval.v_list, .li = val_di
->di_tv.vval.v_list->lv_first, }, }, })); } while (0); break
; } case kMPMap: { if (val_di->di_tv.v_type != 4) { goto name_convert_one_value_regular_dict
; } if (val_di->di_tv.vval.v_list == ((void*)0)) { CONV_EMPTY_DICT
(); break; } list_T *const val_list = val_di->di_tv.vval.v_list
; for (const listitem_T *li = val_list->lv_first; li != ((
void*)0); li = li->li_next) { if (li->li_tv.v_type != 4
|| li->li_tv.vval.v_list->lv_len != 2) { goto name_convert_one_value_regular_dict
; } } do { if ((val_list)->lv_copyID == copyID) { CONV_RECURSE
((val_list), kMPConvPairs); } (val_list)->lv_copyID = copyID
; } while (0); CONV_SPECIAL_MAP_START(val_list); do { if ((*mpstack
).size == (*mpstack).capacity) { (*mpstack).capacity = (*mpstack
).capacity? (*mpstack).capacity<<1 : 8; (*mpstack).items
= (MPConvStackVal*)xrealloc((*mpstack).items, sizeof(MPConvStackVal
) * (*mpstack).capacity); } (*mpstack).items[(*mpstack).size++
] = (((MPConvStackVal) { .type = kMPConvPairs, .data = { .l =
{ .list = val_list, .li = val_list->lv_first, }, }, })); }
while (0); break; } case kMPExt: { const list_T *val_list; varnumber_T
type; if (val_di->di_tv.v_type != 4 || (val_list = val_di
->di_tv.vval.v_list) == ((void*)0) || val_list->lv_len !=
2 || (val_list->lv_first->li_tv.v_type != 1) || (type =
val_list->lv_first->li_tv.vval.v_number) > (127) ||
type < (-128) || (val_list->lv_last->li_tv.v_type !=
4)) { goto name_convert_one_value_regular_dict; } size_t len
; char *buf; if (!vim_list_to_buf(val_list->lv_last->li_tv
.vval.v_list, &len, &buf)) { goto name_convert_one_value_regular_dict
; } CONV_EXT_STRING(buf, len, type); xfree(buf); break; } } break
; } name_convert_one_value_regular_dict: do { if ((tv->vval
.v_dict)->dv_copyID == copyID) { CONV_RECURSE((tv->vval
.v_dict), kMPConvDict); } (tv->vval.v_dict)->dv_copyID =
copyID; } while (0); CONV_DICT_START(tv->vval.v_dict); do
{ if ((*mpstack).size == (*mpstack).capacity) { (*mpstack).capacity
= (*mpstack).capacity? (*mpstack).capacity<<1 : 8; (*mpstack
).items = (MPConvStackVal*)xrealloc((*mpstack).items, sizeof(
MPConvStackVal) * (*mpstack).capacity); } (*mpstack).items[(*
mpstack).size++] = (((MPConvStackVal) { .type = kMPConvDict, .
data = { .d = { .dict = tv->vval.v_dict, .hi = tv->vval
.v_dict->dv_hashtab.ht_array, .todo = tv->vval.v_dict->
dv_hashtab.ht_used, }, }, })); } while (0); break; } default:
{ emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_intern2))), (char_u *)
("name" "_convert_one_value()")); return 0; } } return 1; } scope
int vim_to_name(firstargtype firstargname, typval_T *const tv
, const char *const objname) { current_copyID += 2; const int
copyID = current_copyID; MPConvStack mpstack; ((mpstack).size
= (mpstack).capacity = 0, (mpstack).items = 0); if ( name_convert_one_value
(firstargname, &mpstack, tv, copyID, objname) == 0) { goto
vim_to_msgpack_error_ret; } while (((mpstack).size)) { MPConvStackVal
*cur_mpsv = &((mpstack).items[(((mpstack).size) - 1)]); typval_T
*cur_tv = ((void*)0); switch (cur_mpsv->type) { case kMPConvDict
: { if (!cur_mpsv->data.d.todo) { (void) ((mpstack).items[
--(mpstack).size]); cur_mpsv->data.d.dict->dv_copyID = copyID
- 1; CONV_DICT_END(cur_mpsv->data.d.dict); continue; } else
if (cur_mpsv->data.d.todo != cur_mpsv->data.d.dict->
dv_hashtab.ht_used) { CONV_DICT_BETWEEN_ITEMS(cur_mpsv->data
.d.dict); } while (((cur_mpsv->data.d.hi)->hi_key == ((
void*)0) || (cur_mpsv->data.d.hi)->hi_key == &hash_removed
)) { cur_mpsv->data.d.hi++; } dictitem_T *const di = ((dictitem_T
*)((cur_mpsv->data.d.hi)->hi_key - __builtin_offsetof(
dictitem_T, di_key))); cur_mpsv->data.d.todo--; cur_mpsv->
data.d.hi++; CONV_STR_STRING(&di->di_key[0], strlen((char
*)(&di->di_key[0]))); CONV_DICT_AFTER_KEY(cur_mpsv->
data.d.dict); cur_tv = &di->di_tv; break; } case kMPConvList
: { if (cur_mpsv->data.l.li == ((void*)0)) { (void) ((mpstack
).items[--(mpstack).size]); cur_mpsv->data.l.list->lv_copyID
= copyID - 1; CONV_LIST_END(cur_mpsv->data.l.list); continue
; } else if (cur_mpsv->data.l.li != cur_mpsv->data.l.list
->lv_first) { CONV_LIST_BETWEEN_ITEMS(cur_mpsv->data.l.
list); } cur_tv = &cur_mpsv->data.l.li->li_tv; cur_mpsv
->data.l.li = cur_mpsv->data.l.li->li_next; break; }
case kMPConvPairs: { if (cur_mpsv->data.l.li == ((void*)0
)) { (void) ((mpstack).items[--(mpstack).size]); cur_mpsv->
data.l.list->lv_copyID = copyID - 1; continue; } const list_T
*const kv_pair = cur_mpsv->data.l.li->li_tv.vval.v_list
; if ( name_convert_one_value(firstargname, &mpstack, &
kv_pair->lv_first->li_tv, copyID, objname) == 0) { goto
vim_to_msgpack_error_ret; } cur_tv = &kv_pair->lv_last
->li_tv; cur_mpsv->data.l.li = cur_mpsv->data.l.li->
li_next; break; } } if ( name_convert_one_value(firstargname,
&mpstack, cur_tv, copyID, objname) == 0) { goto vim_to_msgpack_error_ret
; } } xfree((mpstack).items); return 1; vim_to_msgpack_error_ret
: xfree((mpstack).items); return 0; } \
6494static int name##_convert_one_value(firstargtype firstargname, \
6495 MPConvStack *const mpstack, \
6496 typval_T *const tv, \
6497 const int copyID, \
6498 const char *const objname) \
6499 FUNC_ATTR_NONNULL_ALL FUNC_ATTR_WARN_UNUSED_RESULT \
6500{ \
6501 switch (tv->v_type) { \
6502 case VAR_STRING2: { \
6503 CONV_STRING(tv->vval.v_string, STRLEN(tv->vval.v_string)strlen((char *)(tv->vval.v_string))); \
6504 break; \
6505 } \
6506 case VAR_NUMBER1: { \
6507 CONV_NUMBER(tv->vval.v_number); \
6508 break; \
6509 } \
6510 case VAR_FLOAT6: { \
6511 CONV_FLOAT(tv->vval.v_float); \
6512 break; \
6513 } \
6514 case VAR_FUNC3: { \
6515 CONV_FUNC(tv->vval.v_string); \
6516 break; \
6517 } \
6518 case VAR_LIST4: { \
6519 if (tv->vval.v_list == NULL((void*)0) || tv->vval.v_list->lv_len == 0) { \
6520 CONV_EMPTY_LIST(); \
6521 break; \
6522 } \
6523 CHECK_SELF_REFERENCE(tv->vval.v_list, lv_copyID, kMPConvList)do { if ((tv->vval.v_list)->lv_copyID == copyID) { CONV_RECURSE
((tv->vval.v_list), kMPConvList); } (tv->vval.v_list)->
lv_copyID = copyID; } while (0); \
6524 CONV_LIST_START(tv->vval.v_list); \
6525 kv_push( \do { if ((*mpstack).size == (*mpstack).capacity) { (*mpstack)
.capacity = (*mpstack).capacity? (*mpstack).capacity<<1
: 8; (*mpstack).items = (MPConvStackVal*)xrealloc((*mpstack)
.items, sizeof(MPConvStackVal) * (*mpstack).capacity); } (*mpstack
).items[(*mpstack).size++] = (((MPConvStackVal) { .type = kMPConvList
, .data = { .l = { .list = tv->vval.v_list, .li = tv->vval
.v_list->lv_first, }, }, })); } while (0)
6526 MPConvStackVal, \do { if ((*mpstack).size == (*mpstack).capacity) { (*mpstack)
.capacity = (*mpstack).capacity? (*mpstack).capacity<<1
: 8; (*mpstack).items = (MPConvStackVal*)xrealloc((*mpstack)
.items, sizeof(MPConvStackVal) * (*mpstack).capacity); } (*mpstack
).items[(*mpstack).size++] = (((MPConvStackVal) { .type = kMPConvList
, .data = { .l = { .list = tv->vval.v_list, .li = tv->vval
.v_list->lv_first, }, }, })); } while (0)
6527 *mpstack, \do { if ((*mpstack).size == (*mpstack).capacity) { (*mpstack)
.capacity = (*mpstack).capacity? (*mpstack).capacity<<1
: 8; (*mpstack).items = (MPConvStackVal*)xrealloc((*mpstack)
.items, sizeof(MPConvStackVal) * (*mpstack).capacity); } (*mpstack
).items[(*mpstack).size++] = (((MPConvStackVal) { .type = kMPConvList
, .data = { .l = { .list = tv->vval.v_list, .li = tv->vval
.v_list->lv_first, }, }, })); } while (0)
6528 ((MPConvStackVal) { \do { if ((*mpstack).size == (*mpstack).capacity) { (*mpstack)
.capacity = (*mpstack).capacity? (*mpstack).capacity<<1
: 8; (*mpstack).items = (MPConvStackVal*)xrealloc((*mpstack)
.items, sizeof(MPConvStackVal) * (*mpstack).capacity); } (*mpstack
).items[(*mpstack).size++] = (((MPConvStackVal) { .type = kMPConvList
, .data = { .l = { .list = tv->vval.v_list, .li = tv->vval
.v_list->lv_first, }, }, })); } while (0)
6529 .type = kMPConvList, \do { if ((*mpstack).size == (*mpstack).capacity) { (*mpstack)
.capacity = (*mpstack).capacity? (*mpstack).capacity<<1
: 8; (*mpstack).items = (MPConvStackVal*)xrealloc((*mpstack)
.items, sizeof(MPConvStackVal) * (*mpstack).capacity); } (*mpstack
).items[(*mpstack).size++] = (((MPConvStackVal) { .type = kMPConvList
, .data = { .l = { .list = tv->vval.v_list, .li = tv->vval
.v_list->lv_first, }, }, })); } while (0)
6530 .data = { \do { if ((*mpstack).size == (*mpstack).capacity) { (*mpstack)
.capacity = (*mpstack).capacity? (*mpstack).capacity<<1
: 8; (*mpstack).items = (MPConvStackVal*)xrealloc((*mpstack)
.items, sizeof(MPConvStackVal) * (*mpstack).capacity); } (*mpstack
).items[(*mpstack).size++] = (((MPConvStackVal) { .type = kMPConvList
, .data = { .l = { .list = tv->vval.v_list, .li = tv->vval
.v_list->lv_first, }, }, })); } while (0)
6531 .l = { \do { if ((*mpstack).size == (*mpstack).capacity) { (*mpstack)
.capacity = (*mpstack).capacity? (*mpstack).capacity<<1
: 8; (*mpstack).items = (MPConvStackVal*)xrealloc((*mpstack)
.items, sizeof(MPConvStackVal) * (*mpstack).capacity); } (*mpstack
).items[(*mpstack).size++] = (((MPConvStackVal) { .type = kMPConvList
, .data = { .l = { .list = tv->vval.v_list, .li = tv->vval
.v_list->lv_first, }, }, })); } while (0)
6532 .list = tv->vval.v_list, \do { if ((*mpstack).size == (*mpstack).capacity) { (*mpstack)
.capacity = (*mpstack).capacity? (*mpstack).capacity<<1
: 8; (*mpstack).items = (MPConvStackVal*)xrealloc((*mpstack)
.items, sizeof(MPConvStackVal) * (*mpstack).capacity); } (*mpstack
).items[(*mpstack).size++] = (((MPConvStackVal) { .type = kMPConvList
, .data = { .l = { .list = tv->vval.v_list, .li = tv->vval
.v_list->lv_first, }, }, })); } while (0)
6533 .li = tv->vval.v_list->lv_first, \do { if ((*mpstack).size == (*mpstack).capacity) { (*mpstack)
.capacity = (*mpstack).capacity? (*mpstack).capacity<<1
: 8; (*mpstack).items = (MPConvStackVal*)xrealloc((*mpstack)
.items, sizeof(MPConvStackVal) * (*mpstack).capacity); } (*mpstack
).items[(*mpstack).size++] = (((MPConvStackVal) { .type = kMPConvList
, .data = { .l = { .list = tv->vval.v_list, .li = tv->vval
.v_list->lv_first, }, }, })); } while (0)
6534 }, \do { if ((*mpstack).size == (*mpstack).capacity) { (*mpstack)
.capacity = (*mpstack).capacity? (*mpstack).capacity<<1
: 8; (*mpstack).items = (MPConvStackVal*)xrealloc((*mpstack)
.items, sizeof(MPConvStackVal) * (*mpstack).capacity); } (*mpstack
).items[(*mpstack).size++] = (((MPConvStackVal) { .type = kMPConvList
, .data = { .l = { .list = tv->vval.v_list, .li = tv->vval
.v_list->lv_first, }, }, })); } while (0)
6535 }, \do { if ((*mpstack).size == (*mpstack).capacity) { (*mpstack)
.capacity = (*mpstack).capacity? (*mpstack).capacity<<1
: 8; (*mpstack).items = (MPConvStackVal*)xrealloc((*mpstack)
.items, sizeof(MPConvStackVal) * (*mpstack).capacity); } (*mpstack
).items[(*mpstack).size++] = (((MPConvStackVal) { .type = kMPConvList
, .data = { .l = { .list = tv->vval.v_list, .li = tv->vval
.v_list->lv_first, }, }, })); } while (0)
6536 }))do { if ((*mpstack).size == (*mpstack).capacity) { (*mpstack)
.capacity = (*mpstack).capacity? (*mpstack).capacity<<1
: 8; (*mpstack).items = (MPConvStackVal*)xrealloc((*mpstack)
.items, sizeof(MPConvStackVal) * (*mpstack).capacity); } (*mpstack
).items[(*mpstack).size++] = (((MPConvStackVal) { .type = kMPConvList
, .data = { .l = { .list = tv->vval.v_list, .li = tv->vval
.v_list->lv_first, }, }, })); } while (0); \
6537 break; \
6538 } \
6539 case VAR_DICT5: { \
6540 if (tv->vval.v_dict == NULL((void*)0) \
6541 || tv->vval.v_dict->dv_hashtab.ht_used == 0) { \
6542 CONV_EMPTY_DICT(); \
6543 break; \
6544 } \
6545 const dictitem_T *type_di; \
6546 const dictitem_T *val_di; \
6547 if (CONV_ALLOW_SPECIAL \
6548 && tv->vval.v_dict->dv_hashtab.ht_used == 2 \
6549 && (type_di = dict_find((dict_T *) tv->vval.v_dict, \
6550 (char_u *) "_TYPE", -1)) != NULL((void*)0) \
6551 && type_di->di_tv.v_type == VAR_LIST4 \
6552 && (val_di = dict_find((dict_T *) tv->vval.v_dict, \
6553 (char_u *) "_VAL", -1)) != NULL((void*)0)) { \
6554 size_t i; \
6555 for (i = 0; i < ARRAY_SIZE(msgpack_type_lists)((sizeof(msgpack_type_lists)/sizeof((msgpack_type_lists)[0]))
/ ((size_t)(!(sizeof(msgpack_type_lists) % sizeof((msgpack_type_lists
)[0]))))); i++) { \
6556 if (type_di->di_tv.vval.v_list == msgpack_type_lists[i]) { \
6557 break; \
6558 } \
6559 } \
6560 if (i == ARRAY_SIZE(msgpack_type_lists)((sizeof(msgpack_type_lists)/sizeof((msgpack_type_lists)[0]))
/ ((size_t)(!(sizeof(msgpack_type_lists) % sizeof((msgpack_type_lists
)[0])))))) { \
6561 goto name##_convert_one_value_regular_dict; \
6562 } \
6563 switch ((MessagePackType) i) { \
6564 case kMPNil: { \
6565 CONV_SPECIAL_NIL(); \
6566 break; \
6567 } \
6568 case kMPBoolean: { \
6569 if (val_di->di_tv.v_type != VAR_NUMBER1) { \
6570 goto name##_convert_one_value_regular_dict; \
6571 } \
6572 CONV_SPECIAL_BOOL(val_di->di_tv.vval.v_number); \
6573 break; \
6574 } \
6575 case kMPInteger: { \
6576 const list_T *val_list; \
6577 varnumber_T sign; \
6578 varnumber_T highest_bits; \
6579 varnumber_T high_bits; \
6580 varnumber_T low_bits; \
6581 /* List of 4 integers; first is signed (should be 1 or -1, but */ \
6582 /* this is not checked), second is unsigned and have at most */ \
6583 /* one (sign is -1) or two (sign is 1) non-zero bits (number of */ \
6584 /* bits is not checked), other unsigned and have at most 31 */ \
6585 /* non-zero bits (number of bits is not checked).*/ \
6586 if (val_di->di_tv.v_type != VAR_LIST4 \
6587 || (val_list = val_di->di_tv.vval.v_list) == NULL((void*)0) \
6588 || val_list->lv_len != 4 \
6589 || val_list->lv_first->li_tv.v_type != VAR_NUMBER1 \
6590 || (sign = val_list->lv_first->li_tv.vval.v_number) == 0 \
6591 || val_list->lv_first->li_next->li_tv.v_type != VAR_NUMBER1 \
6592 || (highest_bits = \
6593 val_list->lv_first->li_next->li_tv.vval.v_number) < 0 \
6594 || val_list->lv_last->li_prev->li_tv.v_type != VAR_NUMBER1 \
6595 || (high_bits = \
6596 val_list->lv_last->li_prev->li_tv.vval.v_number) < 0 \
6597 || val_list->lv_last->li_tv.v_type != VAR_NUMBER1 \
6598 || (low_bits = val_list->lv_last->li_tv.vval.v_number) < 0) { \
6599 goto name##_convert_one_value_regular_dict; \
6600 } \
6601 uint64_t number = ((uint64_t) (((uint64_t) highest_bits) << 62) \
6602 | (uint64_t) (((uint64_t) high_bits) << 31) \
6603 | (uint64_t) low_bits); \
6604 if (sign > 0) { \
6605 CONV_UNSIGNED_NUMBER(number); \
6606 } else { \
6607 CONV_NUMBER(-number); \
6608 } \
6609 break; \
6610 } \
6611 case kMPFloat: { \
6612 if (val_di->di_tv.v_type != VAR_FLOAT6) { \
6613 goto name##_convert_one_value_regular_dict; \
6614 } \
6615 CONV_FLOAT(val_di->di_tv.vval.v_float); \
6616 break; \
6617 } \
6618 case kMPString: \
6619 case kMPBinary: { \
6620 const bool_Bool is_string = ((MessagePackType) i == kMPString); \
6621 if (val_di->di_tv.v_type != VAR_LIST4) { \
6622 goto name##_convert_one_value_regular_dict; \
6623 } \
6624 size_t len; \
6625 char *buf; \
6626 if (!vim_list_to_buf(val_di->di_tv.vval.v_list, &len, &buf)) { \
6627 goto name##_convert_one_value_regular_dict; \
6628 } \
6629 if (is_string) { \
6630 CONV_STR_STRING(buf, len); \
6631 } else { \
6632 CONV_STRING(buf, len); \
6633 } \
6634 xfree(buf); \
6635 break; \
6636 } \
6637 case kMPArray: { \
6638 if (val_di->di_tv.v_type != VAR_LIST4) { \
6639 goto name##_convert_one_value_regular_dict; \
6640 } \
6641 CHECK_SELF_REFERENCE(val_di->di_tv.vval.v_list, lv_copyID, \do { if ((val_di->di_tv.vval.v_list)->lv_copyID == copyID
) { CONV_RECURSE((val_di->di_tv.vval.v_list), kMPConvList)
; } (val_di->di_tv.vval.v_list)->lv_copyID = copyID; } while
(0)
6642 kMPConvList)do { if ((val_di->di_tv.vval.v_list)->lv_copyID == copyID
) { CONV_RECURSE((val_di->di_tv.vval.v_list), kMPConvList)
; } (val_di->di_tv.vval.v_list)->lv_copyID = copyID; } while
(0); \
6643 CONV_LIST_START(val_di->di_tv.vval.v_list); \
6644 kv_push(MPConvStackVal, *mpstack, ((MPConvStackVal) { \do { if ((*mpstack).size == (*mpstack).capacity) { (*mpstack)
.capacity = (*mpstack).capacity? (*mpstack).capacity<<1
: 8; (*mpstack).items = (MPConvStackVal*)xrealloc((*mpstack)
.items, sizeof(MPConvStackVal) * (*mpstack).capacity); } (*mpstack
).items[(*mpstack).size++] = (((MPConvStackVal) { .type = kMPConvList
, .data = { .l = { .list = val_di->di_tv.vval.v_list, .li =
val_di->di_tv.vval.v_list->lv_first, }, }, })); } while
(0)
6645 .type = kMPConvList, \do { if ((*mpstack).size == (*mpstack).capacity) { (*mpstack)
.capacity = (*mpstack).capacity? (*mpstack).capacity<<1
: 8; (*mpstack).items = (MPConvStackVal*)xrealloc((*mpstack)
.items, sizeof(MPConvStackVal) * (*mpstack).capacity); } (*mpstack
).items[(*mpstack).size++] = (((MPConvStackVal) { .type = kMPConvList
, .data = { .l = { .list = val_di->di_tv.vval.v_list, .li =
val_di->di_tv.vval.v_list->lv_first, }, }, })); } while
(0)
6646 .data = { \do { if ((*mpstack).size == (*mpstack).capacity) { (*mpstack)
.capacity = (*mpstack).capacity? (*mpstack).capacity<<1
: 8; (*mpstack).items = (MPConvStackVal*)xrealloc((*mpstack)
.items, sizeof(MPConvStackVal) * (*mpstack).capacity); } (*mpstack
).items[(*mpstack).size++] = (((MPConvStackVal) { .type = kMPConvList
, .data = { .l = { .list = val_di->di_tv.vval.v_list, .li =
val_di->di_tv.vval.v_list->lv_first, }, }, })); } while
(0)
6647 .l = { \do { if ((*mpstack).size == (*mpstack).capacity) { (*mpstack)
.capacity = (*mpstack).capacity? (*mpstack).capacity<<1
: 8; (*mpstack).items = (MPConvStackVal*)xrealloc((*mpstack)
.items, sizeof(MPConvStackVal) * (*mpstack).capacity); } (*mpstack
).items[(*mpstack).size++] = (((MPConvStackVal) { .type = kMPConvList
, .data = { .l = { .list = val_di->di_tv.vval.v_list, .li =
val_di->di_tv.vval.v_list->lv_first, }, }, })); } while
(0)
6648 .list = val_di->di_tv.vval.v_list, \do { if ((*mpstack).size == (*mpstack).capacity) { (*mpstack)
.capacity = (*mpstack).capacity? (*mpstack).capacity<<1
: 8; (*mpstack).items = (MPConvStackVal*)xrealloc((*mpstack)
.items, sizeof(MPConvStackVal) * (*mpstack).capacity); } (*mpstack
).items[(*mpstack).size++] = (((MPConvStackVal) { .type = kMPConvList
, .data = { .l = { .list = val_di->di_tv.vval.v_list, .li =
val_di->di_tv.vval.v_list->lv_first, }, }, })); } while
(0)
6649 .li = val_di->di_tv.vval.v_list->lv_first, \do { if ((*mpstack).size == (*mpstack).capacity) { (*mpstack)
.capacity = (*mpstack).capacity? (*mpstack).capacity<<1
: 8; (*mpstack).items = (MPConvStackVal*)xrealloc((*mpstack)
.items, sizeof(MPConvStackVal) * (*mpstack).capacity); } (*mpstack
).items[(*mpstack).size++] = (((MPConvStackVal) { .type = kMPConvList
, .data = { .l = { .list = val_di->di_tv.vval.v_list, .li =
val_di->di_tv.vval.v_list->lv_first, }, }, })); } while
(0)
6650 }, \do { if ((*mpstack).size == (*mpstack).capacity) { (*mpstack)
.capacity = (*mpstack).capacity? (*mpstack).capacity<<1
: 8; (*mpstack).items = (MPConvStackVal*)xrealloc((*mpstack)
.items, sizeof(MPConvStackVal) * (*mpstack).capacity); } (*mpstack
).items[(*mpstack).size++] = (((MPConvStackVal) { .type = kMPConvList
, .data = { .l = { .list = val_di->di_tv.vval.v_list, .li =
val_di->di_tv.vval.v_list->lv_first, }, }, })); } while
(0)
6651 }, \do { if ((*mpstack).size == (*mpstack).capacity) { (*mpstack)
.capacity = (*mpstack).capacity? (*mpstack).capacity<<1
: 8; (*mpstack).items = (MPConvStackVal*)xrealloc((*mpstack)
.items, sizeof(MPConvStackVal) * (*mpstack).capacity); } (*mpstack
).items[(*mpstack).size++] = (((MPConvStackVal) { .type = kMPConvList
, .data = { .l = { .list = val_di->di_tv.vval.v_list, .li =
val_di->di_tv.vval.v_list->lv_first, }, }, })); } while
(0)
6652 }))do { if ((*mpstack).size == (*mpstack).capacity) { (*mpstack)
.capacity = (*mpstack).capacity? (*mpstack).capacity<<1
: 8; (*mpstack).items = (MPConvStackVal*)xrealloc((*mpstack)
.items, sizeof(MPConvStackVal) * (*mpstack).capacity); } (*mpstack
).items[(*mpstack).size++] = (((MPConvStackVal) { .type = kMPConvList
, .data = { .l = { .list = val_di->di_tv.vval.v_list, .li =
val_di->di_tv.vval.v_list->lv_first, }, }, })); } while
(0); \
6653 break; \
6654 } \
6655 case kMPMap: { \
6656 if (val_di->di_tv.v_type != VAR_LIST4) { \
6657 goto name##_convert_one_value_regular_dict; \
6658 } \
6659 if (val_di->di_tv.vval.v_list == NULL((void*)0)) { \
6660 CONV_EMPTY_DICT(); \
6661 break; \
6662 } \
6663 list_T *const val_list = val_di->di_tv.vval.v_list; \
6664 for (const listitem_T *li = val_list->lv_first; li != NULL((void*)0); \
6665 li = li->li_next) { \
6666 if (li->li_tv.v_type != VAR_LIST4 \
6667 || li->li_tv.vval.v_list->lv_len != 2) { \
6668 goto name##_convert_one_value_regular_dict; \
6669 } \
6670 } \
6671 CHECK_SELF_REFERENCE(val_list, lv_copyID, kMPConvPairs)do { if ((val_list)->lv_copyID == copyID) { CONV_RECURSE((
val_list), kMPConvPairs); } (val_list)->lv_copyID = copyID
; } while (0); \
6672 CONV_SPECIAL_MAP_START(val_list); \
6673 kv_push(MPConvStackVal, *mpstack, ((MPConvStackVal) { \do { if ((*mpstack).size == (*mpstack).capacity) { (*mpstack)
.capacity = (*mpstack).capacity? (*mpstack).capacity<<1
: 8; (*mpstack).items = (MPConvStackVal*)xrealloc((*mpstack)
.items, sizeof(MPConvStackVal) * (*mpstack).capacity); } (*mpstack
).items[(*mpstack).size++] = (((MPConvStackVal) { .type = kMPConvPairs
, .data = { .l = { .list = val_list, .li = val_list->lv_first
, }, }, })); } while (0)
6674 .type = kMPConvPairs, \do { if ((*mpstack).size == (*mpstack).capacity) { (*mpstack)
.capacity = (*mpstack).capacity? (*mpstack).capacity<<1
: 8; (*mpstack).items = (MPConvStackVal*)xrealloc((*mpstack)
.items, sizeof(MPConvStackVal) * (*mpstack).capacity); } (*mpstack
).items[(*mpstack).size++] = (((MPConvStackVal) { .type = kMPConvPairs
, .data = { .l = { .list = val_list, .li = val_list->lv_first
, }, }, })); } while (0)
6675 .data = { \do { if ((*mpstack).size == (*mpstack).capacity) { (*mpstack)
.capacity = (*mpstack).capacity? (*mpstack).capacity<<1
: 8; (*mpstack).items = (MPConvStackVal*)xrealloc((*mpstack)
.items, sizeof(MPConvStackVal) * (*mpstack).capacity); } (*mpstack
).items[(*mpstack).size++] = (((MPConvStackVal) { .type = kMPConvPairs
, .data = { .l = { .list = val_list, .li = val_list->lv_first
, }, }, })); } while (0)
6676 .l = { \do { if ((*mpstack).size == (*mpstack).capacity) { (*mpstack)
.capacity = (*mpstack).capacity? (*mpstack).capacity<<1
: 8; (*mpstack).items = (MPConvStackVal*)xrealloc((*mpstack)
.items, sizeof(MPConvStackVal) * (*mpstack).capacity); } (*mpstack
).items[(*mpstack).size++] = (((MPConvStackVal) { .type = kMPConvPairs
, .data = { .l = { .list = val_list, .li = val_list->lv_first
, }, }, })); } while (0)
6677 .list = val_list, \do { if ((*mpstack).size == (*mpstack).capacity) { (*mpstack)
.capacity = (*mpstack).capacity? (*mpstack).capacity<<1
: 8; (*mpstack).items = (MPConvStackVal*)xrealloc((*mpstack)
.items, sizeof(MPConvStackVal) * (*mpstack).capacity); } (*mpstack
).items[(*mpstack).size++] = (((MPConvStackVal) { .type = kMPConvPairs
, .data = { .l = { .list = val_list, .li = val_list->lv_first
, }, }, })); } while (0)
6678 .li = val_list->lv_first, \do { if ((*mpstack).size == (*mpstack).capacity) { (*mpstack)
.capacity = (*mpstack).capacity? (*mpstack).capacity<<1
: 8; (*mpstack).items = (MPConvStackVal*)xrealloc((*mpstack)
.items, sizeof(MPConvStackVal) * (*mpstack).capacity); } (*mpstack
).items[(*mpstack).size++] = (((MPConvStackVal) { .type = kMPConvPairs
, .data = { .l = { .list = val_list, .li = val_list->lv_first
, }, }, })); } while (0)
6679 }, \do { if ((*mpstack).size == (*mpstack).capacity) { (*mpstack)
.capacity = (*mpstack).capacity? (*mpstack).capacity<<1
: 8; (*mpstack).items = (MPConvStackVal*)xrealloc((*mpstack)
.items, sizeof(MPConvStackVal) * (*mpstack).capacity); } (*mpstack
).items[(*mpstack).size++] = (((MPConvStackVal) { .type = kMPConvPairs
, .data = { .l = { .list = val_list, .li = val_list->lv_first
, }, }, })); } while (0)
6680 }, \do { if ((*mpstack).size == (*mpstack).capacity) { (*mpstack)
.capacity = (*mpstack).capacity? (*mpstack).capacity<<1
: 8; (*mpstack).items = (MPConvStackVal*)xrealloc((*mpstack)
.items, sizeof(MPConvStackVal) * (*mpstack).capacity); } (*mpstack
).items[(*mpstack).size++] = (((MPConvStackVal) { .type = kMPConvPairs
, .data = { .l = { .list = val_list, .li = val_list->lv_first
, }, }, })); } while (0)
6681 }))do { if ((*mpstack).size == (*mpstack).capacity) { (*mpstack)
.capacity = (*mpstack).capacity? (*mpstack).capacity<<1
: 8; (*mpstack).items = (MPConvStackVal*)xrealloc((*mpstack)
.items, sizeof(MPConvStackVal) * (*mpstack).capacity); } (*mpstack
).items[(*mpstack).size++] = (((MPConvStackVal) { .type = kMPConvPairs
, .data = { .l = { .list = val_list, .li = val_list->lv_first
, }, }, })); } while (0); \
6682 break; \
6683 } \
6684 case kMPExt: { \
6685 const list_T *val_list; \
6686 varnumber_T type; \
6687 if (val_di->di_tv.v_type != VAR_LIST4 \
6688 || (val_list = val_di->di_tv.vval.v_list) == NULL((void*)0) \
6689 || val_list->lv_len != 2 \
6690 || (val_list->lv_first->li_tv.v_type != VAR_NUMBER1) \
6691 || (type = val_list->lv_first->li_tv.vval.v_number) > INT8_MAX(127) \
6692 || type < INT8_MIN(-128) \
6693 || (val_list->lv_last->li_tv.v_type != VAR_LIST4)) { \
6694 goto name##_convert_one_value_regular_dict; \
6695 } \
6696 size_t len; \
6697 char *buf; \
6698 if (!vim_list_to_buf(val_list->lv_last->li_tv.vval.v_list, \
6699 &len, &buf)) { \
6700 goto name##_convert_one_value_regular_dict; \
6701 } \
6702 CONV_EXT_STRING(buf, len, type); \
6703 xfree(buf); \
6704 break; \
6705 } \
6706 } \
6707 break; \
6708 } \
6709name##_convert_one_value_regular_dict: \
6710 CHECK_SELF_REFERENCE(tv->vval.v_dict, dv_copyID, kMPConvDict)do { if ((tv->vval.v_dict)->dv_copyID == copyID) { CONV_RECURSE
((tv->vval.v_dict), kMPConvDict); } (tv->vval.v_dict)->
dv_copyID = copyID; } while (0); \
6711 CONV_DICT_START(tv->vval.v_dict); \
6712 kv_push(MPConvStackVal, *mpstack, ((MPConvStackVal) { \do { if ((*mpstack).size == (*mpstack).capacity) { (*mpstack)
.capacity = (*mpstack).capacity? (*mpstack).capacity<<1
: 8; (*mpstack).items = (MPConvStackVal*)xrealloc((*mpstack)
.items, sizeof(MPConvStackVal) * (*mpstack).capacity); } (*mpstack
).items[(*mpstack).size++] = (((MPConvStackVal) { .type = kMPConvDict
, .data = { .d = { .dict = tv->vval.v_dict, .hi = tv->vval
.v_dict->dv_hashtab.ht_array, .todo = tv->vval.v_dict->
dv_hashtab.ht_used, }, }, })); } while (0)
6713 .type = kMPConvDict, \do { if ((*mpstack).size == (*mpstack).capacity) { (*mpstack)
.capacity = (*mpstack).capacity? (*mpstack).capacity<<1
: 8; (*mpstack).items = (MPConvStackVal*)xrealloc((*mpstack)
.items, sizeof(MPConvStackVal) * (*mpstack).capacity); } (*mpstack
).items[(*mpstack).size++] = (((MPConvStackVal) { .type = kMPConvDict
, .data = { .d = { .dict = tv->vval.v_dict, .hi = tv->vval
.v_dict->dv_hashtab.ht_array, .todo = tv->vval.v_dict->
dv_hashtab.ht_used, }, }, })); } while (0)
6714 .data = { \do { if ((*mpstack).size == (*mpstack).capacity) { (*mpstack)
.capacity = (*mpstack).capacity? (*mpstack).capacity<<1
: 8; (*mpstack).items = (MPConvStackVal*)xrealloc((*mpstack)
.items, sizeof(MPConvStackVal) * (*mpstack).capacity); } (*mpstack
).items[(*mpstack).size++] = (((MPConvStackVal) { .type = kMPConvDict
, .data = { .d = { .dict = tv->vval.v_dict, .hi = tv->vval
.v_dict->dv_hashtab.ht_array, .todo = tv->vval.v_dict->
dv_hashtab.ht_used, }, }, })); } while (0)
6715 .d = { \do { if ((*mpstack).size == (*mpstack).capacity) { (*mpstack)
.capacity = (*mpstack).capacity? (*mpstack).capacity<<1
: 8; (*mpstack).items = (MPConvStackVal*)xrealloc((*mpstack)
.items, sizeof(MPConvStackVal) * (*mpstack).capacity); } (*mpstack
).items[(*mpstack).size++] = (((MPConvStackVal) { .type = kMPConvDict
, .data = { .d = { .dict = tv->vval.v_dict, .hi = tv->vval
.v_dict->dv_hashtab.ht_array, .todo = tv->vval.v_dict->
dv_hashtab.ht_used, }, }, })); } while (0)
6716 .dict = tv->vval.v_dict, \do { if ((*mpstack).size == (*mpstack).capacity) { (*mpstack)
.capacity = (*mpstack).capacity? (*mpstack).capacity<<1
: 8; (*mpstack).items = (MPConvStackVal*)xrealloc((*mpstack)
.items, sizeof(MPConvStackVal) * (*mpstack).capacity); } (*mpstack
).items[(*mpstack).size++] = (((MPConvStackVal) { .type = kMPConvDict
, .data = { .d = { .dict = tv->vval.v_dict, .hi = tv->vval
.v_dict->dv_hashtab.ht_array, .todo = tv->vval.v_dict->
dv_hashtab.ht_used, }, }, })); } while (0)
6717 .hi = tv->vval.v_dict->dv_hashtab.ht_array, \do { if ((*mpstack).size == (*mpstack).capacity) { (*mpstack)
.capacity = (*mpstack).capacity? (*mpstack).capacity<<1
: 8; (*mpstack).items = (MPConvStackVal*)xrealloc((*mpstack)
.items, sizeof(MPConvStackVal) * (*mpstack).capacity); } (*mpstack
).items[(*mpstack).size++] = (((MPConvStackVal) { .type = kMPConvDict
, .data = { .d = { .dict = tv->vval.v_dict, .hi = tv->vval
.v_dict->dv_hashtab.ht_array, .todo = tv->vval.v_dict->
dv_hashtab.ht_used, }, }, })); } while (0)
6718 .todo = tv->vval.v_dict->dv_hashtab.ht_used, \do { if ((*mpstack).size == (*mpstack).capacity) { (*mpstack)
.capacity = (*mpstack).capacity? (*mpstack).capacity<<1
: 8; (*mpstack).items = (MPConvStackVal*)xrealloc((*mpstack)
.items, sizeof(MPConvStackVal) * (*mpstack).capacity); } (*mpstack
).items[(*mpstack).size++] = (((MPConvStackVal) { .type = kMPConvDict
, .data = { .d = { .dict = tv->vval.v_dict, .hi = tv->vval
.v_dict->dv_hashtab.ht_array, .todo = tv->vval.v_dict->
dv_hashtab.ht_used, }, }, })); } while (0)
6719 }, \do { if ((*mpstack).size == (*mpstack).capacity) { (*mpstack)
.capacity = (*mpstack).capacity? (*mpstack).capacity<<1
: 8; (*mpstack).items = (MPConvStackVal*)xrealloc((*mpstack)
.items, sizeof(MPConvStackVal) * (*mpstack).capacity); } (*mpstack
).items[(*mpstack).size++] = (((MPConvStackVal) { .type = kMPConvDict
, .data = { .d = { .dict = tv->vval.v_dict, .hi = tv->vval
.v_dict->dv_hashtab.ht_array, .todo = tv->vval.v_dict->
dv_hashtab.ht_used, }, }, })); } while (0)
6720 }, \do { if ((*mpstack).size == (*mpstack).capacity) { (*mpstack)
.capacity = (*mpstack).capacity? (*mpstack).capacity<<1
: 8; (*mpstack).items = (MPConvStackVal*)xrealloc((*mpstack)
.items, sizeof(MPConvStackVal) * (*mpstack).capacity); } (*mpstack
).items[(*mpstack).size++] = (((MPConvStackVal) { .type = kMPConvDict
, .data = { .d = { .dict = tv->vval.v_dict, .hi = tv->vval
.v_dict->dv_hashtab.ht_array, .todo = tv->vval.v_dict->
dv_hashtab.ht_used, }, }, })); } while (0)
6721 }))do { if ((*mpstack).size == (*mpstack).capacity) { (*mpstack)
.capacity = (*mpstack).capacity? (*mpstack).capacity<<1
: 8; (*mpstack).items = (MPConvStackVal*)xrealloc((*mpstack)
.items, sizeof(MPConvStackVal) * (*mpstack).capacity); } (*mpstack
).items[(*mpstack).size++] = (((MPConvStackVal) { .type = kMPConvDict
, .data = { .d = { .dict = tv->vval.v_dict, .hi = tv->vval
.v_dict->dv_hashtab.ht_array, .todo = tv->vval.v_dict->
dv_hashtab.ht_used, }, }, })); } while (0); \
6722 break; \
6723 } \
6724 default: { \
6725 EMSG2(_(e_intern2), #name "_convert_one_value()")emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_intern2))), (char_u *)(#name
"_convert_one_value()")); \
6726 return FAIL0; \
6727 } \
6728 } \
6729 return OK1; \
6730} \
6731\
6732scope int vim_to_##name(firstargtype firstargname, typval_T *const tv, \
6733 const char *const objname) \
6734 FUNC_ATTR_WARN_UNUSED_RESULT \
6735{ \
6736 current_copyID += COPYID_INC2; \
6737 const int copyID = current_copyID; \
6738 MPConvStack mpstack; \
6739 kv_init(mpstack)((mpstack).size = (mpstack).capacity = 0, (mpstack).items = 0
); \
6740 if (name##_convert_one_value(firstargname, &mpstack, tv, copyID, objname) \
6741 == FAIL0) { \
6742 goto vim_to_msgpack_error_ret; \
6743 } \
6744 while (kv_size(mpstack)((mpstack).size)) { \
6745 MPConvStackVal *cur_mpsv = &kv_A(mpstack, kv_size(mpstack) - 1)((mpstack).items[(((mpstack).size) - 1)]); \
6746 typval_T *cur_tv = NULL((void*)0); \
6747 switch (cur_mpsv->type) { \
6748 case kMPConvDict: { \
6749 if (!cur_mpsv->data.d.todo) { \
6750 (void) kv_pop(mpstack)((mpstack).items[--(mpstack).size]); \
6751 cur_mpsv->data.d.dict->dv_copyID = copyID - 1; \
6752 CONV_DICT_END(cur_mpsv->data.d.dict); \
6753 continue; \
6754 } else if (cur_mpsv->data.d.todo \
6755 != cur_mpsv->data.d.dict->dv_hashtab.ht_used) { \
6756 CONV_DICT_BETWEEN_ITEMS(cur_mpsv->data.d.dict); \
6757 } \
6758 while (HASHITEM_EMPTY(cur_mpsv->data.d.hi)((cur_mpsv->data.d.hi)->hi_key == ((void*)0) || (cur_mpsv
->data.d.hi)->hi_key == &hash_removed)) { \
6759 cur_mpsv->data.d.hi++; \
6760 } \
6761 dictitem_T *const di = HI2DI(cur_mpsv->data.d.hi)((dictitem_T *)((cur_mpsv->data.d.hi)->hi_key - __builtin_offsetof
(dictitem_T, di_key))); \
6762 cur_mpsv->data.d.todo--; \
6763 cur_mpsv->data.d.hi++; \
6764 CONV_STR_STRING(&di->di_key[0], STRLEN(&di->di_key[0])strlen((char *)(&di->di_key[0]))); \
6765 CONV_DICT_AFTER_KEY(cur_mpsv->data.d.dict); \
6766 cur_tv = &di->di_tv; \
6767 break; \
6768 } \
6769 case kMPConvList: { \
6770 if (cur_mpsv->data.l.li == NULL((void*)0)) { \
6771 (void) kv_pop(mpstack)((mpstack).items[--(mpstack).size]); \
6772 cur_mpsv->data.l.list->lv_copyID = copyID - 1; \
6773 CONV_LIST_END(cur_mpsv->data.l.list); \
6774 continue; \
6775 } else if (cur_mpsv->data.l.li != cur_mpsv->data.l.list->lv_first) { \
6776 CONV_LIST_BETWEEN_ITEMS(cur_mpsv->data.l.list); \
6777 } \
6778 cur_tv = &cur_mpsv->data.l.li->li_tv; \
6779 cur_mpsv->data.l.li = cur_mpsv->data.l.li->li_next; \
6780 break; \
6781 } \
6782 case kMPConvPairs: { \
6783 if (cur_mpsv->data.l.li == NULL((void*)0)) { \
6784 (void) kv_pop(mpstack)((mpstack).items[--(mpstack).size]); \
6785 cur_mpsv->data.l.list->lv_copyID = copyID - 1; \
6786 continue; \
6787 } \
6788 const list_T *const kv_pair = cur_mpsv->data.l.li->li_tv.vval.v_list; \
6789 if (name##_convert_one_value(firstargname, &mpstack, \
6790 &kv_pair->lv_first->li_tv, copyID, \
6791 objname) == FAIL0) { \
6792 goto vim_to_msgpack_error_ret; \
6793 } \
6794 cur_tv = &kv_pair->lv_last->li_tv; \
6795 cur_mpsv->data.l.li = cur_mpsv->data.l.li->li_next; \
6796 break; \
6797 } \
6798 } \
6799 if (name##_convert_one_value(firstargname, &mpstack, cur_tv, copyID, \
6800 objname) == FAIL0) { \
6801 goto vim_to_msgpack_error_ret; \
6802 } \
6803 } \
6804 kv_destroy(mpstack)xfree((mpstack).items); \
6805 return OK1; \
6806vim_to_msgpack_error_ret: \
6807 kv_destroy(mpstack)xfree((mpstack).items); \
6808 return FAIL0; \
6809}
6810
6811#define CONV_STRING(buf, len) \
6812 do { \
6813 const char *const buf_ = (const char *) buf; \
6814 if (buf == NULL((void*)0)) { \
6815 ga_concat(gap, (char_u *) "''"); \
6816 } else { \
6817 const size_t len_ = (len); \
6818 size_t num_quotes = 0; \
6819 for (size_t i = 0; i < len_; i++) { \
6820 if (buf_[i] == '\'') { \
6821 num_quotes++; \
6822 } \
6823 } \
6824 ga_grow(gap, 2 + len_ + num_quotes); \
6825 ga_append(gap, '\''); \
6826 for (size_t i = 0; i < len_; i++) { \
6827 if (buf_[i] == '\'') { \
6828 num_quotes++; \
6829 ga_append(gap, '\''); \
6830 } \
6831 ga_append(gap, buf_[i]); \
6832 } \
6833 ga_append(gap, '\''); \
6834 } \
6835 } while (0)
6836
6837#define CONV_STR_STRING(buf, len) \
6838 CONV_STRING(buf, len)
6839
6840#define CONV_EXT_STRING(buf, len, type)
6841
6842#define CONV_NUMBER(num) \
6843 do { \
6844 char numbuf[NUMBUFLEN65]; \
6845 vim_snprintf(numbuf, NUMBUFLEN65 - 1, "%" PRId64"l" "d", (int64_t) (num)); \
6846 ga_concat(gap, (char_u *) numbuf); \
6847 } while (0)
6848
6849#define CONV_FLOAT(flt) \
6850 do { \
6851 char numbuf[NUMBUFLEN65]; \
6852 vim_snprintf(numbuf, NUMBUFLEN65 - 1, "%g", (flt)); \
6853 ga_concat(gap, (char_u *) numbuf); \
6854 } while (0)
6855
6856#define CONV_FUNC(fun) \
6857 do { \
6858 ga_concat(gap, (char_u *) "function("); \
6859 CONV_STRING(fun, STRLEN(fun)strlen((char *)(fun))); \
6860 ga_append(gap, ')'); \
6861 } while (0)
6862
6863#define CONV_EMPTY_LIST() \
6864 ga_concat(gap, (char_u *) "[]")
6865
6866#define CONV_LIST_START(lst) \
6867 ga_append(gap, '[')
6868
6869#define CONV_EMPTY_DICT() \
6870 ga_concat(gap, (char_u *) "{}")
6871
6872#define CONV_SPECIAL_NIL()
6873
6874#define CONV_SPECIAL_BOOL(num)
6875
6876#define CONV_UNSIGNED_NUMBER(num)
6877
6878#define CONV_SPECIAL_MAP_START(lst)
6879
6880#define CONV_DICT_START(dct) \
6881 ga_append(gap, '{')
6882
6883#define CONV_DICT_END(dct) \
6884 ga_append(gap, '}')
6885
6886#define CONV_DICT_AFTER_KEY(dct) \
6887 ga_concat(gap, (char_u *) ": ")
6888
6889#define CONV_DICT_BETWEEN_ITEMS(dct) \
6890 ga_concat(gap, (char_u *) ", ")
6891
6892#define CONV_LIST_END(lst) \
6893 ga_append(gap, ']')
6894
6895#define CONV_LIST_BETWEEN_ITEMS(lst) \
6896 CONV_DICT_BETWEEN_ITEMS(NULL((void*)0))
6897
6898#define CONV_RECURSE(val, conv_type) \
6899 do { \
6900 if (!did_echo_string_emsg) { \
6901 /* Only give this message once for a recursive call to avoid */ \
6902 /* flooding the user with errors. */ \
6903 did_echo_string_emsg = true1; \
6904 EMSG(_("E724: unable to correctly dump variable " \emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)("E724: unable to correctly dump variable "
"with self-referencing container"))))
6905 "with self-referencing container"))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)("E724: unable to correctly dump variable "
"with self-referencing container")))); \
6906 } \
6907 char ebuf[NUMBUFLEN65 + 7]; \
6908 size_t backref = 0; \
6909 for (; backref < kv_size(*mpstack)((*mpstack).size); backref++) { \
6910 const MPConvStackVal mpval = kv_a(MPConvStackVal, *mpstack, backref)(((*mpstack).capacity <= (size_t)(backref)? ((*mpstack).capacity
= (*mpstack).size = (backref) + 1, (--((*mpstack).capacity),
((*mpstack).capacity)|=((*mpstack).capacity)>>1, ((*mpstack
).capacity)|=((*mpstack).capacity)>>2, ((*mpstack).capacity
)|=((*mpstack).capacity)>>4, ((*mpstack).capacity)|=((*
mpstack).capacity)>>8, ((*mpstack).capacity)|=((*mpstack
).capacity)>>16, ++((*mpstack).capacity)), (*mpstack).items
= (MPConvStackVal*)xrealloc((*mpstack).items, sizeof(MPConvStackVal
) * (*mpstack).capacity), 0) : (*mpstack).size <= (size_t)
(backref)? (*mpstack).size = (backref) + 1 : 0), (*mpstack).items
[(backref)]); \
6911 if (mpval.type == conv_type) { \
6912 if (conv_type == kMPConvDict) { \
6913 if ((void *) mpval.data.d.dict == (void *) (val)) { \
6914 break; \
6915 } \
6916 } else if (conv_type == kMPConvList) { \
6917 if ((void *) mpval.data.l.list == (void *) (val)) { \
6918 break; \
6919 } \
6920 } \
6921 } \
6922 } \
6923 vim_snprintf(ebuf, NUMBUFLEN65 + 6, "{E724@%zu}", backref); \
6924 ga_concat(gap, (char_u *) &ebuf[0]); \
6925 return OK1; \
6926 } while (0)
6927
6928#define CONV_ALLOW_SPECIAL false0
6929
6930DEFINE_VIML_CONV_FUNCTIONS(static, string, garray_T *const, gap)static int string_convert_one_value(garray_T *const gap, MPConvStack
*const mpstack, typval_T *const tv, const int copyID, const char
*const objname) { switch (tv->v_type) { case 2: { CONV_STRING
(tv->vval.v_string, strlen((char *)(tv->vval.v_string))
); break; } case 1: { CONV_NUMBER(tv->vval.v_number); break
; } case 6: { CONV_FLOAT(tv->vval.v_float); break; } case 3
: { CONV_FUNC(tv->vval.v_string); break; } case 4: { if (tv
->vval.v_list == ((void*)0) || tv->vval.v_list->lv_len
== 0) { CONV_EMPTY_LIST(); break; } do { if ((tv->vval.v_list
)->lv_copyID == copyID) { CONV_RECURSE((tv->vval.v_list
), kMPConvList); } (tv->vval.v_list)->lv_copyID = copyID
; } while (0); CONV_LIST_START(tv->vval.v_list); do { if (
(*mpstack).size == (*mpstack).capacity) { (*mpstack).capacity
= (*mpstack).capacity? (*mpstack).capacity<<1 : 8; (*mpstack
).items = (MPConvStackVal*)xrealloc((*mpstack).items, sizeof(
MPConvStackVal) * (*mpstack).capacity); } (*mpstack).items[(*
mpstack).size++] = (((MPConvStackVal) { .type = kMPConvList, .
data = { .l = { .list = tv->vval.v_list, .li = tv->vval
.v_list->lv_first, }, }, })); } while (0); break; } case 5
: { if (tv->vval.v_dict == ((void*)0) || tv->vval.v_dict
->dv_hashtab.ht_used == 0) { CONV_EMPTY_DICT(); break; } const
dictitem_T *type_di; const dictitem_T *val_di; if (CONV_ALLOW_SPECIAL
&& tv->vval.v_dict->dv_hashtab.ht_used == 2 &&
(type_di = dict_find((dict_T *) tv->vval.v_dict, (char_u *
) "_TYPE", -1)) != ((void*)0) && type_di->di_tv.v_type
== 4 && (val_di = dict_find((dict_T *) tv->vval.v_dict
, (char_u *) "_VAL", -1)) != ((void*)0)) { size_t i; for (i =
0; i < ((sizeof(msgpack_type_lists)/sizeof((msgpack_type_lists
)[0])) / ((size_t)(!(sizeof(msgpack_type_lists) % sizeof((msgpack_type_lists
)[0]))))); i++) { if (type_di->di_tv.vval.v_list == msgpack_type_lists
[i]) { break; } } if (i == ((sizeof(msgpack_type_lists)/sizeof
((msgpack_type_lists)[0])) / ((size_t)(!(sizeof(msgpack_type_lists
) % sizeof((msgpack_type_lists)[0])))))) { goto string_convert_one_value_regular_dict
; } switch ((MessagePackType) i) { case kMPNil: { CONV_SPECIAL_NIL
(); break; } case kMPBoolean: { if (val_di->di_tv.v_type !=
1) { goto string_convert_one_value_regular_dict; } CONV_SPECIAL_BOOL
(val_di->di_tv.vval.v_number); break; } case kMPInteger: {
const list_T *val_list; varnumber_T sign; varnumber_T highest_bits
; varnumber_T high_bits; varnumber_T low_bits; if (val_di->
di_tv.v_type != 4 || (val_list = val_di->di_tv.vval.v_list
) == ((void*)0) || val_list->lv_len != 4 || val_list->lv_first
->li_tv.v_type != 1 || (sign = val_list->lv_first->li_tv
.vval.v_number) == 0 || val_list->lv_first->li_next->
li_tv.v_type != 1 || (highest_bits = val_list->lv_first->
li_next->li_tv.vval.v_number) < 0 || val_list->lv_last
->li_prev->li_tv.v_type != 1 || (high_bits = val_list->
lv_last->li_prev->li_tv.vval.v_number) < 0 || val_list
->lv_last->li_tv.v_type != 1 || (low_bits = val_list->
lv_last->li_tv.vval.v_number) < 0) { goto string_convert_one_value_regular_dict
; } uint64_t number = ((uint64_t) (((uint64_t) highest_bits) <<
62) | (uint64_t) (((uint64_t) high_bits) << 31) | (uint64_t
) low_bits); if (sign > 0) { CONV_UNSIGNED_NUMBER(number);
} else { CONV_NUMBER(-number); } break; } case kMPFloat: { if
(val_di->di_tv.v_type != 6) { goto string_convert_one_value_regular_dict
; } CONV_FLOAT(val_di->di_tv.vval.v_float); break; } case kMPString
: case kMPBinary: { const _Bool is_string = ((MessagePackType
) i == kMPString); if (val_di->di_tv.v_type != 4) { goto string_convert_one_value_regular_dict
; } size_t len; char *buf; if (!vim_list_to_buf(val_di->di_tv
.vval.v_list, &len, &buf)) { goto string_convert_one_value_regular_dict
; } if (is_string) { CONV_STR_STRING(buf, len); } else { CONV_STRING
(buf, len); } xfree(buf); break; } case kMPArray: { if (val_di
->di_tv.v_type != 4) { goto string_convert_one_value_regular_dict
; } do { if ((val_di->di_tv.vval.v_list)->lv_copyID == copyID
) { CONV_RECURSE((val_di->di_tv.vval.v_list), kMPConvList)
; } (val_di->di_tv.vval.v_list)->lv_copyID = copyID; } while
(0); CONV_LIST_START(val_di->di_tv.vval.v_list); do { if (
(*mpstack).size == (*mpstack).capacity) { (*mpstack).capacity
= (*mpstack).capacity? (*mpstack).capacity<<1 : 8; (*mpstack
).items = (MPConvStackVal*)xrealloc((*mpstack).items, sizeof(
MPConvStackVal) * (*mpstack).capacity); } (*mpstack).items[(*
mpstack).size++] = (((MPConvStackVal) { .type = kMPConvList, .
data = { .l = { .list = val_di->di_tv.vval.v_list, .li = val_di
->di_tv.vval.v_list->lv_first, }, }, })); } while (0); break
; } case kMPMap: { if (val_di->di_tv.v_type != 4) { goto string_convert_one_value_regular_dict
; } if (val_di->di_tv.vval.v_list == ((void*)0)) { CONV_EMPTY_DICT
(); break; } list_T *const val_list = val_di->di_tv.vval.v_list
; for (const listitem_T *li = val_list->lv_first; li != ((
void*)0); li = li->li_next) { if (li->li_tv.v_type != 4
|| li->li_tv.vval.v_list->lv_len != 2) { goto string_convert_one_value_regular_dict
; } } do { if ((val_list)->lv_copyID == copyID) { CONV_RECURSE
((val_list), kMPConvPairs); } (val_list)->lv_copyID = copyID
; } while (0); CONV_SPECIAL_MAP_START(val_list); do { if ((*mpstack
).size == (*mpstack).capacity) { (*mpstack).capacity = (*mpstack
).capacity? (*mpstack).capacity<<1 : 8; (*mpstack).items
= (MPConvStackVal*)xrealloc((*mpstack).items, sizeof(MPConvStackVal
) * (*mpstack).capacity); } (*mpstack).items[(*mpstack).size++
] = (((MPConvStackVal) { .type = kMPConvPairs, .data = { .l =
{ .list = val_list, .li = val_list->lv_first, }, }, })); }
while (0); break; } case kMPExt: { const list_T *val_list; varnumber_T
type; if (val_di->di_tv.v_type != 4 || (val_list = val_di
->di_tv.vval.v_list) == ((void*)0) || val_list->lv_len !=
2 || (val_list->lv_first->li_tv.v_type != 1) || (type =
val_list->lv_first->li_tv.vval.v_number) > (127) ||
type < (-128) || (val_list->lv_last->li_tv.v_type !=
4)) { goto string_convert_one_value_regular_dict; } size_t len
; char *buf; if (!vim_list_to_buf(val_list->lv_last->li_tv
.vval.v_list, &len, &buf)) { goto string_convert_one_value_regular_dict
; } CONV_EXT_STRING(buf, len, type); xfree(buf); break; } } break
; } string_convert_one_value_regular_dict: do { if ((tv->vval
.v_dict)->dv_copyID == copyID) { CONV_RECURSE((tv->vval
.v_dict), kMPConvDict); } (tv->vval.v_dict)->dv_copyID =
copyID; } while (0); CONV_DICT_START(tv->vval.v_dict); do
{ if ((*mpstack).size == (*mpstack).capacity) { (*mpstack).capacity
= (*mpstack).capacity? (*mpstack).capacity<<1 : 8; (*mpstack
).items = (MPConvStackVal*)xrealloc((*mpstack).items, sizeof(
MPConvStackVal) * (*mpstack).capacity); } (*mpstack).items[(*
mpstack).size++] = (((MPConvStackVal) { .type = kMPConvDict, .
data = { .d = { .dict = tv->vval.v_dict, .hi = tv->vval
.v_dict->dv_hashtab.ht_array, .todo = tv->vval.v_dict->
dv_hashtab.ht_used, }, }, })); } while (0); break; } default:
{ emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_intern2))), (char_u *)
("string" "_convert_one_value()")); return 0; } } return 1; }
static int vim_to_string(garray_T *const gap, typval_T *const
tv, const char *const objname) { current_copyID += 2; const int
copyID = current_copyID; MPConvStack mpstack; ((mpstack).size
= (mpstack).capacity = 0, (mpstack).items = 0); if ( string_convert_one_value
(gap, &mpstack, tv, copyID, objname) == 0) { goto vim_to_msgpack_error_ret
; } while (((mpstack).size)) { MPConvStackVal *cur_mpsv = &
((mpstack).items[(((mpstack).size) - 1)]); typval_T *cur_tv =
((void*)0); switch (cur_mpsv->type) { case kMPConvDict: {
if (!cur_mpsv->data.d.todo) { (void) ((mpstack).items[--(
mpstack).size]); cur_mpsv->data.d.dict->dv_copyID = copyID
- 1; CONV_DICT_END(cur_mpsv->data.d.dict); continue; } else
if (cur_mpsv->data.d.todo != cur_mpsv->data.d.dict->
dv_hashtab.ht_used) { CONV_DICT_BETWEEN_ITEMS(cur_mpsv->data
.d.dict); } while (((cur_mpsv->data.d.hi)->hi_key == ((
void*)0) || (cur_mpsv->data.d.hi)->hi_key == &hash_removed
)) { cur_mpsv->data.d.hi++; } dictitem_T *const di = ((dictitem_T
*)((cur_mpsv->data.d.hi)->hi_key - __builtin_offsetof(
dictitem_T, di_key))); cur_mpsv->data.d.todo--; cur_mpsv->
data.d.hi++; CONV_STR_STRING(&di->di_key[0], strlen((char
*)(&di->di_key[0]))); CONV_DICT_AFTER_KEY(cur_mpsv->
data.d.dict); cur_tv = &di->di_tv; break; } case kMPConvList
: { if (cur_mpsv->data.l.li == ((void*)0)) { (void) ((mpstack
).items[--(mpstack).size]); cur_mpsv->data.l.list->lv_copyID
= copyID - 1; CONV_LIST_END(cur_mpsv->data.l.list); continue
; } else if (cur_mpsv->data.l.li != cur_mpsv->data.l.list
->lv_first) { CONV_LIST_BETWEEN_ITEMS(cur_mpsv->data.l.
list); } cur_tv = &cur_mpsv->data.l.li->li_tv; cur_mpsv
->data.l.li = cur_mpsv->data.l.li->li_next; break; }
case kMPConvPairs: { if (cur_mpsv->data.l.li == ((void*)0
)) { (void) ((mpstack).items[--(mpstack).size]); cur_mpsv->
data.l.list->lv_copyID = copyID - 1; continue; } const list_T
*const kv_pair = cur_mpsv->data.l.li->li_tv.vval.v_list
; if ( string_convert_one_value(gap, &mpstack, &kv_pair
->lv_first->li_tv, copyID, objname) == 0) { goto vim_to_msgpack_error_ret
; } cur_tv = &kv_pair->lv_last->li_tv; cur_mpsv->
data.l.li = cur_mpsv->data.l.li->li_next; break; } } if
( string_convert_one_value(gap, &mpstack, cur_tv, copyID
, objname) == 0) { goto vim_to_msgpack_error_ret; } } xfree((
mpstack).items); return 1; vim_to_msgpack_error_ret: xfree((mpstack
).items); return 0; }
6931
6932#undef CONV_RECURSE
6933#define CONV_RECURSE(val, conv_type) \
6934 do { \
6935 char ebuf[NUMBUFLEN65 + 7]; \
6936 size_t backref = 0; \
6937 for (; backref < kv_size(*mpstack)((*mpstack).size); backref++) { \
6938 const MPConvStackVal mpval = kv_a(MPConvStackVal, *mpstack, backref)(((*mpstack).capacity <= (size_t)(backref)? ((*mpstack).capacity
= (*mpstack).size = (backref) + 1, (--((*mpstack).capacity),
((*mpstack).capacity)|=((*mpstack).capacity)>>1, ((*mpstack
).capacity)|=((*mpstack).capacity)>>2, ((*mpstack).capacity
)|=((*mpstack).capacity)>>4, ((*mpstack).capacity)|=((*
mpstack).capacity)>>8, ((*mpstack).capacity)|=((*mpstack
).capacity)>>16, ++((*mpstack).capacity)), (*mpstack).items
= (MPConvStackVal*)xrealloc((*mpstack).items, sizeof(MPConvStackVal
) * (*mpstack).capacity), 0) : (*mpstack).size <= (size_t)
(backref)? (*mpstack).size = (backref) + 1 : 0), (*mpstack).items
[(backref)]); \
6939 if (mpval.type == conv_type) { \
6940 if (conv_type == kMPConvDict) { \
6941 if ((void *) mpval.data.d.dict == (void *) val) { \
6942 break; \
6943 } \
6944 } else if (conv_type == kMPConvList) { \
6945 if ((void *) mpval.data.l.list == (void *) val) { \
6946 break; \
6947 } \
6948 } \
6949 } \
6950 } \
6951 if (conv_type == kMPConvDict) { \
6952 vim_snprintf(ebuf, NUMBUFLEN65 + 6, "{...@%zu}", backref); \
6953 } else { \
6954 vim_snprintf(ebuf, NUMBUFLEN65 + 6, "[...@%zu]", backref); \
6955 } \
6956 ga_concat(gap, (char_u *) &ebuf[0]); \
6957 return OK1; \
6958 } while (0)
6959
6960DEFINE_VIML_CONV_FUNCTIONS(static, echo, garray_T *const, gap)static int echo_convert_one_value(garray_T *const gap, MPConvStack
*const mpstack, typval_T *const tv, const int copyID, const char
