*const objname) { switch (tv->v_type) { case 2: { CONV_STRING
(tv->vval.v_string, strlen((char *)(tv->vval.v_string))
); break; } case 1: { CONV_NUMBER(tv->vval.v_number); break
; } case 6: { CONV_FLOAT(tv->vval.v_float); break; } case 3
: { CONV_FUNC(tv->vval.v_string); break; } case 4: { if (tv
->vval.v_list == ((void*)0) || tv->vval.v_list->lv_len
== 0) { CONV_EMPTY_LIST(); break; } do { if ((tv->vval.v_list
)->lv_copyID == copyID) { CONV_RECURSE((tv->vval.v_list
), kMPConvList); } (tv->vval.v_list)->lv_copyID = copyID
; } while (0); CONV_LIST_START(tv->vval.v_list); do { if (
(*mpstack).size == (*mpstack).capacity) { (*mpstack).capacity
= (*mpstack).capacity? (*mpstack).capacity<<1 : 8; (*mpstack
).items = (MPConvStackVal*)xrealloc((*mpstack).items, sizeof(
MPConvStackVal) * (*mpstack).capacity); } (*mpstack).items[(*
mpstack).size++] = (((MPConvStackVal) { .type = kMPConvList, .
data = { .l = { .list = tv->vval.v_list, .li = tv->vval
.v_list->lv_first, }, }, })); } while (0); break; } case 5
: { if (tv->vval.v_dict == ((void*)0) || tv->vval.v_dict
->dv_hashtab.ht_used == 0) { CONV_EMPTY_DICT(); break; } const
dictitem_T *type_di; const dictitem_T *val_di; if (CONV_ALLOW_SPECIAL
&& tv->vval.v_dict->dv_hashtab.ht_used == 2 &&
(type_di = dict_find((dict_T *) tv->vval.v_dict, (char_u *
) "_TYPE", -1)) != ((void*)0) && type_di->di_tv.v_type
== 4 && (val_di = dict_find((dict_T *) tv->vval.v_dict
, (char_u *) "_VAL", -1)) != ((void*)0)) { size_t i; for (i =
0; i < ((sizeof(msgpack_type_lists)/sizeof((msgpack_type_lists
)[0])) / ((size_t)(!(sizeof(msgpack_type_lists) % sizeof((msgpack_type_lists
)[0]))))); i++) { if (type_di->di_tv.vval.v_list == msgpack_type_lists
[i]) { break; } } if (i == ((sizeof(msgpack_type_lists)/sizeof
((msgpack_type_lists)[0])) / ((size_t)(!(sizeof(msgpack_type_lists
) % sizeof((msgpack_type_lists)[0])))))) { goto echo_convert_one_value_regular_dict
; } switch ((MessagePackType) i) { case kMPNil: { CONV_SPECIAL_NIL
(); break; } case kMPBoolean: { if (val_di->di_tv.v_type !=
1) { goto echo_convert_one_value_regular_dict; } CONV_SPECIAL_BOOL
(val_di->di_tv.vval.v_number); break; } case kMPInteger: {
const list_T *val_list; varnumber_T sign; varnumber_T highest_bits
; varnumber_T high_bits; varnumber_T low_bits; if (val_di->
di_tv.v_type != 4 || (val_list = val_di->di_tv.vval.v_list
) == ((void*)0) || val_list->lv_len != 4 || val_list->lv_first
->li_tv.v_type != 1 || (sign = val_list->lv_first->li_tv
.vval.v_number) == 0 || val_list->lv_first->li_next->
li_tv.v_type != 1 || (highest_bits = val_list->lv_first->
li_next->li_tv.vval.v_number) < 0 || val_list->lv_last
->li_prev->li_tv.v_type != 1 || (high_bits = val_list->
lv_last->li_prev->li_tv.vval.v_number) < 0 || val_list
->lv_last->li_tv.v_type != 1 || (low_bits = val_list->
lv_last->li_tv.vval.v_number) < 0) { goto echo_convert_one_value_regular_dict
; } uint64_t number = ((uint64_t) (((uint64_t) highest_bits) <<
62) | (uint64_t) (((uint64_t) high_bits) << 31) | (uint64_t
) low_bits); if (sign > 0) { CONV_UNSIGNED_NUMBER(number);
} else { CONV_NUMBER(-number); } break; } case kMPFloat: { if
(val_di->di_tv.v_type != 6) { goto echo_convert_one_value_regular_dict
; } CONV_FLOAT(val_di->di_tv.vval.v_float); break; } case kMPString
: case kMPBinary: { const _Bool is_string = ((MessagePackType
) i == kMPString); if (val_di->di_tv.v_type != 4) { goto echo_convert_one_value_regular_dict
; } size_t len; char *buf; if (!vim_list_to_buf(val_di->di_tv
.vval.v_list, &len, &buf)) { goto echo_convert_one_value_regular_dict
; } if (is_string) { CONV_STR_STRING(buf, len); } else { CONV_STRING
(buf, len); } xfree(buf); break; } case kMPArray: { if (val_di
->di_tv.v_type != 4) { goto echo_convert_one_value_regular_dict
; } do { if ((val_di->di_tv.vval.v_list)->lv_copyID == copyID
) { CONV_RECURSE((val_di->di_tv.vval.v_list), kMPConvList)
; } (val_di->di_tv.vval.v_list)->lv_copyID = copyID; } while
(0); CONV_LIST_START(val_di->di_tv.vval.v_list); do { if (
(*mpstack).size == (*mpstack).capacity) { (*mpstack).capacity
= (*mpstack).capacity? (*mpstack).capacity<<1 : 8; (*mpstack
).items = (MPConvStackVal*)xrealloc((*mpstack).items, sizeof(
MPConvStackVal) * (*mpstack).capacity); } (*mpstack).items[(*
mpstack).size++] = (((MPConvStackVal) { .type = kMPConvList, .
data = { .l = { .list = val_di->di_tv.vval.v_list, .li = val_di
->di_tv.vval.v_list->lv_first, }, }, })); } while (0); break
; } case kMPMap: { if (val_di->di_tv.v_type != 4) { goto echo_convert_one_value_regular_dict
; } if (val_di->di_tv.vval.v_list == ((void*)0)) { CONV_EMPTY_DICT
(); break; } list_T *const val_list = val_di->di_tv.vval.v_list
; for (const listitem_T *li = val_list->lv_first; li != ((
void*)0); li = li->li_next) { if (li->li_tv.v_type != 4
|| li->li_tv.vval.v_list->lv_len != 2) { goto echo_convert_one_value_regular_dict
; } } do { if ((val_list)->lv_copyID == copyID) { CONV_RECURSE
((val_list), kMPConvPairs); } (val_list)->lv_copyID = copyID
; } while (0); CONV_SPECIAL_MAP_START(val_list); do { if ((*mpstack
).size == (*mpstack).capacity) { (*mpstack).capacity = (*mpstack
).capacity? (*mpstack).capacity<<1 : 8; (*mpstack).items
= (MPConvStackVal*)xrealloc((*mpstack).items, sizeof(MPConvStackVal
) * (*mpstack).capacity); } (*mpstack).items[(*mpstack).size++
] = (((MPConvStackVal) { .type = kMPConvPairs, .data = { .l =
{ .list = val_list, .li = val_list->lv_first, }, }, })); }
while (0); break; } case kMPExt: { const list_T *val_list; varnumber_T
type; if (val_di->di_tv.v_type != 4 || (val_list = val_di
->di_tv.vval.v_list) == ((void*)0) || val_list->lv_len !=
2 || (val_list->lv_first->li_tv.v_type != 1) || (type =
val_list->lv_first->li_tv.vval.v_number) > (127) ||
type < (-128) || (val_list->lv_last->li_tv.v_type !=
4)) { goto echo_convert_one_value_regular_dict; } size_t len
; char *buf; if (!vim_list_to_buf(val_list->lv_last->li_tv
.vval.v_list, &len, &buf)) { goto echo_convert_one_value_regular_dict
; } CONV_EXT_STRING(buf, len, type); xfree(buf); break; } } break
; } echo_convert_one_value_regular_dict: do { if ((tv->vval
.v_dict)->dv_copyID == copyID) { CONV_RECURSE((tv->vval
.v_dict), kMPConvDict); } (tv->vval.v_dict)->dv_copyID =
copyID; } while (0); CONV_DICT_START(tv->vval.v_dict); do
{ if ((*mpstack).size == (*mpstack).capacity) { (*mpstack).capacity
= (*mpstack).capacity? (*mpstack).capacity<<1 : 8; (*mpstack
).items = (MPConvStackVal*)xrealloc((*mpstack).items, sizeof(
MPConvStackVal) * (*mpstack).capacity); } (*mpstack).items[(*
mpstack).size++] = (((MPConvStackVal) { .type = kMPConvDict, .
data = { .d = { .dict = tv->vval.v_dict, .hi = tv->vval
.v_dict->dv_hashtab.ht_array, .todo = tv->vval.v_dict->
dv_hashtab.ht_used, }, }, })); } while (0); break; } default:
{ emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_intern2))), (char_u *)
("echo" "_convert_one_value()")); return 0; } } return 1; } static
int vim_to_echo(garray_T *const gap, typval_T *const tv, const
char *const objname) { current_copyID += 2; const int copyID
= current_copyID; MPConvStack mpstack; ((mpstack).size = (mpstack
).capacity = 0, (mpstack).items = 0); if ( echo_convert_one_value
(gap, &mpstack, tv, copyID, objname) == 0) { goto vim_to_msgpack_error_ret
; } while (((mpstack).size)) { MPConvStackVal *cur_mpsv = &
((mpstack).items[(((mpstack).size) - 1)]); typval_T *cur_tv =
((void*)0); switch (cur_mpsv->type) { case kMPConvDict: {
if (!cur_mpsv->data.d.todo) { (void) ((mpstack).items[--(
mpstack).size]); cur_mpsv->data.d.dict->dv_copyID = copyID
- 1; CONV_DICT_END(cur_mpsv->data.d.dict); continue; } else
if (cur_mpsv->data.d.todo != cur_mpsv->data.d.dict->
dv_hashtab.ht_used) { CONV_DICT_BETWEEN_ITEMS(cur_mpsv->data
.d.dict); } while (((cur_mpsv->data.d.hi)->hi_key == ((
void*)0) || (cur_mpsv->data.d.hi)->hi_key == &hash_removed
)) { cur_mpsv->data.d.hi++; } dictitem_T *const di = ((dictitem_T
*)((cur_mpsv->data.d.hi)->hi_key - __builtin_offsetof(
dictitem_T, di_key))); cur_mpsv->data.d.todo--; cur_mpsv->
data.d.hi++; CONV_STR_STRING(&di->di_key[0], strlen((char
*)(&di->di_key[0]))); CONV_DICT_AFTER_KEY(cur_mpsv->
data.d.dict); cur_tv = &di->di_tv; break; } case kMPConvList
: { if (cur_mpsv->data.l.li == ((void*)0)) { (void) ((mpstack
).items[--(mpstack).size]); cur_mpsv->data.l.list->lv_copyID
= copyID - 1; CONV_LIST_END(cur_mpsv->data.l.list); continue
; } else if (cur_mpsv->data.l.li != cur_mpsv->data.l.list
->lv_first) { CONV_LIST_BETWEEN_ITEMS(cur_mpsv->data.l.
list); } cur_tv = &cur_mpsv->data.l.li->li_tv; cur_mpsv
->data.l.li = cur_mpsv->data.l.li->li_next; break; }
case kMPConvPairs: { if (cur_mpsv->data.l.li == ((void*)0
)) { (void) ((mpstack).items[--(mpstack).size]); cur_mpsv->
data.l.list->lv_copyID = copyID - 1; continue; } const list_T
*const kv_pair = cur_mpsv->data.l.li->li_tv.vval.v_list
; if ( echo_convert_one_value(gap, &mpstack, &kv_pair
->lv_first->li_tv, copyID, objname) == 0) { goto vim_to_msgpack_error_ret
; } cur_tv = &kv_pair->lv_last->li_tv; cur_mpsv->
data.l.li = cur_mpsv->data.l.li->li_next; break; } } if
( echo_convert_one_value(gap, &mpstack, cur_tv, copyID, objname
) == 0) { goto vim_to_msgpack_error_ret; } } xfree((mpstack).
items); return 1; vim_to_msgpack_error_ret: xfree((mpstack).items
); return 0; }
Within the expansion of the macro 'DEFINE_VIML_CONV_FUNCTIONS':
a
Null pointer value stored to 'cur_tv'
b
Null pointer passed as an argument to a 'nonnull' parameter
6961

6983
6984/// Return a string with the string representation of a variable.
6985/// Puts quotes around strings, so that they can be parsed back by eval().
6986///
6987/// @param[in] tv typval_T to convert.
6988/// @param[out] len Location where length of the result will be saved.
6989///
6990/// @return String representation of the variable or NULL.
6991static char *tv2string(typval_T *tv, size_t *len)
6992 FUNC_ATTR_NONNULL_ARG(1) FUNC_ATTR_MALLOC
6993{
6994 garray_T ga;
6995 ga_init(&ga, (int)sizeof(char), 80);
6996 vim_to_string(&ga, tv, "tv2string() argument");
6997 did_echo_string_emsg = false0;
6998 if (len != NULL((void*)0)) {
6999 *len = (size_t) ga.ga_len;
7000 }
7001 ga_append(&ga, '\0');
7002 return (char *) ga.ga_data;
7003}
7004
7005/// Return a string with the string representation of a variable.
7006/// Does not put quotes around strings, as ":echo" displays values.
7007///
7008/// @param[in] tv typval_T to convert.
7009/// @param[out] len Location where length of the result will be saved.
7010///
7011/// @return String representation of the variable or NULL.
7012static char *echo_string(typval_T *tv, size_t *len)
7013 FUNC_ATTR_NONNULL_ARG(1) FUNC_ATTR_MALLOC
7014{
7015 garray_T ga;
7016 ga_init(&ga, (int)sizeof(char), 80);
7017 if (tv->v_type == VAR_STRING2 || tv->v_type == VAR_FUNC3) {
7018 if (tv->vval.v_string != NULL((void*)0)) {
7019 ga_concat(&ga, tv->vval.v_string);
7020 }
7021 } else {
7022 vim_to_echo(&ga, tv, ":echo argument");
7023 did_echo_string_emsg = false0;
7024 }
7025 if (len != NULL((void*)0)) {
7026 *len = (size_t) ga.ga_len;
7027 }
7028 ga_append(&ga, '\0');
7029 return (char *) ga.ga_data;
7030}
7031
7032/*
7033 * Convert the string "text" to a floating point number.
7034 * This uses strtod(). setlocale(LC_NUMERIC, "C") has been used to make sure
7035 * this always uses a decimal point.
7036 * Returns the length of the text that was consumed.
7037 */
7038static int
7039string2float (
7040 char_u *text,
7041 float_T *value /* result stored here */
7042)
7043{
7044 char *s = (char *)text;
7045 float_T f;
7046
7047 f = strtod(s, &s);
7048 *value = f;
7049 return (int)((char_u *)s - text);
7050}
7051
7052/// Get the value of an environment variable.
7053///
7054/// If the environment variable was not set, silently assume it is empty.
7055///
7056/// @param arg Points to the '$'. It is advanced to after the name.
7057/// @return FAIL if the name is invalid.
7058///
7059static int get_env_tv(char_u **arg, typval_T *rettv, int evaluate)
7060{
7061 char_u *name;
7062 char_u *string = NULL((void*)0);
7063 int len;
7064 int cc;
7065
7066 ++*arg;
7067 name = *arg;
7068 len = get_env_len(arg);
7069
7070 if (evaluate) {
7071 if (len == 0) {
7072 return FAIL0; // Invalid empty name.
7073 }
7074 cc = name[len];
7075 name[len] = NUL'\000';
7076 // First try vim_getenv(), fast for normal environment vars.
7077 string = (char_u *)vim_getenv((char *)name);
7078 if (string == NULL((void*)0) || *string == NUL'\000') {
7079 xfree(string);
7080
7081 // Next try expanding things like $VIM and ${HOME}.
7082 string = expand_env_save(name - 1);
7083 if (string != NULL((void*)0) && *string == '$') {
7084 xfree(string);
7085 string = NULL((void*)0);
7086 }
7087 }
7088 name[len] = cc;
7089 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
7090 rettv->vval.v_string = string;
7091 }
7092
7093 return OK1;
7094}

7403
7404/*
7405 * Function given to ExpandGeneric() to obtain the list of internal
7406 * or user defined function names.
7407 */
7408char_u *get_function_name(expand_T *xp, int idx)
7409{
7410 static int intidx = -1;
7411 char_u *name;
7412
7413 if (idx == 0)
7414 intidx = -1;
7415 if (intidx < 0) {
7416 name = get_user_func_name(xp, idx);
7417 if (name != NULL((void*)0))
7418 return name;
7419 }
7420 if (++intidx < (int)ARRAY_SIZE(functions)((sizeof(functions)/sizeof((functions)[0])) / ((size_t)(!(sizeof
(functions) % sizeof((functions)[0])))))) {
7421 STRCPY(IObuff, functions[intidx].f_name)strcpy((char *)(IObuff), (char *)(functions[intidx].f_name));
7422 STRCAT(IObuff, "(")strcat((char *)(IObuff), (char *)("("));
7423 if (functions[intidx].f_max_argc == 0)
7424 STRCAT(IObuff, ")")strcat((char *)(IObuff), (char *)(")"));
7425 return IObuff;
7426 }
7427
7428 return NULL((void*)0);
7429}
7430
7431/*
7432 * Function given to ExpandGeneric() to obtain the list of internal or
7433 * user defined variable or function names.
7434 */
7435char_u *get_expr_name(expand_T *xp, int idx)
7436{
7437 static int intidx = -1;
7438 char_u *name;
7439
7440 if (idx == 0)
7441 intidx = -1;
7442 if (intidx < 0) {
7443 name = get_function_name(xp, idx);
7444 if (name != NULL((void*)0))
7445 return name;
7446 }
7447 return get_user_var_name(xp, ++intidx);
7448}
7449
7450
7451
7452
7453/*
7454 * Find internal function in table above.
7455 * Return index, or -1 if not found
7456 */
7457static int
7458find_internal_func (
7459 char_u *name /* name of the function */
7460)
7461{
7462 int first = 0;
7463 int last = (int)ARRAY_SIZE(functions)((sizeof(functions)/sizeof((functions)[0])) / ((size_t)(!(sizeof
(functions) % sizeof((functions)[0]))))) - 1;
7464
7465 /*
7466 * Find the function name in the table. Binary search.
7467 */
7468 while (first <= last) {
7469 int x = first + ((unsigned)(last - first)) / 2;
7470 int cmp = STRCMP(name, functions[x].f_name)strcmp((char *)(name), (char *)(functions[x].f_name));
7471 if (cmp < 0)
7472 last = x - 1;
7473 else if (cmp > 0)
7474 first = x + 1;
7475 else
7476 return x;
7477 }
7478 return -1;
7479}
7480
7481/*
7482 * Check if "name" is a variable of type VAR_FUNC. If so, return the function
7483 * name it contains, otherwise return "name".
7484 */
7485static char_u *deref_func_name(char_u *name, int *lenp, int no_autoload)
7486{
7487 dictitem_T *v;
7488 int cc;
7489
7490 cc = name[*lenp];
7491 name[*lenp] = NUL'\000';
7492 v = find_var(name, NULL((void*)0), no_autoload);
7493 name[*lenp] = cc;
7494 if (v != NULL((void*)0) && v->di_tv.v_type == VAR_FUNC3) {
7495 if (v->di_tv.vval.v_string == NULL((void*)0)) {
7496 *lenp = 0;
7497 return (char_u *)""; /* just in case */
7498 }
7499 *lenp = (int)STRLEN(v->di_tv.vval.v_string)strlen((char *)(v->di_tv.vval.v_string));
7500 return v->di_tv.vval.v_string;
7501 }
7502
7503 return name;
7504}
7505
7506/*
7507 * Allocate a variable for the result of a function.
7508 * Return OK or FAIL.
7509 */
7510static int
7511get_func_tv (
7512 char_u *name, /* name of the function */
7513 int len, /* length of "name" */
7514 typval_T *rettv,
7515 char_u **arg, /* argument, pointing to the '(' */
7516 linenr_T firstline, /* first line of range */
7517 linenr_T lastline, /* last line of range */
7518 int *doesrange, /* return: function handled range */
7519 int evaluate,
7520 dict_T *selfdict /* Dictionary for "self" */
7521)
7522{
7523 char_u *argp;
7524 int ret = OK1;
7525 typval_T argvars[MAX_FUNC_ARGS20 + 1]; /* vars for arguments */
7526 int argcount = 0; /* number of arguments found */
7527
7528 /*
7529 * Get the arguments.
7530 */
7531 argp = *arg;
7532 while (argcount < MAX_FUNC_ARGS20) {
7533 argp = skipwhite(argp + 1); /* skip the '(' or ',' */
7534 if (*argp == ')' || *argp == ',' || *argp == NUL'\000')
7535 break;
7536 if (eval1(&argp, &argvars[argcount], evaluate) == FAIL0) {
7537 ret = FAIL0;
7538 break;
7539 }
7540 ++argcount;
7541 if (*argp != ',')
7542 break;
7543 }
7544 if (*argp == ')')
7545 ++argp;
7546 else
7547 ret = FAIL0;
7548
7549 if (ret == OK1)
7550 ret = call_func(name, len, rettv, argcount, argvars,
7551 firstline, lastline, doesrange, evaluate, selfdict);
7552 else if (!aborting()) {
7553 if (argcount == MAX_FUNC_ARGS20)
7554 emsg_funcname(N_("E740: Too many arguments for function %s")"E740: Too many arguments for function %s", name);
7555 else
7556 emsg_funcname(N_("E116: Invalid arguments for function %s")"E116: Invalid arguments for function %s", name);
7557 }
7558
7559 while (--argcount >= 0)
7560 clear_tv(&argvars[argcount]);
7561
7562 *arg = skipwhite(argp);
7563 return ret;
7564}
7565
7566
7567/*
7568 * Call a function with its resolved parameters
7569 * Return FAIL when the function can't be called, OK otherwise.
7570 * Also returns OK when an error was encountered while executing the function.
7571 */
7572int
7573call_func (
7574 char_u *funcname, /* name of the function */
7575 int len, /* length of "name" */
7576 typval_T *rettv, /* return value goes here */
7577 int argcount, /* number of "argvars" */
7578 typval_T *argvars, /* vars for arguments, must have "argcount"
7579 PLUS ONE elements! */
7580 linenr_T firstline, /* first line of range */
7581 linenr_T lastline, /* last line of range */
7582 int *doesrange, /* return: function handled range */
7583 int evaluate,
7584 dict_T *selfdict /* Dictionary for "self" */
7585)
7586{
7587 int ret = FAIL0;
7588#define ERROR_UNKNOWN0 0
7589#define ERROR_TOOMANY1 1
7590#define ERROR_TOOFEW2 2
7591#define ERROR_SCRIPT3 3
7592#define ERROR_DICT4 4
7593#define ERROR_NONE5 5
7594#define ERROR_OTHER6 6
7595 int error = ERROR_NONE5;
7596 int i;
7597 int llen;
7598 ufunc_T *fp;
7599#define FLEN_FIXED40 40
7600 char_u fname_buf[FLEN_FIXED40 + 1];
7601 char_u *fname;
7602 char_u *name;
7603
7604 /* Make a copy of the name, if it comes from a funcref variable it could
7605 * be changed or deleted in the called function. */
7606 name = vim_strnsave(funcname, len);
7607
7608 /*
7609 * In a script change <SID>name() and s:name() to K_SNR 123_name().
7610 * Change <SNR>123_name() to K_SNR 123_name().
7611 * Use fname_buf[] when it fits, otherwise allocate memory (slow).
7612 */
7613 llen = eval_fname_script(name);
7614 if (llen > 0) {
7615 fname_buf[0] = K_SPECIAL(0x80);
7616 fname_buf[1] = KS_EXTRA253;
7617 fname_buf[2] = (int)KE_SNR;
7618 i = 3;
7619 if (eval_fname_sid(name)) { /* "<SID>" or "s:" */
7620 if (current_SID <= 0)
7621 error = ERROR_SCRIPT3;
7622 else {
7623 sprintf((char *)fname_buf + 3, "%" PRId64"l" "d" "_", (int64_t)current_SID);
7624 i = (int)STRLEN(fname_buf)strlen((char *)(fname_buf));
7625 }
7626 }
7627 if (i + STRLEN(name + llen)strlen((char *)(name + llen)) < FLEN_FIXED40) {
7628 STRCPY(fname_buf + i, name + llen)strcpy((char *)(fname_buf + i), (char *)(name + llen));
7629 fname = fname_buf;
7630 } else {
7631 fname = xmalloc(i + STRLEN(name + llen)strlen((char *)(name + llen)) + 1);
7632 memmove(fname, fname_buf, (size_t)i);
7633 STRCPY(fname + i, name + llen)strcpy((char *)(fname + i), (char *)(name + llen));
7634 }
7635 } else
7636 fname = name;
7637
7638 *doesrange = FALSE0;
7639
7640
7641 /* execute the function if no errors detected and executing */
7642 if (evaluate && error == ERROR_NONE5) {
7643 char_u *rfname = fname;
7644
7645 /* Ignore "g:" before a function name. */
7646 if (fname[0] == 'g' && fname[1] == ':') {
7647 rfname = fname + 2;
7648 }
7649
7650 rettv->v_type = VAR_NUMBER1; /* default rettv is number zero */
7651 rettv->vval.v_number = 0;
7652 error = ERROR_UNKNOWN0;
7653
7654 if (!builtin_function(rfname, -1)) {
7655 /*
7656 * User defined function.
7657 */
7658 fp = find_func(rfname);
7659
7660 /* Trigger FuncUndefined event, may load the function. */
7661 if (fp == NULL((void*)0)
7662 && apply_autocmds(EVENT_FUNCUNDEFINED, rfname, rfname, TRUE1, NULL((void*)0))
7663 && !aborting()) {
7664 /* executed an autocommand, search for the function again */
7665 fp = find_func(rfname);
7666 }
7667 /* Try loading a package. */
7668 if (fp == NULL((void*)0) && script_autoload(rfname, TRUE1) && !aborting()) {
7669 /* loaded a package, search for the function again */
7670 fp = find_func(rfname);
7671 }
7672
7673 if (fp != NULL((void*)0)) {
7674 if (fp->uf_flags & FC_RANGE2)
7675 *doesrange = TRUE1;
7676 if (argcount < fp->uf_args.ga_len)
7677 error = ERROR_TOOFEW2;
7678 else if (!fp->uf_varargs && argcount > fp->uf_args.ga_len)
7679 error = ERROR_TOOMANY1;
7680 else if ((fp->uf_flags & FC_DICT4) && selfdict == NULL((void*)0))
7681 error = ERROR_DICT4;
7682 else {
7683 // Call the user function.
7684 call_user_func(fp, argcount, argvars, rettv, firstline, lastline,
7685 (fp->uf_flags & FC_DICT4) ? selfdict : NULL((void*)0));
7686 error = ERROR_NONE5;
7687 }
7688 }
7689 } else {
7690 /*
7691 * Find the function name in the table, call its implementation.
7692 */
7693 i = find_internal_func(fname);
7694 if (i >= 0) {
7695 if (argcount < functions[i].f_min_argc)
7696 error = ERROR_TOOFEW2;
7697 else if (argcount > functions[i].f_max_argc)
7698 error = ERROR_TOOMANY1;
7699 else {
7700 argvars[argcount].v_type = VAR_UNKNOWN0;
7701 functions[i].f_func(argvars, rettv);
7702 error = ERROR_NONE5;
7703 }
7704 }
7705 }
7706 /*
7707 * The function call (or "FuncUndefined" autocommand sequence) might
7708 * have been aborted by an error, an interrupt, or an explicitly thrown
7709 * exception that has not been caught so far. This situation can be
7710 * tested for by calling aborting(). For an error in an internal
7711 * function or for the "E132" error in call_user_func(), however, the
7712 * throw point at which the "force_abort" flag (temporarily reset by
7713 * emsg()) is normally updated has not been reached yet. We need to
7714 * update that flag first to make aborting() reliable.
7715 */
7716 update_force_abort();
7717 }
7718 if (error == ERROR_NONE5)
7719 ret = OK1;
7720
7721 /*
7722 * Report an error unless the argument evaluation or function call has been
7723 * cancelled due to an aborting error, an interrupt, or an exception.
7724 */
7725 if (!aborting()) {
7726 switch (error) {
7727 case ERROR_UNKNOWN0:
7728 emsg_funcname(N_("E117: Unknown function: %s")"E117: Unknown function: %s", name);
7729 break;
7730 case ERROR_TOOMANY1:
7731 emsg_funcname(e_toomanyarg, name);
7732 break;
7733 case ERROR_TOOFEW2:
7734 emsg_funcname(N_("E119: Not enough arguments for function: %s")"E119: Not enough arguments for function: %s",
7735 name);
7736 break;
7737 case ERROR_SCRIPT3:
7738 emsg_funcname(N_("E120: Using <SID> not in a script context: %s")"E120: Using <SID> not in a script context: %s",
7739 name);
7740 break;
7741 case ERROR_DICT4:
7742 emsg_funcname(N_("E725: Calling dict function without Dictionary: %s")"E725: Calling dict function without Dictionary: %s",
7743 name);
7744 break;
7745 }
7746 }
7747
7748 if (fname != name && fname != fname_buf)
7749 xfree(fname);
7750 xfree(name);
7751
7752 return ret;
7753}
7754
7755/*
7756 * Give an error message with a function name. Handle <SNR> things.
7757 * "ermsg" is to be passed without translation, use N_() instead of _().
7758 */
7759static void emsg_funcname(char *ermsg, char_u *name)
7760{
7761 char_u *p;
7762
7763 if (*name == K_SPECIAL(0x80))
7764 p = concat_str((char_u *)"<SNR>", name + 3);
7765 else
7766 p = name;
7767 EMSG2(_(ermsg), p)emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(ermsg))), (char_u *)(p));
7768 if (p != name)
7769 xfree(p);
7770}
7771
7772/*
7773 * Return TRUE for a non-zero Number and a non-empty String.
7774 */
7775static int non_zero_arg(typval_T *argvars)
7776{
7777 return (argvars[0].v_type == VAR_NUMBER1
7778 && argvars[0].vval.v_number != 0)
7779 || (argvars[0].v_type == VAR_STRING2
7780 && argvars[0].vval.v_string != NULL((void*)0)
7781 && *argvars[0].vval.v_string != NUL'\000');
7782}
7783
7784/*********************************************
7785 * Implementation of the built-in functions
7786 */
7787
7788
7789/*
7790 * Get the float value of "argvars[0]" into "f".
7791 * Returns FAIL when the argument is not a Number or Float.
7792 */
7793static inline int get_float_arg(typval_T *argvars, float_T *f)
7794{
7795 if (argvars[0].v_type == VAR_FLOAT6) {
7796 *f = argvars[0].vval.v_float;
7797 return OK1;
7798 }
7799 if (argvars[0].v_type == VAR_NUMBER1) {
7800 *f = (float_T)argvars[0].vval.v_number;
7801 return OK1;
7802 }
7803 EMSG(_("E808: Number or Float required"))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)("E808: Number or Float required"
))));
7804 return FAIL0;
7805}
7806
7807// Apply a floating point C function on a typval with one float_T.
7808//
7809// Some versions of glibc on i386 have an optimization that makes it harder to
7810// call math functions indirectly from inside an inlined function, causing
7811// compile-time errors. Avoid `inline` in that case. #3072
7812#ifndef ARCH_32
7813inline
7814#endif
7815static void float_op_wrapper(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv,
7816 float_T (*function)(float_T))
7817{
7818 float_T f;
7819
7820 rettv->v_type = VAR_FLOAT6;
7821 if (get_float_arg(argvars, &f) == OK1) {
7822 rettv->vval.v_float = function(f);
7823 } else {
7824 rettv->vval.v_float = 0.0;
7825 }
7826}
7827
7828/*
7829 * "abs(expr)" function
7830 */
7831static void f_abs(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
7832{
7833 if (argvars[0].v_type == VAR_FLOAT6) {
7834 float_op_wrapper(argvars, rettv, &fabs);
7835 } else {
7836 varnumber_T n;
7837 int error = FALSE0;
7838
7839 n = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[0], &error);
7840 if (error)
7841 rettv->vval.v_number = -1;
7842 else if (n > 0)
7843 rettv->vval.v_number = n;
7844 else
7845 rettv->vval.v_number = -n;
7846 }
7847}
7848
7849/*
7850 * "acos()" function
7851 */
7852static void f_acos(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
7853{
7854 float_op_wrapper(argvars, rettv, &acos);
7855}
7856
7857/*
7858 * "add(list, item)" function
7859 */
7860static void f_add(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
7861{
7862 list_T *l;
7863
7864 rettv->vval.v_number = 1; /* Default: Failed */
7865 if (argvars[0].v_type == VAR_LIST4) {
7866 if ((l = argvars[0].vval.v_list) != NULL((void*)0)
7867 && !tv_check_lock(l->lv_lock,
7868 (char_u *)N_("add() argument")"add() argument", true1)) {
7869 list_append_tv(l, &argvars[1]);
7870 copy_tv(&argvars[0], rettv);
7871 }
7872 } else
7873 EMSG(_(e_listreq))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_listreq))));
7874}
7875
7876/*
7877 * "and(expr, expr)" function
7878 */
7879static void f_and(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
7880{
7881 rettv->vval.v_number = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[0], NULL((void*)0))
7882 & get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[1], NULL((void*)0));
7883}
7884
7885/*
7886 * "append(lnum, string/list)" function
7887 */
7888static void f_append(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
7889{
7890 long lnum;
7891 char_u *line;
7892 list_T *l = NULL((void*)0);
7893 listitem_T *li = NULL((void*)0);
7894 typval_T *tv;
7895 long added = 0;
7896
7897 /* When coming here from Insert mode, sync undo, so that this can be
7898 * undone separately from what was previously inserted. */
7899 if (u_sync_once == 2) {
7900 u_sync_once = 1; /* notify that u_sync() was called */
7901 u_sync(TRUE1);
7902 }
7903
7904 lnum = get_tv_lnum(argvars);
7905 if (lnum >= 0
7906 && lnum <= curbuf->b_ml.ml_line_count
7907 && u_save(lnum, lnum + 1) == OK1) {
7908 if (argvars[1].v_type == VAR_LIST4) {
7909 l = argvars[1].vval.v_list;
7910 if (l == NULL((void*)0))
7911 return;
7912 li = l->lv_first;
7913 }
7914 for (;; ) {
7915 if (l == NULL((void*)0))
7916 tv = &argvars[1]; /* append a string */
7917 else if (li == NULL((void*)0))
7918 break; /* end of list */
7919 else
7920 tv = &li->li_tv; /* append item from list */
7921 line = get_tv_string_chk(tv);
7922 if (line == NULL((void*)0)) { /* type error */
7923 rettv->vval.v_number = 1; /* Failed */
7924 break;
7925 }
7926 ml_append(lnum + added, line, (colnr_T)0, FALSE0);
7927 ++added;
7928 if (l == NULL((void*)0))
7929 break;
7930 li = li->li_next;
7931 }
7932
7933 appended_lines_mark(lnum, added);
7934 if (curwin->w_cursor.lnum > lnum)
7935 curwin->w_cursor.lnum += added;
7936 } else
7937 rettv->vval.v_number = 1; /* Failed */
7938}
7939
7940/*
7941 * "argc()" function
7942 */
7943static void f_argc(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
7944{
7945 rettv->vval.v_number = ARGCOUNT((curwin)->w_alist->al_ga.ga_len);
7946}
7947
7948/*
7949 * "argidx()" function
7950 */
7951static void f_argidx(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
7952{
7953 rettv->vval.v_number = curwin->w_arg_idx;
7954}
7955
7956/// "arglistid" function
7957static void f_arglistid(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
7958{
7959 rettv->vval.v_number = -1;
7960 if (argvars[0].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
7961 tabpage_T *tp = NULL((void*)0);
7962 if (argvars[1].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
7963 long n = get_tv_number(&argvars[1]);
7964 if (n >= 0) {
7965 tp = find_tabpage(n);
7966 }
7967 } else {
7968 tp = curtab;
7969 }
7970
7971 if (tp != NULL((void*)0)) {
7972 win_T *wp = find_win_by_nr(&argvars[0], tp);
7973 if (wp != NULL((void*)0)) {
7974 rettv->vval.v_number = wp->w_alist->id;
7975 }
7976 }
7977 } else {
7978 rettv->vval.v_number = curwin->w_alist->id;
7979 }
7980}
7981
7982/*
7983 * "argv(nr)" function
7984 */
7985static void f_argv(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
7986{
7987 int idx;
7988
7989 if (argvars[0].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
7990 idx = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[0], NULL((void*)0));
7991 if (idx >= 0 && idx < ARGCOUNT((curwin)->w_alist->al_ga.ga_len))
7992 rettv->vval.v_string = vim_strsave(alist_name(&ARGLIST((aentry_T *)(curwin)->w_alist->al_ga.ga_data)[idx]));
7993 else
7994 rettv->vval.v_string = NULL((void*)0);
7995 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
7996 } else {
7997 rettv_list_alloc(rettv);
7998 for (idx = 0; idx < ARGCOUNT((curwin)->w_alist->al_ga.ga_len); ++idx) {
7999 list_append_string(rettv->vval.v_list, alist_name(&ARGLIST((aentry_T *)(curwin)->w_alist->al_ga.ga_data)[idx]), -1);
8000 }
8001 }
8002}
8003
8004// Prepare "gap" for an assert error and add the sourcing position.
8005static void prepare_assert_error(garray_T *gap)
8006{
8007 char buf[NUMBUFLEN65];
8008
8009 ga_init(gap, 1, 100);
8010 if (sourcing_name != NULL((void*)0)) {
8011 ga_concat(gap, sourcing_name);
8012 if (sourcing_lnum > 0) {
8013 ga_concat(gap, (char_u *)" ");
8014 }
8015 }
8016 if (sourcing_lnum > 0) {
8017 vim_snprintf(buf, ARRAY_SIZE(buf)((sizeof(buf)/sizeof((buf)[0])) / ((size_t)(!(sizeof(buf) % sizeof
((buf)[0]))))), "line %" PRId64"l" "d", (int64_t)sourcing_lnum);
8018 ga_concat(gap, (char_u *)buf);
8019 }
8020 if (sourcing_name != NULL((void*)0) || sourcing_lnum > 0) {
8021 ga_concat(gap, (char_u *)": ");
8022 }
8023}
8024
8025// Fill "gap" with information about an assert error.
8026static void fill_assert_error(garray_T *gap, typval_T *opt_msg_tv,
8027 char_u *exp_str, typval_T *exp_tv,
8028 typval_T *got_tv)
8029{
8030 char_u *tofree;
8031
8032 if (opt_msg_tv->v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
8033 tofree = (char_u *) tv2string(opt_msg_tv, NULL((void*)0));
8034 ga_concat(gap, tofree);
8035 xfree(tofree);
8036 } else {
8037 ga_concat(gap, (char_u *)"Expected ");
8038 if (exp_str == NULL((void*)0)) {
8039 tofree = (char_u *) tv2string(exp_tv, NULL((void*)0));
8040 ga_concat(gap, tofree);
8041 xfree(tofree);
8042 } else {
8043 ga_concat(gap, exp_str);
8044 }
8045 tofree = (char_u *) tv2string(got_tv, NULL((void*)0));
8046 ga_concat(gap, (char_u *)" but got ");
8047 ga_concat(gap, tofree);
8048 xfree(tofree);
8049 }
8050}
8051
8052// Add an assert error to v:errors.
8053static void assert_error(garray_T *gap)
8054{
8055 struct vimvar *vp = &vimvars[VV_ERRORS];
8056
8057 if (vp->vv_typevv_di.di_tv.v_type != VAR_LIST4 || vimvars[VV_ERRORS].vv_listvv_di.di_tv.vval.v_list == NULL((void*)0)) {
8058 // Make sure v:errors is a list.
8059 set_vim_var_list(VV_ERRORS, list_alloc());
8060 }
8061 list_append_string(vimvars[VV_ERRORS].vv_listvv_di.di_tv.vval.v_list,
8062 gap->ga_data, gap->ga_len);
8063}
8064
8065// "assert_equal(expected, actual[, msg])" function
8066static void f_assert_equal(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8067{
8068 garray_T ga;
8069
8070 if (!tv_equal(&argvars[0], &argvars[1], false0, false0)) {
8071 prepare_assert_error(&ga);
8072 fill_assert_error(&ga, &argvars[2], NULL((void*)0),
8073 &argvars[0], &argvars[1]);
8074 assert_error(&ga);
8075 ga_clear(&ga);
8076 }
8077}
8078
8079// Common for assert_true() and assert_false().
8080static void assert_bool(typval_T *argvars, bool_Bool isTrue)
8081{
8082 int error = (int)false0;
8083 garray_T ga;
8084
8085 if (argvars[0].v_type != VAR_NUMBER1 ||
8086 (get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[0], &error) == 0) == isTrue || error) {
8087 prepare_assert_error(&ga);
8088 fill_assert_error(&ga, &argvars[1],
8089 (char_u *)(isTrue ? "True" : "False"),
8090 NULL((void*)0), &argvars[0]);
8091 assert_error(&ga);
8092 ga_clear(&ga);
8093 }
8094}
8095
8096// "assert_false(actual[, msg])" function
8097static void f_assert_false(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8098{
8099 assert_bool(argvars, false0);
8100}
8101
8102// "assert_true(actual[, msg])" function
8103static void f_assert_true(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8104{
8105 assert_bool(argvars, true1);
8106}

8110 */

8112{
8113 float_op_wrapper(argvars, rettv, &asin);

8123
8124/*
8125 * "atan2()" function
8126 */
8127static void f_atan2(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8128{
8129 float_T fx, fy;
8130
8131 rettv->v_type = VAR_FLOAT6;
8132 if (get_float_arg(argvars, &fx) == OK1
8133 && get_float_arg(&argvars[1], &fy) == OK1)
8134 rettv->vval.v_float = atan2(fx, fy);
8135 else
8136 rettv->vval.v_float = 0.0;
8137}

8140 * "browse(save, title, initdir, default)" function
8141 */
8142static void f_browse(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8143{
8144 rettv->vval.v_string = NULL((void*)0);
8145 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
8146}
8147
8148/*
8149 * "browsedir(title, initdir)" function
8150 */
8151static void f_browsedir(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8152{
8153 f_browse(argvars, rettv);
8154}
8155
8156
8157/*
8158 * Find a buffer by number or exact name.
8159 */
8160static buf_T *find_buffer(typval_T *avar)
8161{
8162 buf_T *buf = NULL((void*)0);
8163
8164 if (avar->v_type == VAR_NUMBER1)
8165 buf = buflist_findnr((int)avar->vval.v_number);
8166 else if (avar->v_type == VAR_STRING2 && avar->vval.v_string != NULL((void*)0)) {
8167 buf = buflist_findname_exp(avar->vval.v_string);
8168 if (buf == NULL((void*)0)) {
8169 /* No full path name match, try a match with a URL or a "nofile"
8170 * buffer, these don't use the full path. */
8171 FOR_ALL_BUFFERS(bp)for (buf_T *bp = firstbuf; bp != ((void*)0); bp = bp->b_next
) {
8172 if (bp->b_fname != NULL((void*)0)
8173 && (path_with_url((char *)bp->b_fname)
8174 || bt_nofile(bp)
8175 )
8176 && STRCMP(bp->b_fname, avar->vval.v_string)strcmp((char *)(bp->b_fname), (char *)(avar->vval.v_string
)) == 0) {
8177 buf = bp;
8178 break;
8179 }
8180 }
8181 }
8182 }
8183 return buf;
8184}
8185
8186/*
8187 * "bufexists(expr)" function
8188 */
8189static void f_bufexists(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8190{
8191 rettv->vval.v_number = (find_buffer(&argvars[0]) != NULL((void*)0));
8192}
8193
8194/*
8195 * "buflisted(expr)" function
8196 */
8197static void f_buflisted(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8198{
8199 buf_T *buf;
8200
8201 buf = find_buffer(&argvars[0]);
8202 rettv->vval.v_number = (buf != NULL((void*)0) && buf->b_p_bl);
8203}
8204
8205/*
8206 * "bufloaded(expr)" function
8207 */
8208static void f_bufloaded(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8209{
8210 buf_T *buf;
8211
8212 buf = find_buffer(&argvars[0]);
8213 rettv->vval.v_number = (buf != NULL((void*)0) && buf->b_ml.ml_mfp != NULL((void*)0));
8214}
8215
8216
8217/*
8218 * Get buffer by number or pattern.
8219 */
8220static buf_T *get_buf_tv(typval_T *tv, int curtab_only)
8221{
8222 char_u *name = tv->vval.v_string;
8223 int save_magic;
8224 char_u *save_cpo;
8225 buf_T *buf;
8226
8227 if (tv->v_type == VAR_NUMBER1)
8228 return buflist_findnr((int)tv->vval.v_number);
8229 if (tv->v_type != VAR_STRING2)
8230 return NULL((void*)0);
8231 if (name == NULL((void*)0) || *name == NUL'\000')
8232 return curbuf;
8233 if (name[0] == '$' && name[1] == NUL'\000')
8234 return lastbuf;
8235
8236 /* Ignore 'magic' and 'cpoptions' here to make scripts portable */
8237 save_magic = p_magic;
8238 p_magic = TRUE1;
8239 save_cpo = p_cpo;
8240 p_cpo = (char_u *)"";
8241
8242 buf = buflist_findnr(buflist_findpat(name, name + STRLEN(name)strlen((char *)(name)),
8243 TRUE1, FALSE0, curtab_only));
8244
8245 p_magic = save_magic;
8246 p_cpo = save_cpo;
8247
8248 /* If not found, try expanding the name, like done for bufexists(). */
8249 if (buf == NULL((void*)0))
8250 buf = find_buffer(tv);
8251
8252 return buf;
8253}
8254
8255/*
8256 * "bufname(expr)" function
8257 */
8258static void f_bufname(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8259{
8260 buf_T *buf;
8261
8262 (void)get_tv_number(&argvars[0]); /* issue errmsg if type error */
8263 ++emsg_off;
8264 buf = get_buf_tv(&argvars[0], FALSE0);
8265 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
8266 if (buf != NULL((void*)0) && buf->b_fname != NULL((void*)0))
8267 rettv->vval.v_string = vim_strsave(buf->b_fname);
8268 else
8269 rettv->vval.v_string = NULL((void*)0);
8270 --emsg_off;
8271}
8272
8273/*
8274 * "bufnr(expr)" function
8275 */
8276static void f_bufnr(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8277{
8278 buf_T *buf;
8279 int error = FALSE0;
8280 char_u *name;
8281
8282 (void)get_tv_number(&argvars[0]); /* issue errmsg if type error */
8283 ++emsg_off;
8284 buf = get_buf_tv(&argvars[0], FALSE0);
8285 --emsg_off;
8286
8287 /* If the buffer isn't found and the second argument is not zero create a
8288 * new buffer. */
8289 if (buf == NULL((void*)0)
8290 && argvars[1].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0
8291 && get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[1], &error) != 0
8292 && !error
8293 && (name = get_tv_string_chk(&argvars[0])) != NULL((void*)0)
8294 && !error)
8295 buf = buflist_new(name, NULL((void*)0), (linenr_T)1, 0);
8296
8297 if (buf != NULL((void*)0))
8298 rettv->vval.v_number = buf->b_fnum;
8299 else
8300 rettv->vval.v_number = -1;
8301}
8302
8303/*
8304 * "bufwinnr(nr)" function
8305 */
8306static void f_bufwinnr(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8307{
8308 (void)get_tv_number(&argvars[0]); /* issue errmsg if type error */
8309 ++emsg_off;
8310
8311 buf_T *buf = get_buf_tv(&argvars[0], TRUE1);
8312 int winnr = 0;
8313 bool_Bool found_buf = false0;
8314 FOR_ALL_WINDOWS_IN_TAB(wp, curtab)for (win_T *wp = ((curtab) == curtab) ? firstwin : (curtab)->
tp_firstwin; wp != ((void*)0); wp = wp->w_next) {
8315 ++winnr;
8316 if (wp->w_buffer == buf) {
8317 found_buf = true1;
8318 break;
8319 }
8320 }
8321 rettv->vval.v_number = (found_buf ? winnr : -1);
8322 --emsg_off;
8323}
8324
8325/*
8326 * "byte2line(byte)" function
8327 */
8328static void f_byte2line(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8329{
8330 long boff = 0;
8331
8332 boff = get_tv_number(&argvars[0]) - 1; /* boff gets -1 on type error */
8333 if (boff < 0)
8334 rettv->vval.v_number = -1;
8335 else
8336 rettv->vval.v_number = ml_find_line_or_offset(curbuf,
8337 (linenr_T)0, &boff);
8338}
8339
8340static void byteidx(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv, int comp)
8341{
8342 char_u *t;
8343 char_u *str;
8344 long idx;
8345
8346 str = get_tv_string_chk(&argvars[0]);
8347 idx = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[1], NULL((void*)0));
8348 rettv->vval.v_number = -1;
8349 if (str == NULL((void*)0) || idx < 0)
8350 return;
8351
8352 t = str;
8353 for (; idx > 0; idx--) {
8354 if (*t == NUL'\000') /* EOL reached */
8355 return;
8356 if (enc_utf8 && comp)
8357 t += utf_ptr2len(t);
8358 else
8359 t += (*mb_ptr2len)(t);
8360 }
8361 rettv->vval.v_number = (varnumber_T)(t - str);
8362}
8363
8364/*
8365 * "byteidx()" function
8366 */
8367static void f_byteidx(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8368{
8369 byteidx(argvars, rettv, FALSE0);
8370}
8371
8372/*
8373 * "byteidxcomp()" function
8374 */
8375static void f_byteidxcomp(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8376{
8377 byteidx(argvars, rettv, TRUE1);
8378}
8379
8380int func_call(char_u *name, typval_T *args, dict_T *selfdict, typval_T *rettv)
8381{
8382 listitem_T *item;
8383 typval_T argv[MAX_FUNC_ARGS20 + 1];
8384 int argc = 0;
8385 int dummy;
8386 int r = 0;
8387
8388 for (item = args->vval.v_list->lv_first; item != NULL((void*)0);
8389 item = item->li_next) {
8390 if (argc == MAX_FUNC_ARGS20) {
8391 EMSG(_("E699: Too many arguments"))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)("E699: Too many arguments"))
));
8392 break;
8393 }
8394 /* Make a copy of each argument. This is needed to be able to set
8395 * v_lock to VAR_FIXED in the copy without changing the original list.
8396 */
8397 copy_tv(&item->li_tv, &argv[argc++]);
8398 }
8399
8400 if (item == NULL((void*)0))
8401 r = call_func(name, (int)STRLEN(name)strlen((char *)(name)), rettv, argc, argv,
8402 curwin->w_cursor.lnum, curwin->w_cursor.lnum,
8403 &dummy, TRUE1, selfdict);
8404
8405 /* Free the arguments. */
8406 while (argc > 0)
8407 clear_tv(&argv[--argc]);
8408
8409 return r;
8410}
8411
8412/*
8413 * "call(func, arglist)" function
8414 */
8415static void f_call(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8416{
8417 char_u *func;
8418 dict_T *selfdict = NULL((void*)0);
8419
8420 if (argvars[1].v_type != VAR_LIST4) {
8421 EMSG(_(e_listreq))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_listreq))));
8422 return;
8423 }
8424 if (argvars[1].vval.v_list == NULL((void*)0))
8425 return;
8426
8427 if (argvars[0].v_type == VAR_FUNC3)
8428 func = argvars[0].vval.v_string;
8429 else
8430 func = get_tv_string(&argvars[0]);
8431 if (*func == NUL'\000')
8432 return; /* type error or empty name */
8433
8434 if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
8435 if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_DICT5) {
8436 EMSG(_(e_dictreq))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_dictreq))));
8437 return;
8438 }
8439 selfdict = argvars[2].vval.v_dict;
8440 }
8441
8442 (void)func_call(func, &argvars[1], selfdict, rettv);
8443}
8444
8445/*
8446 * "ceil({float})" function
8447 */
8448static void f_ceil(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8449{
8450 float_op_wrapper(argvars, rettv, &ceil);
8451}
8452
8453/*
8454 * "changenr()" function
8455 */
8456static void f_changenr(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8457{
8458 rettv->vval.v_number = curbuf->b_u_seq_cur;
8459}
8460
8461/*
8462 * "char2nr(string)" function
8463 */
8464static void f_char2nr(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8465{
8466 if (has_mbyte) {
8467 int utf8 = 0;
8468
8469 if (argvars[1].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0)
8470 utf8 = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[1], NULL((void*)0));
8471
8472 if (utf8)
8473 rettv->vval.v_number = (*utf_ptr2char)(get_tv_string(&argvars[0]));
8474 else
8475 rettv->vval.v_number = (*mb_ptr2char)(get_tv_string(&argvars[0]));
8476 } else
8477 rettv->vval.v_number = get_tv_string(&argvars[0])[0];
8478}
8479
8480/*
8481 * "cindent(lnum)" function
8482 */
8483static void f_cindent(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8484{
8485 pos_T pos;
8486 linenr_T lnum;
8487
8488 pos = curwin->w_cursor;
8489 lnum = get_tv_lnum(argvars);
8490 if (lnum >= 1 && lnum <= curbuf->b_ml.ml_line_count) {
8491 curwin->w_cursor.lnum = lnum;
8492 rettv->vval.v_number = get_c_indent();
8493 curwin->w_cursor = pos;
8494 } else
8495 rettv->vval.v_number = -1;
8496}
8497
8498/*
8499 * "clearmatches()" function
8500 */
8501static void f_clearmatches(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8502{
8503 clear_matches(curwin);
8504}
8505
8506/*
8507 * "col(string)" function
8508 */
8509static void f_col(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8510{
8511 colnr_T col = 0;
8512 pos_T *fp;
8513 int fnum = curbuf->b_fnum;
8514
8515 fp = var2fpos(&argvars[0], FALSE0, &fnum);
8516 if (fp != NULL((void*)0) && fnum == curbuf->b_fnum) {
8517 if (fp->col == MAXCOL0x7fffffff) {
8518 /* '> can be MAXCOL, get the length of the line then */
8519 if (fp->lnum <= curbuf->b_ml.ml_line_count)
8520 col = (colnr_T)STRLEN(ml_get(fp->lnum))strlen((char *)(ml_get(fp->lnum))) + 1;
8521 else
8522 col = MAXCOL0x7fffffff;
8523 } else {
8524 col = fp->col + 1;
8525 /* col(".") when the cursor is on the NUL at the end of the line
8526 * because of "coladd" can be seen as an extra column. */
8527 if (virtual_active() && fp == &curwin->w_cursor) {
8528 char_u *p = get_cursor_pos_ptr();
8529
8530 if (curwin->w_cursor.coladd >= (colnr_T)chartabsize(p,
8531 curwin->w_virtcol - curwin->w_cursor.coladd)) {
8532 int l;
8533
8534 if (*p != NUL'\000' && p[(l = (*mb_ptr2len)(p))] == NUL'\000')
8535 col += l;
8536 }
8537 }
8538 }
8539 }
8540 rettv->vval.v_number = col;
8541}
8542
8543/*
8544 * "complete()" function
8545 */
8546static void f_complete(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8547{
8548 int startcol;
8549
8550 if ((State & INSERT0x10) == 0) {
8551 EMSG(_("E785: complete() can only be used in Insert mode"))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)("E785: complete() can only be used in Insert mode"
))));
8552 return;
8553 }
8554
8555 /* Check for undo allowed here, because if something was already inserted
8556 * the line was already saved for undo and this check isn't done. */
8557 if (!undo_allowed())
8558 return;
8559
8560 if (argvars[1].v_type != VAR_LIST4 || argvars[1].vval.v_list == NULL((void*)0)) {
8561 EMSG(_(e_invarg))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_invarg))));
8562 return;
8563 }
8564
8565 startcol = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[0], NULL((void*)0));
8566 if (startcol <= 0)
8567 return;
8568
8569 set_completion(startcol - 1, argvars[1].vval.v_list);
8570}
8571
8572/*
8573 * "complete_add()" function
8574 */
8575static void f_complete_add(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8576{
8577 rettv->vval.v_number = ins_compl_add_tv(&argvars[0], 0);
8578}
8579
8580/*
8581 * "complete_check()" function
8582 */
8583static void f_complete_check(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8584{
8585 int saved = RedrawingDisabled;
8586
8587 RedrawingDisabled = 0;
8588 ins_compl_check_keys(0);
8589 rettv->vval.v_number = compl_interrupted;
8590 RedrawingDisabled = saved;
8591}
8592
8593/*
8594 * "confirm(message, buttons[, default [, type]])" function
8595 */
8596static void f_confirm(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8597{
8598 char_u *message;
8599 char_u *buttons = NULL((void*)0);
8600 char_u buf[NUMBUFLEN65];
8601 char_u buf2[NUMBUFLEN65];
8602 int def = 1;
8603 int type = VIM_GENERIC0;
8604 char_u *typestr;
8605 int error = FALSE0;
8606
8607 message = get_tv_string_chk(&argvars[0]);
8608 if (message == NULL((void*)0))
8609 error = TRUE1;
8610 if (argvars[1].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
8611 buttons = get_tv_string_buf_chk(&argvars[1], buf);
8612 if (buttons == NULL((void*)0))
8613 error = TRUE1;
8614 if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
8615 def = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[2], &error);
8616 if (argvars[3].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
8617 typestr = get_tv_string_buf_chk(&argvars[3], buf2);
8618 if (typestr == NULL((void*)0))
8619 error = TRUE1;
8620 else {
8621 switch (TOUPPER_ASC(*typestr)(((*typestr) < 'a' || (*typestr) > 'z') ? (*typestr) : (
*typestr) - ('a' - 'A'))) {
8622 case 'E': type = VIM_ERROR1; break;
8623 case 'Q': type = VIM_QUESTION4; break;
8624 case 'I': type = VIM_INFO3; break;
8625 case 'W': type = VIM_WARNING2; break;
8626 case 'G': type = VIM_GENERIC0; break;
8627 }
8628 }
8629 }
8630 }
8631 }
8632
8633 if (buttons == NULL((void*)0) || *buttons == NUL'\000')
8634 buttons = (char_u *)_("&Ok")gettext((char *)("&Ok"));
8635
8636 if (!error)
8637 rettv->vval.v_number = do_dialog(type, NULL((void*)0), message, buttons,
8638 def, NULL((void*)0), FALSE0);
8639}
8640
8641/*
8642 * "copy()" function
8643 */
8644static void f_copy(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8645{
8646 var_item_copy(NULL((void*)0), &argvars[0], rettv, false0, 0);
8647}
8648
8649/*
8650 * "cos()" function
8651 */
8652static void f_cos(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8653{
8654 float_op_wrapper(argvars, rettv, &cos);
8655}

8657/*
8658 * "cosh()" function
8659 */
8660static void f_cosh(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8661{
8662 float_op_wrapper(argvars, rettv, &cosh);
8663}
8664
8665/*
8666 * "count()" function
8667 */
8668static void f_count(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8669{
8670 long n = 0;
8671 int ic = FALSE0;
8672
8673 if (argvars[0].v_type == VAR_LIST4) {
8674 listitem_T *li;
8675 list_T *l;
8676 long idx;
8677
8678 if ((l = argvars[0].vval.v_list) != NULL((void*)0)) {
8679 li = l->lv_first;
8680 if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
8681 int error = FALSE0;
8682
8683 ic = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[2], &error);
8684 if (argvars[3].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
8685 idx = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[3], &error);
8686 if (!error) {
8687 li = list_find(l, idx);
8688 if (li == NULL((void*)0))
8689 EMSGN(_(e_listidx), idx)emsgn((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_listidx))), (int64_t)(idx
));
8690 }
8691 }
8692 if (error)
8693 li = NULL((void*)0);
8694 }
8695
8696 for (; li != NULL((void*)0); li = li->li_next)
8697 if (tv_equal(&li->li_tv, &argvars[1], ic, FALSE0))
8698 ++n;
8699 }
8700 } else if (argvars[0].v_type == VAR_DICT5) {
8701 int todo;
8702 dict_T *d;
8703 hashitem_T *hi;
8704
8705 if ((d = argvars[0].vval.v_dict) != NULL((void*)0)) {
8706 int error = FALSE0;
8707
8708 if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
8709 ic = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[2], &error);
8710 if (argvars[3].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0)
8711 EMSG(_(e_invarg))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_invarg))));
8712 }
8713
8714 todo = error ? 0 : (int)d->dv_hashtab.ht_used;
8715 for (hi = d->dv_hashtab.ht_array; todo > 0; ++hi) {
8716 if (!HASHITEM_EMPTY(hi)((hi)->hi_key == ((void*)0) || (hi)->hi_key == &hash_removed
)) {
8717 --todo;
8718 if (tv_equal(&HI2DI(hi)((dictitem_T *)((hi)->hi_key - __builtin_offsetof(dictitem_T
, di_key)))->di_tv, &argvars[1], ic, FALSE0))
8719 ++n;
8720 }
8721 }
8722 }
8723 } else
8724 EMSG2(_(e_listdictarg), "count()")emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_listdictarg))), (char_u *
)("count()"));
8725 rettv->vval.v_number = n;
8726}
8727
8728/*
8729 * "cscope_connection([{num} , {dbpath} [, {prepend}]])" function
8730 *
8731 * Checks the existence of a cscope connection.
8732 */
8733static void f_cscope_connection(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8734{
8735 int num = 0;
8736 char_u *dbpath = NULL((void*)0);
8737 char_u *prepend = NULL((void*)0);
8738 char_u buf[NUMBUFLEN65];
8739
8740 if (argvars[0].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0
8741 && argvars[1].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
8742 num = (int)get_tv_number(&argvars[0]);
8743 dbpath = get_tv_string(&argvars[1]);
8744 if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0)
8745 prepend = get_tv_string_buf(&argvars[2], buf);
8746 }
8747
8748 rettv->vval.v_number = cs_connection(num, dbpath, prepend);
8749}
8750
8751/*
8752 * "cursor(lnum, col)" function
8753 *
8754 * Moves the cursor to the specified line and column.
8755 * Returns 0 when the position could be set, -1 otherwise.
8756 */
8757static void f_cursor(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8758{
8759 long line, col;
8760 long coladd = 0;
8761
8762 rettv->vval.v_number = -1;
8763 if (argvars[1].v_type == VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
8764 pos_T pos;
8765 colnr_T curswant = -1;
8766
8767 if (list2fpos(argvars, &pos, NULL((void*)0), &curswant) == FAIL0) {
8768 return;
8769 }
8770 line = pos.lnum;
8771 col = pos.col;
8772 coladd = pos.coladd;
8773 if (curswant >= 0) {
8774 curwin->w_curswant = curswant - 1;
8775 }
8776 } else {
8777 line = get_tv_lnum(argvars);
8778 col = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[1], NULL((void*)0));
8779 if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0)
8780 coladd = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[2], NULL((void*)0));
8781 }
8782 if (line < 0 || col < 0
8783 || coladd < 0
8784 )
8785 return; /* type error; errmsg already given */
8786 if (line > 0)
8787 curwin->w_cursor.lnum = line;
8788 if (col > 0)
8789 curwin->w_cursor.col = col - 1;
8790 curwin->w_cursor.coladd = coladd;
8791
8792 /* Make sure the cursor is in a valid position. */
8793 check_cursor();
8794 /* Correct cursor for multi-byte character. */
8795 if (has_mbyte)
8796 mb_adjust_cursor();
8797
8798 curwin->w_set_curswant = TRUE1;
8799 rettv->vval.v_number = 0;
8800}
8801
8802/*
8803 * "deepcopy()" function
8804 */
8805static void f_deepcopy(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8806{
8807 int noref = 0;
8808
8809 if (argvars[1].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0)
8810 noref = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[1], NULL((void*)0));
8811 if (noref < 0 || noref > 1)
8812 EMSG(_(e_invarg))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_invarg))));
8813 else {
8814 current_copyID += COPYID_INC2;
8815 var_item_copy(NULL((void*)0), &argvars[0], rettv, true1, (noref == 0
8816 ? current_copyID
8817 : 0));
8818 }
8819}
8820
8821/*
8822 * "delete()" function
8823 */
8824static void f_delete(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8825{
8826 if (check_restricted() || check_secure())
8827 rettv->vval.v_number = -1;
8828 else
8829 rettv->vval.v_number = os_remove((char *)get_tv_string(&argvars[0]));
8830}
8831
8832// dictwatcheradd(dict, key, funcref) function
8833static void f_dictwatcheradd(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8834{
8835 if (check_restricted() || check_secure()) {
8836 return;
8837 }
8838
8839 if (argvars[0].v_type != VAR_DICT5) {
8840 EMSG2(e_invarg2, "dict")emsg2((char_u *)(e_invarg2), (char_u *)("dict"));
8841 return;
8842 }
8843
8844 if (argvars[1].v_type != VAR_STRING2 && argvars[1].v_type != VAR_NUMBER1) {
8845 EMSG2(e_invarg2, "key")emsg2((char_u *)(e_invarg2), (char_u *)("key"));
8846 return;
8847 }
8848
8849 if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_FUNC3 && argvars[2].v_type != VAR_STRING2) {
8850 EMSG2(e_invarg2, "funcref")emsg2((char_u *)(e_invarg2), (char_u *)("funcref"));
8851 return;
8852 }
8853
8854 char *key_pattern = (char *)get_tv_string_chk(argvars + 1);
8855 assert(key_pattern)((key_pattern) ? (void) (0) : __assert_fail ("key_pattern", "/home/travis/build/neovim/bot-ci/build/neovim/src/nvim/eval.c"
, 8855, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));
8856 const size_t key_len = STRLEN(argvars[1].vval.v_string)strlen((char *)(argvars[1].vval.v_string));
8857
8858 if (key_len == 0) {
8859 EMSG(_(e_emptykey))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_emptykey))));
8860 return;
8861 }
8862
8863 ufunc_T *func = find_ufunc(argvars[2].vval.v_string);
8864 if (!func) {
8865 // Invalid function name. Error already reported by `find_ufunc`.
8866 return;
8867 }
8868
8869 func->uf_refcount++;
8870 DictWatcher *watcher = xmalloc(sizeof(DictWatcher));
8871 watcher->key_pattern = xmemdupz(key_pattern, key_len);
8872 watcher->callback = func;
8873 watcher->busy = false0;
8874 QUEUE_INSERT_TAIL(&argvars[0].vval.v_dict->watchers, &watcher->node)do { (*(QUEUE **) &((*(&watcher->node))[0])) = (&
argvars[0].vval.v_dict->watchers); (*(QUEUE **) &((*(&
watcher->node))[1])) = (*(QUEUE **) &((*(&argvars[
0].vval.v_dict->watchers))[1])); ((*(QUEUE **) &((*((*
(QUEUE **) &((*(&watcher->node))[1]))))[0]))) = (&
watcher->node); (*(QUEUE **) &((*(&argvars[0].vval
.v_dict->watchers))[1])) = (&watcher->node); } while
(0);
8875}
8876
8877// dictwatcherdel(dict, key, funcref) function
8878static void f_dictwatcherdel(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8879{
8880 if (check_restricted() || check_secure()) {
8881 return;
8882 }
8883
8884 if (argvars[0].v_type != VAR_DICT5) {
8885 EMSG2(e_invarg2, "dict")emsg2((char_u *)(e_invarg2), (char_u *)("dict"));
8886 return;
8887 }
8888
8889 if (argvars[1].v_type != VAR_STRING2 && argvars[1].v_type != VAR_NUMBER1) {
8890 EMSG2(e_invarg2, "key")emsg2((char_u *)(e_invarg2), (char_u *)("key"));
8891 return;
8892 }
8893
8894 if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_FUNC3 && argvars[2].v_type != VAR_STRING2) {
8895 EMSG2(e_invarg2, "funcref")emsg2((char_u *)(e_invarg2), (char_u *)("funcref"));
8896 return;
8897 }
8898
8899 char *key_pattern = (char *)get_tv_string_chk(argvars + 1);
8900 assert(key_pattern)((key_pattern) ? (void) (0) : __assert_fail ("key_pattern", "/home/travis/build/neovim/bot-ci/build/neovim/src/nvim/eval.c"
, 8900, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));
8901 const size_t key_len = STRLEN(argvars[1].vval.v_string)strlen((char *)(argvars[1].vval.v_string));
8902
8903 if (key_len == 0) {
8904 EMSG(_(e_emptykey))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_emptykey))));
8905 return;
8906 }
8907
8908 ufunc_T *func = find_ufunc(argvars[2].vval.v_string);
8909 if (!func) {
8910 // Invalid function name. Error already reported by `find_ufunc`.
8911 return;
8912 }
8913
8914 dict_T *dict = argvars[0].vval.v_dict;
8915 QUEUE *w = NULL((void*)0);
8916 DictWatcher *watcher = NULL((void*)0);
8917 bool_Bool matched = false0;
8918 QUEUE_FOREACH(w, &dict->watchers)for ((w) = (*(QUEUE **) &((*(&dict->watchers))[0])
); (w) != (&dict->watchers); (w) = (*(QUEUE **) &(
(*(w))[0]))) {
8919 watcher = dictwatcher_node_data(w);
8920 if (func == watcher->callback
8921 && !strcmp(watcher->key_pattern, key_pattern)) {
8922 matched = true1;
8923 break;
8924 }
8925 }
8926
8927 if (!matched) {
8928 EMSG("Couldn't find a watcher matching key and callback")emsg((char_u *)("Couldn't find a watcher matching key and callback"
));
8929 return;
8930 }
8931
8932 QUEUE_REMOVE(w)do { ((*(QUEUE **) &((*((*(QUEUE **) &((*(w))[1]))))[
0]))) = (*(QUEUE **) &((*(w))[0])); ((*(QUEUE **) &((
*((*(QUEUE **) &((*(w))[0]))))[1]))) = (*(QUEUE **) &
((*(w))[1])); } while (0);
8933 dictwatcher_free(watcher);
8934}

8945 * "diff_filler()" function
8946 */
8947static void f_diff_filler(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8948{
8949 rettv->vval.v_number = diff_check_fill(curwin, get_tv_lnum(argvars));
8950}
8951
8952/*
8953 * "diff_hlID()" function
8954 */
8955static void f_diff_hlID(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
8956{
8957 linenr_T lnum = get_tv_lnum(argvars);
8958 static linenr_T prev_lnum = 0;
8959 static int changedtick = 0;
8960 static int fnum = 0;
8961 static int change_start = 0;
8962 static int change_end = 0;
8963 static hlf_T hlID = (hlf_T)0;
8964 int filler_lines;
8965 int col;
8966
8967 if (lnum < 0) /* ignore type error in {lnum} arg */
8968 lnum = 0;
8969 if (lnum != prev_lnum
8970 || changedtick != curbuf->b_changedtick
8971 || fnum != curbuf->b_fnum) {
8972 /* New line, buffer, change: need to get the values. */
8973 filler_lines = diff_check(curwin, lnum);
8974 if (filler_lines < 0) {
8975 if (filler_lines == -1) {
8976 change_start = MAXCOL0x7fffffff;
8977 change_end = -1;
8978 if (diff_find_change(curwin, lnum, &change_start, &change_end))
8979 hlID = HLF_ADD; /* added line */
8980 else
8981 hlID = HLF_CHD; /* changed line */
8982 } else
8983 hlID = HLF_ADD; /* added line */
8984 } else
8985 hlID = (hlf_T)0;
8986 prev_lnum = lnum;
8987 changedtick = curbuf->b_changedtick;
8988 fnum = curbuf->b_fnum;
8989 }
8990
8991 if (hlID == HLF_CHD || hlID == HLF_TXD) {
8992 col = get_tv_number(&argvars[1]) - 1; /* ignore type error in {col} */
8993 if (col >= change_start && col <= change_end)
8994 hlID = HLF_TXD; /* changed text */
8995 else
8996 hlID = HLF_CHD; /* changed line */
8997 }
8998 rettv->vval.v_number = hlID == (hlf_T)0 ? 0 : (int)hlID;
8999}
9000
9001/*
9002 * "empty({expr})" function
9003 */
9004static void f_empty(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
9005{
9006 int n;
9007
9008 switch (argvars[0].v_type) {
9009 case VAR_STRING2:
9010 case VAR_FUNC3:
9011 n = argvars[0].vval.v_string == NULL((void*)0)
9012 || *argvars[0].vval.v_string == NUL'\000';
9013 break;
9014 case VAR_NUMBER1:
9015 n = argvars[0].vval.v_number == 0;
9016 break;
9017 case VAR_FLOAT6:
9018 n = argvars[0].vval.v_float == 0.0;
9019 break;
9020 case VAR_LIST4:
9021 n = argvars[0].vval.v_list == NULL((void*)0)
9022 || argvars[0].vval.v_list->lv_first == NULL((void*)0);
9023 break;
9024 case VAR_DICT5:
9025 n = argvars[0].vval.v_dict == NULL((void*)0)
9026 || argvars[0].vval.v_dict->dv_hashtab.ht_used == 0;
9027 break;
9028 default:
9029 EMSG2(_(e_intern2), "f_empty()")emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_intern2))), (char_u *)("f_empty()"
));
9030 n = 0;
9031 }
9032
9033 rettv->vval.v_number = n;
9034}
9035
9036/*
9037 * "escape({string}, {chars})" function
9038 */
9039static void f_escape(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
9040{
9041 char_u buf[NUMBUFLEN65];
9042
9043 rettv->vval.v_string = vim_strsave_escaped(get_tv_string(&argvars[0]),
9044 get_tv_string_buf(&argvars[1], buf));
9045 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
9046}
9047
9048/*
9049 * "eval()" function
9050 */
9051static void f_eval(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
9052{
9053 char_u *s;
9054
9055 s = get_tv_string_chk(&argvars[0]);
9056 if (s != NULL((void*)0))
9057 s = skipwhite(s);
9058
9059 char_u *p = s;
9060 if (s == NULL((void*)0) || eval1(&s, rettv, TRUE1) == FAIL0) {
9061 if (p != NULL((void*)0) && !aborting()) {
9062 EMSG2(_(e_invexpr2), p)emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_invexpr2))), (char_u *)(p
));
9063 }
9064 need_clr_eos = FALSE0;
9065 rettv->v_type = VAR_NUMBER1;
9066 rettv->vval.v_number = 0;
9067 } else if (*s != NUL'\000') {
9068 EMSG(_(e_trailing))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_trailing))));
9069 }
9070}
9071

9073 * "eventhandler()" function
9074 */
9075static void f_eventhandler(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
9076{
9077 rettv->vval.v_number = vgetc_busy;
9078}

9081 * "executable()" function

9083static void f_executable(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
9084{
9085 rettv->vval.v_number = os_can_exe(get_tv_string(&argvars[0]), NULL((void*)0));
9086}
