9088/// "exepath()" function
9089static void f_exepath(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
9090{
9091 char_u *arg = get_tv_string(&argvars[0]);
9092 char_u *path = NULL((void*)0);
9093
9094 (void)os_can_exe(arg, &path);
9095
9096 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
9097 rettv->vval.v_string = path;
9098}
9099
9100/*
9101 * "exists()" function
9102 */
9103static void f_exists(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
9104{
9105 char_u *p;
9106 char_u *name;
9107 int n = FALSE0;
9108 int len = 0;
9109
9110 p = get_tv_string(&argvars[0]);
9111 if (*p == '$') { /* environment variable */
9112 /* first try "normal" environment variables (fast) */
9113 if (os_getenv((char *)(p + 1)) != NULL((void*)0))
9114 n = TRUE1;
9115 else {
9116 /* try expanding things like $VIM and ${HOME} */
9117 p = expand_env_save(p);
9118 if (p != NULL((void*)0) && *p != '$')
9119 n = TRUE1;
9120 xfree(p);
9121 }
9122 } else if (*p == '&' || *p == '+') { /* option */
9123 n = (get_option_tv(&p, NULL((void*)0), TRUE1) == OK1);
9124 if (*skipwhite(p) != NUL'\000')
9125 n = FALSE0; /* trailing garbage */
9126 } else if (*p == '*') { /* internal or user defined function */
9127 n = function_exists(p + 1);
9128 } else if (*p == ':') {
9129 n = cmd_exists(p + 1);
9130 } else if (*p == '#') {
9131 if (p[1] == '#')
9132 n = autocmd_supported(p + 2);
9133 else
9134 n = au_exists(p + 1);
9135 } else { /* internal variable */
9136 char_u *tofree;
9137 typval_T tv;
9138
9139 /* get_name_len() takes care of expanding curly braces */
9140 name = p;
9141 len = get_name_len(&p, &tofree, TRUE1, FALSE0);
9142 if (len > 0) {
9143 if (tofree != NULL((void*)0)) {
9144 name = tofree;
9145 }
9146 n = (get_var_tv(name, len, &tv, NULL((void*)0), false0, true1) == OK1);
9147 if (n) {
9148 /* handle d.key, l[idx], f(expr) */
9149 n = (handle_subscript(&p, &tv, TRUE1, FALSE0) == OK1);
9150 if (n)
9151 clear_tv(&tv);
9152 }
9153 }
9154 if (*p != NUL'\000')
9155 n = FALSE0;
9156
9157 xfree(tofree);
9158 }
9159
9160 rettv->vval.v_number = n;
9161}
9162
9163/*
9164 * "exp()" function
9165 */
9166static void f_exp(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
9167{
9168 float_op_wrapper(argvars, rettv, &exp);
9169}
9170
9171/*
9172 * "expand()" function
9173 */
9174static void f_expand(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
9175{
9176 char_u *s;
9177 size_t len;
9178 char_u *errormsg;
9179 int options = WILD_SILENT0x40|WILD_USE_NL0x04|WILD_LIST_NOTFOUND0x01;
9180 expand_T xpc;
9181 int error = FALSE0;
9182 char_u *result;
9183
9184 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
9185 if (argvars[1].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0
9186 && argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0
9187 && get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[2], &error)
9188 && !error) {
9189 rettv->v_type = VAR_LIST4;
9190 rettv->vval.v_list = NULL((void*)0);
9191 }
9192
9193 s = get_tv_string(&argvars[0]);
9194 if (*s == '%' || *s == '#' || *s == '<') {
9195 ++emsg_off;
9196 result = eval_vars(s, s, &len, NULL((void*)0), &errormsg, NULL((void*)0));
9197 --emsg_off;
9198 if (rettv->v_type == VAR_LIST4) {
9199 rettv_list_alloc(rettv);
9200 if (result != NULL((void*)0)) {
9201 list_append_string(rettv->vval.v_list, result, -1);
9202 }
9203 } else
9204 rettv->vval.v_string = result;
9205 } else {
9206 /* When the optional second argument is non-zero, don't remove matches
9207 * for 'wildignore' and don't put matches for 'suffixes' at the end. */
9208 if (argvars[1].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0
9209 && get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[1], &error))
9210 options |= WILD_KEEP_ALL0x20;
9211 if (!error) {
9212 ExpandInit(&xpc);
9213 xpc.xp_context = EXPAND_FILES;
9214 if (p_wic)
9215 options += WILD_ICASE0x100;
9216 if (rettv->v_type == VAR_STRING2)
9217 rettv->vval.v_string = ExpandOne(&xpc, s, NULL((void*)0),
9218 options, WILD_ALL6);
9219 else {
9220 rettv_list_alloc(rettv);
9221 ExpandOne(&xpc, s, NULL((void*)0), options, WILD_ALL_KEEP8);
9222 for (int i = 0; i < xpc.xp_numfiles; i++) {
9223 list_append_string(rettv->vval.v_list, xpc.xp_files[i], -1);
9224 }
9225 ExpandCleanup(&xpc);
9226 }
9227 } else
9228 rettv->vval.v_string = NULL((void*)0);
9229 }
9230}
9231
9232/*
9233 * Go over all entries in "d2" and add them to "d1".
9234 * When "action" is "error" then a duplicate key is an error.
9235 * When "action" is "force" then a duplicate key is overwritten.
9236 * Otherwise duplicate keys are ignored ("action" is "keep").
9237 */
9238void dict_extend(dict_T *d1, dict_T *d2, char_u *action)
9239{
9240 dictitem_T *di1;
9241 hashitem_T *hi2;
9242 int todo;
9243 bool_Bool watched = is_watched(d1);
9244 char_u *arg_errmsg = (char_u *)N_("extend() argument")"extend() argument";
9245
9246 todo = (int)d2->dv_hashtab.ht_used;
9247 for (hi2 = d2->dv_hashtab.ht_array; todo > 0; ++hi2) {
9248 if (!HASHITEM_EMPTY(hi2)((hi2)->hi_key == ((void*)0) || (hi2)->hi_key == &hash_removed
)) {
9249 --todo;
9250 di1 = dict_find(d1, hi2->hi_key, -1);
9251 if (d1->dv_scope != 0) {
9252 /* Disallow replacing a builtin function in l: and g:.
9253 * Check the key to be valid when adding to any
9254 * scope. */
9255 if (d1->dv_scope == VAR_DEF_SCOPE2
9256 && HI2DI(hi2)((dictitem_T *)((hi2)->hi_key - __builtin_offsetof(dictitem_T
, di_key)))->di_tv.v_type == VAR_FUNC3
9257 && var_check_func_name(hi2->hi_key,
9258 di1 == NULL((void*)0)))
9259 break;
9260 if (!valid_varname(hi2->hi_key))
9261 break;
9262 }
9263 if (di1 == NULL((void*)0)) {
9264 di1 = dictitem_copy(HI2DI(hi2)((dictitem_T *)((hi2)->hi_key - __builtin_offsetof(dictitem_T
, di_key))));
9265 if (dict_add(d1, di1) == FAIL0) {
9266 dictitem_free(di1);
9267 }
9268
9269 if (watched) {
9270 dictwatcher_notify(d1, (char *)di1->di_key, &di1->di_tv, NULL((void*)0));
9271 }
9272 } else if (*action == 'e') {
9273 EMSG2(_("E737: Key already exists: %s"), hi2->hi_key)emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)("E737: Key already exists: %s"
))), (char_u *)(hi2->hi_key));
9274 break;
9275 } else if (*action == 'f' && HI2DI(hi2)((dictitem_T *)((hi2)->hi_key - __builtin_offsetof(dictitem_T
, di_key))) != di1) {
9276 typval_T oldtv;
9277
9278 if (tv_check_lock(di1->di_tv.v_lock, arg_errmsg, true1)
9279 || var_check_ro(di1->di_flags, arg_errmsg, true1)) {
9280 break;
9281 }
9282
9283 if (watched) {
9284 copy_tv(&di1->di_tv, &oldtv);
9285 }
9286
9287 clear_tv(&di1->di_tv);
9288 copy_tv(&HI2DI(hi2)((dictitem_T *)((hi2)->hi_key - __builtin_offsetof(dictitem_T
, di_key)))->di_tv, &di1->di_tv);
9289
9290 if (watched) {
9291 dictwatcher_notify(d1, (char *)di1->di_key, &di1->di_tv, &oldtv);
9292 clear_tv(&oldtv);
9293 }
9294 }
9295 }
9296 }
9297}
9298
9299/*
9300 * "extend(list, list [, idx])" function
9301 * "extend(dict, dict [, action])" function
9302 */
9303static void f_extend(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
9304{
9305 char_u *arg_errmsg = (char_u *)N_("extend() argument")"extend() argument";
9306
9307 if (argvars[0].v_type == VAR_LIST4 && argvars[1].v_type == VAR_LIST4) {
9308 list_T *l1, *l2;
9309 listitem_T *item;
9310 long before;
9311 int error = FALSE0;
9312
9313 l1 = argvars[0].vval.v_list;
9314 l2 = argvars[1].vval.v_list;
9315 if (l1 != NULL((void*)0) && !tv_check_lock(l1->lv_lock, arg_errmsg, true1)
9316 && l2 != NULL((void*)0)) {
9317 if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
9318 before = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[2], &error);
9319 if (error)
9320 return; /* type error; errmsg already given */
9321
9322 if (before == l1->lv_len)
9323 item = NULL((void*)0);
9324 else {
9325 item = list_find(l1, before);
9326 if (item == NULL((void*)0)) {
9327 EMSGN(_(e_listidx), before)emsgn((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_listidx))), (int64_t)(before
));
9328 return;
9329 }
9330 }
9331 } else
9332 item = NULL((void*)0);
9333 list_extend(l1, l2, item);
9334
9335 copy_tv(&argvars[0], rettv);
9336 }
9337 } else if (argvars[0].v_type == VAR_DICT5 && argvars[1].v_type ==
9338 VAR_DICT5) {
9339 dict_T *d1, *d2;
9340 char_u *action;
9341 int i;
9342
9343 d1 = argvars[0].vval.v_dict;
9344 d2 = argvars[1].vval.v_dict;
9345 if (d1 != NULL((void*)0) && !tv_check_lock(d1->dv_lock, arg_errmsg, true1)
9346 && d2 != NULL((void*)0)) {
9347 /* Check the third argument. */
9348 if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
9349 static char *(av[]) = {"keep", "force", "error"};
9350
9351 action = get_tv_string_chk(&argvars[2]);
9352 if (action == NULL((void*)0))
9353 return; /* type error; errmsg already given */
9354 for (i = 0; i < 3; ++i)
9355 if (STRCMP(action, av[i])strcmp((char *)(action), (char *)(av[i])) == 0)
9356 break;
9357 if (i == 3) {
9358 EMSG2(_(e_invarg2), action)emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_invarg2))), (char_u *)(action
));
9359 return;
9360 }
9361 } else
9362 action = (char_u *)"force";
9363
9364 dict_extend(d1, d2, action);
9365
9366 copy_tv(&argvars[0], rettv);
9367 }
9368 } else
9369 EMSG2(_(e_listdictarg), "extend()")emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_listdictarg))), (char_u *
)("extend()"));
9370}
9371
9372/*
9373 * "feedkeys()" function
9374 */
9375static void f_feedkeys(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
9376{
9377 char_u *keys, *flags = NULL((void*)0);
9378 char_u nbuf[NUMBUFLEN65];
9379
9380 /* This is not allowed in the sandbox. If the commands would still be
9381 * executed in the sandbox it would be OK, but it probably happens later,
9382 * when "sandbox" is no longer set. */
9383 if (check_secure())
9384 return;
9385
9386 keys = get_tv_string(&argvars[0]);
9387 if (*keys != NUL'\000') {
9388 if (argvars[1].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
9389 flags = get_tv_string_buf(&argvars[1], nbuf);
9390 }
9391
9392 vim_feedkeys(cstr_as_string((char *)keys),
9393 cstr_as_string((char *)flags), true1);
9394 }
9395}
9396
9397/// "filereadable()" function
9398static void f_filereadable(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
9399{
9400 char_u *p = get_tv_string(&argvars[0]);
9401 rettv->vval.v_number =
9402 (*p && !os_isdir(p) && os_file_is_readable((char*)p));
9403}
9404
9405/*
9406 * Return 0 for not writable, 1 for writable file, 2 for a dir which we have
9407 * rights to write into.
9408 */
9409static void f_filewritable(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
9410{
9411 char *filename = (char *)get_tv_string(&argvars[0]);
9412 rettv->vval.v_number = os_file_is_writable(filename);
9413}
9414
9415
9416static void findfilendir(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv, int find_what)
9417{
9418 char_u *fname;
9419 char_u *fresult = NULL((void*)0);
9420 char_u *path = *curbuf->b_p_path == NUL'\000' ? p_path : curbuf->b_p_path;
9421 char_u *p;
9422 char_u pathbuf[NUMBUFLEN65];
9423 int count = 1;
9424 int first = TRUE1;
9425 int error = FALSE0;
9426
9427 rettv->vval.v_string = NULL((void*)0);
9428 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
9429
9430 fname = get_tv_string(&argvars[0]);
9431
9432 if (argvars[1].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
9433 p = get_tv_string_buf_chk(&argvars[1], pathbuf);
9434 if (p == NULL((void*)0))
9435 error = TRUE1;
9436 else {
9437 if (*p != NUL'\000')
9438 path = p;
9439
9440 if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0)
9441 count = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[2], &error);
9442 }
9443 }
9444
9445 if (count < 0) {
9446 rettv_list_alloc(rettv);
9447 }
9448
9449 if (*fname != NUL'\000' && !error) {
9450 do {
9451 if (rettv->v_type == VAR_STRING2 || rettv->v_type == VAR_LIST4)
9452 xfree(fresult);
9453 fresult = find_file_in_path_option(first ? fname : NULL((void*)0),
9454 first ? STRLEN(fname)strlen((char *)(fname)) : 0,
9455 0, first, path,
9456 find_what, curbuf->b_ffname,
9457 (find_what == FINDFILE_DIR1
9458 ? (char_u *)""
9459 : curbuf->b_p_sua));
9460 first = FALSE0;
9461
9462 if (fresult != NULL((void*)0) && rettv->v_type == VAR_LIST4)
9463 list_append_string(rettv->vval.v_list, fresult, -1);
9464
9465 } while ((rettv->v_type == VAR_LIST4 || --count > 0) && fresult != NULL((void*)0));
9466 }
9467
9468 if (rettv->v_type == VAR_STRING2)
9469 rettv->vval.v_string = fresult;
9470}
9471
9472
9473/*
9474 * Implementation of map() and filter().
9475 */
9476static void filter_map(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv, int map)
9477{
9478 char_u buf[NUMBUFLEN65];
9479 char_u *expr;
9480 listitem_T *li, *nli;
9481 list_T *l = NULL((void*)0);
9482 dictitem_T *di;
9483 hashtab_T *ht;
9484 hashitem_T *hi;
9485 dict_T *d = NULL((void*)0);
9486 typval_T save_val;
9487 typval_T save_key;
9488 int rem;
9489 int todo;
9490 char_u *ermsg = (char_u *)(map ? "map()" : "filter()");
9491 char_u *arg_errmsg = (char_u *)(map ? N_("map() argument")"map() argument"
9492 : N_("filter() argument")"filter() argument");
9493 int save_did_emsg;
9494 int idx = 0;
9495
9496 if (argvars[0].v_type == VAR_LIST4) {
9497 if ((l = argvars[0].vval.v_list) == NULL((void*)0)
9498 || (!map && tv_check_lock(l->lv_lock, arg_errmsg, true1))) {
9499 return;
9500 }
9501 } else if (argvars[0].v_type == VAR_DICT5) {
9502 if ((d = argvars[0].vval.v_dict) == NULL((void*)0)
9503 || (!map && tv_check_lock(d->dv_lock, arg_errmsg, true1))) {
9504 return;
9505 }
9506 } else {
9507 EMSG2(_(e_listdictarg), ermsg)emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_listdictarg))), (char_u *
)(ermsg));
9508 return;
9509 }
9510
9511 expr = get_tv_string_buf_chk(&argvars[1], buf);
9512 /* On type errors, the preceding call has already displayed an error
9513 * message. Avoid a misleading error message for an empty string that
9514 * was not passed as argument. */
9515 if (expr != NULL((void*)0)) {
9516 prepare_vimvar(VV_VAL, &save_val);
9517 expr = skipwhite(expr);
9518
9519 /* We reset "did_emsg" to be able to detect whether an error
9520 * occurred during evaluation of the expression. */
9521 save_did_emsg = did_emsg;
9522 did_emsg = FALSE0;
9523
9524 prepare_vimvar(VV_KEY, &save_key);
9525 if (argvars[0].v_type == VAR_DICT5) {
9526 vimvars[VV_KEY].vv_typevv_di.di_tv.v_type = VAR_STRING2;
9527
9528 ht = &d->dv_hashtab;
9529 hash_lock(ht);
9530 todo = (int)ht->ht_used;
9531 for (hi = ht->ht_array; todo > 0; ++hi) {
9532 if (!HASHITEM_EMPTY(hi)((hi)->hi_key == ((void*)0) || (hi)->hi_key == &hash_removed
)) {
9533 --todo;
9534
9535 di = HI2DI(hi)((dictitem_T *)((hi)->hi_key - __builtin_offsetof(dictitem_T
, di_key)));
9536 if (map
9537 && (tv_check_lock(di->di_tv.v_lock, arg_errmsg, true1)
9538 || var_check_ro(di->di_flags, arg_errmsg, true1))) {
9539 break;
9540 }
9541
9542 vimvars[VV_KEY].vv_strvv_di.di_tv.vval.v_string = vim_strsave(di->di_key);
9543 int r = filter_map_one(&di->di_tv, expr, map, &rem);
9544 clear_tv(&vimvars[VV_KEY].vv_tvvv_di.di_tv);
9545 if (r == FAIL0 || did_emsg)
9546 break;
9547 if (!map && rem) {
9548 if (var_check_fixed(di->di_flags, arg_errmsg, true1)
9549 || var_check_ro(di->di_flags, arg_errmsg, true1)) {
9550 break;
9551 }
9552 dictitem_remove(d, di);
9553 }
9554 }
9555 }
9556 hash_unlock(ht);
9557 } else {
9558 vimvars[VV_KEY].vv_typevv_di.di_tv.v_type = VAR_NUMBER1;
9559
9560 for (li = l->lv_first; li != NULL((void*)0); li = nli) {
9561 if (map && tv_check_lock(li->li_tv.v_lock, arg_errmsg, true1)) {
9562 break;
9563 }
9564 nli = li->li_next;
9565 vimvars[VV_KEY].vv_nrvv_di.di_tv.vval.v_number = idx;
9566 if (filter_map_one(&li->li_tv, expr, map, &rem) == FAIL0
9567 || did_emsg)
9568 break;
9569 if (!map && rem)
9570 listitem_remove(l, li);
9571 ++idx;
9572 }
9573 }
9574
9575 restore_vimvar(VV_KEY, &save_key);
9576 restore_vimvar(VV_VAL, &save_val);
9577
9578 did_emsg |= save_did_emsg;
9579 }
9580
9581 copy_tv(&argvars[0], rettv);
9582}
9583
9584static int filter_map_one(typval_T *tv, char_u *expr, int map, int *remp)
9585{
9586 typval_T rettv;
9587 char_u *s;
9588 int retval = FAIL0;
9589
9590 copy_tv(tv, &vimvars[VV_VAL].vv_tvvv_di.di_tv);
9591 s = expr;
9592 if (eval1(&s, &rettv, TRUE1) == FAIL0)
9593 goto theend;
9594 if (*s != NUL'\000') { /* check for trailing chars after expr */
9595 EMSG2(_(e_invexpr2), s)emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_invexpr2))), (char_u *)(s
));
9596 clear_tv(&rettv);
9597 goto theend;
9598 }
9599 if (map) {
9600 /* map(): replace the list item value */
9601 clear_tv(tv);
9602 rettv.v_lock = 0;
9603 *tv = rettv;
9604 } else {
9605 int error = FALSE0;
9606
9607 /* filter(): when expr is zero remove the item */
9608 *remp = (get_tv_number_chk(&rettv, &error) == 0);
9609 clear_tv(&rettv);
9610 /* On type error, nothing has been removed; return FAIL to stop the
9611 * loop. The error message was given by get_tv_number_chk(). */
9612 if (error)
9613 goto theend;
9614 }
9615 retval = OK1;
9616theend:
9617 clear_tv(&vimvars[VV_VAL].vv_tvvv_di.di_tv);
9618 return retval;
9619}
9620
9621/*
9622 * "filter()" function
9623 */
9624static void f_filter(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
9625{
9626 filter_map(argvars, rettv, FALSE0);
9627}
9628
9629/*
9630 * "finddir({fname}[, {path}[, {count}]])" function
9631 */
9632static void f_finddir(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
9633{
9634 findfilendir(argvars, rettv, FINDFILE_DIR1);
9635}
9636
9637/*
9638 * "findfile({fname}[, {path}[, {count}]])" function
9639 */
9640static void f_findfile(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
9641{
9642 findfilendir(argvars, rettv, FINDFILE_FILE0);
9643}
9644
9645/*
9646 * "float2nr({float})" function
9647 */
9648static void f_float2nr(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
9649{
9650 float_T f;
9651
9652 if (get_float_arg(argvars, &f) == OK1) {
9653 if (f < -0x7fffffff)
9654 rettv->vval.v_number = -0x7fffffff;
9655 else if (f > 0x7fffffff)
9656 rettv->vval.v_number = 0x7fffffff;
9657 else
9658 rettv->vval.v_number = (varnumber_T)f;
9659 }
9660}
9661
9662/*
9663 * "floor({float})" function
9664 */
9665static void f_floor(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
9666{
9667 float_op_wrapper(argvars, rettv, &floor);
9668}
9669
9670/*
9671 * "fmod()" function
9672 */
9673static void f_fmod(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
9674{
9675 float_T fx, fy;
9676
9677 rettv->v_type = VAR_FLOAT6;
9678 if (get_float_arg(argvars, &fx) == OK1
9679 && get_float_arg(&argvars[1], &fy) == OK1)
9680 rettv->vval.v_float = fmod(fx, fy);
9681 else
9682 rettv->vval.v_float = 0.0;
9683}
9684
9685/*
9686 * "fnameescape({string})" function
9687 */
9688static void f_fnameescape(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
9689{
9690 rettv->vval.v_string = vim_strsave_fnameescape(
9691 get_tv_string(&argvars[0]), FALSE0);
9692 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
9693}
9694
9695/*
9696 * "fnamemodify({fname}, {mods})" function
9697 */
9698static void f_fnamemodify(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
9699{
9700 char_u *fname;
9701 char_u *mods;
9702 size_t usedlen = 0;
9703 size_t len;
9704 char_u *fbuf = NULL((void*)0);
9705 char_u buf[NUMBUFLEN65];
9706
9707 fname = get_tv_string_chk(&argvars[0]);
9708 mods = get_tv_string_buf_chk(&argvars[1], buf);
9709 if (fname == NULL((void*)0) || mods == NULL((void*)0))
9710 fname = NULL((void*)0);
9711 else {
9712 len = STRLEN(fname)strlen((char *)(fname));
9713 (void)modify_fname(mods, &usedlen, &fname, &fbuf, &len);
9714 }
9715
9716 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
9717 if (fname == NULL((void*)0))
9718 rettv->vval.v_string = NULL((void*)0);
9719 else
9720 rettv->vval.v_string = vim_strnsave(fname, len);
9721 xfree(fbuf);
9722}
9723
9724
9725/*
9726 * "foldclosed()" function
9727 */
9728static void foldclosed_both(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv, int end)
9729{
9730 linenr_T lnum;
9731 linenr_T first, last;
9732
9733 lnum = get_tv_lnum(argvars);
9734 if (lnum >= 1 && lnum <= curbuf->b_ml.ml_line_count) {
9735 if (hasFoldingWin(curwin, lnum, &first, &last, FALSE0, NULL((void*)0))) {
9736 if (end)
9737 rettv->vval.v_number = (varnumber_T)last;
9738 else
9739 rettv->vval.v_number = (varnumber_T)first;
9740 return;
9741 }
9742 }
9743 rettv->vval.v_number = -1;
9744}
9745
9746/*
9747 * "foldclosed()" function
9748 */
9749static void f_foldclosed(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
9750{
9751 foldclosed_both(argvars, rettv, FALSE0);
9752}
9753
9754/*
9755 * "foldclosedend()" function
9756 */
9757static void f_foldclosedend(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
9758{
9759 foldclosed_both(argvars, rettv, TRUE1);
9760}
9761
9762/*
9763 * "foldlevel()" function
9764 */
9765static void f_foldlevel(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
9766{
9767 linenr_T lnum;
9768
9769 lnum = get_tv_lnum(argvars);
9770 if (lnum >= 1 && lnum <= curbuf->b_ml.ml_line_count)
9771 rettv->vval.v_number = foldLevel(lnum);
9772}
9773
9774/*
9775 * "foldtext()" function
9776 */
9777static void f_foldtext(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
9778{
9779 linenr_T lnum;
9780 char_u *s;
9781 char_u *r;
9782 int len;
9783 char *txt;
9784
9785 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
9786 rettv->vval.v_string = NULL((void*)0);
9787 if ((linenr_T)vimvars[VV_FOLDSTART].vv_nrvv_di.di_tv.vval.v_number > 0
9788 && (linenr_T)vimvars[VV_FOLDEND].vv_nrvv_di.di_tv.vval.v_number
9789 <= curbuf->b_ml.ml_line_count
9790 && vimvars[VV_FOLDDASHES].vv_strvv_di.di_tv.vval.v_string != NULL((void*)0)) {
9791 /* Find first non-empty line in the fold. */
9792 lnum = (linenr_T)vimvars[VV_FOLDSTART].vv_nrvv_di.di_tv.vval.v_number;
9793 while (lnum < (linenr_T)vimvars[VV_FOLDEND].vv_nrvv_di.di_tv.vval.v_number) {
9794 if (!linewhite(lnum))
9795 break;
9796 ++lnum;
9797 }
9798
9799 /* Find interesting text in this line. */
9800 s = skipwhite(ml_get(lnum));
9801 /* skip C comment-start */
9802 if (s[0] == '/' && (s[1] == '*' || s[1] == '/')) {
9803 s = skipwhite(s + 2);
9804 if (*skipwhite(s) == NUL'\000'
9805 && lnum + 1 < (linenr_T)vimvars[VV_FOLDEND].vv_nrvv_di.di_tv.vval.v_number) {
9806 s = skipwhite(ml_get(lnum + 1));
9807 if (*s == '*')
9808 s = skipwhite(s + 1);
9809 }
9810 }
9811 txt = _("+-%s%3ld lines: ")gettext((char *)("+-%s%3ld lines: "));
9812 r = xmalloc(STRLEN(txt)strlen((char *)(txt))
9813 + STRLEN(vimvars[VV_FOLDDASHES].vv_str)strlen((char *)(vimvars[VV_FOLDDASHES].vv_di.di_tv.vval.v_string
)) // for %s
9814 + 20 // for %3ld
9815 + STRLEN(s)strlen((char *)(s))); // concatenated
9816 sprintf((char *)r, txt, vimvars[VV_FOLDDASHES].vv_strvv_di.di_tv.vval.v_string,
9817 (long)((linenr_T)vimvars[VV_FOLDEND].vv_nrvv_di.di_tv.vval.v_number
9818 - (linenr_T)vimvars[VV_FOLDSTART].vv_nrvv_di.di_tv.vval.v_number + 1));
9819 len = (int)STRLEN(r)strlen((char *)(r));
9820 STRCAT(r, s)strcat((char *)(r), (char *)(s));
9821 /* remove 'foldmarker' and 'commentstring' */
9822 foldtext_cleanup(r + len);
9823 rettv->vval.v_string = r;
9824 }
9825}
9826
9827/*
9828 * "foldtextresult(lnum)" function
9829 */
9830static void f_foldtextresult(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
9831{
9832 linenr_T lnum;
9833 char_u *text;
9834 char_u buf[51];
9835 foldinfo_T foldinfo;
9836 int fold_count;
9837
9838 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
9839 rettv->vval.v_string = NULL((void*)0);
9840 lnum = get_tv_lnum(argvars);
9841 /* treat illegal types and illegal string values for {lnum} the same */
9842 if (lnum < 0)
9843 lnum = 0;
9844 fold_count = foldedCount(curwin, lnum, &foldinfo);
9845 if (fold_count > 0) {
9846 text = get_foldtext(curwin, lnum, lnum + fold_count - 1,
9847 &foldinfo, buf);
9848 if (text == buf)
9849 text = vim_strsave(text);
9850 rettv->vval.v_string = text;
9851 }
9852}
9853
9854/*
9855 * "foreground()" function
9856 */
9857static void f_foreground(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
9858{
9859}
9860
9861/*
9862 * "function()" function
9863 */
9864static void f_function(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
9865{
9866 char_u *s;
9867
9868 s = get_tv_string(&argvars[0]);
9869 if (s == NULL((void*)0) || *s == NUL'\000' || ascii_isdigit(*s))
9870 EMSG2(_(e_invarg2), s)emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_invarg2))), (char_u *)(s)
);
9871 /* Don't check an autoload name for existence here. */
9872 else if (vim_strchr(s, AUTOLOAD_CHAR'#') == NULL((void*)0) && !function_exists(s))
9873 EMSG2(_("E700: Unknown function: %s"), s)emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)("E700: Unknown function: %s"
))), (char_u *)(s));
9874 else {
9875 if (STRNCMP(s, "s:", 2)strncmp((char *)(s), (char *)("s:"), (size_t)(2)) == 0 || STRNCMP(s, "<SID>", 5)strncmp((char *)(s), (char *)("<SID>"), (size_t)(5)) == 0) {
9876 char sid_buf[25];
9877 int off = *s == 's' ? 2 : 5;
9878
9879 /* Expand s: and <SID> into <SNR>nr_, so that the function can
9880 * also be called from another script. Using trans_function_name()
9881 * would also work, but some plugins depend on the name being
9882 * printable text. */
9883 sprintf(sid_buf, "<SNR>%" PRId64"l" "d" "_", (int64_t)current_SID);
9884 rettv->vval.v_string = xmalloc(STRLEN(sid_buf)strlen((char *)(sid_buf)) + STRLEN(s + off)strlen((char *)(s + off)) + 1);
9885 STRCPY(rettv->vval.v_string, sid_buf)strcpy((char *)(rettv->vval.v_string), (char *)(sid_buf));
9886 STRCAT(rettv->vval.v_string, s + off)strcat((char *)(rettv->vval.v_string), (char *)(s + off));
9887 } else
9888 rettv->vval.v_string = vim_strsave(s);
9889 rettv->v_type = VAR_FUNC3;
9890 }
9891}
9892
9893/*
9894 * "garbagecollect()" function
9895 */
9896static void f_garbagecollect(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
9897{
9898 /* This is postponed until we are back at the toplevel, because we may be
9899 * using Lists and Dicts internally. E.g.: ":echo [garbagecollect()]". */
9900 want_garbage_collect = TRUE1;
9901
9902 if (argvars[0].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0 && get_tv_number(&argvars[0]) == 1)
9903 garbage_collect_at_exit = TRUE1;
9904}
9905
9906/*
9907 * "get()" function
9908 */
9909static void f_get(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
9910{
9911 listitem_T *li;
9912 list_T *l;
9913 dictitem_T *di;
9914 dict_T *d;
9915 typval_T *tv = NULL((void*)0);
9916
9917 if (argvars[0].v_type == VAR_LIST4) {
9918 if ((l = argvars[0].vval.v_list) != NULL((void*)0)) {
9919 int error = FALSE0;
9920
9921 li = list_find(l, get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[1], &error));
9922 if (!error && li != NULL((void*)0))
9923 tv = &li->li_tv;
9924 }
9925 } else if (argvars[0].v_type == VAR_DICT5) {
9926 if ((d = argvars[0].vval.v_dict) != NULL((void*)0)) {
9927 di = dict_find(d, get_tv_string(&argvars[1]), -1);
9928 if (di != NULL((void*)0))
9929 tv = &di->di_tv;
9930 }
9931 } else
9932 EMSG2(_(e_listdictarg), "get()")emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_listdictarg))), (char_u *
)("get()"));
9933
9934 if (tv == NULL((void*)0)) {
9935 if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0)
9936 copy_tv(&argvars[2], rettv);
9937 } else
9938 copy_tv(tv, rettv);
9939}
9940
9941
9942/*
9943 * Get line or list of lines from buffer "buf" into "rettv".
9944 * Return a range (from start to end) of lines in rettv from the specified
9945 * buffer.
9946 * If 'retlist' is TRUE, then the lines are returned as a Vim List.
9947 */
9948static void get_buffer_lines(buf_T *buf, linenr_T start, linenr_T end, int retlist, typval_T *rettv)
9949{
9950 char_u *p;
9951
9952 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
9953 rettv->vval.v_string = NULL((void*)0);
9954 if (retlist) {
9955 rettv_list_alloc(rettv);
9956 }
9957
9958 if (buf == NULL((void*)0) || buf->b_ml.ml_mfp == NULL((void*)0) || start < 0)
9959 return;
9960
9961 if (!retlist) {
9962 if (start >= 1 && start <= buf->b_ml.ml_line_count)
9963 p = ml_get_buf(buf, start, FALSE0);
9964 else
9965 p = (char_u *)"";
9966 rettv->vval.v_string = vim_strsave(p);
9967 } else {
9968 if (end < start)
9969 return;
9970
9971 if (start < 1)
9972 start = 1;
9973 if (end > buf->b_ml.ml_line_count)
9974 end = buf->b_ml.ml_line_count;
9975 while (start <= end) {
9976 list_append_string(
9977 rettv->vval.v_list, ml_get_buf(buf, start++, FALSE0), -1);
9978 }
9979 }
9980}
9981
9982/*
9983 * "getbufline()" function
9984 */
9985static void f_getbufline(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
9986{
9987 linenr_T lnum;
9988 linenr_T end;
9989 buf_T *buf;
9990
9991 (void)get_tv_number(&argvars[0]); /* issue errmsg if type error */
9992 ++emsg_off;
9993 buf = get_buf_tv(&argvars[0], FALSE0);
9994 --emsg_off;
9995
9996 lnum = get_tv_lnum_buf(&argvars[1], buf);
9997 if (argvars[2].v_type == VAR_UNKNOWN0)
9998 end = lnum;
9999 else
10000 end = get_tv_lnum_buf(&argvars[2], buf);
10001
10002 get_buffer_lines(buf, lnum, end, TRUE1, rettv);
10003}
10004
10005/*
10006 * "getbufvar()" function
10007 */
10008static void f_getbufvar(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10009{
10010 buf_T *buf;
10011 buf_T *save_curbuf;
10012 char_u *varname;
10013 dictitem_T *v;
10014 int done = FALSE0;
10015
10016 (void)get_tv_number(&argvars[0]); /* issue errmsg if type error */
10017 varname = get_tv_string_chk(&argvars[1]);
10018 ++emsg_off;
10019 buf = get_buf_tv(&argvars[0], FALSE0);
10020
10021 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
10022 rettv->vval.v_string = NULL((void*)0);
10023
10024 if (buf != NULL((void*)0) && varname != NULL((void*)0)) {
10025 /* set curbuf to be our buf, temporarily */
10026 save_curbuf = curbuf;
10027 curbuf = buf;
10028
10029 if (*varname == '&') { /* buffer-local-option */
10030 if (get_option_tv(&varname, rettv, TRUE1) == OK1)
10031 done = TRUE1;
10032 } else if (STRCMP(varname, "changedtick")strcmp((char *)(varname), (char *)("changedtick")) == 0) {
10033 rettv->v_type = VAR_NUMBER1;
10034 rettv->vval.v_number = curbuf->b_changedtick;
10035 done = TRUE1;
10036 } else {
10037 /* Look up the variable. */
10038 /* Let getbufvar({nr}, "") return the "b:" dictionary. */
10039 v = find_var_in_ht(&curbuf->b_vars->dv_hashtab,
10040 'b', varname, FALSE0);
10041 if (v != NULL((void*)0)) {
10042 copy_tv(&v->di_tv, rettv);
10043 done = TRUE1;
10044 }
10045 }
10046
10047 /* restore previous notion of curbuf */
10048 curbuf = save_curbuf;
10049 }
10050
10051 if (!done && argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0)
10052 /* use the default value */
10053 copy_tv(&argvars[2], rettv);
10054
10055 --emsg_off;
10056}
10057
10058/*
10059 * "getchar()" function
10060 */
10061static void f_getchar(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10062{
10063 varnumber_T n;
10064 int error = FALSE0;
10065
10066 /* Position the cursor. Needed after a message that ends in a space. */
10067 ui_cursor_goto(msg_row, msg_col);
10068
10069 ++no_mapping;
10070 ++allow_keys;
10071 for (;; ) {
10072 if (argvars[0].v_type == VAR_UNKNOWN0)
10073 /* getchar(): blocking wait. */
10074 n = safe_vgetc();
10075 else if (get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[0], &error) == 1)
10076 /* getchar(1): only check if char avail */
10077 n = vpeekc_any();
10078 else if (error || vpeekc_any() == NUL'\000')
10079 /* illegal argument or getchar(0) and no char avail: return zero */
10080 n = 0;
10081 else
10082 /* getchar(0) and char avail: return char */
10083 n = safe_vgetc();
10084
10085 if (n == K_IGNORE(-((253) + ((int)(KE_IGNORE) << 8))))
10086 continue;
10087 break;
10088 }
10089 --no_mapping;
10090 --allow_keys;
10091
10092 vimvars[VV_MOUSE_WIN].vv_nrvv_di.di_tv.vval.v_number = 0;
10093 vimvars[VV_MOUSE_LNUM].vv_nrvv_di.di_tv.vval.v_number = 0;
10094 vimvars[VV_MOUSE_COL].vv_nrvv_di.di_tv.vval.v_number = 0;
10095
10096 rettv->vval.v_number = n;
10097 if (IS_SPECIAL(n)((n) < 0) || mod_mask != 0) {
10098 char_u temp[10]; /* modifier: 3, mbyte-char: 6, NUL: 1 */
10099 int i = 0;
10100
10101 /* Turn a special key into three bytes, plus modifier. */
10102 if (mod_mask != 0) {
10103 temp[i++] = K_SPECIAL(0x80);
10104 temp[i++] = KS_MODIFIER252;
10105 temp[i++] = mod_mask;
10106 }
10107 if (IS_SPECIAL(n)((n) < 0)) {
10108 temp[i++] = K_SPECIAL(0x80);
10109 temp[i++] = K_SECOND(n)((n) == (0x80) ? 254 : (n) == '\000' ? 255 : ((-(n)) & 0xff
));
10110 temp[i++] = K_THIRD(n)(((n) == (0x80) || (n) == '\000') ? ('X') : (((unsigned)(-(n)
) >> 8) & 0xff));
10111 } else if (has_mbyte)
10112 i += (*mb_char2bytes)(n, temp + i);
10113 else
10114 temp[i++] = n;
10115 temp[i++] = NUL'\000';
10116 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
10117 rettv->vval.v_string = vim_strsave(temp);
10118
10119 if (is_mouse_key(n)) {
10120 int row = mouse_row;
10121 int col = mouse_col;
10122 win_T *win;
10123 linenr_T lnum;
10124 win_T *wp;
10125 int winnr = 1;
10126
10127 if (row >= 0 && col >= 0) {
10128 /* Find the window at the mouse coordinates and compute the
10129 * text position. */
10130 win = mouse_find_win(&row, &col);
10131 (void)mouse_comp_pos(win, &row, &col, &lnum);
10132 for (wp = firstwin; wp != win; wp = wp->w_next)
10133 ++winnr;
10134 vimvars[VV_MOUSE_WIN].vv_nrvv_di.di_tv.vval.v_number = winnr;
10135 vimvars[VV_MOUSE_LNUM].vv_nrvv_di.di_tv.vval.v_number = lnum;
10136 vimvars[VV_MOUSE_COL].vv_nrvv_di.di_tv.vval.v_number = col + 1;
10137 }
10138 }
10139 }
10140}
10141
10142/*
10143 * "getcharmod()" function
10144 */
10145static void f_getcharmod(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10146{
10147 rettv->vval.v_number = mod_mask;
10148}
10149
10150/*
10151 * "getcharsearch()" function
10152 */
10153static void f_getcharsearch(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10154{
10155 rettv_dict_alloc(rettv);
10156
10157 dict_T *dict = rettv->vval.v_dict;
10158
10159 dict_add_nr_str(dict, "char", 0L, last_csearch());
10160 dict_add_nr_str(dict, "forward", last_csearch_forward(), NULL((void*)0));
10161 dict_add_nr_str(dict, "until", last_csearch_until(), NULL((void*)0));
10162}
10163
10164/*
10165 * "getcmdline()" function
10166 */
10167static void f_getcmdline(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10168{
10169 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
10170 rettv->vval.v_string = get_cmdline_str();
10171}
10172

10174 * "getcmdpos()" function
10175 */
10176static void f_getcmdpos(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10177{
10178 rettv->vval.v_number = get_cmdline_pos() + 1;
10179}
10180

10182 * "getcmdtype()" function
10183 */
10184static void f_getcmdtype(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10185{
10186 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
10187 rettv->vval.v_string = xmallocz(1);
10188 rettv->vval.v_string[0] = get_cmdline_type();
10189}
