10192 * "getcmdwintype()" function
10193 */
10194static void f_getcmdwintype(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10195{
10196 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
10197 rettv->vval.v_string = NULL((void*)0);
10198 rettv->vval.v_string = xmallocz(1);
10199 rettv->vval.v_string[0] = cmdwin_type;
10200}
10201
10202/*
10203 * "getcwd()" function
10204 */
10205static void f_getcwd(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10206{
10207 char_u *cwd;
10208
10209 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
10210 rettv->vval.v_string = NULL((void*)0);
10211 cwd = xmalloc(MAXPATHL4096);
10212 if (os_dirname(cwd, MAXPATHL4096) != FAIL0) {
10213 rettv->vval.v_string = vim_strsave(cwd);
10214#ifdef BACKSLASH_IN_FILENAME
10215 slash_adjust(rettv->vval.v_string);
10216#endif
10217 }
10218 xfree(cwd);
10219}
10220
10221/*
10222 * "getfontname()" function
10223 */
10224static void f_getfontname(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10225{
10226 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
10227 rettv->vval.v_string = NULL((void*)0);
10228}
10229
10230/*
10231 * "getfperm({fname})" function
10232 */
10233static void f_getfperm(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10234{
10235 char_u *perm = NULL((void*)0);
10236 char_u flags[] = "rwx";
10237
10238 char_u *filename = get_tv_string(&argvars[0]);
10239 int32_t file_perm = os_getperm(filename);
10240 if (file_perm >= 0) {
10241 perm = vim_strsave((char_u *)"---------");
10242 for (int i = 0; i < 9; i++) {
10243 if (file_perm & (1 << (8 - i)))
10244 perm[i] = flags[i % 3];
10245 }
10246 }
10247 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
10248 rettv->vval.v_string = perm;
10249}
10250
10251/*
10252 * "getfsize({fname})" function
10253 */
10254static void f_getfsize(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10255{
10256 char *fname = (char *)get_tv_string(&argvars[0]);
10257
10258 rettv->v_type = VAR_NUMBER1;
10259
10260 FileInfo file_info;
10261 if (os_fileinfo(fname, &file_info)) {
10262 uint64_t filesize = os_fileinfo_size(&file_info);
10263 if (os_isdir((char_u *)fname))
10264 rettv->vval.v_number = 0;
10265 else {
10266 rettv->vval.v_number = (varnumber_T)filesize;
10267
10268 /* non-perfect check for overflow */
10269 if ((uint64_t)rettv->vval.v_number != filesize) {
10270 rettv->vval.v_number = -2;
10271 }
10272 }
10273 } else {
10274 rettv->vval.v_number = -1;
10275 }
10276}
10277
10278/*
10279 * "getftime({fname})" function
10280 */
10281static void f_getftime(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10282{
10283 char *fname = (char *)get_tv_string(&argvars[0]);
10284
10285 FileInfo file_info;
10286 if (os_fileinfo(fname, &file_info)) {
10287 rettv->vval.v_number = (varnumber_T)file_info.stat.st_mtim.tv_sec;
10288 } else {
10289 rettv->vval.v_number = -1;
10290 }
10291}
10292
10293/*
10294 * "getftype({fname})" function
10295 */
10296static void f_getftype(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10297{
10298 char_u *fname;
10299 char_u *type = NULL((void*)0);
10300 char *t;
10301
10302 fname = get_tv_string(&argvars[0]);
10303
10304 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
10305 FileInfo file_info;
10306 if (os_fileinfo_link((char *)fname, &file_info)) {
10307 uint64_t mode = file_info.stat.st_mode;
10308#ifdef S_ISREG
10309 if (S_ISREG(mode)((((mode)) & 0170000) == (0100000)))
10310 t = "file";
10311 else if (S_ISDIR(mode)((((mode)) & 0170000) == (0040000)))
10312 t = "dir";
10313# ifdef S_ISLNK
10314 else if (S_ISLNK(mode)((((mode)) & 0170000) == (0120000)))
10315 t = "link";
10316# endif
10317# ifdef S_ISBLK
10318 else if (S_ISBLK(mode)((((mode)) & 0170000) == (0060000)))
10319 t = "bdev";
10320# endif
10321# ifdef S_ISCHR
10322 else if (S_ISCHR(mode)((((mode)) & 0170000) == (0020000)))
10323 t = "cdev";
10324# endif
10325# ifdef S_ISFIFO
10326 else if (S_ISFIFO(mode)((((mode)) & 0170000) == (0010000)))
10327 t = "fifo";
10328# endif
10329# ifdef S_ISSOCK
10330 else if (S_ISSOCK(mode)((((mode)) & 0170000) == (0140000)))
10331 t = "fifo";
10332# endif
10333 else
10334 t = "other";
10335#else
10336# ifdef S_IFMT0170000
10337 switch (mode & S_IFMT0170000) {
10338 case S_IFREG0100000: t = "file"; break;
10339 case S_IFDIR0040000: t = "dir"; break;
10340# ifdef S_IFLNK0120000
10341 case S_IFLNK0120000: t = "link"; break;
10342# endif
10343# ifdef S_IFBLK0060000
10344 case S_IFBLK0060000: t = "bdev"; break;
10345# endif
10346# ifdef S_IFCHR0020000
10347 case S_IFCHR0020000: t = "cdev"; break;
10348# endif
10349# ifdef S_IFIFO0010000
10350 case S_IFIFO0010000: t = "fifo"; break;
10351# endif
10352# ifdef S_IFSOCK0140000
10353 case S_IFSOCK0140000: t = "socket"; break;
10354# endif
10355 default: t = "other";
10356 }
10357# else
10358 if (os_isdir(fname))
10359 t = "dir";
10360 else
10361 t = "file";
10362# endif
10363#endif
10364 type = vim_strsave((char_u *)t);
10365 }
10366 rettv->vval.v_string = type;
10367}
10368
10369/*
10370 * "getline(lnum, [end])" function
10371 */
10372static void f_getline(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10373{
10374 linenr_T lnum;
10375 linenr_T end;
10376 int retlist;
10377
10378 lnum = get_tv_lnum(argvars);
10379 if (argvars[1].v_type == VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
10380 end = 0;
10381 retlist = FALSE0;
10382 } else {
10383 end = get_tv_lnum(&argvars[1]);
10384 retlist = TRUE1;
10385 }
10386
10387 get_buffer_lines(curbuf, lnum, end, retlist, rettv);
10388}
10389
10390/*
10391 * "getmatches()" function
10392 */
10393static void f_getmatches(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10394{
10395 matchitem_T *cur = curwin->w_match_head;
10396 int i;
10397
10398 rettv_list_alloc(rettv);
10399 while (cur != NULL((void*)0)) {
10400 dict_T *dict = dict_alloc();
10401 if (cur->match.regprog == NULL((void*)0)) {
10402 // match added with matchaddpos()
10403 for (i = 0; i < MAXPOSMATCH8; ++i) {
10404 llpos_T *llpos;
10405 char buf[6];
10406
10407 llpos = &cur->pos.pos[i];
10408 if (llpos->lnum == 0) {
10409 break;
10410 }
10411 list_T *l = list_alloc();
10412 list_append_number(l, (varnumber_T)llpos->lnum);
10413 if (llpos->col > 0) {
10414 list_append_number(l, (varnumber_T)llpos->col);
10415 list_append_number(l, (varnumber_T)llpos->len);
10416 }
10417 sprintf(buf, "pos%d", i + 1);
10418 dict_add_list(dict, buf, l);
10419 }
10420 } else {
10421 dict_add_nr_str(dict, "pattern", 0L, cur->pattern);
10422 }
10423 dict_add_nr_str(dict, "group", 0L, syn_id2name(cur->hlg_id));
10424 dict_add_nr_str(dict, "priority", (long)cur->priority, NULL((void*)0));
10425 dict_add_nr_str(dict, "id", (long)cur->id, NULL((void*)0));
10426
10427 if (cur->conceal_char) {
10428 char_u buf[MB_MAXBYTES21 + 1];
10429
10430 buf[(*mb_char2bytes)((int)cur->conceal_char, buf)] = NUL'\000';
10431 dict_add_nr_str(dict, "conceal", 0L, (char_u *)&buf);
10432 }
10433
10434 list_append_dict(rettv->vval.v_list, dict);
10435 cur = cur->next;
10436 }
10437}
10438
10439/*
10440 * "getpid()" function
10441 */
10442static void f_getpid(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10443{
10444 rettv->vval.v_number = os_get_pid();
10445}
10446
10447static void getpos_both(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv, bool_Bool getcurpos)
10448{
10449 pos_T *fp;
10450 int fnum = -1;
10451
10452 if (getcurpos) {
10453 fp = &curwin->w_cursor;
10454 } else {
10455 fp = var2fpos(&argvars[0], true1, &fnum);
10456 }
10457
10458 list_T *l = rettv_list_alloc(rettv);
10459 list_append_number(l, (fnum != -1) ? (varnumber_T)fnum : (varnumber_T)0);
10460 list_append_number(l, (fp != NULL((void*)0)) ? (varnumber_T)fp->lnum : (varnumber_T)0);
10461 list_append_number(l,
10462 (fp != NULL((void*)0))
10463 ? (varnumber_T)(fp->col == MAXCOL0x7fffffff ? MAXCOL0x7fffffff : fp->col + 1)
10464 : (varnumber_T)0);
10465 list_append_number(l,
10466 (fp != NULL((void*)0)) ? (varnumber_T)fp->coladd : (varnumber_T)0);
10467 if (getcurpos) {
10468 list_append_number(l, curwin->w_curswant == MAXCOL0x7fffffff
10469 ? (varnumber_T)MAXCOL0x7fffffff
10470 : (varnumber_T)curwin->w_curswant + 1);
10471 }
10472}
10473
10474/*
10475 * "getcurpos(string)" function
10476 */
10477static void f_getcurpos(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10478{
10479 getpos_both(argvars, rettv, true1);
10480}
10481
10482/*
10483 * "getpos(string)" function
10484 */
10485static void f_getpos(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10486{
10487 getpos_both(argvars, rettv, false0);
10488}
10489
10490/*
10491 * "getqflist()" and "getloclist()" functions
10492 */
10493static void f_getqflist(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10494{
10495 rettv_list_alloc(rettv);
10496 win_T *wp = NULL((void*)0);
10497 if (argvars[0].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) { /* getloclist() */
10498 wp = find_win_by_nr(&argvars[0], NULL((void*)0));
10499 if (wp == NULL((void*)0)) {
10500 return;
10501 }
10502 }
10503 (void)get_errorlist(wp, rettv->vval.v_list);
10504}
10505
10506/// "getreg()" function
10507static void f_getreg(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10508{
10509 char_u *strregname;
10510 int regname;
10511 int arg2 = false0;
10512 bool_Bool return_list = false0;
10513 int error = false0;
10514
10515 if (argvars[0].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
10516 strregname = get_tv_string_chk(&argvars[0]);
10517 error = strregname == NULL((void*)0);
10518 if (argvars[1].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
10519 arg2 = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[1], &error);
10520 if (!error && argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
10521 return_list = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[2], &error);
10522 }
10523 }
10524 } else {
10525 strregname = vimvars[VV_REG].vv_strvv_di.di_tv.vval.v_string;
10526 }
10527
10528 if (error) {
10529 return;
10530 }
10531
10532 regname = (strregname == NULL((void*)0) ? '"' : *strregname);
10533 if (regname == 0)
10534 regname = '"';
10535
10536 if (return_list) {
10537 rettv->v_type = VAR_LIST4;
10538 rettv->vval.v_list =
10539 get_reg_contents(regname, (arg2 ? kGRegExprSrc : 0) | kGRegList);
10540 if (rettv->vval.v_list != NULL((void*)0)) {
10541 rettv->vval.v_list->lv_refcount++;
10542 }
10543 } else {
10544 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
10545 rettv->vval.v_string = get_reg_contents(regname, arg2 ? kGRegExprSrc : 0);
10546 }
10547}
10548
10549/*
10550 * "getregtype()" function
10551 */
10552static void f_getregtype(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10553{
10554 char_u *strregname;
10555 int regname;
10556 char_u buf[NUMBUFLEN65 + 2];
10557 long reglen = 0;
10558
10559 if (argvars[0].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
10560 strregname = get_tv_string_chk(&argvars[0]);
10561 if (strregname == NULL((void*)0)) { /* type error; errmsg already given */
10562 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
10563 rettv->vval.v_string = NULL((void*)0);
10564 return;
10565 }
10566 } else
10567 /* Default to v:register */
10568 strregname = vimvars[VV_REG].vv_strvv_di.di_tv.vval.v_string;
10569
10570 regname = (strregname == NULL((void*)0) ? '"' : *strregname);
10571 if (regname == 0)
10572 regname = '"';
10573
10574 buf[0] = NUL'\000';
10575 buf[1] = NUL'\000';
10576 switch (get_reg_type(regname, &reglen)) {
10577 case MLINE1: buf[0] = 'V'; break;
10578 case MCHAR0: buf[0] = 'v'; break;
10579 case MBLOCK2:
10580 buf[0] = Ctrl_V22;
10581 sprintf((char *)buf + 1, "%" PRId64"l" "d", (int64_t)(reglen + 1));
10582 break;
10583 }
10584 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
10585 rettv->vval.v_string = vim_strsave(buf);
10586}
10587
10588/*
10589 * "gettabvar()" function
10590 */
10591static void f_gettabvar(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10592{
10593 win_T *oldcurwin;
10594 tabpage_T *tp, *oldtabpage;
10595 dictitem_T *v;
10596 char_u *varname;
10597 bool_Bool done = false0;
10598
10599 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
10600 rettv->vval.v_string = NULL((void*)0);
10601
10602 varname = get_tv_string_chk(&argvars[1]);
10603 tp = find_tabpage((int)get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[0], NULL((void*)0)));
10604 if (tp != NULL((void*)0) && varname != NULL((void*)0)) {
10605 // Set tp to be our tabpage, temporarily. Also set the window to the
10606 // first window in the tabpage, otherwise the window is not valid.
10607 win_T *window = tp->tp_firstwin == NULL((void*)0) ? firstwin : tp->tp_firstwin;
10608 if (switch_win(&oldcurwin, &oldtabpage, window, tp, true1) == OK1) {
10609 // look up the variable
10610 // Let gettabvar({nr}, "") return the "t:" dictionary.
10611 v = find_var_in_ht(&tp->tp_vars->dv_hashtab, 't', varname, FALSE0);
10612 if (v != NULL((void*)0)) {
10613 copy_tv(&v->di_tv, rettv);
10614 done = true1;
10615 }
10616 }
10617
10618 /* restore previous notion of curwin */
10619 restore_win(oldcurwin, oldtabpage, TRUE1);
10620 }
10621
10622 if (!done && argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
10623 copy_tv(&argvars[2], rettv);
10624 }
10625}
10626
10627/*
10628 * "gettabwinvar()" function
10629 */
10630static void f_gettabwinvar(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10631{
10632 getwinvar(argvars, rettv, 1);
10633}
10634
10635/*
10636 * "getwinposx()" function
10637 */
10638static void f_getwinposx(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10639{
10640 rettv->vval.v_number = -1;
10641}
10642
10643/*
10644 * "getwinposy()" function
10645 */
10646static void f_getwinposy(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10647{
10648 rettv->vval.v_number = -1;
10649}
10650
10651/*
10652 * Find window specified by "vp" in tabpage "tp".
10653 */
10654static win_T *
10655find_win_by_nr (
10656 typval_T *vp,
10657 tabpage_T *tp /* NULL for current tab page */
10658)
10659{
10660 int nr = get_tv_number_chk(vp, NULL((void*)0));
10661
10662 if (nr < 0) {
10663 return NULL((void*)0);
10664 }
10665
10666 if (nr == 0) {
10667 return curwin;
10668 }
10669
10670 // This method accepts NULL as an alias for curtab.
10671 if (tp == NULL((void*)0)) {
10672 tp = curtab;
10673 }
10674
10675 FOR_ALL_WINDOWS_IN_TAB(wp, tp)for (win_T *wp = ((tp) == curtab) ? firstwin : (tp)->tp_firstwin
; wp != ((void*)0); wp = wp->w_next) {
10676 if (--nr <= 0) {
10677 return wp;
10678 }
10679 }
10680 return NULL((void*)0);
10681}
10682
10683/*
10684 * "getwinvar()" function
10685 */
10686static void f_getwinvar(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10687{
10688 getwinvar(argvars, rettv, 0);
10689}
10690
10691/*
10692 * getwinvar() and gettabwinvar()
10693 */
10694static void
10695getwinvar (
10696 typval_T *argvars,
10697 typval_T *rettv,
10698 int off /* 1 for gettabwinvar() */
10699)
10700{
10701 win_T *win, *oldcurwin;
10702 char_u *varname;
10703 dictitem_T *v;
10704 tabpage_T *tp = NULL((void*)0);
10705 tabpage_T *oldtabpage = NULL((void*)0);
10706 bool_Bool done = false0;
10707
10708 if (off == 1)
10709 tp = find_tabpage((int)get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[0], NULL((void*)0)));
10710 else
10711 tp = curtab;
10712 win = find_win_by_nr(&argvars[off], tp);
10713 varname = get_tv_string_chk(&argvars[off + 1]);
10714 ++emsg_off;
10715
10716 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
10717 rettv->vval.v_string = NULL((void*)0);
10718
10719 if (win != NULL((void*)0) && varname != NULL((void*)0)) {
10720 // Set curwin to be our win, temporarily. Also set the tabpage,
10721 // otherwise the window is not valid. Only do this when needed,
10722 // autocommands get blocked.
10723 bool_Bool need_switch_win = tp != curtab || win != curwin;
10724 if (!need_switch_win
10725 || switch_win(&oldcurwin, &oldtabpage, win, tp, true1) == OK1) {
10726 if (*varname == '&') { // window-local-option
10727 if (get_option_tv(&varname, rettv, 1) == OK1) {
10728 done = true1;
10729 }
10730 } else {
10731 // Look up the variable.
10732 // Let getwinvar({nr}, "") return the "w:" dictionary.
10733 v = find_var_in_ht(&win->w_vars->dv_hashtab, 'w', varname, FALSE0);
10734 if (v != NULL((void*)0)) {
10735 copy_tv(&v->di_tv, rettv);
10736 done = true1;
10737 }
10738 }
10739 }
10740
10741 if (need_switch_win) {
10742 // restore previous notion of curwin
10743 restore_win(oldcurwin, oldtabpage, true1);
10744 }
10745 }
10746
10747 if (!done && argvars[off + 2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0)
10748 /* use the default return value */
10749 copy_tv(&argvars[off + 2], rettv);
10750
10751 --emsg_off;
10752}
10753
10754/*
10755 * "glob()" function
10756 */
10757static void f_glob(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10758{
10759 int options = WILD_SILENT0x40|WILD_USE_NL0x04;
10760 expand_T xpc;
10761 int error = FALSE0;
10762
10763 /* When the optional second argument is non-zero, don't remove matches
10764 * for 'wildignore' and don't put matches for 'suffixes' at the end. */
10765 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
10766 if (argvars[1].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
10767 if (get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[1], &error))
10768 options |= WILD_KEEP_ALL0x20;
10769 if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
10770 if (get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[2], &error)) {
10771 rettv->v_type = VAR_LIST4;
10772 rettv->vval.v_list = NULL((void*)0);
10773 }
10774 if (argvars[3].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0
10775 && get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[3], &error)) {
10776 options |= WILD_ALLLINKS0x200;
10777 }
10778 }
10779 }
10780 if (!error) {
10781 ExpandInit(&xpc);
10782 xpc.xp_context = EXPAND_FILES;
10783 if (p_wic)
10784 options += WILD_ICASE0x100;
10785 if (rettv->v_type == VAR_STRING2)
10786 rettv->vval.v_string = ExpandOne(&xpc, get_tv_string(&argvars[0]),
10787 NULL((void*)0), options, WILD_ALL6);
10788 else {
10789 rettv_list_alloc(rettv);
10790 ExpandOne(&xpc, get_tv_string(&argvars[0]), NULL((void*)0), options, WILD_ALL_KEEP8);
10791 for (int i = 0; i < xpc.xp_numfiles; i++) {
10792 list_append_string(rettv->vval.v_list, xpc.xp_files[i], -1);
10793 }
10794 ExpandCleanup(&xpc);
10795 }
10796 } else
10797 rettv->vval.v_string = NULL((void*)0);
10798}
10799
10800/// "globpath()" function
10801static void f_globpath(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10802{
10803 int flags = 0; // Flags for globpath.
10804 int error = false0;
10805
10806 // Return a string, or a list if the optional third argument is non-zero.
10807 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
10808
10809 if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
10810 // When the optional second argument is non-zero, don't remove matches
10811 // for 'wildignore' and don't put matches for 'suffixes' at the end.
10812 if (get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[2], &error)) {
10813 flags |= WILD_KEEP_ALL0x20;
10814 }
10815
10816 if (argvars[3].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
10817 if (get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[3], &error)) {
10818 rettv->v_type = VAR_LIST4;
10819 rettv->vval.v_list = NULL((void*)0);
10820 }
10821 if (argvars[4].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0
10822 && get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[4], &error)) {
10823 flags |= WILD_ALLLINKS0x200;
10824 }
10825 }
10826 }
10827
10828 char_u buf1[NUMBUFLEN65];
10829 char_u *file = get_tv_string_buf_chk(&argvars[1], buf1);
10830 if (file != NULL((void*)0) && !error) {
10831 garray_T ga;
10832 ga_init(&ga, (int)sizeof(char_u *), 10);
10833 globpath(get_tv_string(&argvars[0]), file, &ga, flags);
10834
10835 if (rettv->v_type == VAR_STRING2) {
10836 rettv->vval.v_string = ga_concat_strings_sep(&ga, "\n");
10837 } else {
10838 rettv_list_alloc(rettv);
10839 for (int i = 0; i < ga.ga_len; i++) {
10840 list_append_string(rettv->vval.v_list,
10841 ((char_u **)(ga.ga_data))[i], -1);
10842 }
10843 }
10844
10845 ga_clear_strings(&ga);
10846 } else {
10847 rettv->vval.v_string = NULL((void*)0);
10848 }
10849}
10850
10851// "glob2regpat()" function
10852static void f_glob2regpat(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10853{
10854 char_u *pat = get_tv_string_chk(&argvars[0]); // NULL on type error
10855
10856 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
10857 rettv->vval.v_string = (pat == NULL((void*)0))
10858 ? NULL((void*)0)
10859 : file_pat_to_reg_pat(pat, NULL((void*)0), NULL((void*)0), false0);
10860}
10861
10862/*
10863 * "has()" function
10864 */
10865static void f_has(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
10866{
10867 int i;
10868 char_u *name;
10869 int n = FALSE0;
10870 static char *(has_list[]) =
10871 {
10872#ifdef UNIX
10873 "unix",
10874#endif
10875#if defined(WIN32)
10876 "win32",
10877#endif
10878#if defined(WIN64) || defined(_WIN64)
10879 "win64",
10880#endif
10881 "fname_case",
10882#ifdef HAVE_ACL(HAVE_POSIX_ACL || HAVE_SOLARIS_ACL)
10883 "acl",
10884#endif
10885 "arabic",
10886 "autocmd",
10887 "browsefilter",
10888 "byte_offset",
10889 "cindent",
10890 "cmdline_compl",
10891 "cmdline_hist",
10892 "comments",
10893 "conceal",
10894 "cscope",
10895 "cursorbind",
10896 "cursorshape",
10897#ifdef DEBUG
10898 "debug",
10899#endif
10900 "dialog_con",
10901 "diff",
10902 "digraphs",
10903 "eval", /* always present, of course! */
10904 "ex_extra",
10905 "extra_search",
10906 "farsi",
10907 "file_in_path",
10908 "filterpipe",
10909 "find_in_path",
10910 "float",
10911 "folding",
10912#if defined(UNIX)
10913 "fork",
10914#endif
10915 "gettext",
10916#if defined(HAVE_ICONV_H) && defined(USE_ICONV)
10917 "iconv",
10918#endif
10919 "insert_expand",
10920 "jumplist",
10921 "keymap",
10922 "langmap",
10923 "libcall",
10924 "linebreak",
10925 "lispindent",
10926 "listcmds",
10927 "localmap",
10928#ifdef __APPLE__
10929 "mac",
10930 "macunix",
10931#endif
10932 "menu",
10933 "mksession",
10934 "modify_fname",
10935 "mouse",
10936 "multi_byte",
10937 "multi_lang",
10938 "path_extra",
10939 "persistent_undo",
10940 "postscript",
10941 "printer",
10942 "profile",
10943 "reltime",
10944 "quickfix",
10945 "rightleft",
10946 "scrollbind",
10947 "showcmd",
10948 "cmdline_info",
10949 "shada",
10950 "signs",
10951 "smartindent",
10952 "startuptime",
10953 "statusline",
10954 "spell",
10955 "syntax",
10956#if !defined(UNIX)
10957 "system", // TODO(SplinterOfChaos): This IS defined for UNIX!
10958#endif
10959 "tablineat",
10960 "tag_binary",
10961 "tag_old_static",
10962 "termresponse",
10963 "textobjects",
10964 "title",
10965 "user-commands", /* was accidentally included in 5.4 */
10966 "user_commands",
10967 "vertsplit",
10968 "virtualedit",
10969 "visual",
10970 "visualextra",
10971 "vreplace",
10972 "wildignore",
10973 "wildmenu",
10974 "windows",
10975 "winaltkeys",
10976 "writebackup",
10977 "nvim",
10978 NULL((void*)0)
10979 };
10980
10981 name = get_tv_string(&argvars[0]);
10982 for (i = 0; has_list[i] != NULL((void*)0); ++i)
10983 if (STRICMP(name, has_list[i])strcasecmp((char *)(name), (char *)(has_list[i])) == 0) {
10984 n = TRUE1;
10985 break;
10986 }
10987
10988 if (n == FALSE0) {
10989 if (STRNICMP(name, "patch", 5)strncasecmp((char *)(name), (char *)("patch"), (size_t)(5)) == 0) {
10990 if (name[5] == '-'
10991 && STRLEN(name)strlen((char *)(name)) > 11
10992 && ascii_isdigit(name[6])
10993 && ascii_isdigit(name[8])
10994 && ascii_isdigit(name[10])) {
10995 int major = atoi((char *)name + 6);
10996 int minor = atoi((char *)name + 8);
10997
10998 // Expect "patch-9.9.01234".
10999 n = (major < VIM_VERSION_MAJOR7
11000 || (major == VIM_VERSION_MAJOR7
11001 && (minor < VIM_VERSION_MINOR4
11002 || (minor == VIM_VERSION_MINOR4
11003 && has_patch(atoi((char *)name + 10))))));
11004 } else {
11005 n = has_patch(atoi((char *)name + 5));
11006 }
11007 } else if (STRICMP(name, "vim_starting")strcasecmp((char *)(name), (char *)("vim_starting")) == 0) {
11008 n = (starting != 0);
11009 } else if (STRICMP(name, "multi_byte_encoding")strcasecmp((char *)(name), (char *)("multi_byte_encoding")) == 0) {
11010 n = has_mbyte;
11011#if defined(USE_ICONV) && defined(DYNAMIC_ICONV)
11012 } else if (STRICMP(name, "iconv")strcasecmp((char *)(name), (char *)("iconv")) == 0) {
11013 n = iconv_enabled(false0);
11014#endif
11015 } else if (STRICMP(name, "syntax_items")strcasecmp((char *)(name), (char *)("syntax_items")) == 0) {
11016 n = syntax_present(curwin);
11017 }
11018 }
11019
11020 if (n == FALSE0 && eval_has_provider((char *)name)) {
11021 n = TRUE1;
11022 }
11023
11024 rettv->vval.v_number = n;
11025}
11026
11027/*
11028 * "has_key()" function
11029 */
11030static void f_has_key(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
11031{
11032 if (argvars[0].v_type != VAR_DICT5) {
11033 EMSG(_(e_dictreq))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_dictreq))));
11034 return;
11035 }
11036 if (argvars[0].vval.v_dict == NULL((void*)0))
11037 return;
11038
11039 rettv->vval.v_number = dict_find(argvars[0].vval.v_dict,
11040 get_tv_string(&argvars[1]), -1) != NULL((void*)0);
11041}
11042
11043/*
11044 * "haslocaldir()" function
11045 */
11046static void f_haslocaldir(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
11047{
11048 rettv->vval.v_number = (curwin->w_localdir != NULL((void*)0));
11049}
11050
11051/*
11052 * "hasmapto()" function
11053 */
11054static void f_hasmapto(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
11055{
11056 char_u *name;
11057 char_u *mode;
11058 char_u buf[NUMBUFLEN65];
11059 int abbr = FALSE0;
11060
11061 name = get_tv_string(&argvars[0]);
11062 if (argvars[1].v_type == VAR_UNKNOWN0)
11063 mode = (char_u *)"nvo";
11064 else {
11065 mode = get_tv_string_buf(&argvars[1], buf);
11066 if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0)
11067 abbr = get_tv_number(&argvars[2]);
11068 }
11069
11070 if (map_to_exists(name, mode, abbr))
11071 rettv->vval.v_number = TRUE1;
11072 else
11073 rettv->vval.v_number = FALSE0;
11074}
11075
11076/*
11077 * "histadd()" function
11078 */
11079static void f_histadd(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
11080{
11081 int histype;
11082 char_u *str;
11083 char_u buf[NUMBUFLEN65];
11084
11085 rettv->vval.v_number = FALSE0;
11086 if (check_restricted() || check_secure())
11087 return;
11088 str = get_tv_string_chk(&argvars[0]); /* NULL on type error */
11089 histype = str != NULL((void*)0) ? get_histtype(str) : -1;
11090 if (histype >= 0) {
11091 str = get_tv_string_buf(&argvars[1], buf);
11092 if (*str != NUL'\000') {
11093 init_history();
11094 add_to_history(histype, str, FALSE0, NUL'\000');
11095 rettv->vval.v_number = TRUE1;
11096 return;
11097 }
11098 }
11099}
11100
11101/*
11102 * "histdel()" function
11103 */
11104static void f_histdel(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
11105{
11106 int n;
11107 char_u buf[NUMBUFLEN65];
11108 char_u *str;
11109
11110 str = get_tv_string_chk(&argvars[0]); /* NULL on type error */
11111 if (str == NULL((void*)0))
11112 n = 0;
11113 else if (argvars[1].v_type == VAR_UNKNOWN0)
11114 /* only one argument: clear entire history */
11115 n = clr_history(get_histtype(str));
11116 else if (argvars[1].v_type == VAR_NUMBER1)
11117 /* index given: remove that entry */
11118 n = del_history_idx(get_histtype(str),
11119 (int)get_tv_number(&argvars[1]));
11120 else
11121 /* string given: remove all matching entries */
11122 n = del_history_entry(get_histtype(str),
11123 get_tv_string_buf(&argvars[1], buf));
11124 rettv->vval.v_number = n;
11125}
11126
11127/*
11128 * "histget()" function
11129 */
11130static void f_histget(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
11131{
11132 int type;
11133 int idx;
11134 char_u *str;
11135
11136 str = get_tv_string_chk(&argvars[0]); /* NULL on type error */
11137 if (str == NULL((void*)0))
11138 rettv->vval.v_string = NULL((void*)0);
11139 else {
11140 type = get_histtype(str);
11141 if (argvars[1].v_type == VAR_UNKNOWN0)
11142 idx = get_history_idx(type);
11143 else
11144 idx = (int)get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[1], NULL((void*)0));
11145 /* -1 on type error */
11146 rettv->vval.v_string = vim_strsave(get_history_entry(type, idx));
11147 }
11148 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
11149}
11150
11151/*
11152 * "histnr()" function
11153 */
11154static void f_histnr(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
11155{
11156 int i;
11157
11158 char_u *history = get_tv_string_chk(&argvars[0]);
11159
11160 i = history == NULL((void*)0) ? HIST_CMD - 1 : get_histtype(history);
11161 if (i >= HIST_CMD && i < HIST_COUNT(HIST_DEBUG + 1))
11162 i = get_history_idx(i);
11163 else
11164 i = -1;
11165 rettv->vval.v_number = i;
11166}
11167
11168/*
11169 * "highlightID(name)" function
11170 */
11171static void f_hlID(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
11172{
11173 rettv->vval.v_number = syn_name2id(get_tv_string(&argvars[0]));
11174}
11175
11176/*
11177 * "highlight_exists()" function
11178 */
11179static void f_hlexists(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
11180{
11181 rettv->vval.v_number = highlight_exists(get_tv_string(&argvars[0]));
11182}
11183
11184/*
11185 * "hostname()" function
11186 */
11187static void f_hostname(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
11188{
11189 char hostname[256];
11190
11191 os_get_hostname(hostname, 256);
11192 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
11193 rettv->vval.v_string = vim_strsave((char_u *)hostname);
11194}
11195
11196/*
11197 * iconv() function
11198 */
11199static void f_iconv(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
11200{
11201 char_u buf1[NUMBUFLEN65];
11202 char_u buf2[NUMBUFLEN65];
11203 char_u *from, *to, *str;
11204 vimconv_T vimconv;
11205
11206 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
11207 rettv->vval.v_string = NULL((void*)0);
11208
11209 str = get_tv_string(&argvars[0]);
11210 from = enc_canonize(enc_skip(get_tv_string_buf(&argvars[1], buf1)));
11211 to = enc_canonize(enc_skip(get_tv_string_buf(&argvars[2], buf2)));
11212 vimconv.vc_type = CONV_NONE0;
11213 convert_setup(&vimconv, from, to);
11214
11215 /* If the encodings are equal, no conversion needed. */
11216 if (vimconv.vc_type == CONV_NONE0)
11217 rettv->vval.v_string = vim_strsave(str);
11218 else
11219 rettv->vval.v_string = string_convert(&vimconv, str, NULL((void*)0));
11220
11221 convert_setup(&vimconv, NULL((void*)0), NULL((void*)0));
11222 xfree(from);
11223 xfree(to);
11224}
11225
11226/*
11227 * "indent()" function
11228 */
11229static void f_indent(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
11230{
11231 linenr_T lnum;
11232
11233 lnum = get_tv_lnum(argvars);
11234 if (lnum >= 1 && lnum <= curbuf->b_ml.ml_line_count)
11235 rettv->vval.v_number = get_indent_lnum(lnum);
11236 else
11237 rettv->vval.v_number = -1;
11238}
11239
11240/*
11241 * "index()" function
11242 */
11243static void f_index(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
11244{
11245 list_T *l;
11246 listitem_T *item;
11247 long idx = 0;
11248 int ic = FALSE0;
11249
11250 rettv->vval.v_number = -1;
11251 if (argvars[0].v_type != VAR_LIST4) {
11252 EMSG(_(e_listreq))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_listreq))));
11253 return;
11254 }
11255 l = argvars[0].vval.v_list;
11256 if (l != NULL((void*)0)) {
11257 item = l->lv_first;
11258 if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
11259 int error = FALSE0;
11260
11261 /* Start at specified item. Use the cached index that list_find()
11262 * sets, so that a negative number also works. */
11263 item = list_find(l, get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[2], &error));
11264 idx = l->lv_idx;
11265 if (argvars[3].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0)
11266 ic = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[3], &error);
11267 if (error)
11268 item = NULL((void*)0);
11269 }
11270
11271 for (; item != NULL((void*)0); item = item->li_next, ++idx)
11272 if (tv_equal(&item->li_tv, &argvars[1], ic, FALSE0)) {
11273 rettv->vval.v_number = idx;
11274 break;
11275 }
11276 }
11277}
11278
11279static int inputsecret_flag = 0;
11280
11281
11282/*
11283 * This function is used by f_input() and f_inputdialog() functions. The third
11284 * argument to f_input() specifies the type of completion to use at the
11285 * prompt. The third argument to f_inputdialog() specifies the value to return
11286 * when the user cancels the prompt.
11287 */
11288static void get_user_input(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv, int inputdialog)
11289{
11290 char_u *prompt = get_tv_string_chk(&argvars[0]);
11291 char_u *p = NULL((void*)0);
11292 int c;
11293 char_u buf[NUMBUFLEN65];
11294 int cmd_silent_save = cmd_silent;
11295 char_u *defstr = (char_u *)"";
11296 int xp_type = EXPAND_NOTHING;
11297 char_u *xp_arg = NULL((void*)0);
11298
11299 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
11300 rettv->vval.v_string = NULL((void*)0);
11301
11302 cmd_silent = FALSE0; /* Want to see the prompt. */
11303 if (prompt != NULL((void*)0)) {
11304 /* Only the part of the message after the last NL is considered as
11305 * prompt for the command line */
11306 p = vim_strrchr(prompt, '\n');
11307 if (p == NULL((void*)0))
11308 p = prompt;
11309 else {
11310 ++p;
11311 c = *p;
11312 *p = NUL'\000';
11313 msg_start();
11314 msg_clr_eos();
11315 msg_puts_attr(prompt, echo_attr);
11316 msg_didout = FALSE0;
11317 msg_starthere();
11318 *p = c;
11319 }
11320 cmdline_row = msg_row;
11321
11322 if (argvars[1].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
11323 defstr = get_tv_string_buf_chk(&argvars[1], buf);
11324 if (defstr != NULL((void*)0))
11325 stuffReadbuffSpec(defstr);
11326
11327 if (!inputdialog && argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
11328 char_u *xp_name;
11329 int xp_namelen;
11330 uint32_t argt;
11331
11332 /* input() with a third argument: completion */
11333 rettv->vval.v_string = NULL((void*)0);
11334
11335 xp_name = get_tv_string_buf_chk(&argvars[2], buf);
11336 if (xp_name == NULL((void*)0))
11337 return;
11338
11339 xp_namelen = (int)STRLEN(xp_name)strlen((char *)(xp_name));
11340
11341 if (parse_compl_arg(xp_name, xp_namelen, &xp_type, &argt,
11342 &xp_arg) == FAIL0)
11343 return;
11344 }
11345 }
11346
11347 if (defstr != NULL((void*)0)) {
11348 int save_ex_normal_busy = ex_normal_busy;
11349 ex_normal_busy = 0;
11350 rettv->vval.v_string =
11351 getcmdline_prompt(inputsecret_flag ? NUL'\000' : '@', p, echo_attr,
11352 xp_type, xp_arg);
11353 ex_normal_busy = save_ex_normal_busy;
11354 }
11355 if (inputdialog && rettv->vval.v_string == NULL((void*)0)
11356 && argvars[1].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0
11357 && argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0)
11358 rettv->vval.v_string = vim_strsave(get_tv_string_buf(
11359 &argvars[2], buf));
11360
11361 xfree(xp_arg);
11362
11363 /* since the user typed this, no need to wait for return */
11364 need_wait_return = FALSE0;
11365 msg_didout = FALSE0;
11366 }
11367 cmd_silent = cmd_silent_save;
11368}
11369
11370/*
11371 * "input()" function
11372 * Also handles inputsecret() when inputsecret is set.
11373 */
11374static void f_input(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
11375{
11376 get_user_input(argvars, rettv, FALSE0);
11377}
11378
11379/*
11380 * "inputdialog()" function
11381 */
11382static void f_inputdialog(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
11383{
11384 get_user_input(argvars, rettv, TRUE1);
11385}
11386
11387/*
11388 * "inputlist()" function
11389 */
11390static void f_inputlist(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
11391{
11392 listitem_T *li;
11393 int selected;
11394 int mouse_used;
11395
11396 if (argvars[0].v_type != VAR_LIST4 || argvars[0].vval.v_list == NULL((void*)0)) {
11397 EMSG2(_(e_listarg), "inputlist()")emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_listarg))), (char_u *)("inputlist()"
));
11398 return;
11399 }
11400
11401 msg_start();
11402 msg_row = Rows - 1; /* for when 'cmdheight' > 1 */
11403 lines_left = Rows; /* avoid more prompt */
11404 msg_scroll = TRUE1;
11405 msg_clr_eos();
11406
11407 for (li = argvars[0].vval.v_list->lv_first; li != NULL((void*)0); li = li->li_next) {
11408 msg_puts(get_tv_string(&li->li_tv));
11409 msg_putchar('\n');
11410 }
11411
11412 /* Ask for choice. */
11413 selected = prompt_for_number(&mouse_used);
11414 if (mouse_used)
11415 selected -= lines_left;
11416
11417 rettv->vval.v_number = selected;
11418}
11419
11420
11421static garray_T ga_userinput = {0, 0, sizeof(tasave_T), 4, NULL((void*)0)};
11422
11423/*
11424 * "inputrestore()" function
11425 */
11426static void f_inputrestore(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
11427{
11428 if (!GA_EMPTY(&ga_userinput)((&ga_userinput)->ga_len <= 0)) {
11429 --ga_userinput.ga_len;
11430 restore_typeahead((tasave_T *)(ga_userinput.ga_data)
11431 + ga_userinput.ga_len);
11432 /* default return is zero == OK */
11433 } else if (p_verbose > 1) {
11434 verb_msg((char_u *)_("called inputrestore() more often than inputsave()")gettext((char *)("called inputrestore() more often than inputsave()"
)));
11435 rettv->vval.v_number = 1; /* Failed */
11436 }
11437}
11438
11439/*
11440 * "inputsave()" function
11441 */
11442static void f_inputsave(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
11443{
11444 // Add an entry to the stack of typeahead storage.
11445 tasave_T *p = GA_APPEND_VIA_PTR(tasave_T, &ga_userinput)ga_append_via_ptr(&ga_userinput, sizeof(tasave_T));
11446 save_typeahead(p);
11447}
11448
11449/*
11450 * "inputsecret()" function
11451 */
11452static void f_inputsecret(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
11453{
11454 ++cmdline_star;
11455 ++inputsecret_flag;
11456 f_input(argvars, rettv);
11457 --cmdline_star;
11458 --inputsecret_flag;
11459}
11460
11461/*
11462 * "insert()" function
11463 */
11464static void f_insert(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
11465{
11466 long before = 0;
11467 listitem_T *item;
11468 list_T *l;
11469 int error = FALSE0;
11470
11471 if (argvars[0].v_type != VAR_LIST4) {
11472 EMSG2(_(e_listarg), "insert()")emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_listarg))), (char_u *)("insert()"
));
11473 } else if ((l = argvars[0].vval.v_list) != NULL((void*)0)
11474 && !tv_check_lock(l->lv_lock,
11475 (char_u *)N_("insert() argument")"insert() argument", true1)) {
11476 if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
11477 before = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[2], &error);
11478 }
11479 if (error) {
11480 // type error; errmsg already given
11481 return;
11482 }
11483
11484 if (before == l->lv_len)
11485 item = NULL((void*)0);
11486 else {
11487 item = list_find(l, before);
11488 if (item == NULL((void*)0)) {
11489 EMSGN(_(e_listidx), before)emsgn((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_listidx))), (int64_t)(before
));
11490 l = NULL((void*)0);
11491 }
11492 }
11493 if (l != NULL((void*)0)) {
11494 list_insert_tv(l, &argvars[1], item);
11495 copy_tv(&argvars[0], rettv);
11496 }
11497 }
11498}
11499
11500/*
11501 * "invert(expr)" function
11502 */
11503static void f_invert(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
11504{
11505 rettv->vval.v_number = ~get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[0], NULL((void*)0));
11506}
11507
11508/*
11509 * "isdirectory()" function
11510 */
11511static void f_isdirectory(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
11512{
11513 rettv->vval.v_number = os_isdir(get_tv_string(&argvars[0]));
11514}
11515
11516/*
11517 * "islocked()" function
11518 */
11519static void f_islocked(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
11520{
11521 lval_T lv;
11522 char_u *end;
11523 dictitem_T *di;
11524
11525 rettv->vval.v_number = -1;
11526 end = get_lval(get_tv_string(&argvars[0]), NULL((void*)0), &lv, FALSE0, FALSE0,
11527 GLV_NO_AUTOLOAD4, FNE_CHECK_START2);
11528 if (end != NULL((void*)0) && lv.ll_name != NULL((void*)0)) {
11529 if (*end != NUL'\000')
11530 EMSG(_(e_trailing))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_trailing))));
11531 else {
11532 if (lv.ll_tv == NULL((void*)0)) {
11533 if (check_changedtick(lv.ll_name))
11534 rettv->vval.v_number = 1; /* always locked */
11535 else {
11536 di = find_var(lv.ll_name, NULL((void*)0), TRUE1);
11537 if (di != NULL((void*)0)) {
11538 /* Consider a variable locked when:
11539 * 1. the variable itself is locked
11540 * 2. the value of the variable is locked.
11541 * 3. the List or Dict value is locked.
11542 */
11543 rettv->vval.v_number = ((di->di_flags & DI_FLAGS_LOCK8)
11544 || tv_islocked(&di->di_tv));
11545 }
11546 }
11547 } else if (lv.ll_range)
11548 EMSG(_("E786: Range not allowed"))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)("E786: Range not allowed")))
);
11549 else if (lv.ll_newkey != NULL((void*)0))
11550 EMSG2(_(e_dictkey), lv.ll_newkey)emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_dictkey))), (char_u *)(lv
.ll_newkey));
11551 else if (lv.ll_list != NULL((void*)0))
11552 /* List item. */
11553 rettv->vval.v_number = tv_islocked(&lv.ll_li->li_tv);
11554 else
11555 /* Dictionary item. */
11556 rettv->vval.v_number = tv_islocked(&lv.ll_di->di_tv);
11557 }
11558 }
11559
11560 clear_lval(&lv);
11561}
11562
11563
11564/*
11565 * Turn a dict into a list:
11566 * "what" == 0: list of keys
11567 * "what" == 1: list of values
11568 * "what" == 2: list of items
11569 */
11570static void dict_list(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv, int what)
11571{
11572 list_T *l2;
11573 dictitem_T *di;
11574 hashitem_T *hi;
11575 listitem_T *li;
11576 listitem_T *li2;
11577 dict_T *d;
11578 int todo;
11579
11580 if (argvars[0].v_type != VAR_DICT5) {
11581 EMSG(_(e_dictreq))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_dictreq))));
11582 return;
11583 }
11584 if ((d = argvars[0].vval.v_dict) == NULL((void*)0))
11585 return;
11586
11587 rettv_list_alloc(rettv);
11588
11589 todo = (int)d->dv_hashtab.ht_used;
11590 for (hi = d->dv_hashtab.ht_array; todo > 0; ++hi) {
11591 if (!HASHITEM_EMPTY(hi)((hi)->hi_key == ((void*)0) || (hi)->hi_key == &hash_removed
)) {
11592 --todo;
11593 di = HI2DI(hi)((dictitem_T *)((hi)->hi_key - __builtin_offsetof(dictitem_T
, di_key)));
11594
11595 li = listitem_alloc();
11596 list_append(rettv->vval.v_list, li);
11597
11598 if (what == 0) {
11599 /* keys() */
11600 li->li_tv.v_type = VAR_STRING2;
11601 li->li_tv.v_lock = 0;
11602 li->li_tv.vval.v_string = vim_strsave(di->di_key);
11603 } else if (what == 1) {
11604 /* values() */
11605 copy_tv(&di->di_tv, &li->li_tv);
11606 } else {
11607 /* items() */
11608 l2 = list_alloc();
11609 li->li_tv.v_type = VAR_LIST4;
11610 li->li_tv.v_lock = 0;
11611 li->li_tv.vval.v_list = l2;
11612 ++l2->lv_refcount;
11613
11614 li2 = listitem_alloc();
11615 list_append(l2, li2);
11616 li2->li_tv.v_type = VAR_STRING2;
11617 li2->li_tv.v_lock = 0;
11618 li2->li_tv.vval.v_string = vim_strsave(di->di_key);
11619
11620 li2 = listitem_alloc();
11621 list_append(l2, li2);
11622 copy_tv(&di->di_tv, &li2->li_tv);
11623 }
11624 }
11625 }
11626}
11627
11628/*
11629 * "items(dict)" function
11630 */
11631static void f_items(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
11632{
11633 dict_list(argvars, rettv, 2);
11634}
11635
11636// "jobclose(id[, stream])" function
11637static void f_jobclose(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
11638{
11639 rettv->v_type = VAR_NUMBER1;
11640 rettv->vval.v_number = 0;
11641
11642 if (check_restricted() || check_secure()) {
11643 return;
11644 }
11645
11646 if (argvars[0].v_type != VAR_NUMBER1 || (argvars[1].v_type != VAR_STRING2
11647 && argvars[1].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0)) {
11648 EMSG(_(e_invarg))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_invarg))));
11649 return;
11650 }
11651
11652 TerminalJobData *data = find_job(argvars[0].vval.v_number);
11653 if (!data) {
11654 EMSG(_(e_invjob))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_invjob))));
11655 return;
11656 }
11657
11658 Process *proc = (Process *)&data->proc;
11659
11660 if (argvars[1].v_type == VAR_STRING2) {
11661 char *stream = (char *)argvars[1].vval.v_string;
11662 if (!strcmp(stream, "stdin")) {
11663 process_close_in(proc);
11664 } else if (!strcmp(stream, "stdout")) {
11665 process_close_out(proc);
11666 } else if (!strcmp(stream, "stderr")) {
11667 process_close_err(proc);
11668 } else {
11669 EMSG2(_("Invalid job stream \"%s\""), stream)emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)("Invalid job stream \"%s\""
))), (char_u *)(stream));
11670 }
11671 } else {
11672 process_close_streams(proc);
11673 }
11674}
11675
11676// "jobpid(id)" function
11677static void f_jobpid(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
11678{
11679 rettv->v_type = VAR_NUMBER1;
11680 rettv->vval.v_number = 0;
11681
11682 if (check_restricted() || check_secure()) {
11683 return;
11684 }
11685
11686 if (argvars[0].v_type != VAR_NUMBER1) {
11687 EMSG(_(e_invarg))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_invarg))));
11688 return;
11689 }
11690
11691 TerminalJobData *data = find_job(argvars[0].vval.v_number);
11692 if (!data) {
11693 EMSG(_(e_invjob))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_invjob))));
11694 return;
11695 }
11696
11697 Process *proc = (Process *)&data->proc;
11698 rettv->vval.v_number = proc->pid;
11699}
11700
11701// "jobsend()" function
11702static void f_jobsend(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
11703{
11704 rettv->v_type = VAR_NUMBER1;
11705 rettv->vval.v_number = 0;
11706
11707 if (check_restricted() || check_secure()) {
11708 return;
11709 }
11710
11711 if (argvars[0].v_type != VAR_NUMBER1 || argvars[1].v_type == VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
11712 // First argument is the job id and second is the string or list to write
11713 // to the job's stdin
11714 EMSG(_(e_invarg))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_invarg))));
11715 return;
11716 }
11717
11718 TerminalJobData *data = find_job(argvars[0].vval.v_number);
11719 if (!data) {
11720 EMSG(_(e_invjob))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_invjob))));
11721 return;
11722 }
11723
11724 if (((Process *)&data->proc)->in->closed) {
11725 EMSG(_("Can't send data to the job: stdin is closed"))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)("Can't send data to the job: stdin is closed"
))));
11726 return;
11727 }
11728
11729 ssize_t input_len;
11730 char *input = (char *) save_tv_as_string(&argvars[1], &input_len, false0);
11731 if (!input) {
11732 // Either the error has been handled by save_tv_as_string(), or there is no
11733 // input to send.
11734 return;
11735 }
11736
11737 WBuffer *buf = wstream_new_buffer(input, input_len, 1, xfree);
11738 rettv->vval.v_number = wstream_write(data->proc.uv.process.in, buf);
11739}
11740
11741// "jobresize(job, width, height)" function
11742static void f_jobresize(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
11743{
11744 rettv->v_type = VAR_NUMBER1;
11745 rettv->vval.v_number = 0;
11746
11747 if (check_restricted() || check_secure()) {
11748 return;
11749 }
11750
11751 if (argvars[0].v_type != VAR_NUMBER1 || argvars[1].v_type != VAR_NUMBER1
11752 || argvars[2].v_type != VAR_NUMBER1) {
11753 // job id, width, height
11754 EMSG(_(e_invarg))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_invarg))));
11755 return;
11756 }
11757
11758
11759 TerminalJobData *data = find_job(argvars[0].vval.v_number);
11760 if (!data) {
11761 EMSG(_(e_invjob))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_invjob))));
11762 return;
11763 }
11764
11765 if (data->proc.uv.process.type != kProcessTypePty) {
11766 EMSG(_(e_jobnotpty))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_jobnotpty))));
11767 return;
11768 }
11769
11770 pty_process_resize(&data->proc.pty, argvars[1].vval.v_number,
11771 argvars[2].vval.v_number);
11772 rettv->vval.v_number = 1;
11773}
11774
11775static char **tv_to_argv(typval_T *cmd_tv, char **cmd)
11776{
11777 if (cmd_tv->v_type == VAR_STRING2) {
11778 char *cmd_str = (char *)get_tv_string(cmd_tv);
11779 if (cmd) {
11780 *cmd = cmd_str;
11781 }
11782 return shell_build_argv(cmd_str, NULL((void*)0));
11783 }
11784
11785 if (cmd_tv->v_type != VAR_LIST4) {
11786 EMSG2(_(e_invarg2), "expected String or List")emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_invarg2))), (char_u *)("expected String or List"
));
11787 return NULL((void*)0);
11788 }
11789
11790 list_T *argl = cmd_tv->vval.v_list;
11791 int argc = argl->lv_len;
11792 if (!argc) {
11793 EMSG(_("Argument vector must have at least one item"))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)("Argument vector must have at least one item"
))));
11794 return NULL((void*)0);
11795 }
11796
11797 assert(argl->lv_first)((argl->lv_first) ? (void) (0) : __assert_fail ("argl->lv_first"
, "/home/travis/build/neovim/bot-ci/build/neovim/src/nvim/eval.c"
, 11797, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));
11798
11799 const char_u *exe = get_tv_string_chk(&argl->lv_first->li_tv);
11800 if (!exe || !os_can_exe(exe, NULL((void*)0))) {
11801 // String is not executable
11802 if (exe) {
11803 EMSG2(e_jobexe, exe)emsg2((char_u *)(e_jobexe), (char_u *)(exe));
11804 }
11805 return NULL((void*)0);
11806 }
11807
11808 if (cmd) {
11809 *cmd = (char *)exe;
11810 }
11811
11812 // Build the argument vector
11813 int i = 0;
11814 char **argv = xcalloc(argc + 1, sizeof(char *));
11815 for (listitem_T *arg = argl->lv_first; arg != NULL((void*)0); arg = arg->li_next) {
11816 char *a = (char *)get_tv_string_chk(&arg->li_tv);
11817 if (!a) {
11818 // Did emsg in get_tv_string; just deallocate argv.
11819 shell_free_argv(argv);
11820 return NULL((void*)0);
11821 }
11822 argv[i++] = xstrdup(a);
11823 }
11824
11825 return argv;
11826}
11827
11828// "jobstart()" function
11829static void f_jobstart(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
11830{
11831 rettv->v_type = VAR_NUMBER1;
11832 rettv->vval.v_number = 0;
11833
11834 if (check_restricted() || check_secure()) {
11835 return;
11836 }
11837
11838 char **argv = tv_to_argv(&argvars[0], NULL((void*)0));
11839 if (!argv) {
11840 return; // Did error message in tv_to_argv.
11841 }
11842
11843 if (argvars[1].v_type != VAR_DICT5 && argvars[1].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
11844 // Wrong argument types
11845 EMSG2(_(e_invarg2), "expected dictionary")emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_invarg2))), (char_u *)("expected dictionary"
));
11846 shell_free_argv(argv);
11847 return;
11848 }
11849
11850 dict_T *job_opts = NULL((void*)0);
11851 ufunc_T *on_stdout = NULL((void*)0), *on_stderr = NULL((void*)0), *on_exit = NULL((void*)0);
11852 if (argvars[1].v_type == VAR_DICT5) {
11853 job_opts = argvars[1].vval.v_dict;
11854 if (!common_job_callbacks(job_opts, &on_stdout, &on_stderr, &on_exit)) {
11855 shell_free_argv(argv);
11856 return;
11857 }
11858 }
11859
11860 bool_Bool pty = job_opts && get_dict_number(job_opts, (uint8_t *)"pty") != 0;
11861 bool_Bool detach = job_opts && get_dict_number(job_opts, (uint8_t *)"detach") != 0;
11862 TerminalJobData *data = common_job_init(argv, on_stdout, on_stderr, on_exit,
11863 job_opts, pty, detach);
11864 Process *proc = (Process *)&data->proc;
11865
11866 if (pty) {
11867 uint16_t width = get_dict_number(job_opts, (uint8_t *)"width");
11868 if (width > 0) {
11869 data->proc.pty.width = width;
11870 }
11871 uint16_t height = get_dict_number(job_opts, (uint8_t *)"height");
11872 if (height > 0) {
11873 data->proc.pty.height = height;
11874 }
11875 char *term = (char *)get_dict_string(job_opts, (uint8_t *)"TERM", true1);
11876 if (term) {
11877 data->proc.pty.term_name = term;
11878 }
11879 }
11880
11881 if (!on_stdout) {
11882 proc->out = NULL((void*)0);
11883 }
11884 if (!on_stderr) {
11885 proc->err = NULL((void*)0);
11886 }
11887 common_job_start(data, rettv);
11888}
11889
11890// "jobstop()" function
11891static void f_jobstop(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
11892{
11893 rettv->v_type = VAR_NUMBER1;
11894 rettv->vval.v_number = 0;
11895
11896 if (check_restricted() || check_secure()) {
11897 return;
11898 }
11899
11900 if (argvars[0].v_type != VAR_NUMBER1) {
11901 // Only argument is the job id
11902 EMSG(_(e_invarg))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_invarg))));
11903 return;
11904 }
11905
11906
11907 TerminalJobData *data = find_job(argvars[0].vval.v_number);
11908 if (!data) {
11909 EMSG(_(e_invjob))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_invjob))));
11910 return;
11911 }
11912
11913 process_stop((Process *)&data->proc);
11914 data->stopped = true1;
11915 rettv->vval.v_number = 1;
11916}
11917
11918// "jobwait(ids[, timeout])" function
11919static void f_jobwait(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
11920{
11921 rettv->v_type = VAR_NUMBER1;
11922 rettv->vval.v_number = 0;
11923
11924 if (check_restricted() || check_secure()) {
11925 return;
11926 }
11927
11928 if (argvars[0].v_type != VAR_LIST4 || (argvars[1].v_type != VAR_NUMBER1
11929 && argvars[1].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0)) {
11930 EMSG(_(e_invarg))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_invarg))));
11931 return;
11932 }
11933
11934 list_T *args = argvars[0].vval.v_list;
11935 list_T *rv = list_alloc();
11936
11937 ui_busy_start();
11938 Queue *waiting_jobs = queue_new_parent(loop_on_put, &loop);
11939 // For each item in the input list append an integer to the output list. -3
11940 // is used to represent an invalid job id, -2 is for a interrupted job and
11941 // -1 for jobs that were skipped or timed out.
11942 for (listitem_T *arg = args->lv_first; arg != NULL((void*)0); arg = arg->li_next) {
11943 TerminalJobData *data = NULL((void*)0);
11944 if (arg->li_tv.v_type != VAR_NUMBER1
11945 || !(data = find_job(arg->li_tv.vval.v_number))) {
11946 list_append_number(rv, -3);
11947 } else {
11948 // append the list item and set the status pointer so we'll collect the
11949 // status code when the job exits
11950 list_append_number(rv, -1);
11951 data->status_ptr = &rv->lv_last->li_tv.vval.v_number;
11952 // Process any pending events for the job because we'll temporarily
11953 // replace the parent queue
11954 queue_process_events(data->events);
11955 queue_replace_parent(data->events, waiting_jobs);
11956 }
11957 }
11958
11959 int remaining = -1;
11960 uint64_t before = 0;
11961 if (argvars[1].v_type == VAR_NUMBER1 && argvars[1].vval.v_number >= 0) {
11962 remaining = argvars[1].vval.v_number;
11963 before = os_hrtime();
11964 }
11965
11966 for (listitem_T *arg = args->lv_first; arg != NULL((void*)0); arg = arg->li_next) {
11967 TerminalJobData *data = NULL((void*)0);
11968 if (remaining == 0) {
11969 // timed out
11970 break;
11971 }
11972 if (arg->li_tv.v_type != VAR_NUMBER1
11973 || !(data = find_job(arg->li_tv.vval.v_number))) {
11974 continue;
11975 }
11976 int status = process_wait((Process *)&data->proc, remaining, waiting_jobs);
11977 if (status < 0) {
11978 // interrupted or timed out, skip remaining jobs.
11979 if (status == -2) {
11980 // set the status so the user can distinguish between interrupted and
11981 // skipped/timeout jobs.
11982 *data->status_ptr = -2;
11983 }
11984 break;
11985 }
11986 if (remaining > 0) {
11987 uint64_t now = os_hrtime();
11988 remaining -= (int) ((now - before) / 1000000);
11989 before = now;
11990 if (remaining <= 0) {
11991 break;
11992 }
11993 }
11994 }
11995
11996 for (listitem_T *arg = args->lv_first; arg != NULL((void*)0); arg = arg->li_next) {
11997 TerminalJobData *data = NULL((void*)0);
11998 if (arg->li_tv.v_type != VAR_NUMBER1
11999 || !(data = find_job(arg->li_tv.vval.v_number))) {
12000 continue;
12001 }
12002 // remove the status pointer because the list may be freed before the
12003 // job exits
12004 data->status_ptr = NULL((void*)0);
12005 }
12006
12007 // restore the parent queue for any jobs still alive
12008 for (listitem_T *arg = args->lv_first; arg != NULL((void*)0); arg = arg->li_next) {
12009 TerminalJobData *data = NULL((void*)0);
12010 if (arg->li_tv.v_type != VAR_NUMBER1
12011 || !(data = pmap_get(uint64_t)map_uint64_t_ptr_t_get(jobs, arg->li_tv.vval.v_number))) {
12012 continue;
12013 }
12014 // restore the parent queue for the job
12015 queue_process_events(data->events);
12016 queue_replace_parent(data->events, loop.events);
12017 }
12018
12019 queue_free(waiting_jobs);
12020 ui_busy_stop();
12021 rv->lv_refcount++;
12022 rettv->v_type = VAR_LIST4;
12023 rettv->vval.v_list = rv;
12024}
12025
12026/*
12027 * "join()" function
12028 */
12029static void f_join(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
12030{
12031 garray_T ga;
12032 char_u *sep;
12033
12034 if (argvars[0].v_type != VAR_LIST4) {
12035 EMSG(_(e_listreq))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_listreq))));
12036 return;
12037 }
12038 if (argvars[0].vval.v_list == NULL((void*)0))
12039 return;
12040 if (argvars[1].v_type == VAR_UNKNOWN0)
12041 sep = (char_u *)" ";
12042 else
12043 sep = get_tv_string_chk(&argvars[1]);
12044
12045 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
12046
12047 if (sep != NULL((void*)0)) {
12048 ga_init(&ga, (int)sizeof(char), 80);
12049 list_join(&ga, argvars[0].vval.v_list, (char *) sep);
12050 ga_append(&ga, NUL'\000');
12051 rettv->vval.v_string = (char_u *)ga.ga_data;
12052 } else
12053 rettv->vval.v_string = NULL((void*)0);
12054}
12055
12056/*
12057 * "keys()" function
12058 */
12059static void f_keys(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
12060{
12061 dict_list(argvars, rettv, 0);
12062}
12063
12064/*
12065 * "last_buffer_nr()" function.
12066 */
12067static void f_last_buffer_nr(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
12068{
12069 int n = 0;
12070
12071 FOR_ALL_BUFFERS(buf)for (buf_T *buf = firstbuf; buf != ((void*)0); buf = buf->
b_next) {
12072 if (n < buf->b_fnum) {
12073 n = buf->b_fnum;
12074 }
12075 }
12076
12077 rettv->vval.v_number = n;
12078}
12079
12080/*
12081 * "len()" function
12082 */
12083static void f_len(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
12084{
12085 switch (argvars[0].v_type) {
12086 case VAR_STRING2:
12087 case VAR_NUMBER1:
12088 rettv->vval.v_number = (varnumber_T)STRLEN(strlen((char *)(get_tv_string(&argvars[0])))
12089 get_tv_string(&argvars[0]))strlen((char *)(get_tv_string(&argvars[0])));
12090 break;
12091 case VAR_LIST4:
12092 rettv->vval.v_number = list_len(argvars[0].vval.v_list);
12093 break;
12094 case VAR_DICT5:
12095 rettv->vval.v_number = dict_len(argvars[0].vval.v_dict);
12096 break;
12097 default:
12098 EMSG(_("E701: Invalid type for len()"))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)("E701: Invalid type for len()"
))));
12099 break;
12100 }
12101}
12102
12103static void libcall_common(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv, int out_type)
12104{
12105 rettv->v_type = out_type;
12106 if (out_type != VAR_NUMBER1) {
12107 rettv->vval.v_string = NULL((void*)0);
12108 }
12109
12110 if (check_restricted() || check_secure()) {
12111 return;
12112 }
12113
12114 // The first two args (libname and funcname) must be strings
12115 if (argvars[0].v_type != VAR_STRING2 || argvars[1].v_type != VAR_STRING2) {
12116 return;
12117 }
12118
12119 const char *libname = (char *) argvars[0].vval.v_string;
12120 const char *funcname = (char *) argvars[1].vval.v_string;
12121
12122 int in_type = argvars[2].v_type;
12123
12124 // input variables
12125 char *str_in = (in_type == VAR_STRING2)
12126 ? (char *) argvars[2].vval.v_string : NULL((void*)0);
12127 int64_t int_in = argvars[2].vval.v_number;
12128
12129 // output variables
12130 char **str_out = (out_type == VAR_STRING2)
12131 ? (char **) &rettv->vval.v_string : NULL((void*)0);
12132 int64_t int_out = 0;
12133
12134 bool_Bool success = os_libcall(libname, funcname,
12135 str_in, int_in,
12136 str_out, &int_out);
12137
12138 if (!success) {
12139 EMSG2(_(e_libcall), funcname)emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_libcall))), (char_u *)(funcname
));
12140 return;
12141 }
12142
12143 if (out_type == VAR_NUMBER1) {
12144 rettv->vval.v_number = (int) int_out;
12145 }
12146}
12147
12148/*
12149 * "libcall()" function
12150 */
12151static void f_libcall(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
12152{
12153 libcall_common(argvars, rettv, VAR_STRING2);
12154}
12155
12156/*
12157 * "libcallnr()" function
12158 */
12159static void f_libcallnr(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
12160{
12161 libcall_common(argvars, rettv, VAR_NUMBER1);
12162}
12163
12164/*
12165 * "line(string)" function
12166 */
12167static void f_line(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
12168{
12169 linenr_T lnum = 0;
12170 pos_T *fp;
12171 int fnum;
12172
12173 fp = var2fpos(&argvars[0], TRUE1, &fnum);
12174 if (fp != NULL((void*)0))
12175 lnum = fp->lnum;
12176 rettv->vval.v_number = lnum;
12177}
12178
12179/*
12180 * "line2byte(lnum)" function
12181 */
12182static void f_line2byte(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
12183{
12184 linenr_T lnum;
12185
12186 lnum = get_tv_lnum(argvars);
12187 if (lnum < 1 || lnum > curbuf->b_ml.ml_line_count + 1)
12188 rettv->vval.v_number = -1;
12189 else
12190 rettv->vval.v_number = ml_find_line_or_offset(curbuf, lnum, NULL((void*)0));
12191 if (rettv->vval.v_number >= 0)
12192 ++rettv->vval.v_number;
12193}
12194
12195/*
12196 * "lispindent(lnum)" function
12197 */
12198static void f_lispindent(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
12199{
12200 pos_T pos;
12201 linenr_T lnum;
12202
12203 pos = curwin->w_cursor;
12204 lnum = get_tv_lnum(argvars);
12205 if (lnum >= 1 && lnum <= curbuf->b_ml.ml_line_count) {
12206 curwin->w_cursor.lnum = lnum;
12207 rettv->vval.v_number = get_lisp_indent();
12208 curwin->w_cursor = pos;
12209 } else
12210 rettv->vval.v_number = -1;
12211}
12212
12213/*
12214 * "localtime()" function
12215 */
12216static void f_localtime(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
12217{
12218 rettv->vval.v_number = (varnumber_T)time(NULL((void*)0));
12219}
12220
12221
12222static void get_maparg(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv, int exact)
12223{
12224 char_u *keys;
12225 char_u *which;
12226 char_u buf[NUMBUFLEN65];
12227 char_u *keys_buf = NULL((void*)0);
12228 char_u *rhs;
12229 int mode;
12230 int abbr = FALSE0;
12231 int get_dict = FALSE0;
12232 mapblock_T *mp;
12233 int buffer_local;
12234
12235 /* return empty string for failure */
12236 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
12237 rettv->vval.v_string = NULL((void*)0);
12238
12239 keys = get_tv_string(&argvars[0]);
12240 if (*keys == NUL'\000')
12241 return;
12242
12243 if (argvars[1].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
12244 which = get_tv_string_buf_chk(&argvars[1], buf);
12245 if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
12246 abbr = get_tv_number(&argvars[2]);
12247 if (argvars[3].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0)
12248 get_dict = get_tv_number(&argvars[3]);
12249 }
12250 } else
12251 which = (char_u *)"";
12252 if (which == NULL((void*)0))
12253 return;
12254
12255 mode = get_map_mode(&which, 0);
12256
12257 keys = replace_termcodes(keys, &keys_buf, TRUE1, TRUE1, FALSE0);
12258 rhs = check_map(keys, mode, exact, FALSE0, abbr, &mp, &buffer_local);
12259 xfree(keys_buf);
12260
12261 if (!get_dict) {
12262 /* Return a string. */
12263 if (rhs != NULL((void*)0))
12264 rettv->vval.v_string = str2special_save(rhs, FALSE0);
12265
12266 } else {
12267 rettv_dict_alloc(rettv);
12268 if (rhs != NULL((void*)0)) {
12269 // Return a dictionary.
12270 char_u *lhs = str2special_save(mp->m_keys, TRUE1);
12271 char_u *mapmode = map_mode_to_chars(mp->m_mode);
12272 dict_T *dict = rettv->vval.v_dict;
12273
12274 dict_add_nr_str(dict, "lhs", 0L, lhs);
12275 dict_add_nr_str(dict, "rhs", 0L, mp->m_orig_str);
12276 dict_add_nr_str(dict, "noremap", mp->m_noremap ? 1L : 0L, NULL((void*)0));
12277 dict_add_nr_str(dict, "expr", mp->m_expr ? 1L : 0L, NULL((void*)0));
12278 dict_add_nr_str(dict, "silent", mp->m_silent ? 1L : 0L, NULL((void*)0));
12279 dict_add_nr_str(dict, "sid", (long)mp->m_script_ID, NULL((void*)0));
12280 dict_add_nr_str(dict, "buffer", (long)buffer_local, NULL((void*)0));
12281 dict_add_nr_str(dict, "nowait", mp->m_nowait ? 1L : 0L, NULL((void*)0));
12282 dict_add_nr_str(dict, "mode", 0L, mapmode);
12283
12284 xfree(lhs);
12285 xfree(mapmode);
12286 }
12287 }
12288}
12289
12290/*
12291 * "log()" function
12292 */
12293static void f_log(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
12294{
12295 float_op_wrapper(argvars, rettv, &log);
12296}

12299 * "log10()" function
12300 */
12301static void f_log10(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
12302{
12303 float_op_wrapper(argvars, rettv, &log10);
12304}
12305
12306
12307/*
12308 * "map()" function
12309 */
12310static void f_map(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
12311{
12312 filter_map(argvars, rettv, TRUE1);
12313}
12314
12315/*
12316 * "maparg()" function
12317 */
12318static void f_maparg(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
12319{
12320 get_maparg(argvars, rettv, TRUE1);
12321}
12322
12323/*
12324 * "mapcheck()" function
12325 */
12326static void f_mapcheck(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
12327{
12328 get_maparg(argvars, rettv, FALSE0);
12329}
12330
12331
12332static void find_some_match(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv, int type)
12333{
12334 char_u *str = NULL((void*)0);
12335 long len = 0;
12336 char_u *expr = NULL((void*)0);
12337 char_u *pat;
12338 regmatch_T regmatch;
12339 char_u patbuf[NUMBUFLEN65];
12340 char_u *save_cpo;
12341 long start = 0;
12342 long nth = 1;
12343 colnr_T startcol = 0;
12344 int match = 0;
12345 list_T *l = NULL((void*)0);
12346 listitem_T *li = NULL((void*)0);
12347 long idx = 0;
12348 char_u *tofree = NULL((void*)0);
12349
12350 /* Make 'cpoptions' empty, the 'l' flag should not be used here. */
12351 save_cpo = p_cpo;
12352 p_cpo = (char_u *)"";
12353
12354 rettv->vval.v_number = -1;
12355 if (type == 3) {
12356 /* return empty list when there are no matches */
12357 rettv_list_alloc(rettv);
12358 } else if (type == 2) {
12359 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
12360 rettv->vval.v_string = NULL((void*)0);
12361 }
12362
12363 if (argvars[0].v_type == VAR_LIST4) {
12364 if ((l = argvars[0].vval.v_list) == NULL((void*)0))
12365 goto theend;
12366 li = l->lv_first;
12367 } else {
12368 expr = str = get_tv_string(&argvars[0]);
12369 len = (long)STRLEN(str)strlen((char *)(str));
12370 }
12371
12372 pat = get_tv_string_buf_chk(&argvars[1], patbuf);
12373 if (pat == NULL((void*)0))
12374 goto theend;
12375
12376 if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
12377 int error = FALSE0;
12378
12379 start = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[2], &error);
12380 if (error)
12381 goto theend;
12382 if (l != NULL((void*)0)) {
12383 li = list_find(l, start);
12384 if (li == NULL((void*)0))
12385 goto theend;
12386 idx = l->lv_idx; /* use the cached index */
12387 } else {
12388 if (start < 0)
12389 start = 0;
12390 if (start > len)
12391 goto theend;
12392 /* When "count" argument is there ignore matches before "start",
12393 * otherwise skip part of the string. Differs when pattern is "^"
12394 * or "\<". */
12395 if (argvars[3].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0)
12396 startcol = start;
12397 else {
12398 str += start;
12399 len -= start;
12400 }
12401 }
12402
12403 if (argvars[3].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0)
12404 nth = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[3], &error);
12405 if (error)
12406 goto theend;
12407 }
12408
12409 regmatch.regprog = vim_regcomp(pat, RE_MAGIC1 + RE_STRING2);
12410 if (regmatch.regprog != NULL((void*)0)) {
12411 regmatch.rm_ic = p_ic;
12412
12413 for (;; ) {
12414 if (l != NULL((void*)0)) {
12415 if (li == NULL((void*)0)) {
12416 match = FALSE0;
12417 break;
12418 }
12419 xfree(tofree);
12420 tofree = str = (char_u *) echo_string(&li->li_tv, NULL((void*)0));
12421 if (str == NULL((void*)0))
12422 break;
12423 }
12424
12425 match = vim_regexec_nl(&regmatch, str, (colnr_T)startcol);
12426
12427 if (match && --nth <= 0)
12428 break;
12429 if (l == NULL((void*)0) && !match)
12430 break;
12431
12432 /* Advance to just after the match. */
12433 if (l != NULL((void*)0)) {
12434 li = li->li_next;
12435 ++idx;
12436 } else {
12437 startcol = (colnr_T)(regmatch.startp[0]
12438 + (*mb_ptr2len)(regmatch.startp[0]) - str);
12439 if (startcol > (colnr_T)len || str + startcol <= regmatch.startp[0]) {
12440 match = FALSE0;
12441 break;
12442 }
12443 }
12444 }
12445
12446 if (match) {
12447 if (type == 3) {
12448 int i;
12449
12450 /* return list with matched string and submatches */
12451 for (i = 0; i < NSUBEXP10; ++i) {
12452 if (regmatch.endp[i] == NULL((void*)0)) {
12453 list_append_string(rettv->vval.v_list, (char_u *)"", 0);
12454 } else {
12455 list_append_string(rettv->vval.v_list,
12456 regmatch.startp[i],
12457 (int)(regmatch.endp[i] - regmatch.startp[i]));
12458 }
12459 }
12460 } else if (type == 2) {
12461 /* return matched string */
12462 if (l != NULL((void*)0))
12463 copy_tv(&li->li_tv, rettv);
12464 else
12465 rettv->vval.v_string = vim_strnsave(regmatch.startp[0],
12466 (int)(regmatch.endp[0] - regmatch.startp[0]));
12467 } else if (l != NULL((void*)0))
12468 rettv->vval.v_number = idx;
12469 else {
12470 if (type != 0)
12471 rettv->vval.v_number =
12472 (varnumber_T)(regmatch.startp[0] - str);
12473 else
12474 rettv->vval.v_number =
12475 (varnumber_T)(regmatch.endp[0] - str);
12476 rettv->vval.v_number += (varnumber_T)(str - expr);
12477 }
12478 }
12479 vim_regfree(regmatch.regprog);
12480 }
12481
12482theend:
12483 xfree(tofree);
12484 p_cpo = save_cpo;
12485}
12486
12487/*
12488 * "match()" function
12489 */
12490static void f_match(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
12491{
12492 find_some_match(argvars, rettv, 1);
12493}
12494
12495/*
12496 * "matchadd()" function
12497 */
12498static void f_matchadd(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
12499{
12500 char_u buf[NUMBUFLEN65];
12501 char_u *grp = get_tv_string_buf_chk(&argvars[0], buf); /* group */
12502 char_u *pat = get_tv_string_buf_chk(&argvars[1], buf); /* pattern */
12503 int prio = 10; /* default priority */
12504 int id = -1;
12505 int error = false0;
12506 char_u *conceal_char = NULL((void*)0);
12507
12508 rettv->vval.v_number = -1;
12509
12510 if (grp == NULL((void*)0) || pat == NULL((void*)0))
12511 return;
12512 if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
12513 prio = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[2], &error);
12514 if (argvars[3].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
12515 id = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[3], &error);
12516 if (argvars[4].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
12517 if (argvars[4].v_type != VAR_DICT5) {
12518 EMSG(_(e_dictreq))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_dictreq))));
12519 return;
12520 }
12521 if (dict_find(argvars[4].vval.v_dict,
12522 (char_u *)"conceal", -1) != NULL((void*)0)) {
12523 conceal_char = get_dict_string(argvars[4].vval.v_dict,
12524 (char_u *)"conceal", false0);
12525 }
12526 }
12527 }
12528 }
12529 if (error == true1) {
12530 return;
12531 }
12532 if (id >= 1 && id <= 3) {
12533 EMSGN("E798: ID is reserved for \":match\": %" PRId64, id)emsgn((char_u *)("E798: ID is reserved for \":match\": %" "l"
"d"), (int64_t)(id));
12534 return;
12535 }
12536
12537 rettv->vval.v_number = match_add(curwin, grp, pat, prio, id, NULL((void*)0),
12538 conceal_char);
12539}
12540
12541static void f_matchaddpos(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv) FUNC_ATTR_NONNULL_ALL
12542{
12543 rettv->vval.v_number = -1;
12544
12545 char_u buf[NUMBUFLEN65];
12546 char_u *group;
12547 group = get_tv_string_buf_chk(&argvars[0], buf);
12548 if (group == NULL((void*)0)) {
12549 return;
12550 }
12551
12552 if (argvars[1].v_type != VAR_LIST4) {
12553 EMSG2(_(e_listarg), "matchaddpos()")emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_listarg))), (char_u *)("matchaddpos()"
));
12554 return;
12555 }
12556
12557 list_T *l;
12558 l = argvars[1].vval.v_list;
12559 if (l == NULL((void*)0)) {
12560 return;
12561 }
12562
12563 int error = false0;
12564 int prio = 10;
12565 int id = -1;
12566 char_u *conceal_char = NULL((void*)0);
12567
12568 if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
12569 prio = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[2], &error);
12570 if (argvars[3].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
12571 id = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[3], &error);
12572 if (argvars[4].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
12573 if (argvars[4].v_type != VAR_DICT5) {
12574 EMSG(_(e_dictreq))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_dictreq))));
12575 return;
12576 }
12577 if (dict_find(argvars[4].vval.v_dict,
12578 (char_u *)"conceal", -1) != NULL((void*)0)) {
12579 conceal_char = get_dict_string(argvars[4].vval.v_dict,
12580 (char_u *)"conceal", false0);
12581 }
12582 }
12583 }
12584 }
12585 if (error == true1) {
12586 return;
12587 }
12588
12589 // id == 3 is ok because matchaddpos() is supposed to substitute :3match
12590 if (id == 1 || id == 2) {
12591 EMSGN("E798: ID is reserved for \"match\": %" PRId64, id)emsgn((char_u *)("E798: ID is reserved for \"match\": %" "l" "d"
), (int64_t)(id));
12592 return;
12593 }
12594
12595 rettv->vval.v_number = match_add(curwin, group, NULL((void*)0), prio, id, l,
12596 conceal_char);
12597}
12598
12599/*
12600 * "matcharg()" function
12601 */
12602static void f_matcharg(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
12603{
12604 rettv_list_alloc(rettv);
12605
12606 int id = get_tv_number(&argvars[0]);
12607
12608 if (id >= 1 && id <= 3) {
12609 matchitem_T *m;
12610
12611 if ((m = (matchitem_T *)get_match(curwin, id)) != NULL((void*)0)) {
12612 list_append_string(rettv->vval.v_list, syn_id2name(m->hlg_id), -1);
12613 list_append_string(rettv->vval.v_list, m->pattern, -1);
12614 } else {
12615 list_append_string(rettv->vval.v_list, NULL((void*)0), -1);
12616 list_append_string(rettv->vval.v_list, NULL((void*)0), -1);
12617 }
12618 }
12619}
12620
12621/*
12622 * "matchdelete()" function
12623 */
12624static void f_matchdelete(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
12625{
12626 rettv->vval.v_number = match_delete(curwin,
12627 (int)get_tv_number(&argvars[0]), TRUE1);
12628}

12634{
12635 find_some_match(argvars, rettv, 0);
12636}

12642{
12643 find_some_match(argvars, rettv, 3);
12644}

12647 * "matchstr()" function

12649static void f_matchstr(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
12650{
12651 find_some_match(argvars, rettv, 2);
12652}
12653
12654
12655static void max_min(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv, int domax)
12656{
12657 long n = 0;
12658 long i;
12659 int error = FALSE0;
12660
12661 if (argvars[0].v_type == VAR_LIST4) {
12662 list_T *l;
12663 listitem_T *li;
12664
12665 l = argvars[0].vval.v_list;
12666 if (l != NULL((void*)0)) {
12667 li = l->lv_first;
12668 if (li != NULL((void*)0)) {
12669 n = get_tv_number_chk(&li->li_tv, &error);
12670 for (;; ) {
12671 li = li->li_next;
12672 if (li == NULL((void*)0))
12673 break;
12674 i = get_tv_number_chk(&li->li_tv, &error);
12675 if (domax ? i > n : i < n)
12676 n = i;
12677 }
12678 }
12679 }
12680 } else if (argvars[0].v_type == VAR_DICT5) {
12681 dict_T *d;
12682 int first = TRUE1;
12683 hashitem_T *hi;
12684 int todo;
12685
12686 d = argvars[0].vval.v_dict;
12687 if (d != NULL((void*)0)) {
12688 todo = (int)d->dv_hashtab.ht_used;
12689 for (hi = d->dv_hashtab.ht_array; todo > 0; ++hi) {
12690 if (!HASHITEM_EMPTY(hi)((hi)->hi_key == ((void*)0) || (hi)->hi_key == &hash_removed
)) {
12691 --todo;
12692 i = get_tv_number_chk(&HI2DI(hi)((dictitem_T *)((hi)->hi_key - __builtin_offsetof(dictitem_T
, di_key)))->di_tv, &error);
12693 if (first) {
12694 n = i;
12695 first = FALSE0;
12696 } else if (domax ? i > n : i < n)
12697 n = i;
12698 }
12699 }
12700 }
12701 } else
12702 EMSG(_(e_listdictarg))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_listdictarg))));
12703 rettv->vval.v_number = error ? 0 : n;
12704}
12705
12706/*
12707 * "max()" function
12708 */
12709static void f_max(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
12710{
12711 max_min(argvars, rettv, TRUE1);
12712}
12713
12714/*
12715 * "min()" function
12716 */
12717static void f_min(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
12718{
12719 max_min(argvars, rettv, FALSE0);
12720}
12721
12722/*
12723 * "mkdir()" function
12724 */
12725static void f_mkdir(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
12726{
12727 char_u *dir;
12728 char_u buf[NUMBUFLEN65];
12729 int prot = 0755;
12730
12731 rettv->vval.v_number = FAIL0;
12732 if (check_restricted() || check_secure())
12733 return;
12734
12735 dir = get_tv_string_buf(&argvars[0], buf);
12736 if (*dir == NUL'\000')
12737 rettv->vval.v_number = FAIL0;
12738 else {
12739 if (*path_tail(dir) == NUL'\000')
12740 /* remove trailing slashes */
12741 *path_tail_with_sep(dir) = NUL'\000';
12742
12743 if (argvars[1].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
12744 if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0)
12745 prot = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[2], NULL((void*)0));
12746 if (prot != -1 && STRCMP(get_tv_string(&argvars[1]), "p")strcmp((char *)(get_tv_string(&argvars[1])), (char *)("p"
)) == 0) {
12747 char *failed_dir;
12748 int ret = os_mkdir_recurse((char *) dir, prot, &failed_dir);
12749 if (ret != 0) {
12750 EMSG3(_(e_mkdir), failed_dir, os_strerror(ret))emsg3((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_mkdir))), (char_u *)(failed_dir
), (char_u *)(uv_strerror(ret)));
12751 xfree(failed_dir);
12752 rettv->vval.v_number = FAIL0;
12753 return;
12754 } else {
12755 rettv->vval.v_number = OK1;
12756 return;
12757 }
12758 }
12759 }
12760 rettv->vval.v_number = prot == -1 ? FAIL0 : vim_mkdir_emsg(dir, prot);
12761 }
12762}
12763
12764/*
12765 * "mode()" function
12766 */
12767static void f_mode(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
12768{
12769 char_u buf[3];
12770
12771 buf[1] = NUL'\000';
12772 buf[2] = NUL'\000';
12773
12774 if (VIsual_active) {
12775 if (VIsual_select)
12776 buf[0] = VIsual_mode + 's' - 'v';
12777 else
12778 buf[0] = VIsual_mode;
12779 } else if (State == HITRETURN(0x200 + 0x01) || State == ASKMORE0x300 || State == SETWSIZE0x400
12780 || State == CONFIRM0x800) {
12781 buf[0] = 'r';
12782 if (State == ASKMORE0x300)
12783 buf[1] = 'm';
12784 else if (State == CONFIRM0x800)
12785 buf[1] = '?';
12786 } else if (State == EXTERNCMD0x600)
12787 buf[0] = '!';
12788 else if (State & INSERT0x10) {
12789 if (State & VREPLACE_FLAG0x80) {
12790 buf[0] = 'R';
12791 buf[1] = 'v';
12792 } else if (State & REPLACE_FLAG0x40)
12793 buf[0] = 'R';
12794 else
12795 buf[0] = 'i';
12796 } else if (State & CMDLINE0x08) {
12797 buf[0] = 'c';
12798 if (exmode_active)
12799 buf[1] = 'v';
12800 } else if (exmode_active) {
12801 buf[0] = 'c';
12802 buf[1] = 'e';
12803 } else if (State & TERM_FOCUS0x2000) {
12804 buf[0] = 't';
12805 } else {
12806 buf[0] = 'n';
12807 if (finish_op)
12808 buf[1] = 'o';
12809 }
12810
12811 /* Clear out the minor mode when the argument is not a non-zero number or
12812 * non-empty string. */
12813 if (!non_zero_arg(&argvars[0]))
12814 buf[1] = NUL'\000';
12815
12816 rettv->vval.v_string = vim_strsave(buf);
12817 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
12818}
12819
12820/// Msgpack callback for writing to readfile()-style list
12821static int msgpack_list_write(void *data, const char *buf, size_t len)
12822{
12823 if (len == 0) {
12824 return 0;
12825 }
12826 list_T *const list = (list_T *) data;
12827 const char *const end = buf + len;
12828 const char *line_end = buf;
12829 if (list->lv_last == NULL((void*)0)) {
12830 list_append_string(list, NULL((void*)0), 0);
12831 }
12832 listitem_T *li = list->lv_last;
12833 do {
12834 const char *line_start = line_end;
12835 line_end = xmemscan(line_start, NL'\012', end - line_start);
12836 if (line_end == line_start) {
12837 list_append_allocated_string(list, NULL((void*)0));
12838 } else {
12839 const size_t line_length = line_end - line_start;
12840 char *str;
12841 if (li == NULL((void*)0)) {
12842 str = xmemdupz(line_start, line_length);
12843 } else {
12844 const size_t li_len = (li->li_tv.vval.v_string == NULL((void*)0)
12845 ? 0
12846 : STRLEN(li->li_tv.vval.v_string)strlen((char *)(li->li_tv.vval.v_string)));
12847 li->li_tv.vval.v_string = xrealloc(li->li_tv.vval.v_string,
12848 li_len + line_length + 1);
12849 str = (char *) li->li_tv.vval.v_string + li_len;
12850 memmove(str, line_start, line_length);
12851 str[line_length] = 0;
12852 }
12853 for (size_t i = 0; i < line_length; i++) {
12854 if (str[i] == NUL'\000') {
12855 str[i] = NL'\012';
12856 }
12857 }
12858 if (li == NULL((void*)0)) {
12859 list_append_allocated_string(list, str);
12860 } else {
12861 li = NULL((void*)0);
12862 }
12863 if (line_end == end - 1) {
12864 list_append_allocated_string(list, NULL((void*)0));
12865 }
12866 }
12867 line_end++;
12868 } while (line_end < end);
12869 return 0;
12870}
12871
12872/// Convert readfile()-style list to a char * buffer with length
12873///
12874/// @param[in] list Converted list.
12875/// @param[out] ret_len Resulting buffer length.
12876/// @param[out] ret_buf Allocated buffer with the result or NULL if ret_len is
12877/// zero.
12878///
12879/// @return true in case of success, false in case of failure.
12880static inline bool_Bool vim_list_to_buf(const list_T *const list,
12881 size_t *const ret_len, char **const ret_buf)
12882 FUNC_ATTR_NONNULL_ARG(2,3) FUNC_ATTR_WARN_UNUSED_RESULT
12883{
12884 size_t len = 0;
12885 if (list != NULL((void*)0)) {
12886 for (const listitem_T *li = list->lv_first;
12887 li != NULL((void*)0);
12888 li = li->li_next) {
12889 if (li->li_tv.v_type != VAR_STRING2) {
12890 return false0;
12891 }
12892 len++;
12893 if (li->li_tv.vval.v_string != 0) {
12894 len += STRLEN(li->li_tv.vval.v_string)strlen((char *)(li->li_tv.vval.v_string));
12895 }
12896 }
12897 if (len) {
12898 len--;
12899 }
12900 }
12901 *ret_len = len;
12902 if (len == 0) {
12903 *ret_buf = NULL((void*)0);
12904 return true1;
12905 }
12906 ListReaderState lrstate = init_lrstate(list);
12907 char *const buf = xmalloc(len);
12908 size_t read_bytes;
12909 if (read_from_list(&lrstate, buf, len, &read_bytes) != OK1) {
12910 assert(false)((0) ? (void) (0) : __assert_fail ("0", "/home/travis/build/neovim/bot-ci/build/neovim/src/nvim/eval.c"
, 12910, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));
12911 }
12912 assert(len == read_bytes)((len == read_bytes) ? (void) (0) : __assert_fail ("len == read_bytes"
, "/home/travis/build/neovim/bot-ci/build/neovim/src/nvim/eval.c"
, 12912, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));
12913 *ret_buf = buf;
12914 return true1;
12915}
12916
12917/// Show a error message when converting to msgpack value
12918///
12919/// @param[in] msg Error message to dump. Must contain exactly two %s that
12920/// will be replaced with what was being dumped: first with
12921/// something like “F” or “function argument”, second with path
12922/// to the failed value.
12923/// @param[in] mpstack Path to the failed value.
12924/// @param[in] objname Dumped object name.
12925///
12926/// @return FAIL.
12927static int conv_error(const char *const msg, const MPConvStack *const mpstack,
12928 const char *const objname)
12929 FUNC_ATTR_NONNULL_ALL
12930{
12931 garray_T msg_ga;
12932 ga_init(&msg_ga, (int)sizeof(char), 80);
12933 char *const key_msg = _("key %s")gettext((char *)("key %s"));
12934 char *const key_pair_msg = _("key %s at index %i from special map")gettext((char *)("key %s at index %i from special map"));
