15067static void f_setbufvar(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
15068{
15069 buf_T *buf;
15070 aco_save_T aco;
15071 char_u *varname, *bufvarname;
15072 typval_T *varp;
15073 char_u nbuf[NUMBUFLEN65];
15074
15075 if (check_restricted() || check_secure())
15076 return;
15077 (void)get_tv_number(&argvars[0]); /* issue errmsg if type error */
15078 varname = get_tv_string_chk(&argvars[1]);
15079 buf = get_buf_tv(&argvars[0], FALSE0);
15080 varp = &argvars[2];
15081
15082 if (buf != NULL((void*)0) && varname != NULL((void*)0) && varp != NULL((void*)0)) {
15083 /* set curbuf to be our buf, temporarily */
15084 aucmd_prepbuf(&aco, buf);
15085
15086 if (*varname == '&') {
15087 long numval;
15088 char_u *strval;
15089 int error = FALSE0;
15090
15091 ++varname;
15092 numval = get_tv_number_chk(varp, &error);
15093 strval = get_tv_string_buf_chk(varp, nbuf);
15094 if (!error && strval != NULL((void*)0))
15095 set_option_value(varname, numval, strval, OPT_LOCAL4);
15096 } else {
15097 bufvarname = xmalloc(STRLEN(varname)strlen((char *)(varname)) + 3);
15098 STRCPY(bufvarname, "b:")strcpy((char *)(bufvarname), (char *)("b:"));
15099 STRCPY(bufvarname + 2, varname)strcpy((char *)(bufvarname + 2), (char *)(varname));
15100 set_var(bufvarname, varp, TRUE1);
15101 xfree(bufvarname);
15102 }
15103
15104 /* reset notion of buffer */
15105 aucmd_restbuf(&aco);
15106 }
15107}
15108
15109static void f_setcharsearch(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
15110{
15111 dict_T *d;
15112 dictitem_T *di;
15113 char_u *csearch;
15114
15115 if (argvars[0].v_type != VAR_DICT5) {
15116 EMSG(_(e_dictreq))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_dictreq))));
15117 return;
15118 }
15119
15120 if ((d = argvars[0].vval.v_dict) != NULL((void*)0)) {
15121 csearch = get_dict_string(d, (char_u *)"char", FALSE0);
15122 if (csearch != NULL((void*)0)) {
15123 if (enc_utf8) {
15124 int pcc[MAX_MCO6];
15125 int c = utfc_ptr2char(csearch, pcc);
15126 set_last_csearch(c, csearch, utfc_ptr2len(csearch));
15127 }
15128 else
15129 set_last_csearch(PTR2CHAR(csearch)(has_mbyte ? mb_ptr2char(csearch) : (int)*(csearch)),
15130 csearch, MB_PTR2LEN(csearch)(has_mbyte ? (*mb_ptr2len)(csearch) : 1));
15131 }
15132
15133 di = dict_find(d, (char_u *)"forward", -1);
15134 if (di != NULL((void*)0))
15135 set_csearch_direction(get_tv_number(&di->di_tv) ? FORWARD1 : BACKWARD(-1));
15136
15137 di = dict_find(d, (char_u *)"until", -1);
15138 if (di != NULL((void*)0))
15139 set_csearch_until(!!get_tv_number(&di->di_tv));
15140 }
15141}
15142
15143/*
15144 * "setcmdpos()" function
15145 */
15146static void f_setcmdpos(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
15147{
15148 int pos = (int)get_tv_number(&argvars[0]) - 1;
15149
15150 if (pos >= 0)
15151 rettv->vval.v_number = set_cmdline_pos(pos);
15152}
15153
15154/*
15155 * "setline()" function
15156 */
15157static void f_setline(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
15158{
15159 linenr_T lnum;
15160 char_u *line = NULL((void*)0);
15161 list_T *l = NULL((void*)0);
15162 listitem_T *li = NULL((void*)0);
15163 long added = 0;
15164 linenr_T lcount = curbuf->b_ml.ml_line_count;
15165
15166 lnum = get_tv_lnum(&argvars[0]);
15167 if (argvars[1].v_type == VAR_LIST4) {
15168 l = argvars[1].vval.v_list;
15169 li = l->lv_first;
15170 } else
15171 line = get_tv_string_chk(&argvars[1]);
15172
15173 /* default result is zero == OK */
15174 for (;; ) {
15175 if (l != NULL((void*)0)) {
15176 /* list argument, get next string */
15177 if (li == NULL((void*)0))
15178 break;
15179 line = get_tv_string_chk(&li->li_tv);
15180 li = li->li_next;
15181 }
15182
15183 rettv->vval.v_number = 1; /* FAIL */
15184 if (line == NULL((void*)0) || lnum < 1 || lnum > curbuf->b_ml.ml_line_count + 1)
15185 break;
15186
15187 /* When coming here from Insert mode, sync undo, so that this can be
15188 * undone separately from what was previously inserted. */
15189 if (u_sync_once == 2) {
15190 u_sync_once = 1; /* notify that u_sync() was called */
15191 u_sync(TRUE1);
15192 }
15193
15194 if (lnum <= curbuf->b_ml.ml_line_count) {
15195 /* existing line, replace it */
15196 if (u_savesub(lnum) == OK1 && ml_replace(lnum, line, TRUE1) == OK1) {
15197 changed_bytes(lnum, 0);
15198 if (lnum == curwin->w_cursor.lnum)
15199 check_cursor_col();
15200 rettv->vval.v_number = 0; /* OK */
15201 }
15202 } else if (added > 0 || u_save(lnum - 1, lnum) == OK1) {
15203 /* lnum is one past the last line, append the line */
15204 ++added;
15205 if (ml_append(lnum - 1, line, (colnr_T)0, FALSE0) == OK1)
15206 rettv->vval.v_number = 0; /* OK */
15207 }
15208
15209 if (l == NULL((void*)0)) /* only one string argument */
15210 break;
15211 ++lnum;
15212 }
15213
15214 if (added > 0)
15215 appended_lines_mark(lcount, added);
15216}
15217
15218
15219/*
15220 * Used by "setqflist()" and "setloclist()" functions
15221 */
15222static void set_qf_ll_list(win_T *wp, typval_T *list_arg, typval_T *action_arg, typval_T *rettv)
15223{
15224 char_u *act;
15225 int action = ' ';
15226
15227 rettv->vval.v_number = -1;
15228
15229 if (list_arg->v_type != VAR_LIST4)
15230 EMSG(_(e_listreq))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_listreq))));
15231 else {
15232 list_T *l = list_arg->vval.v_list;
15233
15234 if (action_arg->v_type == VAR_STRING2) {
15235 act = get_tv_string_chk(action_arg);
15236 if (act == NULL((void*)0))
15237 return; /* type error; errmsg already given */
15238 if (*act == 'a' || *act == 'r')
15239 action = *act;
15240 }
15241
15242 if (l != NULL((void*)0) && set_errorlist(wp, l, action,
15243 (char_u *)(wp == NULL((void*)0) ? "setqflist()" : "setloclist()")) == OK1)
15244 rettv->vval.v_number = 0;
15245 }
15246}
15247
15248/*
15249 * "setloclist()" function
15250 */
15251static void f_setloclist(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
15252{
15253 win_T *win;
15254
15255 rettv->vval.v_number = -1;
15256
15257 win = find_win_by_nr(&argvars[0], NULL((void*)0));
15258 if (win != NULL((void*)0))
15259 set_qf_ll_list(win, &argvars[1], &argvars[2], rettv);
15260}
15261
15262/*
15263 * "setmatches()" function
15264 */
15265static void f_setmatches(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
15266{
15267 list_T *l;
15268 listitem_T *li;
15269 dict_T *d;
15270 list_T *s = NULL((void*)0);
15271
15272 rettv->vval.v_number = -1;
15273 if (argvars[0].v_type != VAR_LIST4) {
15274 EMSG(_(e_listreq))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_listreq))));
15275 return;
15276 }
15277 if ((l = argvars[0].vval.v_list) != NULL((void*)0)) {
15278
15279 /* To some extent make sure that we are dealing with a list from
15280 * "getmatches()". */
15281 li = l->lv_first;
15282 while (li != NULL((void*)0)) {
15283 if (li->li_tv.v_type != VAR_DICT5
15284 || (d = li->li_tv.vval.v_dict) == NULL((void*)0)) {
15285 EMSG(_(e_invarg))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_invarg))));
15286 return;
15287 }
15288 if (!(dict_find(d, (char_u *)"group", -1) != NULL((void*)0)
15289 && (dict_find(d, (char_u *)"pattern", -1) != NULL((void*)0)
15290 || dict_find(d, (char_u *)"pos1", -1) != NULL((void*)0))
15291 && dict_find(d, (char_u *)"priority", -1) != NULL((void*)0)
15292 && dict_find(d, (char_u *)"id", -1) != NULL((void*)0))) {
15293 EMSG(_(e_invarg))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_invarg))));
15294 return;
15295 }
15296 li = li->li_next;
15297 }
15298
15299 clear_matches(curwin);
15300 li = l->lv_first;
15301 while (li != NULL((void*)0)) {
15302 int i = 0;
15303 char_u buf[5];
15304 dictitem_T *di;
15305
15306 d = li->li_tv.vval.v_dict;
15307 if (dict_find(d, (char_u *)"pattern", -1) == NULL((void*)0)) {
15308 if (s == NULL((void*)0)) {
15309 s = list_alloc();
15310 if (s == NULL((void*)0)) {
15311 return;
15312 }
15313 }
15314
15315 // match from matchaddpos()
15316 for (i = 1; i < 9; ++i) {
15317 snprintf((char *)buf, sizeof(buf), (char *)"pos%d", i);
15318 if ((di = dict_find(d, (char_u *)buf, -1)) != NULL((void*)0)) {
15319 if (di->di_tv.v_type != VAR_LIST4) {
15320 return;
15321 }
15322
15323 list_append_tv(s, &di->di_tv);
15324 s->lv_refcount++;
15325 } else {
15326 break;
15327 }
15328 }
15329 }
15330
15331 char_u *group = get_dict_string(d, (char_u *)"group", false0);
15332 int priority = get_dict_number(d, (char_u *)"priority");
15333 int id = get_dict_number(d, (char_u *)"id");
15334 char_u *conceal = dict_find(d, (char_u *)"conceal", -1) != NULL((void*)0)
15335 ? get_dict_string(d, (char_u *)"conceal",
15336 false0)
15337 : NULL((void*)0);
15338 if (i == 0) {
15339 match_add(curwin, group,
15340 get_dict_string(d, (char_u *)"pattern", false0),
15341 priority, id, NULL((void*)0), conceal);
15342 } else {
15343 match_add(curwin, group, NULL((void*)0), priority, id, s, conceal);
15344 list_unref(s);
15345 s = NULL((void*)0);
15346 }
15347 li = li->li_next;
15348 }
15349 rettv->vval.v_number = 0;
15350 }
15351}
15352
15353/*
15354 * "setpos()" function
15355 */
15356static void f_setpos(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
15357{
15358 pos_T pos;
15359 int fnum;
15360 char_u *name;
15361 colnr_T curswant = -1;
15362
15363 rettv->vval.v_number = -1;
15364 name = get_tv_string_chk(argvars);
15365 if (name != NULL((void*)0)) {
15366 if (list2fpos(&argvars[1], &pos, &fnum, &curswant) == OK1) {
15367 if (--pos.col < 0)
15368 pos.col = 0;
15369 if (name[0] == '.' && name[1] == NUL'\000') {
15370 /* set cursor */
15371 if (fnum == curbuf->b_fnum) {
15372 curwin->w_cursor = pos;
15373 if (curswant >= 0) {
15374 curwin->w_curswant = curswant - 1;
15375 }
15376 check_cursor();
15377 rettv->vval.v_number = 0;
15378 } else
15379 EMSG(_(e_invarg))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_invarg))));
15380 } else if (name[0] == '\'' && name[1] != NUL'\000' && name[2] == NUL'\000') {
15381 /* set mark */
15382 if (setmark_pos(name[1], &pos, fnum) == OK1)
15383 rettv->vval.v_number = 0;
15384 } else
15385 EMSG(_(e_invarg))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_invarg))));
15386 }
15387 }
15388}
15389
15390/*
15391 * "setqflist()" function
15392 */
15393static void f_setqflist(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
15394{
15395 set_qf_ll_list(NULL((void*)0), &argvars[0], &argvars[1], rettv);
15396}
15397
15398/*
15399 * "setreg()" function
15400 */
15401static void f_setreg(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
15402{
15403 int regname;
15404 char_u *strregname;
15405 char_u *stropt;
15406 bool_Bool append = false0;
15407 char_u yank_type;
15408 long block_len;
15409
15410 block_len = -1;
15411 yank_type = MAUTO0xff;
15412
15413 strregname = get_tv_string_chk(argvars);
15414 rettv->vval.v_number = 1; /* FAIL is default */
15415
15416 if (strregname == NULL((void*)0))
15417 return; /* type error; errmsg already given */
15418 regname = *strregname;
15419 if (regname == 0 || regname == '@')
15420 regname = '"';
15421
15422 if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
15423 stropt = get_tv_string_chk(&argvars[2]);
15424 if (stropt == NULL((void*)0))
15425 return; /* type error */
15426 for (; *stropt != NUL'\000'; ++stropt)
15427 switch (*stropt) {
15428 case 'a': case 'A': /* append */
15429 append = true1;
15430 break;
15431 case 'v': case 'c': /* character-wise selection */
15432 yank_type = MCHAR0;
15433 break;
15434 case 'V': case 'l': /* line-wise selection */
15435 yank_type = MLINE1;
15436 break;
15437 case 'b': case Ctrl_V22: /* block-wise selection */
15438 yank_type = MBLOCK2;
15439 if (ascii_isdigit(stropt[1])) {
15440 ++stropt;
15441 block_len = getdigits_long(&stropt) - 1;
15442 --stropt;
15443 }
15444 break;
15445 }
15446 }
15447
15448 if (argvars[1].v_type == VAR_LIST4) {
15449 int len = argvars[1].vval.v_list->lv_len;
15450 // First half: use for pointers to result lines; second half: use for
15451 // pointers to allocated copies.
15452 char_u **lstval = xmalloc(sizeof(char_u *) * ((len + 1) * 2));
15453 char_u **curval = lstval;
15454 char_u **allocval = lstval + len + 2;
15455 char_u **curallocval = allocval;
15456
15457 char_u buf[NUMBUFLEN65];
15458 for (listitem_T *li = argvars[1].vval.v_list->lv_first;
15459 li != NULL((void*)0);
15460 li = li->li_next) {
15461 char_u *strval = get_tv_string_buf_chk(&li->li_tv, buf);
15462 if (strval == NULL((void*)0)) {
15463 goto free_lstval;
15464 }
15465 if (strval == buf) {
15466 // Need to make a copy,
15467 // next get_tv_string_buf_chk() will overwrite the string.
15468 strval = vim_strsave(buf);
15469 *curallocval++ = strval;
15470 }
15471 *curval++ = strval;
15472 }
15473 *curval++ = NULL((void*)0);
15474
15475 write_reg_contents_lst(regname, lstval, -1, append, yank_type, block_len);
15476
15477free_lstval:
15478 while (curallocval > allocval)
15479 xfree(*--curallocval);
15480 xfree(lstval);
15481 } else {
15482 char_u *strval = get_tv_string_chk(&argvars[1]);
15483 if (strval == NULL((void*)0)) {
15484 return;
15485 }
15486 write_reg_contents_ex(regname, strval, -1, append, yank_type, block_len);
15487 }
15488 rettv->vval.v_number = 0;
15489}
15490
15491/*
15492 * "settabvar()" function
15493 */
15494static void f_settabvar(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
15495{
15496 tabpage_T *save_curtab;
15497 tabpage_T *tp;
15498 char_u *varname, *tabvarname;
15499 typval_T *varp;
15500
15501 rettv->vval.v_number = 0;
15502
15503 if (check_restricted() || check_secure())
15504 return;
15505
15506 tp = find_tabpage((int)get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[0], NULL((void*)0)));
15507 varname = get_tv_string_chk(&argvars[1]);
15508 varp = &argvars[2];
15509
15510 if (varname != NULL((void*)0) && varp != NULL((void*)0)
15511 && tp != NULL((void*)0)
15512 ) {
15513 save_curtab = curtab;
15514 goto_tabpage_tp(tp, FALSE0, FALSE0);
15515
15516 tabvarname = xmalloc(STRLEN(varname)strlen((char *)(varname)) + 3);
15517 STRCPY(tabvarname, "t:")strcpy((char *)(tabvarname), (char *)("t:"));
15518 STRCPY(tabvarname + 2, varname)strcpy((char *)(tabvarname + 2), (char *)(varname));
15519 set_var(tabvarname, varp, TRUE1);
15520 xfree(tabvarname);
15521
15522 /* Restore current tabpage */
15523 if (valid_tabpage(save_curtab))
15524 goto_tabpage_tp(save_curtab, FALSE0, FALSE0);
15525 }
15526}
15527
15528/*
15529 * "settabwinvar()" function
15530 */
15531static void f_settabwinvar(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
15532{
15533 setwinvar(argvars, rettv, 1);
15534}
15535
15536/*
15537 * "setwinvar()" function
15538 */
15539static void f_setwinvar(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
15540{
15541 setwinvar(argvars, rettv, 0);
15542}
15543
15544/*
15545 * "setwinvar()" and "settabwinvar()" functions
15546 */
15547
15548static void setwinvar(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv, int off)
15549{
15550 win_T *win;
15551 win_T *save_curwin;
15552 tabpage_T *save_curtab;
15553 char_u *varname, *winvarname;
15554 typval_T *varp;
15555 char_u nbuf[NUMBUFLEN65];
15556 tabpage_T *tp = NULL((void*)0);
15557
15558 if (check_restricted() || check_secure())
15559 return;
15560
15561 if (off == 1)
15562 tp = find_tabpage((int)get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[0], NULL((void*)0)));
15563 else
15564 tp = curtab;
15565 win = find_win_by_nr(&argvars[off], tp);
15566 varname = get_tv_string_chk(&argvars[off + 1]);
15567 varp = &argvars[off + 2];
15568
15569 if (win != NULL((void*)0) && varname != NULL((void*)0) && varp != NULL((void*)0)) {
15570 bool_Bool need_switch_win = tp != curtab || win != curwin;
15571 if (!need_switch_win
15572 || switch_win(&save_curwin, &save_curtab, win, tp, true1) == OK1) {
15573 if (*varname == '&') {
15574 long numval;
15575 char_u *strval;
15576 int error = false0;
15577
15578 ++varname;
15579 numval = get_tv_number_chk(varp, &error);
15580 strval = get_tv_string_buf_chk(varp, nbuf);
15581 if (!error && strval != NULL((void*)0)) {
15582 set_option_value(varname, numval, strval, OPT_LOCAL4);
15583 }
15584 } else {
15585 winvarname = xmalloc(STRLEN(varname)strlen((char *)(varname)) + 3);
15586 STRCPY(winvarname, "w:")strcpy((char *)(winvarname), (char *)("w:"));
15587 STRCPY(winvarname + 2, varname)strcpy((char *)(winvarname + 2), (char *)(varname));
15588 set_var(winvarname, varp, true1);
15589 xfree(winvarname);
15590 }
15591 }
15592 if (need_switch_win) {
15593 restore_win(save_curwin, save_curtab, true1);
15594 }
15595 }
15596}
15597
15598/// f_sha256 - sha256({string}) function
15599static void f_sha256(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
15600{
15601 char_u *p = get_tv_string(&argvars[0]);
15602 const char_u *hash = sha256_bytes(p, (int) STRLEN(p)strlen((char *)(p)) , NULL((void*)0), 0);
15603
15604 // make a copy of the hash (sha256_bytes returns a static buffer)
15605 rettv->vval.v_string = (char_u *) xstrdup((char *) hash);
15606 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
15607}
15608
15609/*
15610 * "shellescape({string})" function
15611 */
15612static void f_shellescape(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
15613{
15614 rettv->vval.v_string = vim_strsave_shellescape(
15615 get_tv_string(&argvars[0]), non_zero_arg(&argvars[1]), true1);
15616 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
15617}
15618
15619/*
15620 * shiftwidth() function
15621 */
15622static void f_shiftwidth(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
15623{
15624 rettv->vval.v_number = get_sw_value(curbuf);
15625}
15626
15627/*
15628 * "simplify()" function
15629 */
15630static void f_simplify(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
15631{
15632 char_u *p;
15633
15634 p = get_tv_string(&argvars[0]);
15635 rettv->vval.v_string = vim_strsave(p);
15636 simplify_filename(rettv->vval.v_string); /* simplify in place */
15637 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
15638}
15639
15640/*
15641 * "sin()" function
15642 */
15643static void f_sin(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
15644{
15645 float_op_wrapper(argvars, rettv, &sin);
15646}
15647
15648/*
15649 * "sinh()" function
15650 */
15651static void f_sinh(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
15652{
15653 float_op_wrapper(argvars, rettv, &sinh);
15654}
15655
15656/// struct used in the array that's given to qsort()
15657typedef struct {
15658 listitem_T *item;
15659 int idx;
15660} sortItem_T;
15661
15662static int item_compare_ic;
15663static bool_Bool item_compare_numeric;
15664static char_u *item_compare_func;
15665static dict_T *item_compare_selfdict;
15666static int item_compare_func_err;
15667#define ITEM_COMPARE_FAIL999 999
15668
15669/*
15670 * Compare functions for f_sort() and f_uniq() below.
15671 */
15672static int item_compare(const void *s1, const void *s2, bool_Bool keep_zero)
15673{
15674 sortItem_T *si1, *si2;
15675 char_u *p1;
15676 char_u *p2;
15677 char_u *tofree1 = NULL((void*)0);
15678 char_u *tofree2 = NULL((void*)0);
15679 int res;
15680
15681 si1 = (sortItem_T *)s1;
15682 si2 = (sortItem_T *)s2;
15683 typval_T *tv1 = &si1->item->li_tv;
15684 typval_T *tv2 = &si2->item->li_tv;
15685 // tv2string() puts quotes around a string and allocates memory. Don't do
15686 // that for string variables. Use a single quote when comparing with a
15687 // non-string to do what the docs promise.
15688 if (tv1->v_type == VAR_STRING2) {
15689 if (tv2->v_type != VAR_STRING2 || item_compare_numeric) {
15690 p1 = (char_u *)"'";
15691 } else {
15692 p1 = tv1->vval.v_string;
15693 }
15694 } else {
15695 tofree1 = p1 = (char_u *) tv2string(tv1, NULL((void*)0));
15696 }
15697 if (tv2->v_type == VAR_STRING2) {
15698 if (tv1->v_type != VAR_STRING2 || item_compare_numeric) {
15699 p2 = (char_u *)"'";
15700 } else {
15701 p2 = tv2->vval.v_string;
15702 }
15703 } else {
15704 tofree2 = p2 = (char_u *) tv2string(tv2, NULL((void*)0));
15705 }
15706 if (p1 == NULL((void*)0))
15707 p1 = (char_u *)"";
15708 if (p2 == NULL((void*)0))
15709 p2 = (char_u *)"";
15710 if (!item_compare_numeric) {
15711 if (item_compare_ic) {
15712 res = STRICMP(p1, p2)strcasecmp((char *)(p1), (char *)(p2));
15713 } else {
15714 res = STRCMP(p1, p2)strcmp((char *)(p1), (char *)(p2));
15715 }
15716 } else {
15717 double n1, n2;
15718 n1 = strtod((char *)p1, (char **)&p1);
15719 n2 = strtod((char *)p2, (char **)&p2);
15720 res = n1 == n2 ? 0 : n1 > n2 ? 1 : -1;
15721 }
15722
15723 // When the result would be zero, compare the item indexes. Makes the
15724 // sort stable.
15725 if (res == 0 && !keep_zero) {
15726 res = si1->idx > si2->idx ? 1 : -1;
15727 }
15728
15729 xfree(tofree1);
15730 xfree(tofree2);
15731 return res;
15732}
15733
15734static int item_compare_keeping_zero(const void *s1, const void *s2)
15735{
15736 return item_compare(s1, s2, true1);
15737}
15738
15739static int item_compare_not_keeping_zero(const void *s1, const void *s2)
15740{
15741 return item_compare(s1, s2, false0);
15742}
15743
15744static int item_compare2(const void *s1, const void *s2, bool_Bool keep_zero)
15745{
15746 sortItem_T *si1, *si2;
15747 int res;
15748 typval_T rettv;
15749 typval_T argv[3];
15750 int dummy;
15751
15752 /* shortcut after failure in previous call; compare all items equal */
15753 if (item_compare_func_err)
15754 return 0;
15755
15756 si1 = (sortItem_T *)s1;
15757 si2 = (sortItem_T *)s2;
15758
15759 // Copy the values. This is needed to be able to set v_lock to VAR_FIXED
15760 // in the copy without changing the original list items.
15761 copy_tv(&si1->item->li_tv, &argv[0]);
15762 copy_tv(&si2->item->li_tv, &argv[1]);
15763
15764 rettv.v_type = VAR_UNKNOWN0; /* clear_tv() uses this */
15765 res = call_func(item_compare_func, (int)STRLEN(item_compare_func)strlen((char *)(item_compare_func)),
15766 &rettv, 2, argv, 0L, 0L, &dummy, TRUE1,
15767 item_compare_selfdict);
15768 clear_tv(&argv[0]);
15769 clear_tv(&argv[1]);
15770
15771 if (res == FAIL0)
15772 res = ITEM_COMPARE_FAIL999;
15773 else
15774 res = get_tv_number_chk(&rettv, &item_compare_func_err);
15775 if (item_compare_func_err)
15776 res = ITEM_COMPARE_FAIL999; /* return value has wrong type */
15777 clear_tv(&rettv);
15778
15779 // When the result would be zero, compare the pointers themselves. Makes
15780 // the sort stable.
15781 if (res == 0 && !keep_zero) {
15782 res = si1->idx > si2->idx ? 1 : -1;
15783 }
15784
15785 return res;
15786}
15787
15788static int item_compare2_keeping_zero(const void *s1, const void *s2)
15789{
15790 return item_compare2(s1, s2, true1);
15791}
15792
15793static int item_compare2_not_keeping_zero(const void *s1, const void *s2)
15794{
15795 return item_compare2(s1, s2, false0);
15796}
15797
15798/*
15799 * "sort({list})" function
15800 */
15801static void do_sort_uniq(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv, bool_Bool sort)
15802{
15803 list_T *l;
15804 listitem_T *li;
15805 sortItem_T *ptrs;
15806 long len;
15807 long i;
15808
15809 if (argvars[0].v_type != VAR_LIST4) {
15810 EMSG2(_(e_listarg), sort ? "sort()" : "uniq()")emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_listarg))), (char_u *)(sort
? "sort()" : "uniq()"));
15811 } else {
15812 l = argvars[0].vval.v_list;
15813 if (l == NULL((void*)0) ||
15814 tv_check_lock(l->lv_lock,
15815 (char_u *)(sort
15816 ? N_("sort() argument")"sort() argument"
15817 : N_("uniq() argument")"uniq() argument"),
15818 true1)) {
15819 return;
15820 }
15821 rettv->vval.v_list = l;
15822 rettv->v_type = VAR_LIST4;
15823 ++l->lv_refcount;
15824
15825 len = list_len(l);
15826 if (len <= 1)
15827 return; /* short list sorts pretty quickly */
15828
15829 item_compare_ic = FALSE0;
15830 item_compare_numeric = false0;
15831 item_compare_func = NULL((void*)0);
15832 item_compare_selfdict = NULL((void*)0);
15833
15834 if (argvars[1].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
15835 /* optional second argument: {func} */
15836 if (argvars[1].v_type == VAR_FUNC3) {
15837 item_compare_func = argvars[1].vval.v_string;
15838 } else {
15839 int error = FALSE0;
15840
15841 i = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[1], &error);
15842 if (error)
15843 return; /* type error; errmsg already given */
15844 if (i == 1)
15845 item_compare_ic = TRUE1;
15846 else
15847 item_compare_func = get_tv_string(&argvars[1]);
15848 if (item_compare_func != NULL((void*)0)) {
15849 if (STRCMP(item_compare_func, "n")strcmp((char *)(item_compare_func), (char *)("n")) == 0) {
15850 item_compare_func = NULL((void*)0);
15851 item_compare_numeric = true1;
15852 } else if (STRCMP(item_compare_func, "i")strcmp((char *)(item_compare_func), (char *)("i")) == 0) {
15853 item_compare_func = NULL((void*)0);
15854 item_compare_ic = TRUE1;
15855 }
15856 }
15857 }
15858
15859 if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
15860 /* optional third argument: {dict} */
15861 if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_DICT5) {
15862 EMSG(_(e_dictreq))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_dictreq))));
15863 return;
15864 }
15865 item_compare_selfdict = argvars[2].vval.v_dict;
15866 }
15867 }
15868
15869 /* Make an array with each entry pointing to an item in the List. */
15870 ptrs = xmalloc((size_t)(len * sizeof (sortItem_T)));
15871
15872 i = 0;
15873 if (sort) {
15874 // sort(): ptrs will be the list to sort.
15875 for (li = l->lv_first; li != NULL((void*)0); li = li->li_next) {
15876 ptrs[i].item = li;
15877 ptrs[i].idx = i;
15878 i++;
15879 }
15880
15881 item_compare_func_err = FALSE0;
15882 // Test the compare function.
15883 if (item_compare_func != NULL((void*)0)
15884 && item_compare2_not_keeping_zero(&ptrs[0], &ptrs[1])
15885 == ITEM_COMPARE_FAIL999) {
15886 EMSG(_("E702: Sort compare function failed"))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)("E702: Sort compare function failed"
))));
15887 } else {
15888 // Sort the array with item pointers.
15889 qsort(ptrs, (size_t)len, sizeof (sortItem_T),
15890 item_compare_func == NULL((void*)0) ? item_compare_not_keeping_zero :
15891 item_compare2_not_keeping_zero);
15892
15893 if (!item_compare_func_err) {
15894 // Clear the list and append the items in the sorted order.
15895 l->lv_first = NULL((void*)0);
15896 l->lv_last = NULL((void*)0);
15897 l->lv_idx_item = NULL((void*)0);
15898 l->lv_len = 0;
15899
15900 for (i = 0; i < len; i++) {
15901 list_append(l, ptrs[i].item);
15902 }
15903 }
15904 }
15905 } else {
15906 int (*item_compare_func_ptr)(const void *, const void *);
15907
15908 // f_uniq(): ptrs will be a stack of items to remove.
15909 item_compare_func_err = FALSE0;
15910 item_compare_func_ptr = item_compare_func ? item_compare2_keeping_zero :
15911 item_compare_keeping_zero;
15912
15913 for (li = l->lv_first; li != NULL((void*)0) && li->li_next != NULL((void*)0); li = li->li_next) {
15914 if (item_compare_func_ptr(&li, &li->li_next) == 0) {
15915 ptrs[i++].item = li;
15916 }
15917 if (item_compare_func_err) {
15918 EMSG(_("E882: Uniq compare function failed"))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)("E882: Uniq compare function failed"
))));
15919 break;
15920 }
15921 }
15922
15923 if (!item_compare_func_err) {
15924 while (--i >= 0) {
15925 assert(ptrs[i].item->li_next)((ptrs[i].item->li_next) ? (void) (0) : __assert_fail ("ptrs[i].item->li_next"
, "/home/travis/build/neovim/bot-ci/build/neovim/src/nvim/eval.c"
, 15925, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));
15926 li = ptrs[i].item->li_next;
15927 ptrs[i].item->li_next = li->li_next;
15928 if (li->li_next != NULL((void*)0)) {
15929 li->li_next->li_prev = ptrs[i].item;
15930 } else {
15931 l->lv_last = ptrs[i].item;
15932 }
15933 list_fix_watch(l, li);
15934 listitem_free(li);
15935 l->lv_len--;
15936 }
15937 }
15938 }
15939
15940 xfree(ptrs);
15941 }
15942}
15943
15944/// "sort"({list})" function
15945static void f_sort(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
15946{
15947 do_sort_uniq(argvars, rettv, true1);
15948}
15949
15950/// "uniq({list})" function
15951static void f_uniq(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
15952{
15953 do_sort_uniq(argvars, rettv, false0);
15954}
15955
15956/*
15957 * "soundfold({word})" function
15958 */
15959static void f_soundfold(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
15960{
15961 char_u *s;
15962
15963 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
15964 s = get_tv_string(&argvars[0]);
15965 rettv->vval.v_string = eval_soundfold(s);
15966}
15967
15968/*
15969 * "spellbadword()" function
15970 */
15971static void f_spellbadword(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
15972{
15973 char_u *word = (char_u *)"";
15974 hlf_T attr = HLF_COUNT;
15975 size_t len = 0;
15976
15977 rettv_list_alloc(rettv);
15978
15979 if (argvars[0].v_type == VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
15980 /* Find the start and length of the badly spelled word. */
15981 len = spell_move_to(curwin, FORWARD1, TRUE1, TRUE1, &attr);
15982 if (len != 0)
15983 word = get_cursor_pos_ptr();
15984 } else if (curwin->w_p_spellw_onebuf_opt.wo_spell && *curbuf->b_s.b_p_spl != NUL'\000') {
15985 char_u *str = get_tv_string_chk(&argvars[0]);
15986 int capcol = -1;
15987
15988 if (str != NULL((void*)0)) {
15989 /* Check the argument for spelling. */
15990 while (*str != NUL'\000') {
15991 len = spell_check(curwin, str, &attr, &capcol, false0);
15992 if (attr != HLF_COUNT) {
15993 word = str;
15994 break;
15995 }
15996 str += len;
15997 }
15998 }
15999 }
16000
16001 assert(len <= INT_MAX)((len <= 2147483647) ? (void) (0) : __assert_fail ("len <= 2147483647"
, "/home/travis/build/neovim/bot-ci/build/neovim/src/nvim/eval.c"
, 16001, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));
16002 list_append_string(rettv->vval.v_list, word, (int)len);
16003 list_append_string(rettv->vval.v_list,
16004 (char_u *)(attr == HLF_SPB ? "bad" :
16005 attr == HLF_SPR ? "rare" :
16006 attr == HLF_SPL ? "local" :
16007 attr == HLF_SPC ? "caps" :
16008 ""),
16009 -1);
16010}
16011
16012/*
16013 * "spellsuggest()" function
16014 */
16015static void f_spellsuggest(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
16016{
16017 char_u *str;
16018 int typeerr = FALSE0;
16019 int maxcount;
16020 garray_T ga;
16021 listitem_T *li;
16022 bool_Bool need_capital = false0;
16023
16024 rettv_list_alloc(rettv);
16025
16026 if (curwin->w_p_spellw_onebuf_opt.wo_spell && *curwin->w_s->b_p_spl != NUL'\000') {
16027 str = get_tv_string(&argvars[0]);
16028 if (argvars[1].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
16029 maxcount = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[1], &typeerr);
16030 if (maxcount <= 0)
16031 return;
16032 if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
16033 need_capital = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[2], &typeerr);
16034 if (typeerr)
16035 return;
16036 }
16037 } else
16038 maxcount = 25;
16039
16040 spell_suggest_list(&ga, str, maxcount, need_capital, false0);
16041
16042 for (int i = 0; i < ga.ga_len; ++i) {
16043 str = ((char_u **)ga.ga_data)[i];
16044
16045 li = listitem_alloc();
16046 li->li_tv.v_type = VAR_STRING2;
16047 li->li_tv.v_lock = 0;
16048 li->li_tv.vval.v_string = str;
16049 list_append(rettv->vval.v_list, li);
16050 }
16051 ga_clear(&ga);
16052 }
16053}
16054
16055static void f_split(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
16056{
16057 char_u *str;
16058 char_u *end;
16059 char_u *pat = NULL((void*)0);
16060 regmatch_T regmatch;
16061 char_u patbuf[NUMBUFLEN65];
16062 char_u *save_cpo;
16063 int match;
16064 colnr_T col = 0;
16065 int keepempty = FALSE0;
16066 int typeerr = FALSE0;
16067
16068 /* Make 'cpoptions' empty, the 'l' flag should not be used here. */
16069 save_cpo = p_cpo;
16070 p_cpo = (char_u *)"";
16071
16072 str = get_tv_string(&argvars[0]);
16073 if (argvars[1].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
16074 pat = get_tv_string_buf_chk(&argvars[1], patbuf);
16075 if (pat == NULL((void*)0))
16076 typeerr = TRUE1;
16077 if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0)
16078 keepempty = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[2], &typeerr);
16079 }
16080 if (pat == NULL((void*)0) || *pat == NUL'\000')
16081 pat = (char_u *)"[\\x01- ]\\+";
16082
16083 rettv_list_alloc(rettv);
16084
16085 if (typeerr)
16086 return;
16087
16088 regmatch.regprog = vim_regcomp(pat, RE_MAGIC1 + RE_STRING2);
16089 if (regmatch.regprog != NULL((void*)0)) {
16090 regmatch.rm_ic = FALSE0;
16091 while (*str != NUL'\000' || keepempty) {
16092 if (*str == NUL'\000')
16093 match = FALSE0; /* empty item at the end */
16094 else
16095 match = vim_regexec_nl(&regmatch, str, col);
16096 if (match)
16097 end = regmatch.startp[0];
16098 else
16099 end = str + STRLEN(str)strlen((char *)(str));
16100 if (keepempty || end > str || (rettv->vval.v_list->lv_len > 0
16101 && *str != NUL'\000' && match && end <
16102 regmatch.endp[0])) {
16103 list_append_string(rettv->vval.v_list, str, (int)(end - str));
16104 }
16105 if (!match)
16106 break;
16107 /* Advance to just after the match. */
16108 if (regmatch.endp[0] > str)
16109 col = 0;
16110 else {
16111 /* Don't get stuck at the same match. */
16112 col = (*mb_ptr2len)(regmatch.endp[0]);
16113 }
16114 str = regmatch.endp[0];
16115 }
16116
16117 vim_regfree(regmatch.regprog);
16118 }
16119
16120 p_cpo = save_cpo;
16121}
16122
16123/*
16124 * "sqrt()" function
16125 */
16126static void f_sqrt(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
16127{
16128 float_op_wrapper(argvars, rettv, &sqrt);
16129}
16130
16131/*
16132 * "str2float()" function
16133 */
16134static void f_str2float(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
16135{
16136 char_u *p = skipwhite(get_tv_string(&argvars[0]));
16137
16138 if (*p == '+')
16139 p = skipwhite(p + 1);
16140 (void)string2float(p, &rettv->vval.v_float);
16141 rettv->v_type = VAR_FLOAT6;
16142}
16143
16144// "str2nr()" function
16145static void f_str2nr(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
16146{
16147 int base = 10;
16148 char_u *p;
16149 long n;
16150 int what;
16151
16152 if (argvars[1].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
16153 base = get_tv_number(&argvars[1]);
16154 if (base != 2 && base != 8 && base != 10 && base != 16) {
16155 EMSG(_(e_invarg))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_invarg))));
16156 return;
16157 }
16158 }
16159
16160 p = skipwhite(get_tv_string(&argvars[0]));
16161 if (*p == '+') {
16162 p = skipwhite(p + 1);
16163 }
16164 switch (base) {
16165 case 2:
16166 what = STR2NR_BIN1 + STR2NR_FORCE8;
16167 break;
16168 case 8:
16169 what = STR2NR_OCT2 + STR2NR_FORCE8;
16170 break;
16171 case 16:
16172 what = STR2NR_HEX4 + STR2NR_FORCE8;
16173 break;
16174 default:
16175 what = 0;
16176 }
16177 vim_str2nr(p, NULL((void*)0), NULL((void*)0), what, &n, NULL((void*)0), 0);
16178 rettv->vval.v_number = n;
16179}
16180
16181/*
16182 * "strftime({format}[, {time}])" function
16183 */
16184static void f_strftime(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
16185{
16186 char_u result_buf[256];
16187 time_t seconds;
16188 char_u *p;
16189
16190 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
16191
16192 p = get_tv_string(&argvars[0]);
16193 if (argvars[1].v_type == VAR_UNKNOWN0)
16194 seconds = time(NULL((void*)0));
16195 else
16196 seconds = (time_t)get_tv_number(&argvars[1]);
16197
16198 struct tm curtime;
16199 struct tm *curtime_ptr = os_localtime_r(&seconds, &curtime);
16200 /* MSVC returns NULL for an invalid value of seconds. */
16201 if (curtime_ptr == NULL((void*)0))
16202 rettv->vval.v_string = vim_strsave((char_u *)_("(Invalid)")gettext((char *)("(Invalid)")));
16203 else {
16204 vimconv_T conv;
16205 char_u *enc;
16206
16207 conv.vc_type = CONV_NONE0;
16208 enc = enc_locale();
16209 convert_setup(&conv, p_enc, enc);
16210 if (conv.vc_type != CONV_NONE0)
16211 p = string_convert(&conv, p, NULL((void*)0));
16212 if (p != NULL((void*)0))
16213 (void)strftime((char *)result_buf, sizeof(result_buf),
16214 (char *)p, curtime_ptr);
16215 else
16216 result_buf[0] = NUL'\000';
16217
16218 if (conv.vc_type != CONV_NONE0)
16219 xfree(p);
16220 convert_setup(&conv, enc, p_enc);
16221 if (conv.vc_type != CONV_NONE0)
16222 rettv->vval.v_string = string_convert(&conv, result_buf, NULL((void*)0));
16223 else
16224 rettv->vval.v_string = vim_strsave(result_buf);
16225
16226 /* Release conversion descriptors */
16227 convert_setup(&conv, NULL((void*)0), NULL((void*)0));
16228 xfree(enc);
16229 }
16230}
16231
16232/*
16233 * "stridx()" function
16234 */
16235static void f_stridx(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
16236{
16237 char_u buf[NUMBUFLEN65];
16238 char_u *needle;
16239 char_u *haystack;
16240 char_u *save_haystack;
16241 char_u *pos;
16242 int start_idx;
16243
16244 needle = get_tv_string_chk(&argvars[1]);
16245 save_haystack = haystack = get_tv_string_buf_chk(&argvars[0], buf);
16246 rettv->vval.v_number = -1;
16247 if (needle == NULL((void*)0) || haystack == NULL((void*)0))
16248 return; /* type error; errmsg already given */
16249
16250 if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
16251 int error = FALSE0;
16252
16253 start_idx = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[2], &error);
16254 if (error || start_idx >= (int)STRLEN(haystack)strlen((char *)(haystack)))
16255 return;
16256 if (start_idx >= 0)
16257 haystack += start_idx;
16258 }
16259
16260 pos = (char_u *)strstr((char *)haystack, (char *)needle);
16261 if (pos != NULL((void*)0))
16262 rettv->vval.v_number = (varnumber_T)(pos - save_haystack);
16263}
16264
16265/*
16266 * "string()" function
16267 */
16268static void f_string(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
16269{
16270 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
16271 rettv->vval.v_string = (char_u *) tv2string(&argvars[0], NULL((void*)0));
16272}
16273
16274/*
16275 * "strlen()" function
16276 */
16277static void f_strlen(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
16278{
16279 rettv->vval.v_number = (varnumber_T)(STRLEN(strlen((char *)(get_tv_string(&argvars[0])))
16280 get_tv_string(&argvars[0]))strlen((char *)(get_tv_string(&argvars[0]))));
16281}
16282
16283/*
16284 * "strchars()" function
16285 */
16286static void f_strchars(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
16287{
16288 char_u *s = get_tv_string(&argvars[0]);
16289 int skipcc = 0;
16290 varnumber_T len = 0;
16291 int (*func_mb_ptr2char_adv)(char_u **pp);
16292
16293 if (argvars[1].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
16294 skipcc = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[1], NULL((void*)0));
16295 }
16296 if (skipcc < 0 || skipcc > 1) {
16297 EMSG(_(e_invarg))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_invarg))));
16298 } else {
16299 func_mb_ptr2char_adv = skipcc ? mb_ptr2char_adv : mb_cptr2char_adv;
16300 while (*s != NUL'\000') {
16301 func_mb_ptr2char_adv(&s);
16302 ++len;
16303 }
16304 rettv->vval.v_number = len;
16305 }
16306}
16307
16308/*
16309 * "strdisplaywidth()" function
16310 */
16311static void f_strdisplaywidth(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
16312{
16313 char_u *s = get_tv_string(&argvars[0]);
16314 int col = 0;
16315
16316 if (argvars[1].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0)
16317 col = get_tv_number(&argvars[1]);
16318
16319 rettv->vval.v_number = (varnumber_T)(linetabsize_col(col, s) - col);
16320}
16321
16322/*
16323 * "strwidth()" function
16324 */
16325static void f_strwidth(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
16326{
16327 char_u *s = get_tv_string(&argvars[0]);
16328
16329 rettv->vval.v_number = (varnumber_T) mb_string2cells(s);
16330}
16331
16332/*
16333 * "strpart()" function
16334 */
16335static void f_strpart(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
16336{
16337 char_u *p;
16338 int n;
16339 int len;
16340 int slen;
16341 int error = FALSE0;
16342
16343 p = get_tv_string(&argvars[0]);
16344 slen = (int)STRLEN(p)strlen((char *)(p));
16345
16346 n = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[1], &error);
16347 if (error)
16348 len = 0;
16349 else if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0)
16350 len = get_tv_number(&argvars[2]);
16351 else
16352 len = slen - n; /* default len: all bytes that are available. */
16353
16354 /*
16355 * Only return the overlap between the specified part and the actual
16356 * string.
16357 */
16358 if (n < 0) {
16359 len += n;
16360 n = 0;
16361 } else if (n > slen)
16362 n = slen;
16363 if (len < 0)
16364 len = 0;
16365 else if (n + len > slen)
16366 len = slen - n;
16367
16368 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
16369 rettv->vval.v_string = vim_strnsave(p + n, len);
16370}
16371
16372/*
16373 * "strridx()" function
16374 */
16375static void f_strridx(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
16376{
16377 char_u buf[NUMBUFLEN65];
16378 char_u *needle;
16379 char_u *haystack;
16380 char_u *rest;
16381 char_u *lastmatch = NULL((void*)0);
16382 int haystack_len, end_idx;
16383
16384 needle = get_tv_string_chk(&argvars[1]);
16385 haystack = get_tv_string_buf_chk(&argvars[0], buf);
16386
16387 rettv->vval.v_number = -1;
16388 if (needle == NULL((void*)0) || haystack == NULL((void*)0))
16389 return; /* type error; errmsg already given */
16390
16391 haystack_len = (int)STRLEN(haystack)strlen((char *)(haystack));
16392 if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
16393 /* Third argument: upper limit for index */
16394 end_idx = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[2], NULL((void*)0));
16395 if (end_idx < 0)
16396 return; /* can never find a match */
16397 } else
16398 end_idx = haystack_len;
16399
16400 if (*needle == NUL'\000') {
16401 /* Empty string matches past the end. */
16402 lastmatch = haystack + end_idx;
16403 } else {
16404 for (rest = haystack; *rest != NUL'\000'; ++rest) {
16405 rest = (char_u *)strstr((char *)rest, (char *)needle);
16406 if (rest == NULL((void*)0) || rest > haystack + end_idx)
16407 break;
16408 lastmatch = rest;
16409 }
16410 }
16411
16412 if (lastmatch == NULL((void*)0))
16413 rettv->vval.v_number = -1;
16414 else
16415 rettv->vval.v_number = (varnumber_T)(lastmatch - haystack);
16416}
16417
16418/*
16419 * "strtrans()" function
16420 */
16421static void f_strtrans(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
16422{
16423 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
16424 rettv->vval.v_string = transstr(get_tv_string(&argvars[0]));
16425}
16426
16427/*
16428 * "submatch()" function
16429 */
16430static void f_submatch(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
16431{
16432 int error = FALSE0;
16433 int no = (int)get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[0], &error);
16434 if (error) {
16435 return;
16436 }
16437
16438 int retList = 0;
16439
16440 if (argvars[1].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
16441 retList = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[1], &error);
16442 if (error) {
16443 return;
16444 }
16445 }
16446
16447 if (retList == 0) {
16448 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
16449 rettv->vval.v_string = reg_submatch(no);
16450 } else {
16451 rettv->v_type = VAR_LIST4;
16452 rettv->vval.v_list = reg_submatch_list(no);
16453 }
16454}
16455
16456/*
16457 * "substitute()" function
16458 */
16459static void f_substitute(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
16460{
16461 char_u patbuf[NUMBUFLEN65];
16462 char_u subbuf[NUMBUFLEN65];
16463 char_u flagsbuf[NUMBUFLEN65];
16464
16465 char_u *str = get_tv_string_chk(&argvars[0]);
16466 char_u *pat = get_tv_string_buf_chk(&argvars[1], patbuf);
16467 char_u *sub = get_tv_string_buf_chk(&argvars[2], subbuf);
16468 char_u *flg = get_tv_string_buf_chk(&argvars[3], flagsbuf);
16469
16470 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
16471 if (str == NULL((void*)0) || pat == NULL((void*)0) || sub == NULL((void*)0) || flg == NULL((void*)0))
16472 rettv->vval.v_string = NULL((void*)0);
16473 else
16474 rettv->vval.v_string = do_string_sub(str, pat, sub, flg);
16475}
16476
16477/*
16478 * "synID(lnum, col, trans)" function
16479 */
16480static void f_synID(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
16481{
16482 int id = 0;
16483 long lnum;
16484 long col;
16485 int trans;
16486 int transerr = FALSE0;
16487
16488 lnum = get_tv_lnum(argvars); /* -1 on type error */
16489 col = get_tv_number(&argvars[1]) - 1; /* -1 on type error */
16490 trans = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[2], &transerr);
16491
16492 if (!transerr && lnum >= 1 && lnum <= curbuf->b_ml.ml_line_count
16493 && col >= 0 && col < (long)STRLEN(ml_get(lnum))strlen((char *)(ml_get(lnum))))
16494 id = syn_get_id(curwin, lnum, (colnr_T)col, trans, NULL((void*)0), FALSE0);
16495
16496 rettv->vval.v_number = id;
16497}
16498
16499/*
16500 * "synIDattr(id, what [, mode])" function
16501 */
16502static void f_synIDattr(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
16503{
16504 char_u *p = NULL((void*)0);
16505 int id;
16506 char_u *what;
16507 char_u *mode;
16508 char_u modebuf[NUMBUFLEN65];
16509 int modec;
16510
16511 id = get_tv_number(&argvars[0]);
16512 what = get_tv_string(&argvars[1]);
16513 if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
16514 mode = get_tv_string_buf(&argvars[2], modebuf);
16515 modec = TOLOWER_ASC(mode[0])(((mode[0]) < 'A' || (mode[0]) > 'Z') ? (mode[0]) : (mode
[0]) + ('a' - 'A'));
16516 if (modec != 'c' && modec != 'g')
16517 modec = 0; /* replace invalid with current */
16518 } else if (ui_rgb_attached()) {
16519 modec = 'g';
16520 } else {
16521 modec = 'c';
16522 }
16523
16524
16525 switch (TOLOWER_ASC(what[0])(((what[0]) < 'A' || (what[0]) > 'Z') ? (what[0]) : (what
[0]) + ('a' - 'A'))) {
16526 case 'b':
16527 if (TOLOWER_ASC(what[1])(((what[1]) < 'A' || (what[1]) > 'Z') ? (what[1]) : (what
[1]) + ('a' - 'A')) == 'g') /* bg[#] */
16528 p = highlight_color(id, what, modec);
16529 else /* bold */
16530 p = highlight_has_attr(id, HL_BOLD0x02, modec);
16531 break;
16532
16533 case 'f': /* fg[#] or font */
16534 p = highlight_color(id, what, modec);
16535 break;
16536
16537 case 'i':
16538 if (TOLOWER_ASC(what[1])(((what[1]) < 'A' || (what[1]) > 'Z') ? (what[1]) : (what
[1]) + ('a' - 'A')) == 'n') /* inverse */
16539 p = highlight_has_attr(id, HL_INVERSE0x01, modec);
16540 else /* italic */
16541 p = highlight_has_attr(id, HL_ITALIC0x04, modec);
16542 break;
16543
16544 case 'n': /* name */
16545 p = get_highlight_name(NULL((void*)0), id - 1);
16546 break;
16547
16548 case 'r': /* reverse */
16549 p = highlight_has_attr(id, HL_INVERSE0x01, modec);
16550 break;
16551
16552 case 's':
16553 if (TOLOWER_ASC(what[1])(((what[1]) < 'A' || (what[1]) > 'Z') ? (what[1]) : (what
[1]) + ('a' - 'A')) == 'p') /* sp[#] */
16554 p = highlight_color(id, what, modec);
16555 else /* standout */
16556 p = highlight_has_attr(id, HL_STANDOUT0x20, modec);
16557 break;
16558
16559 case 'u':
16560 if (STRLEN(what)strlen((char *)(what)) <= 5 || TOLOWER_ASC(what[5])(((what[5]) < 'A' || (what[5]) > 'Z') ? (what[5]) : (what
[5]) + ('a' - 'A')) != 'c')
16561 /* underline */
16562 p = highlight_has_attr(id, HL_UNDERLINE0x08, modec);
16563 else
16564 /* undercurl */
16565 p = highlight_has_attr(id, HL_UNDERCURL0x10, modec);
16566 break;
16567 }
16568
16569 if (p != NULL((void*)0))
16570 p = vim_strsave(p);
16571 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
16572 rettv->vval.v_string = p;
16573}
16574
16575/*
16576 * "synIDtrans(id)" function
16577 */
16578static void f_synIDtrans(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
16579{
16580 int id;
16581
16582 id = get_tv_number(&argvars[0]);
16583
16584 if (id > 0)
16585 id = syn_get_final_id(id);
16586 else
16587 id = 0;
16588
16589 rettv->vval.v_number = id;
16590}
16591
16592/*
16593 * "synconcealed(lnum, col)" function
16594 */
16595static void f_synconcealed(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
16596{
16597 long lnum;
16598 long col;
16599 int syntax_flags = 0;
16600 int cchar;
16601 int matchid = 0;
16602 char_u str[NUMBUFLEN65];
16603
16604 rettv->v_type = VAR_LIST4;
16605 rettv->vval.v_list = NULL((void*)0);
16606
16607 lnum = get_tv_lnum(argvars); /* -1 on type error */
16608 col = get_tv_number(&argvars[1]) - 1; /* -1 on type error */
16609
16610 memset(str, NUL'\000', sizeof(str));
16611
16612 rettv_list_alloc(rettv);
16613 if (lnum >= 1 && lnum <= curbuf->b_ml.ml_line_count && col >= 0
16614 && col <= (long)STRLEN(ml_get(lnum))strlen((char *)(ml_get(lnum))) && curwin->w_p_colew_onebuf_opt.wo_cole > 0) {
16615 (void)syn_get_id(curwin, lnum, col, FALSE0, NULL((void*)0), FALSE0);
16616 syntax_flags = get_syntax_info(&matchid);
16617
16618 // get the conceal character
16619 if ((syntax_flags & HL_CONCEAL0x20000) && curwin->w_p_colew_onebuf_opt.wo_cole < 3) {
16620 cchar = syn_get_sub_char();
16621 if (cchar == NUL'\000' && curwin->w_p_colew_onebuf_opt.wo_cole == 1 && lcs_conceal != NUL'\000') {
16622 cchar = lcs_conceal;
16623 }
16624 if (cchar != NUL'\000') {
16625 if (has_mbyte)
16626 (*mb_char2bytes)(cchar, str);
16627 else
16628 str[0] = cchar;
16629 }
16630 }
16631 }
16632
16633 list_append_number(rettv->vval.v_list, (syntax_flags & HL_CONCEAL0x20000) != 0);
16634 // -1 to auto-determine strlen
16635 list_append_string(rettv->vval.v_list, str, -1);
16636 list_append_number(rettv->vval.v_list, matchid);
16637}
16638
16639/*
16640 * "synstack(lnum, col)" function
16641 */
16642static void f_synstack(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
16643{
16644 long lnum;
16645 long col;
16646
16647 rettv->v_type = VAR_LIST4;
16648 rettv->vval.v_list = NULL((void*)0);
16649
16650 lnum = get_tv_lnum(argvars); /* -1 on type error */
16651 col = get_tv_number(&argvars[1]) - 1; /* -1 on type error */
16652
16653 if (lnum >= 1
16654 && lnum <= curbuf->b_ml.ml_line_count
16655 && col >= 0
16656 && col <= (long)STRLEN(ml_get(lnum))strlen((char *)(ml_get(lnum)))) {
16657 rettv_list_alloc(rettv);
16658 (void)syn_get_id(curwin, lnum, (colnr_T)col, FALSE0, NULL((void*)0), TRUE1);
16659
16660 int id;
16661 int i = 0;
16662 while ((id = syn_get_stack_item(i++)) >= 0) {
16663 list_append_number(rettv->vval.v_list, id);
16664 }
16665 }
16666}
16667
16668static list_T* string_to_list(char_u *str, size_t len, bool_Bool keepempty)
16669{
16670 list_T *list = list_alloc();
16671
16672 // Copy each line to a list element using NL as the delimiter.
16673 for (size_t i = 0; i < len; i++) {
16674 char_u *start = str + i;
16675 size_t line_len = (char_u *) xmemscan(start, NL'\012', len - i) - start;
16676 i += line_len;
16677
16678 // Don't use a str function to copy res as it may contains NULs.
16679 char_u *s = xmemdupz(start, line_len);
16680 memchrsub(s, NUL'\000', NL'\012', line_len); // Replace NUL with NL to avoid truncation
16681
16682 listitem_T *li = listitem_alloc();
16683 li->li_tv.v_type = VAR_STRING2;
16684 li->li_tv.v_lock = 0;
16685 li->li_tv.vval.v_string = s;
16686 list_append(list, li);
16687 }
16688
16689 // Optionally retain final newline, if present
16690 if (keepempty && str[len-1] == NL'\012') {
16691 list_append_string(list, (char_u*)"", 0);
16692 }
16693
16694 return list;
16695}
16696
16697static void get_system_output_as_rettv(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv,
16698 bool_Bool retlist)
16699{
16700 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
16701 rettv->vval.v_string = NULL((void*)0);
16702
16703 if (check_restricted() || check_secure()) {
16704 return;
16705 }
16706
16707 // get input to the shell command (if any), and its length
16708 ssize_t input_len;
16709 char *input = (char *) save_tv_as_string(&argvars[1], &input_len, false0);
16710 if (input_len < 0) {
16711 assert(input == NULL)((input == ((void*)0)) ? (void) (0) : __assert_fail ("input == ((void*)0)"
, "/home/travis/build/neovim/bot-ci/build/neovim/src/nvim/eval.c"
, 16711, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));
16712 return;
16713 }
16714
16715 // get shell command to execute
16716 char **argv = tv_to_argv(&argvars[0], NULL((void*)0));
16717 if (!argv) {
16718 xfree(input);
16719 return; // Already did emsg.
16720 }
16721
16722 // execute the command
16723 size_t nread = 0;
16724 char *res = NULL((void*)0);
16725 int status = os_system(argv, input, input_len, &res, &nread);
16726
16727 xfree(input);
16728
16729 set_vim_var_nr(VV_SHELL_ERROR, (long) status);
16730
16731 if (res == NULL((void*)0)) {
16732 if (retlist) {
16733 // return an empty list when there's no output
16734 rettv_list_alloc(rettv);
16735 } else {
16736 rettv->vval.v_string = (char_u *) xstrdup("");
16737 }
16738 return;
16739 }
16740
16741 if (retlist) {
16742 int keepempty = 0;
16743 if (argvars[1].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0 && argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
16744 keepempty = get_tv_number(&argvars[2]);
16745 }
16746 rettv->vval.v_list = string_to_list((char_u *) res, nread, keepempty != 0);
16747 rettv->vval.v_list->lv_refcount++;
16748 rettv->v_type = VAR_LIST4;
16749
16750 xfree(res);
16751 } else {
16752 // res may contain several NULs before the final terminating one.
16753 // Replace them with SOH (1) like in get_cmd_output() to avoid truncation.
16754 memchrsub(res, NUL'\000', 1, nread);
16755#ifdef USE_CRNL
16756 // translate <CR><NL> into <NL>
16757 char *d = res;
16758 for (char *s = res; *s; ++s) {
16759 if (s[0] == CAR'\015' && s[1] == NL'\012') {
16760 ++s;
16761 }
16762
16763 *d++ = *s;
16764 }
16765
16766 *d = NUL'\000';
16767#endif
16768 rettv->vval.v_string = (char_u *) res;
16769 }
16770}
16771
16772/// f_system - the VimL system() function
16773static void f_system(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
16774{
16775 get_system_output_as_rettv(argvars, rettv, false0);
16776}
16777
16778static void f_systemlist(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
16779{
16780 get_system_output_as_rettv(argvars, rettv, true1);
16781}
16782
16783
16784/*
16785 * "tabpagebuflist()" function
16786 */
16787static void f_tabpagebuflist(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
16788{
16789 tabpage_T *tp;
16790 win_T *wp = NULL((void*)0);
16791
16792 if (argvars[0].v_type == VAR_UNKNOWN0)
16793 wp = firstwin;
16794 else {
16795 tp = find_tabpage((int)get_tv_number(&argvars[0]));
16796 if (tp != NULL((void*)0))
16797 wp = (tp == curtab) ? firstwin : tp->tp_firstwin;
16798 }
16799 if (wp != NULL((void*)0)) {
16800 rettv_list_alloc(rettv);
16801 while (wp != NULL((void*)0)) {
16802 list_append_number(rettv->vval.v_list, wp->w_buffer->b_fnum);
16803 wp = wp->w_next;
16804 }
16805 }
16806}
16807
16808
16809/*
16810 * "tabpagenr()" function
16811 */
16812static void f_tabpagenr(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
16813{
16814 int nr = 1;
16815 char_u *arg;
16816
16817 if (argvars[0].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
16818 arg = get_tv_string_chk(&argvars[0]);
16819 nr = 0;
16820 if (arg != NULL((void*)0)) {
16821 if (STRCMP(arg, "$")strcmp((char *)(arg), (char *)("$")) == 0)
16822 nr = tabpage_index(NULL((void*)0)) - 1;
16823 else
16824 EMSG2(_(e_invexpr2), arg)emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_invexpr2))), (char_u *)(arg
));
16825 }
16826 } else
16827 nr = tabpage_index(curtab);
16828 rettv->vval.v_number = nr;
16829}
16830
16831
16832
16833/*
16834 * Common code for tabpagewinnr() and winnr().
16835 */
16836static int get_winnr(tabpage_T *tp, typval_T *argvar)
16837{
16838 win_T *twin;
16839 int nr = 1;
16840 win_T *wp;
16841 char_u *arg;
16842
16843 twin = (tp == curtab) ? curwin : tp->tp_curwin;
16844 if (argvar->v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
16845 arg = get_tv_string_chk(argvar);
16846 if (arg == NULL((void*)0))
16847 nr = 0; /* type error; errmsg already given */
16848 else if (STRCMP(arg, "$")strcmp((char *)(arg), (char *)("$")) == 0)
16849 twin = (tp == curtab) ? lastwin : tp->tp_lastwin;
16850 else if (STRCMP(arg, "#")strcmp((char *)(arg), (char *)("#")) == 0) {
16851 twin = (tp == curtab) ? prevwin : tp->tp_prevwin;
16852 if (twin == NULL((void*)0))
16853 nr = 0;
16854 } else {
16855 EMSG2(_(e_invexpr2), arg)emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_invexpr2))), (char_u *)(arg
));
16856 nr = 0;
16857 }
16858 }
16859
16860 if (nr > 0)
16861 for (wp = (tp == curtab) ? firstwin : tp->tp_firstwin;
16862 wp != twin; wp = wp->w_next) {
16863 if (wp == NULL((void*)0)) {
16864 /* didn't find it in this tabpage */
16865 nr = 0;
16866 break;
16867 }
16868 ++nr;
16869 }
16870 return nr;
16871}
16872
16873/*
16874 * "tabpagewinnr()" function
16875 */
16876static void f_tabpagewinnr(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
16877{
16878 int nr = 1;
16879 tabpage_T *tp;
16880
16881 tp = find_tabpage((int)get_tv_number(&argvars[0]));
16882 if (tp == NULL((void*)0))
16883 nr = 0;
16884 else
16885 nr = get_winnr(tp, &argvars[1]);
16886 rettv->vval.v_number = nr;
16887}
16888
16889
16890/*
16891 * "tagfiles()" function
16892 */
16893static void f_tagfiles(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
16894{
16895 char_u *fname;
16896 tagname_T tn;
16897
16898 rettv_list_alloc(rettv);
16899 fname = xmalloc(MAXPATHL4096);
16900
16901 int first = TRUE1;
16902 while (get_tagfname(&tn, first, fname) == OK1) {
16903 list_append_string(rettv->vval.v_list, fname, -1);
16904 first = FALSE0;
16905 }
16906
16907 tagname_free(&tn);
16908 xfree(fname);
16909}
16910
16911/*
16912 * "taglist()" function
16913 */
16914static void f_taglist(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
16915{
16916 char_u *tag_pattern;
16917
16918 tag_pattern = get_tv_string(&argvars[0]);
16919
16920 rettv->vval.v_number = FALSE0;
16921 if (*tag_pattern == NUL'\000')
16922 return;
16923
16924 (void)get_tags(rettv_list_alloc(rettv), tag_pattern);
16925}
16926
16927/*
16928 * "tempname()" function
16929 */
16930static void f_tempname(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
16931{
16932 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
16933 rettv->vval.v_string = vim_tempname();
16934}
16935
16936// "termopen(cmd[, cwd])" function
16937static void f_termopen(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
16938{
16939 if (check_restricted() || check_secure()) {
16940 return;
16941 }
16942
16943 if (curbuf->b_changed) {
16944 EMSG(_("Can only call this function in an unmodified buffer"))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)("Can only call this function in an unmodified buffer"
))));
16945 return;
16946 }
16947
16948 char *cmd;
16949 char **argv = tv_to_argv(&argvars[0], &cmd);
16950 if (!argv) {
16951 return; // Did error message in tv_to_argv.
16952 }
16953
16954 if (argvars[1].v_type != VAR_DICT5 && argvars[1].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
16955 // Wrong argument type
16956 EMSG2(_(e_invarg2), "expected dictionary")emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_invarg2))), (char_u *)("expected dictionary"
));
16957 shell_free_argv(argv);
16958 return;
16959 }
16960
16961 ufunc_T *on_stdout = NULL((void*)0), *on_stderr = NULL((void*)0), *on_exit = NULL((void*)0);
16962 dict_T *job_opts = NULL((void*)0);
16963 if (argvars[1].v_type == VAR_DICT5) {
16964 job_opts = argvars[1].vval.v_dict;
16965 if (!common_job_callbacks(job_opts, &on_stdout, &on_stderr, &on_exit)) {
16966 shell_free_argv(argv);
16967 return;
16968 }
16969 }
16970
16971 TerminalJobData *data = common_job_init(argv, on_stdout, on_stderr, on_exit,
16972 job_opts, true1, false0);
16973 data->proc.pty.width = curwin->w_width;
16974 data->proc.pty.height = curwin->w_height;
16975 data->proc.pty.term_name = xstrdup("xterm-256color");
16976 if (!common_job_start(data, rettv)) {
16977 return;
16978 }
16979 TerminalOptions topts;
16980 topts.data = data;
16981 topts.width = curwin->w_width;
16982 topts.height = curwin->w_height;
16983 topts.write_cb = term_write;
16984 topts.resize_cb = term_resize;
16985 topts.close_cb = term_close;
16986
16987 char *cwd = ".";
16988 if (argvars[1].v_type == VAR_STRING2
16989 && os_isdir(argvars[1].vval.v_string)) {
16990 cwd = (char *)argvars[1].vval.v_string;
16991 }
16992 int pid = data->proc.pty.process.pid;
16993
16994 char buf[1024];
16995 // format the title with the pid to conform with the term:// URI
16996 snprintf(buf, sizeof(buf), "term://%s//%d:%s", cwd, pid, cmd);
16997 // at this point the buffer has no terminal instance associated yet, so unset
16998 // the 'swapfile' option to ensure no swap file will be created
16999 curbuf->b_p_swf = false0;
17000 (void)setfname(curbuf, (uint8_t *)buf, NULL((void*)0), true1);
17001 // Save the job id and pid in b:terminal_job_{id,pid}
17002 Error err;
17003 dict_set_value(curbuf->b_vars, cstr_as_string("terminal_job_id"),
17004 INTEGER_OBJ(rettv->vval.v_number)((Object) { .type = kObjectTypeInteger, .data.integer = rettv
->vval.v_number }), &err);
17005 dict_set_value(curbuf->b_vars, cstr_as_string("terminal_job_pid"),
17006 INTEGER_OBJ(pid)((Object) { .type = kObjectTypeInteger, .data.integer = pid }
), &err);
17007
17008 Terminal *term = terminal_open(topts);
17009 data->term = term;
17010 data->refcount++;
17011
17012 return;
17013}
17014
17015/*
17016 * "test(list)" function: Just checking the walls...
17017 */
17018static void f_test(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
17019{
17020 /* Used for unit testing. Change the code below to your liking. */
17021}
17022
17023/*
17024 * "tan()" function
17025 */
17026static void f_tan(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
17027{
17028 float_op_wrapper(argvars, rettv, &tan);
17029}
17030
17031/*
17032 * "tanh()" function
17033 */
17034static void f_tanh(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
17035{
17036 float_op_wrapper(argvars, rettv, &tanh);
17037}
17038
17039/*
17040 * "tolower(string)" function
17041 */
17042static void f_tolower(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
17043{
17044 char_u *p = vim_strsave(get_tv_string(&argvars[0]));
17045 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
17046 rettv->vval.v_string = p;
17047
17048 while (*p != NUL'\000') {
17049 int l;
17050
17051 if (enc_utf8) {
17052 int c, lc;
17053
17054 c = utf_ptr2char(p);
17055 lc = utf_tolower(c);
17056 l = utf_ptr2len(p);
17057 /* TODO: reallocate string when byte count changes. */
17058 if (utf_char2len(lc) == l)
17059 utf_char2bytes(lc, p);
17060 p += l;
17061 } else if (has_mbyte && (l = (*mb_ptr2len)(p)) > 1)
17062 p += l; /* skip multi-byte character */
17063 else {
17064 *p = TOLOWER_LOCtolower(*p); /* note that tolower() can be a macro */
17065 ++p;
17066 }
17067 }
17068}
17069
17070/*
17071 * "toupper(string)" function
17072 */
17073static void f_toupper(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
17074{
17075 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
17076 rettv->vval.v_string = strup_save(get_tv_string(&argvars[0]));
17077}
17078
17079/*
17080 * "tr(string, fromstr, tostr)" function
17081 */
17082static void f_tr(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
17083{
17084 char_u *in_str;
17085 char_u *fromstr;
17086 char_u *tostr;
17087 char_u *p;
17088 int inlen;
17089 int fromlen;
17090 int tolen;
17091 int idx;
17092 char_u *cpstr;
17093 int cplen;
17094 int first = TRUE1;
17095 char_u buf[NUMBUFLEN65];
17096 char_u buf2[NUMBUFLEN65];
17097 garray_T ga;
17098
17099 in_str = get_tv_string(&argvars[0]);
17100 fromstr = get_tv_string_buf_chk(&argvars[1], buf);
17101 tostr = get_tv_string_buf_chk(&argvars[2], buf2);
17102
17103 /* Default return value: empty string. */
17104 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
17105 rettv->vval.v_string = NULL((void*)0);
17106 if (fromstr == NULL((void*)0) || tostr == NULL((void*)0))
17107 return; /* type error; errmsg already given */
17108 ga_init(&ga, (int)sizeof(char), 80);
17109
17110 if (!has_mbyte)
17111 /* not multi-byte: fromstr and tostr must be the same length */
17112 if (STRLEN(fromstr)strlen((char *)(fromstr)) != STRLEN(tostr)strlen((char *)(tostr))) {
17113error:
17114 EMSG2(_(e_invarg2), fromstr)emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_invarg2))), (char_u *)(fromstr
));
17115 ga_clear(&ga);
17116 return;
17117 }
17118
17119 /* fromstr and tostr have to contain the same number of chars */
17120 while (*in_str != NUL'\000') {
17121 if (has_mbyte) {
17122 inlen = (*mb_ptr2len)(in_str);
17123 cpstr = in_str;
17124 cplen = inlen;
17125 idx = 0;
17126 for (p = fromstr; *p != NUL'\000'; p += fromlen) {
17127 fromlen = (*mb_ptr2len)(p);
17128 if (fromlen == inlen && STRNCMP(in_str, p, inlen)strncmp((char *)(in_str), (char *)(p), (size_t)(inlen)) == 0) {
17129 for (p = tostr; *p != NUL'\000'; p += tolen) {
17130 tolen = (*mb_ptr2len)(p);
17131 if (idx-- == 0) {
17132 cplen = tolen;
17133 cpstr = p;
17134 break;
17135 }
17136 }
17137 if (*p == NUL'\000') /* tostr is shorter than fromstr */
17138 goto error;
17139 break;
17140 }
17141 ++idx;
17142 }
17143
17144 if (first && cpstr == in_str) {
17145 /* Check that fromstr and tostr have the same number of
17146 * (multi-byte) characters. Done only once when a character
17147 * of in_str doesn't appear in fromstr. */
17148 first = FALSE0;
17149 for (p = tostr; *p != NUL'\000'; p += tolen) {
17150 tolen = (*mb_ptr2len)(p);
17151 --idx;
17152 }
17153 if (idx != 0)
17154 goto error;
17155 }
17156
17157 ga_grow(&ga, cplen);
17158 memmove((char *)ga.ga_data + ga.ga_len, cpstr, (size_t)cplen);
17159 ga.ga_len += cplen;
17160
17161 in_str += inlen;
17162 } else {
17163 /* When not using multi-byte chars we can do it faster. */
17164 p = vim_strchr(fromstr, *in_str);
17165 if (p != NULL((void*)0))
17166 ga_append(&ga, tostr[p - fromstr]);
17167 else
17168 ga_append(&ga, *in_str);
17169 ++in_str;
17170 }
17171 }
17172
17173 // add a terminating NUL
17174 ga_append(&ga, NUL'\000');
17175
17176 rettv->vval.v_string = ga.ga_data;
17177}
17178
17179/*
17180 * "trunc({float})" function
17181 */
17182static void f_trunc(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
17183{
17184 float_op_wrapper(argvars, rettv, &trunc);
17185}
17186
17187/*
17188 * "type(expr)" function
17189 */
17190static void f_type(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
17191{
17192 int n;
17193
17194 switch (argvars[0].v_type) {
17195 case VAR_NUMBER1: n = 0; break;
17196 case VAR_STRING2: n = 1; break;
17197 case VAR_FUNC3: n = 2; break;
17198 case VAR_LIST4: n = 3; break;
17199 case VAR_DICT5: n = 4; break;
17200 case VAR_FLOAT6: n = 5; break;
17201 default: EMSG2(_(e_intern2), "f_type()")emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_intern2))), (char_u *)("f_type()"
)); n = 0; break;
17202 }
17203 rettv->vval.v_number = n;
17204}
17205
17206/*
17207 * "undofile(name)" function
17208 */
17209static void f_undofile(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
17210{
17211 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
17212 {
17213 char_u *fname = get_tv_string(&argvars[0]);
17214
17215 if (*fname == NUL'\000') {
17216 /* If there is no file name there will be no undo file. */
17217 rettv->vval.v_string = NULL((void*)0);
17218 } else {
17219 char *ffname = FullName_save((char *)fname, false0);
17220
17221 if (ffname != NULL((void*)0)) {
17222 rettv->vval.v_string = (char_u *)u_get_undo_file_name(ffname, false0);
17223 }
17224 xfree(ffname);
17225 }
17226 }
17227}
17228
17229/*
17230 * "undotree()" function
17231 */
17232static void f_undotree(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
17233{
17234 rettv_dict_alloc(rettv);
17235
17236 dict_T *dict = rettv->vval.v_dict;
17237 list_T *list;
17238
17239 dict_add_nr_str(dict, "synced", (long)curbuf->b_u_synced, NULL((void*)0));
17240 dict_add_nr_str(dict, "seq_last", curbuf->b_u_seq_last, NULL((void*)0));
17241 dict_add_nr_str(dict, "save_last",
17242 (long)curbuf->b_u_save_nr_last, NULL((void*)0));
17243 dict_add_nr_str(dict, "seq_cur", curbuf->b_u_seq_cur, NULL((void*)0));
17244 dict_add_nr_str(dict, "time_cur", (long)curbuf->b_u_time_cur, NULL((void*)0));
17245 dict_add_nr_str(dict, "save_cur", (long)curbuf->b_u_save_nr_cur, NULL((void*)0));
17246
17247 list = list_alloc();
17248 u_eval_tree(curbuf->b_u_oldhead, list);
17249 dict_add_list(dict, "entries", list);
17250}
17251

17253 * "values(dict)" function
17254 */
17255static void f_values(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
17256{
17257 dict_list(argvars, rettv, 1);
17258}
17259
17260/*
17261 * "virtcol(string)" function
17262 */
17263static void f_virtcol(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
17264{
17265 colnr_T vcol = 0;
17266 pos_T *fp;
17267 int fnum = curbuf->b_fnum;
17268
17269 fp = var2fpos(&argvars[0], FALSE0, &fnum);
17270 if (fp != NULL((void*)0) && fp->lnum <= curbuf->b_ml.ml_line_count
17271 && fnum == curbuf->b_fnum) {
17272 getvvcol(curwin, fp, NULL((void*)0), NULL((void*)0), &vcol);
17273 ++vcol;
17274 }
17275
17276 rettv->vval.v_number = vcol;
17277}
17278
17279/*
17280 * "visualmode()" function
17281 */
17282static void f_visualmode(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
17283{
17284 char_u str[2];
17285
17286 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
17287 str[0] = curbuf->b_visual_mode_eval;
17288 str[1] = NUL'\000';
17289 rettv->vval.v_string = vim_strsave(str);
17290
17291 /* A non-zero number or non-empty string argument: reset mode. */
17292 if (non_zero_arg(&argvars[0]))
17293 curbuf->b_visual_mode_eval = NUL'\000';
17294}

17300{
17301 if (wild_menu_showing)
17302 rettv->vval.v_number = 1;
17303}

17313 if (wp == NULL((void*)0))
17314 rettv->vval.v_number = -1;
17315 else
17316 rettv->vval.v_number = wp->w_buffer->b_fnum;
17317}

17326}

17337 rettv->vval.v_number = -1;
17338 else

17361
17362/*
17363 * "winrestcmd()" function
17364 */
17365static void f_winrestcmd(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
17366{
17367 int winnr = 1;
17368 garray_T ga;
17369 char_u buf[50];
17370
17371 ga_init(&ga, (int)sizeof(char), 70);
17372 FOR_ALL_WINDOWS_IN_TAB(wp, curtab)for (win_T *wp = ((curtab) == curtab) ? firstwin : (curtab)->
tp_firstwin; wp != ((void*)0); wp = wp->w_next) {
17373 sprintf((char *)buf, "%dresize %d|", winnr, wp->w_height);
17374 ga_concat(&ga, buf);
17375 sprintf((char *)buf, "vert %dresize %d|", winnr, wp->w_width);
17376 ga_concat(&ga, buf);
17377 ++winnr;
17378 }
17379 ga_append(&ga, NUL'\000');
17380
17381 rettv->vval.v_string = ga.ga_data;
17382 rettv->v_type = VAR_STRING2;
17383}
17384
17385/*
17386 * "winrestview()" function
17387 */
17388static void f_winrestview(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
17389{
17390 dict_T *dict;
17391
17392 if (argvars[0].v_type != VAR_DICT5
17393 || (dict = argvars[0].vval.v_dict) == NULL((void*)0))
17394 EMSG(_(e_invarg))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_invarg))));
17395 else {
17396 if (dict_find(dict, (char_u *)"lnum", -1) != NULL((void*)0)) {
17397 curwin->w_cursor.lnum = get_dict_number(dict, (char_u *)"lnum");
17398 }
17399 if (dict_find(dict, (char_u *)"col", -1) != NULL((void*)0)) {
17400 curwin->w_cursor.col = get_dict_number(dict, (char_u *)"col");
17401 }
17402 if (dict_find(dict, (char_u *)"coladd", -1) != NULL((void*)0)) {
17403 curwin->w_cursor.coladd = get_dict_number(dict, (char_u *)"coladd");
17404 }
17405 if (dict_find(dict, (char_u *)"curswant", -1) != NULL((void*)0)) {
17406 curwin->w_curswant = get_dict_number(dict, (char_u *)"curswant");
17407 curwin->w_set_curswant = FALSE0;
17408 }
17409 if (dict_find(dict, (char_u *)"topline", -1) != NULL((void*)0)) {
17410 set_topline(curwin, get_dict_number(dict, (char_u *)"topline"));
17411 }
17412 if (dict_find(dict, (char_u *)"topfill", -1) != NULL((void*)0)) {
17413 curwin->w_topfill = get_dict_number(dict, (char_u *)"topfill");
17414 }
17415 if (dict_find(dict, (char_u *)"leftcol", -1) != NULL((void*)0)) {
17416 curwin->w_leftcol = get_dict_number(dict, (char_u *)"leftcol");
17417 }
17418 if (dict_find(dict, (char_u *)"skipcol", -1) != NULL((void*)0)) {
17419 curwin->w_skipcol = get_dict_number(dict, (char_u *)"skipcol");
17420 }
17421
17422 check_cursor();
17423 win_new_height(curwin, curwin->w_height);
17424 win_new_width(curwin, curwin->w_width);
17425 changed_window_setting();
17426
17427 if (curwin->w_topline <= 0)
17428 curwin->w_topline = 1;
17429 if (curwin->w_topline > curbuf->b_ml.ml_line_count)
17430 curwin->w_topline = curbuf->b_ml.ml_line_count;
17431 check_topfill(curwin, true1);
17432 }
17433}
17434
17435/*
17436 * "winsaveview()" function
17437 */
17438static void f_winsaveview(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
17439{
17440 dict_T *dict;
17441
17442 rettv_dict_alloc(rettv);
17443 dict = rettv->vval.v_dict;
17444
17445 dict_add_nr_str(dict, "lnum", (long)curwin->w_cursor.lnum, NULL((void*)0));
17446 dict_add_nr_str(dict, "col", (long)curwin->w_cursor.col, NULL((void*)0));
17447 dict_add_nr_str(dict, "coladd", (long)curwin->w_cursor.coladd, NULL((void*)0));
17448 update_curswant();
17449 dict_add_nr_str(dict, "curswant", (long)curwin->w_curswant, NULL((void*)0));
17450
17451 dict_add_nr_str(dict, "topline", (long)curwin->w_topline, NULL((void*)0));
17452 dict_add_nr_str(dict, "topfill", (long)curwin->w_topfill, NULL((void*)0));
17453 dict_add_nr_str(dict, "leftcol", (long)curwin->w_leftcol, NULL((void*)0));
17454 dict_add_nr_str(dict, "skipcol", (long)curwin->w_skipcol, NULL((void*)0));
17455}
17456
17457/// Writes list of strings to file
17458static bool_Bool write_list(FILE *fd, list_T *list, bool_Bool binary)
17459{
17460 int ret = true1;
17461
17462 for (listitem_T *li = list->lv_first; li != NULL((void*)0); li = li->li_next) {
17463 for (char_u *s = get_tv_string(&li->li_tv); *s != NUL'\000'; ++s) {
17464 if (putc(*s == '\n' ? NUL : *s, fd)_IO_putc (*s == '\n' ? '\000' : *s, fd) == EOF(-1)) {
17465 ret = false0;
17466 break;
17467 }
17468 }
17469 if (!binary || li->li_next != NULL((void*)0)) {
17470 if (putc('\n', fd)_IO_putc ('\n', fd) == EOF(-1)) {
17471 ret = false0;
17472 break;
17473 }
17474 }
17475 if (ret == false0) {
17476 EMSG(_(e_write))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_write))));
17477 break;
17478 }
17479 }
17480 return ret;
17481}
17482
17483/// Saves a typval_T as a string.
17484///
17485/// For lists, replaces NLs with NUL and separates items with NLs.
17486///
17487/// @param[in] tv A value to store as a string.
17488/// @param[out] len The length of the resulting string or -1 on error.
17489/// @param[in] endnl If true, the output will end in a newline (if a list).
17490/// @returns an allocated string if `tv` represents a VimL string, list, or
17491/// number; NULL otherwise.
17492static char_u *save_tv_as_string(typval_T *tv, ssize_t *len, bool_Bool endnl)
17493 FUNC_ATTR_MALLOC FUNC_ATTR_NONNULL_ALL
17494{
17495 if (tv->v_type == VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
17496 *len = 0;
17497 return NULL((void*)0);
17498 }
17499
17500 // For types other than list, let get_tv_string_buf_chk() get the value or
17501 // print an error.
17502 if (tv->v_type != VAR_LIST4) {
17503 char_u *ret = get_tv_string_chk(tv);
17504 if (ret && (*len = STRLEN(ret)strlen((char *)(ret)))) {
17505 ret = vim_strsave(ret);
17506 } else {
17507 ret = NULL((void*)0);
17508 *len = -1;
17509 }
17510 return ret;
17511 }
17512
17513 // Pre-calculate the resulting length.
17514 *len = 0;
17515 list_T *list = tv->vval.v_list;
17516 for (listitem_T *li = list->lv_first; li != NULL((void*)0); li = li->li_next) {
17517 *len += STRLEN(get_tv_string(&li->li_tv))strlen((char *)(get_tv_string(&li->li_tv))) + 1;
17518 }
17519
17520 if (*len == 0) {
17521 return NULL((void*)0);
17522 }
17523
17524 char_u *ret = xmalloc(*len + endnl);
17525 char_u *end = ret;
17526 for (listitem_T *li = list->lv_first; li != NULL((void*)0); li = li->li_next) {
17527 for (char_u *s = get_tv_string(&li->li_tv); *s != NUL'\000'; s++) {
17528 *end++ = (*s == '\n') ? NUL'\000' : *s;
17529 }
17530 if (endnl || li->li_next != NULL((void*)0)) {
17531 *end++ = '\n';
17532 }
17533 }
17534 *end = NUL'\000';
17535 *len = end - ret;
17536 return ret;
17537}
17538
17539/*
17540 * "winwidth(nr)" function
17541 */
17542static void f_winwidth(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
17543{
17544 win_T *wp;
17545
17546 wp = find_win_by_nr(&argvars[0], NULL((void*)0));
17547 if (wp == NULL((void*)0))
17548 rettv->vval.v_number = -1;
17549 else
17550 rettv->vval.v_number = wp->w_width;
17551}
17552
17553/// "writefile()" function
17554static void f_writefile(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
17555{
17556 rettv->vval.v_number = 0; // Assuming success.
17557
17558 if (check_restricted() || check_secure()) {
17559 return;
17560 }
17561
17562 if (argvars[0].v_type != VAR_LIST4) {
17563 EMSG2(_(e_listarg), "writefile()")emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_listarg))), (char_u *)("writefile()"
));
17564 return;
17565 }
17566 if (argvars[0].vval.v_list == NULL((void*)0)) {
17567 return;
17568 }
17569
17570 bool_Bool binary = false0;
17571 bool_Bool append = false0;
17572 if (argvars[2].v_type != VAR_UNKNOWN0) {
17573 if (vim_strchr(get_tv_string(&argvars[2]), 'b')) {
17574 binary = true1;
17575 }
17576 if (vim_strchr(get_tv_string(&argvars[2]), 'a')) {
17577 append = true1;
17578 }
17579 }
17580
17581 // Always open the file in binary mode, library functions have a mind of
17582 // their own about CR-LF conversion.
17583 char_u *fname = get_tv_string(&argvars[1]);
17584 FILE *fd;
17585 if (*fname == NUL'\000' || (fd = mch_fopen((char *)fname,fopen(((char *)fname), (append ? "ab" : "wb"))
17586 append ? APPENDBIN : WRITEBIN)fopen(((char *)fname), (append ? "ab" : "wb"))) == NULL((void*)0)) {
17587 EMSG2(_(e_notcreate), *fname == NUL ? (char_u *)_("<empty>") : fname)emsg2((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_notcreate))), (char_u *)(
*fname == '\000' ? (char_u *)gettext((char *)("<empty>"
)) : fname));
17588 rettv->vval.v_number = -1;
17589 } else {
17590 if (write_list(fd, argvars[0].vval.v_list, binary) == false0) {
17591 rettv->vval.v_number = -1;
17592 }
17593 fclose(fd);
17594 }
17595}
17596/*
17597 * "xor(expr, expr)" function
17598 */
17599static void f_xor(typval_T *argvars, typval_T *rettv)
17600{
17601 rettv->vval.v_number = get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[0], NULL((void*)0))
17602 ^ get_tv_number_chk(&argvars[1], NULL((void*)0));
17603}
17604
17605
17606/*
17607 * Translate a String variable into a position.
17608 * Returns NULL when there is an error.
17609 */
17610static pos_T *
17611var2fpos (
17612 typval_T *varp,
17613 int dollar_lnum, /* TRUE when $ is last line */
17614 int *fnum /* set to fnum for '0, 'A, etc. */
17615)
17616{
17617 char_u *name;
17618 static pos_T pos;
17619 pos_T *pp;
17620
17621 /* Argument can be [lnum, col, coladd]. */
17622 if (varp->v_type == VAR_LIST4) {
17623 list_T *l;
17624 int len;
17625 int error = FALSE0;
17626 listitem_T *li;
17627
17628 l = varp->vval.v_list;
17629 if (l == NULL((void*)0))
17630 return NULL((void*)0);
17631
17632 /* Get the line number */
17633 pos.lnum = list_find_nr(l, 0L, &error);
17634 if (error || pos.lnum <= 0 || pos.lnum > curbuf->b_ml.ml_line_count)
17635 return NULL((void*)0); /* invalid line number */
17636
17637 /* Get the column number */
17638 pos.col = list_find_nr(l, 1L, &error);
17639 if (error)
17640 return NULL((void*)0);
17641 len = (long)STRLEN(ml_get(pos.lnum))strlen((char *)(ml_get(pos.lnum)));
17642
17643 /* We accept "$" for the column number: last column. */
17644 li = list_find(l, 1L);
17645 if (li != NULL((void*)0) && li->li_tv.v_type == VAR_STRING2
17646 && li->li_tv.vval.v_string != NULL((void*)0)
17647 && STRCMP(li->li_tv.vval.v_string, "$")strcmp((char *)(li->li_tv.vval.v_string), (char *)("$")) == 0)
17648 pos.col = len + 1;
17649
17650 /* Accept a position up to the NUL after the line. */
17651 if (pos.col == 0 || (int)pos.col > len + 1)
17652 return NULL((void*)0); /* invalid column number */
17653 --pos.col;
17654
17655 /* Get the virtual offset. Defaults to zero. */
17656 pos.coladd = list_find_nr(l, 2L, &error);
17657 if (error)
17658 pos.coladd = 0;
17659
17660 return &pos;
17661 }
17662
17663 name = get_tv_string_chk(varp);
17664 if (name == NULL((void*)0))
17665 return NULL((void*)0);
17666 if (name[0] == '.') /* cursor */
17667 return &curwin->w_cursor;
17668 if (name[0] == 'v' && name[1] == NUL'\000') { /* Visual start */
17669 if (VIsual_active)
17670 return &VIsual;
17671 return &curwin->w_cursor;
17672 }
17673 if (name[0] == '\'') { /* mark */
17674 pp = getmark_buf_fnum(curbuf, name[1], FALSE0, fnum);
17675 if (pp == NULL((void*)0) || pp == (pos_T *)-1 || pp->lnum <= 0)
17676 return NULL((void*)0);
17677 return pp;
17678 }
17679
17680 pos.coladd = 0;
17681
17682 if (name[0] == 'w' && dollar_lnum) {
17683 pos.col = 0;
17684 if (name[1] == '0') { /* "w0": first visible line */
17685 update_topline();
17686 pos.lnum = curwin->w_topline;
17687 return &pos;
17688 } else if (name[1] == '$') { /* "w$": last visible line */
17689 validate_botline();
17690 pos.lnum = curwin->w_botline - 1;
17691 return &pos;
17692 }
17693 } else if (name[0] == '$') { /* last column or line */
17694 if (dollar_lnum) {
17695 pos.lnum = curbuf->b_ml.ml_line_count;
17696 pos.col = 0;
17697 } else {
17698 pos.lnum = curwin->w_cursor.lnum;
17699 pos.col = (colnr_T)STRLEN(get_cursor_line_ptr())strlen((char *)(get_cursor_line_ptr()));
17700 }
17701 return &pos;
17702 }
17703 return NULL((void*)0);
17704}
17705
17706/*
17707 * Convert list in "arg" into a position and optional file number.
17708 * When "fnump" is NULL there is no file number, only 3 items.
17709 * Note that the column is passed on as-is, the caller may want to decrement
17710 * it to use 1 for the first column.
17711 * Return FAIL when conversion is not possible, doesn't check the position for
17712 * validity.
17713 */
17714static int list2fpos(typval_T *arg, pos_T *posp, int *fnump, colnr_T *curswantp)
17715{
17716 list_T *l = arg->vval.v_list;
17717 long i = 0;
17718 long n;
17719
17720 /* List must be: [fnum, lnum, col, coladd, curswant], where "fnum" is only
17721 * there when "fnump" isn't NULL; "coladd" and "curswant" are optional. */
17722 if (arg->v_type != VAR_LIST4
17723 || l == NULL((void*)0)
17724 || l->lv_len < (fnump == NULL((void*)0) ? 2 : 3)
17725 || l->lv_len > (fnump == NULL((void*)0) ? 4 : 5))
17726 return FAIL0;
17727
17728 if (fnump != NULL((void*)0)) {
17729 n = list_find_nr(l, i++, NULL((void*)0)); /* fnum */
17730 if (n < 0)
17731 return FAIL0;
17732 if (n == 0)
17733 n = curbuf->b_fnum; /* current buffer */
17734 *fnump = n;
17735 }
17736
17737 n = list_find_nr(l, i++, NULL((void*)0)); /* lnum */
17738 if (n < 0)
17739 return FAIL0;
17740 posp->lnum = n;
17741
17742 n = list_find_nr(l, i++, NULL((void*)0)); /* col */
17743 if (n < 0)
17744 return FAIL0;
17745 posp->col = n;
17746
17747 n = list_find_nr(l, i, NULL((void*)0)); // off
17748 if (n < 0)
17749 posp->coladd = 0;
17750 else
17751 posp->coladd = n;
17752
17753 if (curswantp != NULL((void*)0)) {
17754 *curswantp = list_find_nr(l, i + 1, NULL((void*)0)); // curswant
17755 }
17756
17757 return OK1;
17758}
17759
17760/*
17761 * Get the length of an environment variable name.
